165b5(rgyud 'grel): yis mtshan// rin chen sna lnga phyogs kyi rtsig pa la// rang 'byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od dang bcas// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba mchog brgyad spras// rin chen me tog mu tig phreng bas mdzes// gzugs sgra dr-i ro reg gi lha mo
165b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khyug/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshon bla re rnga yab dang // zla phyed rdo rje rin chen ba den dpyangs dril bu snyan pa'i sgra snyan mtha' dag sgrogs// re'u cha brgyad pa'i thig bzhi phye ba la// sna tshogs pad mtshan mu khyud rdo rje can//
166a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyi re'u char bum pa gang ba bzhi// bdud rtsi'i bcud ldan rgyan dang mtshan mas mdzes// re'u mig phyi ma kun tu 'khor lo'i tshul// mtshams med rdo rje'i phreng ba dag dang ldan// phyi rol ra ba rim
166a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gnas pa'i rgyab// phyi yi lcags ri rdo rje ra ba'i nang // phyogs dang mtsham su dur khrod chen po brgyad// shing brgyad ngos ni zhing skyong lus phyed s+ho// gdong pa phyogs skyong brgyad kyi gangadan deng ma// g.yas kyi
166a3(rgyud 'grel): gri khug g.yon na thod pa 'dzin// mtsho brgyad nang na klu brgyad lus phyed bton// thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan phyogasu gus// shing brgyad drung du rnal 'byor 'khor bcas gnas// sprin dang mchod rten rang 'byung mkha'
166a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i tshogs// ro langs sha za 'byung po mang gnas shing // ro dang byo khyi ce spyang rnam par 'dres// de dus drag byed mkha'agro lha tshogs la// 'dzam bu'i gling bzhin dur khrod rnam par snang // phyi rol dpag bsam bum pa
166a5(rgyud 'grel): bya dang shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis rnam par mdzes// dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan dag la// dpal mchog dang po bzhugs mdzad do// chos kun stong nying mtshan mar bral// smon mod rang bzhin 'od gsol
166a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ ting 'dzin la bzhugs byams par gnas// 'gog pa'i rang bzhin la gnas pa// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de// mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur gyur// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// a
166b1(rgyud 'grel): yig bcu drug gnas pa las// thugs rje chen po shar byed pa'i// nyi dkyil ka yig sum cu bzhi// lce rtsa can bzhi mi gsal gnyis// skar ma'i gzugs 'dra bsgom par bya// de dag 'phro zhing 'dus pa yis// tshogs grwanyi
166b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs// ye shes dang po gnyis ston cing // byang chub sems gnyis mtshan nyid do// gsum pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar gsal dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan// bum par hUM mtshan rnam gsal ba// tshogs gnyis
166b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu yongs rdzogs rtags// kha dog lnga ni snang ba las// rigs drug dkyil 'khor bsam byas pas// rang gi gnas rnams sbyong mdzad cing // dkyil 'khor so so'i 'khor bcas la// slar 'dus sku gsung thugs zhugs
166b4(rgyud 'grel): pas// rdo rje'i 'od bcas chen por gyur// ye shes pa rapa gnyis ston cing // byang chub sems nyid mtshan nyid do// lnga pa cho ga rdzogs pa las// rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhengs te// ye shes byang sems lnga pa las/
166b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen por gsal ba yin// oM badz+ra a haM/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa a/ dzeHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ gang ri rdul bral me shel 'od// rin chen lnga yaMs gzer phreng mdzes// sgeg dgyes 'dzub mig bcas pa'i
166b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// dkar mthing ser mchog 'bar ba'i mdangs// zhal mang phyag bzhi sgeg bshad 'i chang // g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// snyems bcus gsor zhing thugs kar brten// g.yon pa kha T+wAM rgya gram can// dril bu ba dan
167a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa 'khrol// 'og ma gnyis kyi mnga' dang gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes// stong g.yogs dar dkar gser ris can// sku smang tshig gu'i na bza' gsol// rin chen 'phreng ba'i
167a2(rgyud 'grel): can// mgul gdung do shal dpung rgyan dang // phyag 'bas gdu bus mo do// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya nI// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi ba gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs stsogs rnam par bsam/
167a3(rgyud 'grel): na mo sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+Shit+ta/ gu Na badz+ra b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnamasu// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// mthe bo
167a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dbu nga mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mor bya// sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol// rtse mo nang du spang byas nas// sna dang mig jug lta bu ste/ 'di
167a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mgo bo'i gnas lngar gtug// dar dbyangs bcing zhing mtha' nas dgrol/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsau mAM/ hAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rat+nom+b+ha le a d+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ paT laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ badz+rI tuSh+ya ho/ yon na cha la na rA ye/ za ma
167a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog sku lta bur// phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// oM AHhUM// thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i
167b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' hUM dang bcas// dkyil 'khor spyan drangs lha mo yi// khrus byas dri ma gsum dag nus// dbang bskur 'bras bu bsam par bya// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu'o// khams gsum dag na rin chen gzhan//
167b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin po che// dbu rgyan du ni bde bas mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrogs pa// lha yi chu yi dag pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // dar dbyangs sogs kyis brgyan
167b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mkha' gsang hUM las byung ba yi// rdo rje pad bcas nor+ya bus mtshan// pad+ma 'dab brgyad a dang bcas// mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar// sha ta pa la sogs brda yis// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sbyor ldan bya// lha mo'i rol spyod
167b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang byas pas// dkyil 'khor mnyes pa'i las bya'o// oM pra be sha phaT/ a la la l-i la ho/ ling ga 'greng ba rang 'byung ste// brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas// ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nos// rdo rje sems dpa' de kun dag/
167b5(rgyud 'grel): ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas// 'dod dgur bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'a 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // bde ba chen po'i 'od zer las// lha mo bcu gnyis tshul 'dra bar// phyogs dus sangs rgyas yab yum rnams// dga' ba
167b6(rgyud 'grel): chen pos mnyes par mdzad// rdul phran yi ge'i dbyibasu gyur// gang zhig zhal du zhugs pa las// bde ba chen po'i gnasu 'dus// 'khor lo bzhi nas rim bzhin spro// brti ka ta'i gnas 'byung ste// bde chen chags dang gnyis
168a1(rgyud 'grel): med 'dres// khams gsum 'gro ba'i rgyud bsregs nas// rigs drug sa so'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub// rnal 'byor dag pa'i rgyud bskul zhing // rnam gsum dkyil 'khor bsal bar sdug// sla
168a2(rgyud 'grel): sa gnas su gzhal yas khang // rgyan dang gdan bcas sngon bzhin 'byung // thig les gnas su mtshan byas nas// spros pas ye shes dkyil 'khor gisal// hUM las rdo rje sems dpa' ste// gsang gnas dbus kyi
168a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la'o// dzaHlas lha mo bde mchog ma// hUM las e ma bde ba'o// baM las lha mo snang mdzad ma// ho la so slob ma mo yi rgya// de dag sems dpa'i phyogs bzhi nas// 'khril pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// oM lA s+t+ra stangs
168a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub ma// b+h+rUM las chos kyi 'khor lo yin// ha las khams gsum rnam rgyal te// khaM las 'dod pa kun mdzad ma'o// de dag shar la stsogs pa yi// phyogs bzhi yi ni re tshwa la'o// A~M las gling bu tAM pI baM/
168a5(rgyud 'grel): ba lasau rnga chen d+hArdza dzaM// me mtshams la sogs re mgalha mo bzhi ni rim bzhin bzhugs// a A me tog spos me ma// AM aHmar me dri chab ma'o// ba ra khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru// lha myo bzhi ni granas
168a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// dzaM las rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma// hUM las pag gdong mche ba can// baM las nyi zla ma 'bar ma// ho las thal byed sgo bzhir gnas// b+ha ga'i gnas nas spro bya zhing // slar 'dus phyi rol gnas la 'khod// rdo rje sems
168b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i gzugs 'dra ba// sku gnyis 'phro 'dus rang la gzhug/ dzaM badz+ra tri sa ma ya phaT/ lha mo byade mchog 'gying bag can// dkar mo sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// phyag gnyis mnga' gzhu 'gengs pa ste// 'phro 'du las mdzad
168b2(rgyud 'grel): shar du bzhugs// oM badz+ri kI li kI la hUM/ oM ma bde ba gser gyi mdog/ g.yas pas bdag po la 'khyud cing // g.yon pas rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// 'gying bcas lho yi phyogasu gnas// baM badz+ra Ni sma ra raT/ snang mdzad
168b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo g.yas pa na// sna tshogs rdo rje g.yon dag gis// 'gying bcas thod pa'i snod thogs shing // kha T+wA~M la brten nub phyogs gnas// ho badz+ra kA me shwa ri tra// slob ma mo 'gyong ljang gu'i mdog/ g.yas pas bdag blo'i sku la
168b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud// g.yon gyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa nas// sangs rgyas sku 'byung byang gi phyogs// oM aM ma du badz+rI b+h+rUM g+h+raM/ sangs rgyas byang chub dkar dmar gsal// tshangs pa'i mgo byazhis mtshan pa yis// mnga' bzhi dus gcig 'phen
168b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul// 'gying bcas shar gyi re'u char gnas// g.yas pas bdag po'i sku la 'khyud // g.yon gyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa nas// sangs rgyas sku byung byang gi phyogs// oM badz+ra me ge bu lu trUM// chos kyi 'kho lo dkar ser
168b6(rgyud 'grel): mngangs// g.yas gi gung mo'i rtse mo la// 'khor lo rtse brgyad 'jigs tshul 'dzin// 'gying bcas lho yi re cha gnas// oM ha sha rang brjo ma mo/ khams gsum rnam rgyal dmar skye'o mdog/ g.yas na tri shul rtsa
169a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang // g.yon pasmA rdo rje nA lnga 'dzin// garaR+Sha mad+hA nub k+Sha re mArA gnas// u khA bad+d+hA nA r-id+b+hahA/ 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'u mdag/ phyag gnyis dpag bsas ldan / ma
169a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas rlung bskyong 'dzin// gar mdzad byang gi ngog su gnas// oM he ra ti badz+ra bi lA sa~M tA \u0f7f// gling bu sngon mo rdo rjes mtshan// sna tshogs sgra sgrogs ma~M yi phyogs// ha~M badz+ra g+hi te te te te/ pi baM ser mo rdo rjes mtshan//
169a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs drug ljon bden bral phyogs// he ra ti badz+re hA si ha sa baM// rnga chen dmar po'i rdo d+he rba// brdung mdzad rlung mtshams la gnas pa'o// hi ra te badz+ra nedz+nyo pe pa pe sa dzaM// rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga la// rdo rjes mtshan brdung dang
169a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan phyogs// oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ me tog dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan// klu gzhu thogs pa me'i phyogs gnas// badz+ra d+hU paM/ spros mo dkar sngo rdo rjes mtshan// srog thogs bden bral mtshamasu gnas// oM badz+ra lo ke/ mar
169a5(rgyud 'grel): dmer mo rdo rjes mtshan// gsal 'dzin rlung gi mtshams gnas// oM badz+ra gran+d+he/ dri chab ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan// gang 'thor dbang ldan mtsham su gnas// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dz+wa ranA gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // da
169a6(rgyud 'grel): pabarta mgo ljang gu shar// oM badz+ra pA she hU~M/ phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba// g.yon zhags lho yi sgo la gnas// oM badz+rI shriM kha le baM/ snang ba mo dmar phyag gnyis kyis// nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs//
169b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra g+haN+Do/ thal byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pas ban+d+ha ku bcas byung // yang na lha mo thams cad kyang // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// bar+m+ma yi dbus ni dam+bar la dkar// phyag mchog lo mya ston mo 'dra// dkar
169b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing ser ba'i brla dong ldan/ b+hardzas kha zas sna tshogs mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma sna tshogs la gnas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs brgyan dang gos// mu tig me tog la
169b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs mchog/ mdzes pa'i rgyan cha sna tshogs 'chang // mgon po ro mnyam gnas bzhugs nas// chos dbyings ye shes snyems 'jug las// lha mo bdag po bskul mdzad de// sems can don kun rnam 'phrul mdzad// rjes
169b4(rgyud 'grel): su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnams// dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rjesu mchod byas pa// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// e ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog
169b5(rgyud 'grel): tu bde ba'i shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la ros cig yo l-ig ho// blo bur 'khrul pas 'khor lo yi// 'gro ba kun la dgongs nas bzhengs// dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams gsal
169b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir// dbang bskur byin gyis brlab par mdzad// gzugs phung chos dbyings ye shes che// mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// rnam gsum gzugs dang rol mjed// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul//
170a1(rgyud 'grel): tshor ba kun tog ye shes che// rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// rnam gsum sgra dang rol mjed de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// 'du shes mnyam nyid ye shes rgyu// lce la pad+ma dbang phyug rgya la// rnam/
170a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum ro dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// 'du byed bya ba grub pa'i gnas// sna la rta mchog rol pa ste// rnam gsum d+hi dang rol mdzad cing // brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrulo// rnam
170a3(rgyud 'grel): shes me long ye shes che// yid la rdo rje he ru ka/ rnam gsum chos dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// kun khyab stong pa'i ye shes che// lus la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas// rnam gsum rig
170a4(rgyud 'grel): dang rol mdzad de// brtan g.yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul// rnam gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing // thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// dbang bskur rigs kyi
170a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma bsam// de ltar gtso dang sbrul bcas pa// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas// phyag rgya bzhi la gnas spro zhing // phyag rgya'i sku rnams gsal bar mdzad// sbyor ba bzhi yi bye brag gis// dkyil
170a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ni// rje su 'gro ba'i las dag gis// dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba yin// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug la// sbyor ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod// gzhug
170b1(rgyud 'grel): rjesu sbyor ba'o// dag mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs mdzad nas// 'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin// byin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa// sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o// thugs ka'i 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// ye shes dkyil la /
170b2(rgyud 'grel): sprul mdzad cing // dze hUM baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing // stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus// na mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol
170b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni kA hr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs
170b4(rgyud 'grel): nus kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugasu gsol// k+ShA ya dA k+Shit+ta hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' bo'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshigs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// A le la ho// tshangs pa'i mchog rnams zil
170b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon mjed cing // rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mjed// a la la ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol// a la la ho/ kun 'byung yon tan
170b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dgong rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun bsgrubs pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs nas/ a la la ho// sku gsung thugs
171a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// a la la ho/ dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thubs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// skyi zhur byas shing btag/
171a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam g.yon thal mo sbyar bar bya// oM AHhUM/ a ti b+hU to// ban+d+ha nAMk+Sharo ya mi// gu ru pau ta/ a la lA ho/ oM 'byung ba chen
171a3(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs s+tha d+hi ro reg bya chos// lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus spro// me tog 'dug pa mar me la// dri tshogs kun gyi mchod par bya// oM pa na pa na/ be nu su ra
171a4(rgyud 'grel): tA/ ti pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma yAM ga~M sid+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+rI puSh+pe/ oM badz+re d+hU pI/ oM badz+rI A lo kaM/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ p+lu tIn+na ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn kha khA khA hi/ skad kyi grwasang ni mthon dman dang // gre 'gyur bcas
171a5(rgyud 'grel): shing bzlas pa yis// dus gsum rang bzhin mchog rnams kyis// hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing // tshig rnams kun gyis tse 'dod par/ dzaM ltar spros pa'i glu kun gyis// hUM ga~M gru yos phyag rgya pal// rdo rje sem
171a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rab bsgrub pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyad gcig dang // de bzhin du ni rgyud mang sogs// gyen du 'thor dang thur du thugs// g.yas pa mi 'degs so so'i rgya// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum ldan pas// rong gi gnas la spyir
171b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// dzaHhUM baM hoHbde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// g.yas g.yon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// bde ba'i cha lugs gar/
171b2(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil krung snyems bcas nas// dpung 'joms dngos grub thams cad 'grub// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdzaHhUM baM hoHs+pha ra ta s+t+waM/ zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// pad gnas bcas pa'i
171b3(rgyud 'grel): gar bcas 'khyud // mnga'o 'dzin sangs rgyas pad+mo sogs// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gos can// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags// bde ba 'bar ba'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi
171b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mchog chen po'o// se ral kha yi tshul bzhin du// rdo rje khA T+wAM ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun par// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis// mnga' bzhi yongasu 'phang
171b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang pa bteg cing 'phang ba dang // gzhings te 'phang ba'i stabs dag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstod pa ni// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// bya ba dang ni
171b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa dang // dbrog pa dag gis khyad par du// sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum ngag ni bsdu bar bya// lcug ma gang yang rung gzung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad
172a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsen nas ni// dpag bsam shing dag yongasu 'grub// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston no// pho bo len pa'i tshul ston dang // swA N+DaT+Ta tshul ston na lta hU~M dang // rdzu rda tshul skyon rnal 'byor ba'o// myang ba brgya/
172a2(rgyud 'grel): ltar byed pa dang // sna yi myang ba rngub pa dang // mig btsu ma zhen par wA pA dang // thams cad bdag gis myang ba'o// rang 'byung lha mo dang bcas pa'o// phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis ni bye/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang
172a3(rgyud 'grel): dpal khyod bdag cig sgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs rnams bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog
172a4(rgyud 'grel): grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a lA la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kye ma bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar
172a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// a la lA la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol// mdzub mos mtheb mo mnan nas ni// rang gi mtheb mos mdzub mo mnas/ su grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo
172a6(rgyud 'grel): mig gi 'bras bur bya// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// khong stong du ni sbyar na su// sngags bcas gnasu bzhag bya ste// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs
172b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'i bdag la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// oM AHhUM/ dam tshig dam pa sgrub par mAd+hA gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la
172b2(rgyud 'grel): rol du gsol// rab tu dga' ba rjesu chags pa'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pa'i// rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa'i bde bas thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa
172b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dge ba'i dbang phyug che mchog grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog rol cig to// bde bas bde bya slong rnam par
172b4(rgyud 'grel): rol hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kun gyis slob ma gzung du gsol// kye badri ba'i mchog grub par mdzod// e ma'o badre ba gsol// dam pa rab
172b5(rgyud 'grel): tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag la rab tu bde bar 'gyur// a la la la lA ho// e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig/ mkha' 'gro bde mchog kun tu bskor cing kun tu zhugs// la lar rab tu drag cing skye bo drag la drag pa'i
172b6(rgyud 'grel): bud med sku ltar snang // 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu res shing zhi bar mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad// la lar rab tu
173a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+mo'i dam tshig bdug la grub par mdzod// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdza du gsol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan bsgreng
173a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la stsol// lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam par 'gyur// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta zhing gar byed pa'o// lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes
173a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtag pa las// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dag/ lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma
173a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha ma'i gzugs ston bdud rtsir 'grub// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ minyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzad// byin brlabs mtshan dang rgyan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi
173a5(rgyud 'grel): reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen por rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid
173a6(rgyud 'grel): can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mo g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i
173b1(rgyud 'grel): cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i
173b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin
173b3(rgyud 'grel): tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i
173b4(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig
173b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gsum dngos grub dum pa bo dag la stso la// dzaHhUM baM hoHru Ta maT/ smA ra raT/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+ha/ Tak+ki hUM d+de/ ka ni ku ni/ hUM hUM/ Tak+ki ni hUM dzaHhu lu hu lu/ a la laM la la ho/ shud+d+ha sid+d+hiM/ daR+sha ya/ sarba ta g+haM
173b6(rgyud 'grel): g+he/ ta g+he g+haM/ Ta Ta/ g+ho g+he g+he/ ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he ta ta/ ta g+he ta g+he/ hai dor+g+ho/ hUM dzaM/ g+he ta g+he dor+d+hak+ki hUM dza/ tra a la la la la ho// ru Ta maT/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o// ta g+he g+he/ ta g+he na te g+ho na g+ho na g+he ta/ g+he na g+he na/
174a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gyi rnga'o// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i// sku yi phyogs tsam
174a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas smon lam 'tshe ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gi/ 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams kun snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rje rab brtan te// re smon thams cad dus
174a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir 'grub par mdzad du gsol// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs nas// thun mong 'das dang dang po brtsam// sems dpa' rnam pa gsum ldan par// rang rang sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// nyi dkyil thabs dang shes
174a4(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi// phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa las// sa gsung thugs kyi mtshan mas brgyan// gtso bos ji ltar bzlas pa bzhin// 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// gnas dang 'khor dang 'phro ba yis// mthun pa'i
174a5(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs mnyes mdzad cing // rigs bsdus 'gro ba'i las la sbyar// gtso bo'i zhal nas sbyor sngags ni// rang gi gsang sngags bcu bzhi pa'o// de bzhin lha mo so so yi// sngags dang 'phro 'du las ldan pa'o// rdzogs
174a6(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod bstod bskul ba dang // gsol gdab 'gro ba'i las la sbyor// gnyis pa so so'i las bya ba// gtso sogs rim pa bzhin du ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan byas te// 'od kyi rig ma dang bcas shing // gsal ba rnam pa
174b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ldan par// rang gi glasang sngags brjod par bya// oM mA hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdzaHhUM baM hoH/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i gsang sngags yi ge bAn+to brgyud pa'o// 'khor gyi lha mo m+b+ha lus pa'i// bzlas rdzogs mchod
174b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod bskul bya zhing // rang gi lngas la sbyar nas kyang // so so'i gnas su bsdu bar bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par
174b3(rgyud 'grel): bya sna rtse thig l-i phra mo la// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bsdu bya ste/ yi ge mtshan ma phra mo'i bar// mtshan ma lnga gsal bar du gnas// yi ge ka sogs de yig mtha'// nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya'o// yi ge d+ha sogs k+Sha yig
174b4(rgyud 'grel): mtha'o// phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri// dbus gnas par ni a yig phreng // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de// thig le zla tshes dang ldan par// tsheg drag zla ba gnyis yin te// a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// dbus
174b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje do bor gnas// de dbus rtag tu bsgom pa ni// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// 'di de spangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ri mor grags pa yin// ling grwa 'greng ba rang 'byung ste// bAR+Ya yi dbusu gzhug byas nas// ling ga
174b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer byin brlabs te// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni// der ni hUM yig bsgom par bya// shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// kun kyang khyab cing dri med pas//
175a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sem da / brtan pa'o// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga yi bar// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom// rten dang brtan pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rnam dag de nyid gsal bar brtag/ dge bcu dag
175a2(rgyud 'grel): la brten bcas shing // bden bzhi dngos po gcig tu gnas// rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis tshogs// rgyu 'bras sna tshogs dag pa'i dbyings// yon tan tshoDa rnams kun rgyas shing // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab mdzad
175a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// chos tshogs sum cu rtsa bdun las// ting 'dzin bzhi por 'jug par mdzad// rang bzhin ye shes drug dag las// rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs snang // rnam thar brgyad po brten bcas shing // rdo rje theg pa'i tshul
175a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mdzes// mdzad pa rgya chen phrin las rnams// yul drug dag gi phyag rgya che// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// thugs rje chen po'i char khang dang // bdud bzhi las rgyu lta theg chen mchog/ mnyam par ster bas
175a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul 'jug cing // rtog pa'i sgrib pa sel bar mdzad// smon lam las grub mdzad 'phro las// theg chen yon tan ci yang 'byung // mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs pa'i sku// brten pa'i theg pa sna tshogs sgrogs// dbang phyug
175a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs yon tan brgya// phrin las bzhi yis rnam phye zhing // rten gnas rgyu dang spyod mdzad pa'i// gnas kyi mtshan ma 'grub pa yin// chags med mdzad pas spyod kun dang // nyon mongs mtshan mas gos pa med// bde
175b1(rgyud 'grel): chen dbyings las ma 'phros shing // sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa can// yon tan 'byung gnas 'chi med lngas// gang ba phyogs bzhir gnas dgod pa// shes lnga'i 'dod pa'i longs spyod tshogs// nyi shu bdun gyi rgyan gyis
175b2(rgyud 'grel): spras// phrin las mchod pa'i gnas gyur pa'i// 'khor lo rang rtags mtshan mas mdzes// phyi yi mtshan ma tshogs dag gis// thams cad yon tan snang bas spras// sku gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis// sna tshogs phrin
175b3(rgyud 'grel): las dpag med tshogs// ye shes 'bar ba'i byin rlabs kyis// log rtogs mtshan ma bsreg par mdzad// mtshan nyid theg sogs gzhan dag lhas// khyad par 'phags pa theg pa'i mchog/ khams gsum gzhan rtog
175b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyong mdzad cing // lus sogs rnam par dag pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyan gyi rten dag las// sangs rgyas brgyad po sku slang ma dzang // dregs byed 'dul phyir rigos mtshan mnan// snod bcud sgrol mdzad shes rab mtshon// srang
175b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas las byung rtog pa'i tshogs// gnyis med rang gi ngo bor mos// dbyings dang ye shes mnyam pa'i lha// snang srid gnyis med bsgom pa'i lha// thugs rje che la sprul pa'i char// tha ba las byung smin par mdzad// rang
175b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ye shes chen po las// tshogs brgyad snang ba sna tshogs nyid// thugs rje'i sprul pa dpag med kyis// stong gsum khams las 'gro bar byed// 'byung ba'i snang ba tha dad rnams// thams cad rnam dag dkyil 'khor che//
176a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i rtog pas ma gos shing // byang chub thugs rje chags pa'i rtags// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku// zla 'dra dmar ba'i mdang dang ldan// chos dbyings stong pa'i ye shes las// rigs
176a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan ma bzhir snang zhing // 'phrin las tshad med rnam spyod pas// 'brel pa'i don bzhin spyod par mdzad// khams gsum rgyal ba'i rgyan bcas pas// cha lugs sbyong zhing 'gying bar mdzad// ye shes lnga ldan
176a3(rgyud 'grel): zab mo dang // rgya chen rigs lnga'i sku snang mdzad// rang gi thugs bskul dran tshogs kyis// los la rnam par rol mdzad do// sna tshogs kun grub sku gsung thugs// khyams gsum las rgyal gsung sgrogs shing //
176a4(rgyud 'grel): chags phyir zhi gnas lhag mthong gi/ mtshan nyid 'brel po ston paro mjed// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe byad brgyad cus rnam skyes pas// thun mong las grub zil gnon pa'i// dbyings dang ye shes
176a5(rgyud 'grel): 'brel po'i rgyan// byang chub sems sogs bla gab la// thugs rje'i rim pas legs spras shing // mdzad pa'i las mang sna tshogs pos// 'gro ba'i rnam rtog spyod par ston// g.yasu bsdu ba bzhi dag dang // g.yon
176a6(rgyud 'grel): tshad med bzhi snang mdzad// spyi bor pha rol phyin drug dang // gzungs dang ting 'dzin rtag sna tshogs// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun 'dus pas// yon tan rgyan gyi rin chen la// rnam pa lnga yi tshul zhugs shing //

176b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs la rnam thar brgyad kyis brgyan// bden bzhi'i gdu bus mdzes byas pas// rnam par bzhi yi rang bzhin can// dge dang pha rol phyin bcu yi// rked chings phyeng ba nyi rim mdzes// chos bzang sum cu rtsa bdun gyis//
176b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs skud bzhin du brgyan bcas shing // ma 'dres chos bzang bco brgyad pos// rim gnyis phreng bar ldan pa yin// phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ldan zhing // 'gro la de don ston par mdzad// phung po lnga rnams rnam dag pas//
176b4(rgyud 'grel): rigs lde'i rgyan gyis mdzes par byas// 'byung ba che rnams rnam dag phyir// lha mo bzhi dang kun tu 'khril// skye mched bcu gnyis rnam dag pas// nang gi lha mo'i tshogasu byung // khams sogs spyod pa rnam dag cing //

177a2(rgyud 'grel): dbus dang phyogs bzhi ru// dbus su rta yi rgyal po la// lha chen lha yi mtshan mas bskor// shar du phyogs skyong la// lho ru sngon spyod ma mo'i tshogs// nub tu dbang lha klu chen brgyad// byang du rgyas pa'i 'gro ba/

180b2(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes dga' lugasu 'byung // rdo rje dbyings mtshams sbyor ba 'am// ban+d+ha kau ti'i rtse mo ro gzung // gling bzhi'i rtse rnams bsdu bya ste// steng gi mtshan mas blta bar bya// dga' ba me skyes par dag tu// ma zin zin par

180b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor l-i bzhi dang sbyor byas nas// kAHrtse'i gnas gzung gong ma bzhin// thabs ldan sa dang gyen bltas la// gcig 'gyur oM ba d+hU tir zhugs// de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo yis// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas//
180b5(rgyud 'grel): slar nyid chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas// bde ba'i ye shes gzung byas te// zin dang brten dang bogs dbyung dang // dbyung du med pa'i gnas 'jog pa'o// phyi yi gnas kyang rgyas byas shing // gzung med 'dzin dang bral bar
180b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ khams gsum dngos po de lta bur// bde ba chen las gzhan ma yin// blo mchog sbyangs pa'i 'phro ldan pas// phyi nang chos kun mkha' bzhin gosal// snang srid rang las rnam grol zhing // 'byung 'jug med par ye
181a1(rgyud 'grel): shes che/ dbang po drug gi yul snang bas// de las gzhan med byang chub sems// rtog pa mtha' rnams 'dzin med pa'i// snang gsal bde ba chen po'i chos// gnas med bta snyoms can/
181a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i gnas// rtsol bral byang sems brtsol ba'i don// bcos med dran pa rang dgar gnas// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rgyan dang bcas// byung tshor 'gog dang rjes dran med// ma bcos mtha' bral bde ba'i rgyun//
181a3(rgyud 'grel): mngon gsum gsal ba nyams myong ba// snang srid ma g.yos phyag rgya'i tshogs// chos kun rang bzhin de lta bur// bde chen rdo rje sems dpa'i sku// gsung thugs yon tan phrin las brgyan// ma rtsol rgod pa chen po'i/
181a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings// de dus mtshan ma rnam myong ba// lus rtog sgra sogs srung zhing stong // gsal bu'i don las gzhan mi 'gyur// chos rnams gang la rgyags sdang med// mkha' la khyad chen gnas pa dang // chu la nya chen
181a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba bzhin// byis pa rnams ni gzugs sog mag/ 'bring po'i blo ldani chags bral stod// gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid shes pas// blo mchog rnams ni grol bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs ma la
181a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs la// rnal 'byor 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor
181b1(rgyud 'grel): bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// de byas bdag nyid ltar sbyor ba ste// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// ri yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams
181b2(rgyud 'grel): cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// sbyor ba bzhi la legs gnas shing // ting 'dzin nyams pa med pa'i blos// seng ge ri brag rgyu ba bzhin// 'jigs med thams cad zil gyis gnon// thams cad mnyam pas
181b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyang bya ste// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan// bza' spyod kun la rol bya zhing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// rnal 'byor thams cad nyer spyod pas// dpal ni bzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor
181b4(rgyud 'grel): kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun gyis longs spyod kyis// ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing // rang
181b5(rgyud 'grel): gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rje smra sbyor bas mchod byed cing // rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag/ bdag nyid rab tu myang byed na// shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun
181b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi bdag nyid kyis// ra sa ya na'i bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / long tsho nad med bde ba 'grub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam por 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// sangs rgyas tham
182a1(rgyud 'grel): cad rab tu 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal sbyor ba'i// mthu 'di nyid kyis thams cad du// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// so so dag nas rab 'grub 'gyur// lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku// thams
182a2(rgyud 'grel): cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legs zhes pa grub pa ni// dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol// sku gsum dbyer ming las byung bas// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul zhing // mdzad pa rgya chen sna tshogs kyis// don bzhin
182a3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa mdzad pa yin// brtson ldan shes rab mchog gyur pa'i// mkhas mchog rnams kyis rnyeng dka'i don// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog lngas// skyes mchog ga
182a4(rgyud 'grel): gos drin rnyed pa'i// rgya mtsho las byung rin po che// 'gro ba'i don du bteg byas pas// 'jug pa po rnams dga' bar gyis// rgyud rgyal rnams kyi rtsa ba'i don// gsang ba'i de nyid bzhi bcu gnyis/ ces bsngos rtog pa bcu pa
182a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyi ma'i phyi ma phyi ma lngas// gsang don rnam par dgod byas pas// 'khrul rtog mi chog bslang bral zhing // rgyud gzhan tshig phrad tsam bkod de// rgyal ba'i gsung bzhin rnam par bsdebs// cung zad bya sags la
182a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba yo// dri med ston ka'i zla 'dra bas// 'gro ba'i ye shes gsal mdzad nas// dpal ldan sku gsung thob de 'i shog/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ku ru mdzes
182b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+hA ka ra sid+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de lha rin po ches/ rgyud 'grel dang gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o// dpal rnam par sna mdzad kyi bsang dor bcu/
182b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI bai ro tsa Na gu d+har+b+ba d+ha ro byA ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// dngos bdag
182b3(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba gnyis med mchog/ longs spyod rnam sprul bde chen sku// rogs kyi 'khor lo rab mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun 'byung gnas phyag 'tshal// zhi 'grog mya ngan 'das sogs 'joms// rgyu 'bras lam zhen dbyugs
182b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin mdzad// dpal ldan rnam snang gsang ba'i don// rnam dgod sgrub thabs mchog bshad bya// rang bzhin ngang tshul bzang las byung // gnyis med yon tan skye ba thob// skyabs 'gro byung sems sdom pa can// dbang tho
182b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'jigs med pa/ theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog/ rnam snang dkyil 'khor la dga' bas// phyi nang g.yed pa rab bsal te// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyer// rten gnas dgon pa gtsug lag khang
182b6(rgyud 'grel): ri yi rtse rnams thams cad tu// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgongs pa sgrub par bya// 'gro la snying rje chen po yis// bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas// sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bskyed pas//
183a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba dang // dbang po'i dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te// drang po bya ba'i rim rdzogs spyad// sgrib tshogs las sgrol dag byed pa'i// sems can chung med blo yis gzung //
183a2(rgyud 'grel): bar chad bgegs bsal srung byed pa'i// 'khor lo me 'od rab gur// phyogs bcur khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i// cho ga rang gi laso bzhin bsgom// thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems
183a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings las// 'gro la khyab pa'i thugs rje'i rgyun// stong gsal na mkha'i shugs ltar byung // rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la zhugs// oM yaM raM baM laM suM raM// oM na maHsarba
183a4(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga yo mi maN+Da la hUM baM/ chos 'byung nA mkha'i rang bzhin lus// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// raM rab me 'ong rgyan gsal zhing // kha dog dbyibs rgyan mtshan mar bcas// bde
183a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus// khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyad dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa// sa bzhi na mkha' logs kyi phyogs// rim
183a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rin chen 'tsher ba la// rang 'byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od // sna lnga'i rtsig pa dra ba dang // dri phyed rin chen pha gus mtshan// 'khor los mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad// rin chen mu tig me tog phreng // rgyal mtshon bla re rdza ya
183b1(rgyud 'grel): gdugs// yon tan lnga yi lha mo mchog/ zla phyed rdo rje rin chen dang // ba dan dril bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs// pho brang 'khor lho rtse brgyad la// pad mtshan mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng // mtshum su bum pa gang ba bzhi// rigs
183b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan mas rnam par mdzes// bar skabs re'u cha brgyad la// mtshams phyed 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes// khams kyi cha yi mtshams bzhi dang // sgo gnas la sogs pad+ma'i gdan// phyi rol rA ba rim gsum
183b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// phyogs mtshams dur khrod chen po brgyad// de mtha' 'dod pa'i long+yas spyod dang // rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'o// yod pa ma yin med pa min// dbu mar yang ni dmigasu med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba//
183b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// rnam thar sgo bzhir snyoms 'jug gi/ 'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral ba// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de// mngon byang lha yis rdzogs skur 'gyur// sems
183b5(rgyud 'grel): dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de yi byang chub sangs rgyas yin// oM mahA su ka badz+ra satwa aHhrIHhUM baM ho// su ra taste// rdo rje sems dpa'
183b6(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sku// dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsol 'od// zhal bzhi rnam gzigs phyag bzhi pa// dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bcas 'khrol// 'og ma gnyis kyi mnga' dang gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga
184a1(rgyud 'grel): yis mdzes// stong g.yogs dkar ser dang ris can// sku slad tshig gu'i na bza' la// rin chen phreng ba'i rked 'ching 'dril// mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang // phyag bzhi gdu bu s+ye myo do// rdo rje
184a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+Shit+ta gu Na kar+m+ma/ badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// lus
184a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ba spu'i gnas rnam su// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbyang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag
184a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis nor bu rin chen dung // ji ltar rig pa mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo mthe bong rtse mo bzhi// yongasu bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral bar legs par bzhag par bya// khaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rat+na mA le A b+hi Shiny+tsi traM/ pa Ta
184a5(rgyud 'grel): laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ badz+ra tu Sh+ya ho// byin brlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis// rgyu yis mgon po rdo rje 'cha // sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad sku// cha lugs mtshon ma rgyan gsal gyur// zhal ba'i ser dkar ljang
184a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar mdog/ sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar bzhin// phyag na chos gos lhung bzod dang // mkhar gsil dam chos glegs bam 'dzin// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs dang // longs spyod kun gyis nyer mdzes par// thun
184b1(rgyud 'grel): mong rgyun sogs tshang ba las// khyad par rtags kyis rnam smras pa'o// rang 'od ngo bo las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas spyan ma dkar gsal mdangs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgyu rtsal can// g.yas pa 'khor lo thod pa
184b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon// rin chen rgyan sogs phreng ba dang // na gza' dril bu rgod bcings can// phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pa// gnas bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor gdan la
184b3(rgyud 'grel): legs gnas rnams// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par gsal// lha yi bum pas khrus byas te// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam// khyam las skyes pa'i ling ga ni// 'khor lo
184b4(rgyud 'grel): mdangs la ma phaT kyis mtshan// oM yig dgu byAs b+ha ga'i dbyibs// pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad e gnas pa// sna tshogs brda yis bsgral byas nas// thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzod// oM pra be sha phaT/ a la la
184b5(rgyud 'grel): la la ho// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// lha rnams rang la gzhug byas te// gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu 'phel// khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang // rnal
184b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor mtshan ma rnam par sbyang // gsal ba'i gon su gzhal yas khang // rgyan sogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin dbyung // thig le gnas mtshan byas na// spros pa yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal// khaM las rnam par snang
185a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad de// gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la'o// haM lus sangs rgyas kun brjod ma// tsha las de bzhin dpa' mo ste// traM lus kun tu bzang mo yin// dz+ha las mi zad snod 'dzin ma'o// AM lAs
185a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun ldan pa// b+h+rUM las zhal bzung gzung ma ste// hA lus lha mo sbyin rgyun mo// kha lus na mkha'i spyan ma'o// de dag nang gi phyogs bzhi dang // phyi nas re'u cha'i phyogs bzhir ro// oM la k+Shing drA trA wi //
185a3(rgyud 'grel): lngas rnga tshon rdo rdza rme// m+me mnyams la sogs ri mig tu// l+h+wam bzhi ni gnas pa yin// a A me tog spos mo ma// a ar+thamar me dro chab ma'o// bar khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi cha// lha mo bzhi ni gnas
185a4(rgyud 'grel): yin// dzaHlAs rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma// hUM las phag gdong mche ba can// baM las nyi zla mi 'bar ma// hoHlas thal byang sgro bzhir gnas// oM b+hu khaM dzaH/ rang gi gnas nas spro bya ste// skur 'dus rlung gi lus
185a5(rgyud 'grel): gzug/ oM swA tAn+tu// sangs rgyu sta kun+da brjod chu shel mtshungs// rgyun mdzes lce yi phyag rgyu 'dzin// oM badz+ra rat+na ra// dpa' blo shin+da tu rgyal myi mchog/ gser mdog phyag gnyis thal ma 'dzin// oM badz+ra d+harmA ga
185a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang pad+ma ga'i mngag/ phyag gnyis rdo rje rtsi l-I tog/ oM bidz+dza A~MH/ mi zang snying 'dzin sna tshogs mngog/ rgya ni nga srong kyang chos kyi rung // oM sarba badz+ra/ sangs rgyas sngon brgyan gur gum mngog/ thugs ka sa
185b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mI bstod sku// tshaM badz+ra ra ti ho// lha mo zhal bzang me long mdog/ phyag gnyis me long rlung g.yab 'dzin// tAM badz+rI pad+ma/ sprin chen be DUr+ya mdog mtshungs// phyag gnyis sprin chen ster ba 'bebs// d+hU bI sh+tsa bar+d+ha/
185b2(rgyud 'grel): namakha'i spyan mo s+yer skya'i mdangs// phyag gnyis pad bcas mig gi rgyu// he ra ti tsakra pi la sai t+yA thA/ gling bu sngon mo sna tshogs sku// 'khor los mchin pa'i gling bu sgrogs// he ra ti tsakra ke te te te/ ba~M baM ser mo d+ha
185b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan dbyangaso// 'khor los mtshan pa'-i pi wang bsgreng // he ra ti tsakra ha s+yai ha s+ya paM// rnga chen dmar mo 'khor lo'o rnga// phrin las so so'i tshul bzhin du// he ra tI tsakra ni pe te ba pA ba dzaM/ rdzu rnga ljang gu rdza rnga ma// 'khor los
185b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan poSh+Ti rol stabs tshul// A badz+ra puSh+pe/ me tog dmar ser 'khor los mtshan// rin chen gzhod pa gang ba 'dzin// A badz+ra d+hU paM/ spros myi dkar sngon bdug pa'i spyod// 'khor los mtshan pa g.yas su
185b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jog/ oM badz+ra A lo ki/ mar me dmar mo 'khor los mtshan// snod nad mar me'i sdong po 'dzin// oM badz+ra gan+d+he ho// dri cheb ljang skya 'khor los mtshan// dung chos g.yon 'dzin g.yas par 'thor// oM badz+ra
185b6(rgyud 'grel): M ku sha dzaH// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // thod pa rta mgo ljang gu 'dzin// oM badz+ra pA she hUM// phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mtsho ba// g.yon pa rin chen zhags pa 'dzin// oM badz+ra shri kha le baM// snang ba dmar
186a1(rgyud 'grel): mo phyag gnyis kyis// lcags sgrog nyi ma zla bas mtshan// oM bad+d+ha gar+b+he ho// thal byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pas thod pa mtha' yas sku// kun kyang rgyun phreng na bza' dang // rigs kyi mtsha
186a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'gying bag bzhin// 'dzum pa te ga rgod pa'i so zur ston// rang gi cha lugs gar gyis gnas// mgon po ro mnyam la zhugs nas// chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug pas// lha mos bdag po bskul mdzad
186a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad// brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi// skye mched drug las sangs rgyas drug/ phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan ma dang // rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan// thugs ka'i 'od
186a4(rgyud 'grel): zer spro bsdu yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad cing // dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing // stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde
186a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// rnam par snang mdzad skal bzang dpal khyod ba dag/ dzaHhU~M baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na ma hA kA ru ni ka dri Sh+ya ho/ sa m+ba ho/ sa m+ba ste// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro/
186a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing zhugasu gsol// kA ya bkrit+taM hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes
186b1(rgyud 'grel): la la ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cing // rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// a la la ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnams mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings
186b2(rgyud 'grel): la rol// a la la ho// kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dgod rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun grub pas// tshogs bsags rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ba/ a la la ho// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan phrin las rgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// a la la ho// rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo sbyar bsam g.yos bzhin rgyas gnasu 'dud// oM a ti b+hu ho// ban+da naM kA/
186b4(rgyud 'grel): ro ya mi gu ru bi ta a la la ho// oM 'byung ba chen las thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snying ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dr-i ro rag bya chos// lha mo'i tshogs rnams ma lus spros// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri
186b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kun gyis mchod par bya// oM pa na pe pe nu su ra ta ti pu pa ra mu// sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yo ga sid+d+ha aHhUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+paM badz+ra d+haSh+To/ badz+ra A lo ke/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn kha kha khA hi// lag pa g.yas
186b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gnyis ngag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// de bzhin g.yon pa bsgyur bar bya// de ni sbyor ba bteg nas ni// spyi bo'i mtsham su bzhag par bya// bskal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i
187a1(rgyud 'grel): glus/ mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tsi dgar blang // dzaHhUM baM ho// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin ga sheg/
187a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// don dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// btso ma gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la soDa chag chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi
187a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid rab bsgrub pa// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de byas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yAs pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcas pa yin// sor mo kun la reg pa ni//
187a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// g.yas pa'i yan lag g.yon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas pa// bdud rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// oM b+hU khi swAhA// rdo rje khyu
187a5(rgyud 'grel): chur bcangs nas su// g.yon pas dgag pa kun brjod ma// he ru ka yaM khu tshur che// g.yon pas dbab pa dpa' mo yin// pad+mo rdo rje khu tshur ni// g.yon dag ba kun tu bzang mo'o// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // g.yon
187a6(rgyud 'grel): pas dgab pa mi zad snod// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nasu// dgab pa sangs rgyas kun ldan dpal// bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// dgab pa zhal bzang gzungs ma yin// rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang // ngag
187b1(rgyud 'grel): pA sprin chen me yi rgya// dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshul dag/ dgab pa na mkha'i spyan ma'o// gling bu ma tshogs lha mo yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i// phyag rgya sngags
187b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis gnyis med 'gyur// 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs med khyab par spros pa ni// rgyul ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs skyed pa// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed
187b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ srid pa'i bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul tshogs bcas kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad 'grub par mdzod//
187b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba// A la lA la la ho// de ring grub par mdzod// so so'i ljags kyi pad+mo la// chos kyi snying pos mtshan pa'i dkyil// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tISh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ne sarbA r+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/
187b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par bzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol
187b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub
188a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur//
188a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub// gsal bar lta la gnas par mdzod// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtag pa li// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dag/
188a3(rgyud 'grel): lnga lnga yo 'phro 'du yis// mtshon ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha yi gzugs ston bdud rtsir bsgrub// rang 'byung bdong nas rnam par dag/ mnyam pa'i don las rol par mdzad// byin brlabs
188a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang rgyan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyis rig bya'i mchog/ byin gyis brlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang bAT+Ta kyis ldan par mdzad/
188a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid mi ge yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i sgra rnams blang byas nas// sil snyun kun m+b+hi sgra rnams dang // gang gis lha rnams mnyes par b+he// oM aM aM/ haMhUM/ baM/ daMd de/ bdag cag dam
188a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcang gtub lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sgra yi phyogs tsam mthong na mod la 'tsho ba dang // gzi mdangs lus
188b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis// 'od kyi phog pas 'jig rten khams kun snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer/ rab gnas te/ re smon thams cad dus 'dir 'grub par mdzad gsol// de nas
188b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sum// theg le gnyis sum phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan mA gsal ba dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen
188b3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya// thun bzhi'i skabasu gtor ma btang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang lus byung ste mdun bzhag nas//
188b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab las la bskul bar bya// oM khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// oM
188b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+rA gats+tsha muH// de nas phyag rgya rnam bkod pa// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas// rnam gsum sems dpa' hU~M l+ya thim// rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan
188b6(rgyud 'grel): dpe rgya ni dang cha lugs gsal// cho ga go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM haM oM tuM oM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+dza traM// oM pa Ta laM ba a b+hi Shony+tsa laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu
189a1(rgyud 'grel): byud// myu nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po snang ba'i yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' gtung byin rlabs ma nyams par// sgyu m+b+ha gnyi
189a2(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes rol// byed spyong tshogs gnyis rgyur brtag/ thams cad 'gro da'i don phyir spyad// dpal ldan nam snang dkyil 'khor gyi// gsang don rnam par bkod byam+bu las// byung ba'i dag tso dri med
189a3(rgyud 'grel): des// khams gsum sU dzAgr-i nA ma gsal / dbul rnam par snad mdzad kyi gsong ban+d+hi na rnam par dgod pa zhes byag// slob dpon pa ku na rdzas mdzad pa rdzogs so//

190a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'i gsang ngon bzhugs//
190b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+re he ru ka gu d+ha rA d+hA ro b+hu ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tsha lo// thams cad 'byung
190b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsal byed cing // gnyis med ma 'dres mdzad mthar phyin// stong nyid ye shes drug gi bdag/ thugs mchog khro bdag phyag 'tshal te// dregs byed zhe sdang la sogs skyes// nyon mongs lam zhe na ru tra sogs/
190b3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms mdzad dpal ldan he ru ka'i// gsung don rnams bkod bshad par bya// rang bzhin drang tshul bzang las byung // gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can// dbang thob dam tshig
190b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs med pa// theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog/ he ru ka dpal la dga' bas// phyi nang g.yeng ba rab gsal te// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyero// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs
190b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dug nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa dag/ rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro lnga snying rje chen po yis// bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcus nAs// sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bsgred bas// bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang
190b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbang po'i dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te// dang po bya ba'i rom rdzogs sbyang // sgrib sogs las grol dag byed pa'i// sems can tshad med blo yis gzung // bar chad bgegs bsal srung byed pa'i// 'khor lo ma
191a1(rgyud 'grel): ra ba gur// phyogs bcu khro bo'i tshogs skyed pa'i// cho ga rang gi las bzhin bsgom// thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las// 'gro la phan pa'i thugs rje'i
191a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan// stong gsal na mkha'i shugs ltar byung // rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs// e yaM baM laM suM raM// oM na maHsarba ta thA gA ta/ a nu rA ga ya ni maN+Da la hUM b+hU/
191a3(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung namakha'i rang bzhin las// byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// ri rab me 'ong rgyan gsal zhing // kha dog dbyibs rgyal mtshan mar bcas// bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas// sna tshogs
191a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rin po che// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus// khang pa rdo rje sgo khyud dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa// sa gzhi na mkha' logs kyi phyogs// rigs kyi rin chen 'tsher ba la// rang 'byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od //
191a5(rgyud 'grel): sna lnga'i rtsig pa dra ba dang // dri byed rin chen pha bus mtshan// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad// rin chen mu tig me tog phreng // rgyal mtshan bla re rnga yab gdugs// 'dod yon lnga yi lha mo 'khyug/ zla ched rdo rje rin
191a6(rgyud 'grel): chen dang // ba dan dril bu sgra snyan sgrogs// pho brang zla khams sgo can la// re'u mig dgu pa thod pas mtshan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan mdzes shing // rdo rje steng bas rnam par mtshan// rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yis// thams cad nam
191b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dag ni reg par 'gyur// dmigasu yod pa ma yin te//
191b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyis tshul// rnam thar sgo bzhi snyoms 'jug go/ 'gog gnas 'dul bya'i don bral ba// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de// mngon byang lnga yis rdzogs skur 'gyur// sems dang sems
191b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra tA s+t+waM/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku// dkar zhing
191b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba'i mdangs gsol 'od// zhal bzhi rnams gzigs phyag bzhi pa// dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bcas 'khrol// 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// stod g.yog
191b5(rgyud 'grel): dang dar ser dang ris tsan// sku slad tshig gu'i na bza' la// rin chen phreng ba'i rkeng 'ching 'dril// mgul du do shel dpung rgyan dang // phyag zhabs gdu bu se mo do// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngag
191b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyo// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta gu Na kar+m+ma/ badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnamasu// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran
192a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnamakha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+ha tu At+ma ko haM/ lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yi// mdzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing // gung mo mthe
192a2(rgyud 'grel): blo'i rtse mo can// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs bsgyur bteg/ bskor zhing kun tu bskor nas kyang // khro gnyer du nI legs bzhag bya// haM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rat+na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ pa Ta laM b+hi Shiny+tsa oM// badz+ra tu Sh+ya ho// byin brlabs rigs
192a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbu rgyan gyis// rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang // dpal ldan he ru ka yi sku// khrag mthu mthing nag 'dzegs pa'i rgyal// 'bar ba chen po'i 'od zer can// zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar// dbus ma mthing nag drag po'i
192a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal// g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste// rgyu ba ma chags mdzad dmar ba'o// smin mtshams khro gnyer grog bzhin 'gyur// spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal// dbu sgra sma ra ser gnag las// spu rnams rdo rje gyen du
192a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil// sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jig su rung // rgod dang gshed dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rnga ma dang zhi ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// de 'og
192a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi// pags pa rlung gi tshul du bskor// gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu// g.yas kyis bzhi pas dung khrag 'dzin// g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa ru// snying chen po yis bkang ba'o// la lar zhal
192b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag bzhi pa// g.yas gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin// g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas// rdo rje kha T+wAM se ral kha// la lar rdo rje ban+d+ha dmar// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten mdzad// glang chen stag gi pags pa yis//
192b2(rgyud 'grel): stong smang sku yin bzar mnabs// klu rgyal thod pa'i phreng ba yis// sku yi gnas brgyad rnams spras shing // lha chen dpa' bo'i g.yang gzhi dag/ mtshan ma chen po na bzar gsol// sku la thal byas byugs pa la//
192b3(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang zhag gi ri mos mtshan// phyag rgya la yi mtshan pa la// snyan gau nga nyi zla rin chen phreng // thun mong rgyan sogs tshang pa la// khyad par rtags kyis rnam sbas pa'o// rang byung ngo bo las byung ba'i// kro d+hi shwa ri'i 'jo stes
192b4(rgyud 'grel): stabs// sku mdog sngo skya na mkha'i lus// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten bcas// lag pa g.yon pas thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum pa'i phyag/ rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan// phyung
192b5(rgyud 'grel): nad byin gyis brlabs mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur// gnas bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor gdan la legs gnas rnams// spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par
192b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol// lha mo'i bum pas khrus byas te// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam// hriHlas skyes pa'i ling ga ni// rdo rje gsang lam phaT kyis mtshan// a yi ge dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyibs// pad+ma 'dab brgyad e gan+da ga
193a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs brda yis bskul byas nas// thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad// a pra ba sha phaT/ a la la la la ho// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnya
193a2(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste// gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel// khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang // rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam par sbyang // gsang ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang // rgyan sogs
193a3(rgyud 'grel): gdun rnams sngon bzhin 'byung // thig lis gnas su mtshan byas nas// spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsang // hrI las rdo rje he ru ka/ gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma lnga'o// hrIHlus shar du gau rI ma/ hrI las
193a4(rgyud 'grel): lho yi phyogs// nub tu dz+nyAM lngas pra mo ste// dzAM las bet+tA byang du'o// mtshams bzhir hUM phaT sa bon las// puk+ka la sogs lha mo bzhi// yA wa ra la bzhi po las// mda' rnon 'dzin ma l-i sogs rnams// maM mtshoms sogs
193a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gru tshong la// rimya pa bzhin du gnas pA yin// a AM me tog spos me ma// aM aHmar me d+hI cha bA ste/ bar khyAm saM mtshams kyi gnas ru// lha mo bzhi ru gnas pa yin// dzaHlasA rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma//
193a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM las phag gdong mche ba can// baM las nyi zla me 'bar me// Sh+T+r-iHlas bal byed sgo bzhir gnas// oM shrI he ru ka bod+hi sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu dra// pra b+hAny+tsa kra hUM phaT// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba sbyang mdzad nas
193b1(rgyud 'grel): yab yum sku la gzhug par bya// hUM badz+ra g+hA he sid+d+he pa ra ma hA yo gi shwa ri dI// ke'u ri dmar ser zhi ba mo// zhal bzhi g.yon rgyang gar gyis bzhugs// phyag brgyad g.yas kyi mnga' bzhi la// tshangs pa chen po'i mgo bzhi
193b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs// hUM hU~M badz+rI tsaN+Da shi kha T+wA~M ga ma hA badz+ra ka pA laM mA la ma g+hu ge ru ru// tsau ri dmar ser drag pa mo// g.yon na lcags kyu g.yas pa yi// gung mos 'khor lo rtse brgyad bstod// kha T+wAM la brten zhabs g.yas bteg/
193b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra ma ri yo ga~M dzaHpra mo dmar gnag phyag bzhi ma// dang por rdo rje kham phor 'chang // 'og gnyis khu tshur 'khor lo 'degs// g.yas brkyang rmongs tshul grong mya 'phags// oM badz+ra pre ta ke dz+ri/ pre ta dkar mo slong
193b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad tshul// dga' ba'i gar thabs g.yas pa nA// thod pa mtshan ldan bdud rtsis bkang // g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag/ oM badz+ra pra ha ri ni traM/ puk+ka mo sna tshogs mdog/ g.yas pas rdo rje ci lnga gsor// g.yan
193b5(rgyud 'grel): pas dpag bsam lcug ma 'dzin// gar gyis gzigs thabs 'gyur ba bzhin// hUM badz+ra shU la a/ ka bi da phaT/ tsaN+Da so gnag dbugs 'byin tshul// g.yas na ra skyes rdo rjes mtshan// rlung 'thor g.yon pas tri shul
193b6(rgyud 'grel): gar// gzhan gyi srog 'phrog las la brtson// hUM badz+re kro d+ha ts+tshin+da ka ma Ta/ g+hasma ser gnag ro ldegs tshul// g.yas pas ral gri g.yon mo thab// g.yon brkyang gar gyis gyur bag can// myur ba'i phrin las grub pa mdzod//
194a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+rUM nAM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya pA she phaT// sme sha mthing nag phyag bzhi pa// phyag gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin// g.yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas// rdo rje kha T+wAM se ral kha// kun kyang thong phreng sbrul gdug dang /
194a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing lpags rlon pa'i rin chen phreng // gdan ni sna tshogs pad+ma la// zhing da nyi mas mtshan pa'o// he badz+ra ra tAM phaT// mnga' 'dzin dkar mo mnga' dang gzhu// me mtshams phyogs kyi pad+ma lA// bi ma hA ra ti bad+d+he ho// kha T+wAM sar
194a3(rgyud 'grel): ta badz+ra ha/ kha T+wAM se ra mo kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje dril 'phan bden bral mtshams oM badz+ra lo tsu me yaM ya// 'khor lo 'dzin pa dmar ser mo// rtsibs brgyad 'dzin ma rlung gi phyogs// ra ma hA shrI badz+ra ra tra hI// sna tshogs ba den ldang
194a4(rgyud 'grel): gu la// sna tshogs ba ngan dril dbang mtshams// a badz+ra puSh+pe/ me tog ljang ser rdo rjes mtshan// gzhong thogs me yi mtshamasu gnas// A~M badz+re d+hU pe/ spos me kar ser rdo rjes mtshan// phog phor bden bral phyogasu
194a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// oM badz+re U lo ke/ mar me dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan// gsal 'dzin rlung gi mtshams su gnas// aHbadz+ra gan+d+he/ dri chab ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan// ngag 'thor dbang ldan mtsham su gnas// oM badz+ra aM ku sho dzaH
194a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // thod pa rta mgo ljang gu shar// oM badz+ra pra be sha hUM// phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba// g.yon zhags lho yi sgo la gnas// oM badz+re shriM kha le baM// snang ba dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis/
194b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs// oM badz+ra gar+b+he ho// thul byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pa ban d+ha sku bcas byang // lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan dang na bza' klubs// sku mdzes khros pa'i mtshan
194b2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dzin// sgo ba cung zad 'gying ba'i tshul// mgon po ro mnyam la bzhugs gnas// chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug las// lha mos bdag po bskul mdzad de// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad// brten
194b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyis// skye mched drug lnga sangs rgyas drug/ phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan ma dang // rigs kyi bdag po sna brgyan par bya// thugs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad
194b4(rgyud 'grel): cing // dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing // stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu// na mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa gzhengasu gsol// rdo rje
194b5(rgyud 'grel): ru skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na ma hA kA ru Ni ka shrI dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi
194b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugasu gsol// kA ya bIk+tsit+ta hUM// sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// a la la ho// tshangs pa'i
195a1(rgyud 'grel): rmug rnams can rdzu ga na mdza byu// ga pa d+hAm hA 'dugs gnad ya // u ga tu sa nga ga sa nam ra smras/ mad sgyu
195a2(rgyud 'grel): A la s+ho/ myu byu yin tan rgyul mdu ldan gru gang // rgyun rdzo 'ar m+b+ha bkod dang laswA r+dz+nyA hA/ yul la hU~M// mad+h+ya ba rkyen 'ag myed na mas// chags na pa
195a3(rgyud 'grel): yul to// sku gsung blugs mchog yon tan pr-i ni las brgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i rnal phyug 'tshal-i lo// a la la ho// sbyinA mA ga yo bya degs tshul gyis// bra mra chu lur bcas dgong 'jung // d+hU oM d+hin /
195a4(rgyud 'grel): nAMkA yA mi// Te pa taM/ a lA la ho// oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // snang gsum rdul spyod ma lus pa'o// gzugs sgra d+d+hi ri rig bya chos// me tog bdag pa mar mr-i dang // d+hi tshogs pan rgyas tshad
195a5(rgyud 'grel): mA tshogs rnams m+b+ha wus+dza s+ho// ba n+yA bA nA pain+t+ra m+WA ra ta ti thA pA rarAm+b+ha/ seMm ta d+h+r-i g+ha ta sa mya y+ya ga tsid+d+ha.aM ma/ oM ba dru// bajug ste/ / shwe ga rnamag+sa Sh+Na 'aM dz+dza
195a6(rgyud 'grel): nga sa na pos rgyan cing/ 'drug po skyesbyang bab pa yi// spong // hU~M / la 'byung byeng bcom pan sa// sems na shegs/ mchogs mi spo sa spyo
195b1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyags la// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khro 'byung khra ba na// thal bar
195b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa'i mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu 'khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// gos chen po dang byug pa tsho// sha chen po dang byug pa cha/
195b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang sbrang rtsi tshe// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung ba yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gtume gdug pa yi// sems can khams ni rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog
195b4(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dpal ldan he ru ka btsas pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa'o// sa ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha DA ga la rgyab rten bcas// lag pa g.yon par thod
195b5(rgyud 'grel): pa thogs// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum par bya// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// na mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' la 'byin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba
195b6(rgyud 'grel): yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// skyil mo krung na phyed bcas la// rkang pas rang gi brla mnan nas// legs par bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// yang nas yang du bskyod pa yis// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya ste/ zhi
196a1(rgyud 'grel): dang drug po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' bar gar byed 'gyur bas bcas// shi bya ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhing dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du 'bugs byed gar byed lus//
196a2(rgyud 'grel): lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me tog grub pa yis// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyamo par skyes
196a3(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// sbyor ba'i gnyer pa bde ba bzhin// mngon par gtor zhing ste gol brdab// ngal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du blta zhing lhag pas drung // 'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // zas dang
196a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// de bzhin sA las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul bstan dang // dur khrod dag gis gor byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil
196a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs pa bsreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma yin rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed ma'i// de bzhin bzhi pa 'debs byed ma'o// lnga pa gar
196a6(rgyud 'grel): byed ma yi rgyu// drug pa gsong ma yin par bshad// bdun pa za ba mo yi rgyu// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// mnga' rnon 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i// lha mo bzhi po snga ma bzhin// me tog la sogs brgyad rnams ni// dkyil 'khor
196b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga ma'i tshul// rang 'byung mo dang bcas pa yi// phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa
196b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo cher bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas man bsu gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde la bzhugs// hUM a la la ho// snang bar mdzod// rnam
196b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bde mchog sgyu mus sprul// dam tshig dgra la 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// so so'i lcogs kyi pad+ma la// chos kyi snying po mtshan ma'i dkyil// su b+ha gastaM ma ha na de bo haM rau mi r-i/ mi hi ra ni
196b4(rgyud 'grel): shr-I ye/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs// 'jigs pa rdo rje gnon sbyin ma// skyugs bcas gnasu bzhag byas te// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bya'o// oM
196b5(rgyud 'grel): A hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdza du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams
196b6(rgyud 'grel): cang grub par mdzod// mnyam pa'i gnas la rol tu gsol// hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal
197a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ma la phyag 'tshalo// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtag pa las// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par bkang // lha lnga lnga yi 'phro 'dra yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dr-i dang sgra// lha mo'i gzu
197a2(rgyud 'grel): ston bdud rtsi bsgrub// rang byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ mnyam pa'i don la rol par mdzod// byin brlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyis reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po rnam par
197a3(rgyud 'grel): rol// grub pa'i rjes 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mad+hod// mAnyam nyid m+b+hi g+hA la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i glu rnams blangs byas nas// sil snyan kun gyi sgo rnams dang // grwar gyis lha rnams mnyes par byA// d+he kau kaM/
197a4(rgyud 'grel): k+ShaM kaM/ d+ha badz+re badz+dzi/ d+h+ye ra d+he ra/ kAM kr-I k+ShaM k+ShaM/ b+h+r-id+d+ho d+hAb+h+yA n+tu d+h+waM b+h+yo/ d+hek+Sho kiM ka ka kau kaM/ d+h+r-i kaM kaM kau/ bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcad btubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phog po'i sdug ba

197a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dir sgrub par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis ma// thog le gnyis sa phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang / mtshan mi med pa'i don pas bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog// don de bangs
197b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sku// de bzhin dbyings nyid ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya// thun bzhi'i skabasu gtor ma btang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod cing bstod// rang las phyung ste mdun bzhag nas// gsol btab las la/
197b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bya// oM khyed kyi sen don kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha muH// de nas phyag rgya rnam bkod pa// rim bzhin
197b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsdu byas nas// rnam gsum sems dpa' hUM la thi// rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyibs// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan dpe rgyan dang cha lugs la// go cha go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang bskur
197b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur dbu rgyan tsod pan ldan// kaM haM oM TuM/ oM rat+na ma la~M/ A b+hi Shiny+tsa tAM/ oM pyA Ta laM ba A b+hi laM baM hUM/ spyod lamo kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po snang ba yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du

197b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phro ba ma lus kun// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas shog/ dpal he ru ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon ku kunA dzas mdzad pa rdzog so//

200a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs// e ye baM le maM su ra/ oM na maHsarba tA thA ga ta a nu rA ga ya ma~M man+ta la hUM b+h+rUM// chos 'byung na mkha'i rang bzhin las// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsigs/

200b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// oM ma hA su kha/ badz+ra satwa aH// dzaHhUM baM hoH// su ra tasti// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku// dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'od // zhal bzhi rnam gzigs phyag bzhi pa//

200b6(rgyud 'grel): oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya b+hik+tsit+taM gu na/ karma badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yos// gnas kun byin gyis brlabs
201a1(rgyud 'grel): pAr bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+hA t+yA bad+d+ha swa b+hA bA At+ma ko haM// mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung me gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya
201a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di// rang byung rnams kyis dbang bskur ba'o// hrIHoM d+hi Shiny+tsi mAM/ rat+na mA le a b+hiSh+Tha traM/ paT+Ta lo a b+hi Shiny+tsa aM/ badz+re tu Sh+ya ho// byin rlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis// rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang // dpal ldan pad+ma gaR+Sha dbang sku// cha lugs

201a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul du gzigs// rang 'ong ngo bo las byung ba'i// na bza' dkor mo dkar gsal mdangs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pad+ma dang // thong pa bdud rtsis gang ba 'dzin// rin chen rgyan sogs phreng ba dang // na bza' dril ba'i rkeng
