201b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra yis bskul byas nas// thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad// oM badz+re be sha poT/ a la la he// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rab mnyes par// lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste/
201b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel// khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang // rnal 'byor mtshan ma rab tu sbyang // gsang ba'i gnasu gzhal yas khang // rgyan chags gdan rnams ston bzhin dbyung // thig le gnasu mtshan bya
201b4(rgyud 'grel): nas// spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal// gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la// hriMHlas pad+ma gar dab phyug/ dzaHlas rnam par gzigs ma ste// hUM las de bzhin sbrel ma yin// baM lus lha mo sa 'dzin te// de bzhin ha
201b5(rgyud 'grel): yis khro gnyer ma// hUM gis gtum pa'i dbang phyug ste// he sa ni sna tshogs pad+ma'o// A las pad+ma'i na bza' ma// ho las pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma'o// de dag nang gi phyogs bzhi dang // phyi nas pad+ma'i phyogs bzhir ro// oM las gling
201b6(rgyud 'grel): pu traM bi baM// baM las rnga tshan dza rdza je// me mtshams la sogs 'dab ma bzhir// lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin// a A me tog spos me ma// a aHmar me dril chab ma// bar mtshams khyams kyi gnas bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni
202a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa yin// dzaM las rta mgrin 'phad+ma mtho ma// hUM las phag gdong mche ba can// baM las nyi zla me 'bar ma// hoHlas thal byed sgo bzhir gnas// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho pad+mA nat+te shwa ri hrIHdzaMH// rang gi gnas/
202a2(rgyud 'grel): nas spro byas te// slar 'dus yab yum lus la gzhug/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dza// rnam gzigs pad+ma rA ga'i mchog/ pad+ma dmar mo kha 'byed mdzod// oM badz+ra pad+ma ma dza// sgrol ma ljang gu g.yon dkur birten// pad+ma sdong 'dziman
202a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pos brtem/ he pad+me pad+mi baM// sa 'dzin sngon mo rgyan can ma// chos kyi 'khor l-i pad+ma dkar// ho pad+ma ni ri dzi// lho gnyer dkar mo mdung rtse gsum// pad+ma mthing kha bskyod par byed // hUM phaT tsaN+De shwa ri hUM phaT/ pad gtumi dbang
202a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gang ri'i mdog/ pad maM dmar po tri shul// ha ma bi shra pad ma mu ge si ta hUM phaT// sna tshogs pad+ma ljang gu'i mdog/ pad+ma 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin// hrIHpad+mo pad mo hUM hUM oM// pad+ma na bza' gser gyi mdog/ pad+ma
202a5(rgyud 'grel): ser po chu srin rgyal// ho pad+me sha kra ma hUM dzaM// pad+ma'i dbang phyug dmar ba'i mdog/ pad+ma le brgan rdor rtse lnga// he ra tipad+ma bi saM thatha// gling bu sngon mo sna tshogs sgra// pad mas mtshan ma'i gling bu sgrogs// ha ra ti pad+ma ge te te ti/
202a6(rgyud 'grel): pi bang ser mo drug ldan dbyangs// pad+mas mtshan pa'i pi paM bsgreng // he ra ti pad+ma hA sa haM// rnga chen dmar mo pad ma'i rnga// phrin las so so'i tshul bzhin brdung // ha ra ti pad+ma ne t+ye be pa pa dza// rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga ma// pad+mas mtshan
202b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rol stobs tshul// a bad+d+he puSh+pe/ me tog dkar serar+ya pad+mas mtshan// rin chen bzhod pa bkang ba 'dzin// A badz+re d+hU pe/ spos me dkar sngon bdug pa snod// pad+mas mtshan pa'i g.yas 'dags// oM badz+ra a lo ka/ mar ma
202b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo pad+mas mtshan// snod mang mar me'i sdong po 'dzin// aHbadz+ra gan+d+he/ dri chab ljang skya pad+mas mtshan// dung chos snong 'dzin g.yas pas mthor// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ rtag gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // thod pa rta
202b3(rgyud 'grel): mgo ljang gu 'dzin// oM badz+rI pA sha b+h+rUM/ phyag gdong sngon mo g.yas che ba// g.yon pa pad+ma'i zhags pa 'dzin// oM badz+ri shrIM kha le me// snang ba mo dmar phyag gnyis kyis// lcags sgroganyi ma zla bas mtsha no// oM badz+ra b+han+ta
202b4(rgyud 'grel): thal byeng ljang gus g.yas dril bu// g.yon pa thod pa g.yas pa'i sku// kun kyang rgyun phreng na bza' dang // rigs kyi mtshan ma 'bying zag bzhin// 'dzum bteg rgod pa so zurar+ya ston// rang gi cha lugs gar gyi gnas// mtshan
202b5(rgyud 'grel): po ro monyam lnga zhugs nas// chos dbyingasna ye shes snyoms 'jug las// lha mo sa badrag po bskul mdza de// sems can kun rnam kun 'phrul mdzad// rten pa'i dkyil 'khyoHrnams kyi// skye mche dru la sangs rgyas drug
202b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bzhi yis mtshan ma dang // rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan// thugs ka'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad de// dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing // stong pa
203a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nges par gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// pad+ma gArA skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye haM b+ha ga
203a2(rgyud 'grel): bAn ma hAk+Sha ra Ni ka ru No ka/ dI sh+ya ho// sau ma ya ho// sa mA ya s+t+waM/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhug
203a3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// k+Sha ya bAk+tsit+ta hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// a la la ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan mdzad cing // rtog pa du ma
203a4(rgyud 'grel): sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// a laM l-i ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings las rol// a la la ho/ kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyi
203a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnam dgod rung las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen mgon medun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa// a la la ho// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan phrin las brgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i
203a6(rgyud 'grel): wA la phyag 'tshal lo// a l-i la ho// thal mo pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin// ras kyi snying gar bcing bya ste// mthe bong mthe'u chung pad+ma bzhin// rgyas par 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// hri a ti b+hu ho/ ban+de ni kA ro ya mi/ gu ru ba ti/ a ma
203b1(rgyud 'grel): oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// lha mo'i cho ga rdza ma lus spro// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri tshogs kun gyis mchod par bya// oM ba na pa na pA nra
203b2(rgyud 'grel): su rat+na/ sarba ta thA ba twA/ sa ma yo gI sid+d+hi AHhUM/ oM bad+d+ha puSh+pe/ badz+re d+hU pe/ badz+ra A lo ke/ badz+ra ban+d+he/ prA tAMts+tsha ho/ shr-I b+hA ga ban kha kha khA hi khA hi/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes
203b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur te// g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// te zhes bya baM glu yi rgyo// thams cad dag pas rab bsgrub pa'o// dzaHhUM baM ho// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa
203b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa dag bya'i phyir/ shel gong bzhin du dag pa'o// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ 'dar ba sna tshogs 'khri
203b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongasu bsgyur cing par byas
203b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ pad+ma'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo bskor// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas// rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed//
204a1(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha pad+ma narte shwa ri hrIHhUM bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dmar po tsi bder gzung // snying gar 'dren tshul kha 'byed pa// rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// bsnyems pa'i
204a2(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yon pa yis// bid+hA sngon po ts+tsho bad+mar bzung // snying gir 'dren tshul bud med rgyu// sgrol ba'i byang chub mchog yin no// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dkar po ci bdir bzung // 'khor lo'i rgyu
204a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings rab tu bskor// rgyal chen po yi 'khor lo'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma mothing kha ci byader gzung // g.yas pa gar byed bya dan gsum// khro gnyer ma yi phyag rgya yin// bsnyems pa'i lag pa
204a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dmar po ci bder bzung // g.yas pa tI shul tshul du bsgred // pang gtum dbang phyug bde gnon rgya// bsnyems pa'i lag po g.yon pa yis// ng+ga ljang gu ci bder gzung // g.yasta pas 'khor lho rtse brgya
204a5(rgyud 'grel): stong // pad+ma dbang phyug thugs kyi rgyu// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma ser po tso bder bzung // g.yas pas gar byed chu sbyin bsgreng // pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa
204a6(rgyud 'grel): yis// pad+ma le brgan ci bder gzung // snying gar 'dren tshul rdo rje'i rgya// 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i go ba gsum// gling ba la sogs lha mo yo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i// phyag rgya
204b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags gnyis gnyis med 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dul// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// sems dpa' pad+ma'i dga' mchag
204b2(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma'i dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la ho// kye gar dbang thar pa'i dga' ba gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag/ tshangs pa 'jug sil dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags// A la la ho// pad+mo sgyu ma dpal
204b3(rgyud 'grel): rnamasna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar byed pa// pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad rung rnam par sbyongs// pad+mo 'dzin pas mngon sum spyan snga
204b4(rgyud 'grel): gar mekhan gar mdzod cig/ so so'i lcags kyi pad+ma lA// mtshan ma chos kyi snying por bcas// A~M tA re tut+tA ra tu ra swA hA// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub// mthe bong mthe chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad+ma dza
204b5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rgyas// sngags bcas gnas smra bzhag bya ste// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bar bya'o// oM AHdz+haiM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tsho'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa byang
204b6(rgyud 'grel): par mdza du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol tu gsol// la la rab tu drag cing spyi bo drag la drag pa'i bud med sku lha
205a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu snang / 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu nges shing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzod// la lar rab
205a2(rgyud 'grel): tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma'i rgyal po'i ngam tshig la grub par mdzod// bteg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam sbyar zhing // rim gror byas pa btags pa'i mchog/ bteg pa'i lta bas gar byed do// sma
205a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ban+d+ha brtags pa la// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dgang // lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan// 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtsi 'grub// rang 'byung gdong gnas rnam par
205a4(rgyud 'grel): dag/ mnyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzod// byin rlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis brlabs cing rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po'i rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad
205a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ hUM dang phaT gyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i glu rnams blang byas nas// sil snyan rnams kyi sgra rnams dang // gar gyis lha rnams mnyes par byas// pad+ma pad+ma hUM/ pad+ma pad+ma hU~M/ pad+ma
205a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma hriM/ bdag cag ngam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcad gtub lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib ma phob pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mos la 'tsho ba dang //
205b1(rgyud 'grel): gzi mdangs lus la 'jug par byed pa stong phrag gis// 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khamasu snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab tu gnas// re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol/
205b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam// thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i
205b3(rgyud 'grel): sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya// mthun bzhi'i skabasu gtor ma gtang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang las phyung ste mdun bzhag nas// gsol gdab las
205b4(rgyud 'grel): la bskul bar bya// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjesu mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs zhes kyang // slar yang sems can don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha muH// de nas phyag
205b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya rnams bkod pa// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas// rnam gsum sems dpa' hUM la thim// rim bzhin thig lce mnyam pa'i dbyings// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan dpe rgyan dang cha lugs
205b6(rgyud 'grel): gsal// go cha go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM hUM oM tu hrIHrat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM paT+Ta laM a ba liM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po
206a1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor rol pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' btung byin brlabs ma nyams bzlas// sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol// byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag/ thams
206a2(rgyud 'grel): cad 'gro ba'i don phyir spring // rnam bkod dge ba dri med mchog/ mya ngan sdug bsngal las dbugs 'byin// bkra shis bde legs 'grub byed pas// rang gi rin chen rdzas kyis gang+gA 'dzin// he r+ya ti ts+tshit+ta ba si tra thA// gling bu sdom
206a3(rgyud 'grel): mo sna tshogs sgra// nor bus mchin pa'i gling bu sgregs// he rat+ti rat+na/ ge te ti te te te/ pi baM ser mo drug ldan dbyangs// nor bus mtshan pa'i pi paM bsgreng // he ratI na hA se hAs baM// rnga chen dmar mo nor bu'i rnga// phrin las so so
206a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin brdung // he rat+ti rat+na nri t+ye pe pa pe pa dzaM// rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga la// nor bus mtshan pa'i rol stabs tshul// a badz+ra puSh+pe/ me tog dmar ser nor bus mtshan// rin chen gzhong pa bkang ba 'dzin// A badz+ra d+hU pe/ spos pe
206a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar sngon bdug pa'i snod// norar+ya bus mtshan pa ga ya su 'degs// aM badz+ra A lo ke hrIHmar me dmar po nor bus mtshan// snod mang mar me'i sdong bu 'dzin// aHbadz+ra gan+d+he/ dri chab ljang skya nor bus mtshan// g.yon na
206a6(rgyud 'grel): dung chos g.yas par 'thon// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu dang // thod pa rta mgo ljang gu 'dzin// oM badz+ra pA she hUM/ phag gdong sngon mo g.yas mche ba// g.yon pa rin chen zhags pa 'dzin// oM badz+ra
206b1(rgyud 'grel): shr-i kha le baM// snang ba dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis// lcags sgrog nyi ma zla bas mtshan// oM badz+ra g+haN+De hoH// thal byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pas thod pa mtha' yas sku// kun kyang rgyan phreng na bza' dang // rigs
206b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshan ma 'gying bag bzhin// 'dzum bteg rgod pas so zur ston// rang gi cha lugs gar gyis gnas// mgon po mnyam gzhag la zhugs gnas// chos dbyings ye shes snyoms 'jug pas// lha mos bdag po bskul
206b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad de// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad// brten pa'i dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyis// skye mched drug la sangs rgyas drug/ phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan mya dang // rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan// thugs ka'i 'od
206b4(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phro 'du yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad cing // dzaHbaM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcing // stong pa shin tu yod med rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs
206b5(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// rdo rje nyi ma skal bzang dpal khyod badrog/ dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hau b+ha gau bAn/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dri sh+tsa ho/ sa ma ya hau// sa ma yas+t+ra/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir/
206b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas ga shegs shing bzhugasu gsol// kA ya bAkr-it+ta hUM/ sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor
207a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mdzes// A la la ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad cing // rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzod// a la la ho// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnams
207a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol// a lA la ho// kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam dgod rang las byung // a la la ho// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gag med kun
207a3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa// tshogs btsas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa// a lA la ho// sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan phrin las brgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// lus kyi yan lag thams cad ni// sa la
207a4(rgyud 'grel): bskul te phyag bya ba// snying ga kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par bya// traM a b+hU ho// ban+d+ha naM kA ro ya yi/ gu ru pa ti a la lA ho// oM 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus
207a5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// gzugs s+tha dri ro reg bya chos// lha mo'i tshogs mu lus spro// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri tshigs kun gyis mchod par bya// oM pa na pe na pa nu// su ra ti pra pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA gaM tA/ sa mA ya~M ga sid+d+hi a
207a6(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra puSh+Ti/ badz+re d+hU be/ badz+ra A la~M kaM/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ pr-i tIts+tsha ho// shrI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha khA hi/ lag pa g.yas g.yon dag gis// mdzub me mtho'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje rin chen tha
207b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyar nas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar+ya T+Ta// hrIHzhes bya ba'i glu yi rgyu// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// dzaHhUM b+hU ha~M// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs// nor
207b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// dpal ldan nyi ma'i phyag rgya ro gnas// na mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' las
207b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs/ shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag par 'gyur// drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis 'grub
207b4(rgyud 'grel): par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod de nyid don gsal shog/ dpal pad+ma gur gyi dbang phyug gi gsang don rnam par dpyod pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
207b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkham tho bo dz+haiM kA ra sid+ha dang / thu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de/ lha rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / bkra shis/
207b6(rgyud 'grel): oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ye swA hA/
208a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mi ma'i bsang don ra dgod pa bzhugs/
208b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+re rat+na pyA b+ha gu d+hAn+na d+ha ro b+hA he nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rin chen nyi ma'i/ gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//
208b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun bdag rnam 'phrul ston// mi 'gyur 'joms mdzad chags pa med// zag med 'byung gnas las kun dag/ mun sel dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal// zhen chags 'jungs dang bkren sogs 'joms/
208b3(rgyud 'grel): rin chen nor stsogs sbyin mdzad pa'i// rdo rje nyi ma'i gsang don dgod// rab bsdus de 'jug don phyir bshad // rang bzhin dang tshul bzang las byung // gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa
208b4(rgyud 'grel): can// dbang thob ngam tshig 'jigs med pa// theg chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog/ rdo rje nyi ma la dga' bas// phyi rang g.yeng ba rab spangs te// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bu gnyer// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang /
208b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo skyed mos tshal nyid du// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya// 'gro la snying rje chen po yis// bdag gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas// sbyor nus mthu gsum bskyed pas// bdag dang
208b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro po sbyang ba dang // dbang po'i dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te// dang po bya ba'i rim rdzogs sbyang // sgrib tshogs las sgrol dag byed pa'i// sems can chid med blo yis gzung // bar chad bgegs bsal srung byed pa 'i//
209a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo me 'od rab gur// phyogs bcu khwa za'i tshogs bskyed pa'o// cho gas rang gi las bzhin bsgom// thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las// 'bru
209a2(rgyud 'grel): ba khyaba'i snying rje'i rgyun// stong gsal na mkha'i shugs ltar 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas pa bzhugs// e yaM baM laM maM suM raM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA a nu ra ga ya mi
209a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Da la hUM hUM/ chos 'byung na mkha'i rang bzhin las// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// ri rab me 'od rgyan gsal zhing // kha dog dbyibs rgyan mtshan mar bcas// bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas//
209a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus// khang pa gru bzhi sgo khyud dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa// sa gzhi na mkha' l-i Na Sh+yoH/ rigs kyi rin chen 'tsher ba dang // rang byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od // sna
209a5(rgyud 'grel): ldi'i rtsig pa dra bar ldan// dra phyed rin chen pha gus mtshan// nor bus mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad// rin chen mu tig me tog rje// rgyan mtshan bla re rnga yang gdugs// 'dod yon lnga'i lha mo 'khrungs// zla phyed rdo rin chen dang // ba dan dril bu sgra
209a6(rgyud 'grel): snyan sgrogs// pho brang ren chen zur brgyad pa// thig bzhis phye ba'i ri'u mig brgyad// mtshams phyed rin tshan phreng bas mdzes// pad mtshan rin chen mu khyud phreng // mtshamasu bum pa gang po bzhi// rigs kyi mtshan mas rnam
209b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzes// bar khyams cha yi mtshams bzhi dang // sgo nas la sogs pad+ma'i gdan// phyi rol ra ba rim gsum brgyan// phyogs brgyad dur khrod chen po brgyad// de mtha' 'dod pa'i long spyod dang // rdo rje rabs bskor ba'o//
209b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gdug cing drag po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu grags// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam pa'o// rnam thar ske bzhi
209b3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms 'jug gi/ 'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral ba// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad de// mngon byang lnga yi rdzogs skur gyur// sems dang sems dpa'i ting nge dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud
209b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// oM mu hA su kha badz+ra sAtwa AHdziHhUM baM ho// su ra ta s+t+waM// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen sku// dkar zhing dmar la mngangs gsal 'od// zhal bzhi rnam gzigs phyag bzhi
209b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dang pos rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bcas 'khrol// 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes// stong g.yogs dang dkar gser ris can// sku smad tshigs gu'i na bza' la// rin chen
209b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'i rked chings 'dril// mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang // phyag zhabs dpung rgyan se mo // rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs
210a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsam// oM na maHsarba tA tha ga tA/ kA ya bAkr-it+ta gu Na kar+m+ma badz+ra s+ya b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnamasu// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya
210a2(rgyud 'grel): yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya'o// oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// rdo rje thil mo mnyam sbyor ba// mdzub mo mnyam ste phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brgyan// rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya// dpral bar mi
210a3(rgyud 'grel): gu bzhag pa ni// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// a b+hi Shiny+tsa mai/ rat+na me le A b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ ban+d+ha laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ badz+ra tu sh+ya ho// byin rlabs rigs kyis dbu rgyun gyis// rgyu yo mgon po rdo rje 'chang // dpal ldan rdo rje nyi ma
210a4(rgyud 'grel): rud+ham lus mtshan ma rgyun gsal gyur// gsor gyi ril nyi shAr bzhin// zhal ba'i phyag bzhis rnam mdzes pa// g.yas na mnga' dang ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gang+gA nyi dkyil rdo rjes mtshan// 'od kyis dkyil 'khor rnam lngas
210a5(rgyud 'grel): bskor// 'dzum bcas po yon mig gyen du bteg/ lA lar cung zhig khros pa la// b+hu ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku// zhabs gnyis skyil krung legs bzhugs shong // snga ma'i rgyan gyis byas pa'o// rang 'ong ngo bo las byung ba'i
210a6(rgyud 'grel): mthing shun mdog 'dra mA ma kI/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgyu rtsal can// phyag gnyis rin chen thod pa 'dzin// rin chen sna tshogs phreng ba dang // na bza' dril bu rkeng chings can// phyung naso byin gyis rlabs mdzad de// thabs
210b1(rgyud 'grel): dang shes rab ldan par gyur// gnas ba'i yi ge mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor gdan la lags gnas rnams// sgra dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// phyag rgyaban yi rnam par gsal// lha ma'i bum bA sau khA sau t+yas te// Na
210b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur rigs kyi bdag por bsam// tAM las bskyed pa'i ling ga ni// rin chen gsal lam phaT kyis mtshan// a yis dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyings// pado 'dab brgyad la e gnas pa// sna tshogs brda yis bskul byas nas//
210b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs shes gnyis med rol par mdzad// traM pra be sha phaT/ a la la la ho/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste// gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu
210b4(rgyud 'grel): spel// khams gsum 'gro gnas dag pa dang // rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam pa ro spya // gsang ba'i gnas su gzhal yas khang // rgyan sogs na bza' sngon bzhin 'byung // thig+na le gnas su mtshan byas nas// spos pa yi
210b5(rgyud 'grel): ge'i dkyil 'khor gsal// traM las rdo rje nyi ma ste// gnas nas dbus kyi pad+ma la// oM las lha mo'i dbang bskur ma'o// hrIHlas de bzhin gter ldan ma// hoHlas rgyal mtshan ljin yin// hrIHlas lha mo mchod chen ma'o// dza
210b6(rgyud 'grel): las lha mo mngab 'dzin te// hUM las de bzhin ral gri 'dzin// baM las lha mo nyi ma'o// de dag nang gi re'u cha dang // rin chen rtse mo'i phyogs bzhir gnas// oM las gling bu traM bi pheM// baM las rnga chen dze rnga rnga// mi mtshams la sogs
211a1(rgyud 'grel): re'u mig tu// lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin// a a me tog spros me mA// a aHmAr m+me dr-i chab ma// bar khyams mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni gnas pa yin// dzaHlas rta 'phrin 'phang
211a2(rgyud 'grel): mtho ma// hUM las phag gdong mche ba can// baM las nyi zla me 'bar ma// hoHlas thal byed sgo bzhir gnas// oM sbyi t+ya bu s+yai t+ya ma hA badz+ra rat+na b+ha ta ta traM dzaHrang gi gnas nas spro bya ste// slar 'dus la yab yum gzhug/ badz+ra satwa
211a3(rgyud 'grel): dzaHlha mo dbang skur mdang gsal dmar// dbu rgyan rdo rje cod pan nA// badz+ra rat+na hUM/ gtor ldan dmar ser phyag gnyis ma// rin chen gnyis kyi bum pa bsnams// badz+ra d+harmA paM/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan dkar mdog ma// rin po che
211a4(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyal mtshan mchog/ oM badz+ra karma hoH/ mchog chen ljang sngon rin chen mdog/ tshul dang gzi brjid chen po ston// gzhu dang mnga' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i rgyan//
211a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'degs// rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te// skyil krung gdan la legs par bzhugs/ badz+ra rat+na bA b+ha ta ta tra dza// dbang bskur ma yi dbu rgyan te// gter ldan ma yi rin chen bum// rgyal mtshan mchog
211a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan rin chen tog/ mchod chen rin chen gzhong pa 'gengs// mnga' gzhu mo dang kha T+wAM ga/ nyi ma mo dang me mo zhi// rang ba mtshan gyi phyag rgya bzhin// 'gyings bcas gtso bo'i phyogasu 'dud// gling bu ma sogs lha mo yi// phyag rgya'i/
211b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'i// phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pas// 'jal dum g.yul 'gyed rnam par khyad
211b2(rgyud 'grel): par gyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jal du ma rnam par rgyas pa'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag
211b3(rgyud 'grel): gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston// a la la la la ho// mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par 'di dag thams cad bud med rnams kyi phyir// rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen
211b4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pu mchog/ bud med rin chen dag pa dram pa'i rin du thams cad 'gro/ a la la ho// so so'i ljags kyi pad+ma la// chos kyi snying po mtshan ma'i dkyil// tAM pa pa ta Ta~M Ta Ta tra Ta/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste//
211b5(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong rdo rjes g.yog pa ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu yin// sngags bcas gnas nas dgrol bar bya'i// oM A hUM// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzodado// dam tshig
211b6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa grub par mdza du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod // mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol tu gsol// thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi
212a1(rgyud 'grel): zad gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la mdzod // mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal// khro zhing 'dzum dang
212a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i bzhin// khro las gyur kyang bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar blta zhing legs por gnas// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtags pa la// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par bkang // lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga
212a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs ston bdud rtsi 'grub// rang byung gdong nas rnam par dag/ mnyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzad// byin rlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin
212a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i glu rnams glang byas naso// sil snyan kun
212a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgra rnams dang // gar gyisA lha rnams mnyes par b+ha// tAM trUM traM/ ba ba ba ba b+hA ba byA/ Ta Ta Ta Ta TA nA D+ha Ta~M/ NAtA tratrAt+tA tA twen+na t+te/ traTanA tut+te/ ta durAt+na/ putra Ta tra/ bdag cag dam chog 'di lo mngon du zhug sa p+tA nAmAs+thA/ btsud
212a6(rgyud 'grel): gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib ma so phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas med la 'tsho ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug par byed pa stong phrag gis// 'od kyis phog pas
212b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams su snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab gnas p+ta// rI snron thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzlas pa rnam gnyis sam// thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis//
212b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag mtshan ma gsal bya dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin dbyings dang ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bsgrub par
212b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ thun bzhi'i skabasu gtor ma gtang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang las byung ste mdun bzhag nas// gsol btab las la bskul bar bya// oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad//
212b4(rgyud 'grel): rjesu mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha mutrade nas phyag rgyun ma bkod po// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu byas nas/
212b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum sems dpa' hU~M la thim// rim bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i sgrar gnas te// mtshan dpes rgyan dang tshe lug g+has lnga// go cha go bcings bsrung byo zhing // dab
212b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur dbu rgyan gcod pan can// kaM haM au nuM/ oM rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ pan+d+ha li pa a b+hi laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya se// dbang po snang ba yul

213a5(rgyud 'grel): phab pa// / oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ye swA hA/ bkra shis
214a1(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rol pa'i gsang don rnam par dgod pa bzhugs so//
214b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu kra la b+ha ta gu d+har+b+ba d+ha ro b+hU te nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gsang ba'i don du rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// thugs rjes
214b2(rgyud 'grel): cha mnyam la rgyud gzigs// so so'i don bzhin rnam drug tshogs// dbugs sbyin phrin las kun gyi bdag/ rta mchog dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal// lha chen dregs byed 'dul byed pa'i// rta yi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i thabs//
214b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin// rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don phyir bshad// rang bzhin dang tshul bzang las byung // gnyis med yon tan skye bas thob// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa can// dbang thob dam tshig 'jig med pa//
214b4(rgyud 'grel): thig chen gsang sngags blo gros mchog/ rta mchog dkyil 'khor la dga' bas// phyi nang g.yeng ba rab bsal te// rang gi 'dod don 'bras bur gnyer// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/
214b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// 'gro la snying rje chen po yis// bdag gzhan bsgrub par dam bcas nas// sbyor ldan nus mthu gsum bskyed pas// bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba dang // dbang po'i
214b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mdun dmigs te// dang po bya ba'i rdzogs rim spyad// sgrib tshogs las grol dag byed pa'i// sems can tshad med blo yis bzung // bar chad bgegs pas bsrung byed pa'i// 'khor lo me 'odor ba kun// phyogs bcu
215a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshogs bskyed pa'i// cho ga rang gi las bzhin sgom// thams cad spros bral de bzhin nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems dbyings las// 'gro ba khyab pa'i thugs rje rgyun// stong gsal na mkha'i
215a2(rgyud 'grel): shugs ltar 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa'i skal bzang dpal// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs// e yaM paM laM maM suM raM/ oM na ma sarba ta thA ga tA a nu rag ya mi maN+Da la hUM/ chos 'byung na mkha'i rang bzhin las//
215a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin brtsegs// ri rab me 'ong rgyun bsal zhing // kha dog dbyibs rgyan mtshan mar bcas// bde gshegs yon tan snang ba'i gnas// sna tshogs pad+ma rin po che// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dbus
215a4(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud dang // rta babs bzhi yis mdzes byas pa// sa gzhi na mkhar logs kyi phyogs// rigs kyi rin chen 'char ba la// rang byung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od// dra phyed rin chen pha gus mtshan// sna tshogs rdo rje ka ba
215a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad// rin chen mu tig rin chen phreng // rgyal mtshan bla re rnga yab gdugs// 'dod yon lnga yi lha mo 'khyud // zla phyed rdo rje rin chen dang // ba dan dril bu'i sgra snyan sgrogs// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba la// sna tshogs
215a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes rnam par mtshan// mtshamasu bum pa gang ba bzhi// rigs kyi mtshan mas mdzes par byas// dbus kyi sto ba nas bzung ste// sgo nas bar du pad+ma'i gdan// dbus su lha chen yab yum brgyad// phyogs bzhir bsnol
215b1(rgyud 'grel): te rnam par bsam// phyi rol ra ba rim gsum brgyan// phyogs mtshams dur khrod chen po brgyad // de mtha' 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang // rdo rje ra bas bskor ba'o// thams cad dag par mos pa yi// sdig med stobs kyis
215b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon du// drag shu lo sbyor bas mnyam sbyor bas// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya// rnam thar bzhi yi snyoms 'jug gi/ 'gog gnas gdul bya'i don bral ba// phyogs bcu'i rgyal bas bskul mdzad do// mngon byang
215b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi rdzogs skur gyur// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdza hUM baM hoHrdo rje sems
215b4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bde chen sku// dkar zhing dmar ba'i mdangs gsal 'ong // zhal bzhi rnam bzhi phyag bzhi pa// dang po rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bcas 'khor// 'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang kA'u// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdze
215b5(rgyud 'grel): stod g.yogs dar dkar dang ris can// sku smang tshig gu'i na bza' gsol// rin chen 'phreng ba'i rkeng chings can// mgul du do shal dpung rgyan dang / phyag zhabs gdu bu se mo de// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag
215b6(rgyud 'grel): tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA kA ya bA kr-it+ta gu Na kar+m+ma badz+ra swa b+hA at+ma ko&haM// lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams// dkyil
216a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgyu yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// oM d+harmA d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin
216a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// haM oM b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ pan+d+ha laM ba a b+hi Shiny+tsa ai/ badz+rI tu bye ho// byin brlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis// rgyu yi mgon po rdo
216a3(rgyud 'grel): rje 'chang // dpal ldan rta mchog rol pa'i sku/ cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// de bzhin zhabs kyang rnam pa bzhi// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum pa bsgreng // sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri mnga'//
216a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa kha tshur sna tshogs par // mdung dang dbyug pa gzhu 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa gru gsum dpal mo mnan// gnyis pas grol ma dga' ba'o// g.yon pas mig gsum khyab 'jug dang // gnyis pas tshangs pa dga' rab
216a5(rgyud 'grel): gnon// zhal rnams dmar dang nag po dang // dkar zhing rta mgo ljang gu ston// sgyu yi kha dog ljang gu la// phyag rnams dmar zhing zhabs gnag pa'o// khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang // 'bar ba chen po'i brgyan gyis mdzes//
216a6(rgyud 'grel): rang 'ong ngo bo las byung ba'i// dam tshig sgrol ma mdog ljang skya// sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa thogs// rin chen rgyan mdzes 'jo sgeg stabs// phyung nas byin gyis brlabs mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab ldan par 'gyur// gnas
216b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi ge mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor gdan la legs gnas rnams// spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya bzhi yi rnam par gsal// lha mo'i bum pas khrus byas te// dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag por
216b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// haM las bskyed pa'i ling ga ni// rgya gram gsang lam pad kyis mtshan// a yos dag byas b+ha ga'i dbyibs// pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad e gnas pa// sna tshogs brda yis bskul byas nas// thabs shes gnyis med rol
216b3(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// oM pra bau sha phaT/ u la la la la ho// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad// lha rnams rang la gzhug bya ste// gnyis ka'i dga' ba rab tu spel// khams gsuM
216b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro gnas dag pa dang // rnal 'byor mtshan ma rnam por sbyang // gsang ba'i gnasu gzhal yas khang // rgyan sogs gdan rnams sngon bzhin 'byung // thig les gnasu mtshan byas nas// spros pas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor
216b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal// haM lAs bskyed pa'i rta mchog ni// gsang gnas dbus kyi pad+ma la'o// dzaM las sna tshogs pad+ma'i rgya// ta las sna tshogs rdo rje ma'o// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi// lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs rnams la// khyad par
216b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo gnyis kyis lhags// chos kyi snying po'i phyogasu bskyed// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba sbyang byas nas// yab yum sku la gzhug par bya// oM bi shU badz+ra d+harmA hog/ sna tshogs pad+ma dmar skya mo// phyag
217a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pad+ma gar stabs sbyar// oM bi shwa badz+ra satwa AH/ sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa 'dzin// lha mo 'di dag thams cad kyang // rin chen rgyan dang na bza' klubs// 'dzum bteg rgod pa'i so zur ston//
217a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi cha lcags kun gyi gnas// mgon po ro mnyam la bzhugasta naste// chos dbyings ye shesna snyoms 'jug pas// lha mo bdag po bskul mdzad de// simasna can kun don rnam 'phrul mdzad// rten gyi dkyil 'khor
217a3(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kyi// skye mched drug las sangs rgyas drug/ phyag rgya bzhi yi mtshan ma dang // rigs kyi bdag pos nye bar mtshan// thugs ka'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor bskul mdzad de// dzaH
217a4(rgyud 'grel): baM hoH'i sbyor tshogs dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgyu bcing // stong pa shin tu 'od med rnal 'byor mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// rta mchog rol pa
217a5(rgyud 'grel): skal bzong dpal khyod bdag/ dzAHhU~M baM hau// oM d+h+ye hi b+ha ga b+hAn/ mAhA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hau// sa mA yA s+t+waM/ bder gshegs po brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas
217a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs shing bzhugasu gsol// ka yaM ba k+Shit+ta hUM// sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ra mdzes// a la lo ho// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams
217b1(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis gnon mdzad cing // rtog pa du mA'i sgro 'dogs gcod pad+ma mdzad// a la la ho// gnyis ma ye shes gnyis can nam mtha' yas// snang stong bde rkyen mnyam nyid dbyings la rol// a la la ho// sun 'byu/
217b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung // a lA la'o// mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med kun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs pa// a la la ho// sku gsung
217b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs mchog yon tan phrin las rgyan// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// a lA la ho/ dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag bya'o// hUM a ti b+hu'o// ban+d+ha naM kA ro ya mi/ gu ru pa
217b4(rgyud 'grel): tI a lA la ho// oM 'byung ba chen las thams cad 'byung // stong gsum rdul snyed ma lus pa'i// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// lha yi tshogs rnams ma lus sngo// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri tshogs kun
217b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi mchod par bya'o// i prA na pe na pi nu su ra ti pu pa ra mu sarba ta thA ga tA/ sa ma yaM ga sid+d+hi a pa hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ badz+ro d+hU pe/ badz+ra A lo ke/ badz+ra gan+d+he pra tots+tsha ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn kha kha khA hi/ gyen du 'thor zhing
217b6(rgyud 'grel): thur du 'beb so// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dag/ me tog bdug pa ma'i me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa byung ba'o// gang ngam 'on te stong ngam rung // yang na tso 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa
218a1(rgyud 'grel): yaM s+t+ra/ mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// kA ka la ya dang tso'ur+ya'i dbyangs// de bzhin du rab tu gdangs snyan dang // ka ta la yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad 'grub pa'o//
218a2(rgyud 'grel): dzaHhUM baM hoHrnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnam sbyong dpal// rta yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// thams cad pad+mo mos pa yis// sdig med
218a3(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyi ngo 'thon tu// rab tu rnon pa'i rtsel dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shul
218a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po rdo rje ste// dbang phyug dam pa bsgrub par bya// g.yon pa'i khu tshur 'dzub mo yis// dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin//
218a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjer bcas shing slob mo 'grub// g.yas pa bya dan gsum pa bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// brkyang dang bskum pa'i tshul byas nas// khro bo'i skyil mo krung byas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu
218a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ lha mo nyi shu'i tshogs rnams kyis// phyag rgya'i so so'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// rang byung lha mo dang bcas pa'o// phyag rgya sngags kyis gnyis med 'gyur// myos byed stong pas lhag par
218b1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas lhag par rab tu ston/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshe
218b2(rgyud 'grel): kun grub par mdzod// thams cad dag pas mos pas ngo 'thon stobs kyis non par mdzod// hi he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa'i stobs kyis ngo 'thon dbang phyug
218b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug non// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum po la gsum grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon mthu chen non// mnyam sbyor ru tA ma tA'i snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/
218b4(rgyud 'grel): rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis d+mo 'byon tshangs pa non// stor chen tshangs las sgrol ma drongs shig sla ra te// rap+tiM rtsal gyis non pa'i stobs kyis de 'thon dga' dbang non// mnyam sbyor kun gyis bdag
218b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' dbang drongs// a la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir// sgrub zhugs A la l-i la la // a suM b+hA ni s+ye d+hA hUM phaT// mdza' bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongasu rtog pa de dag med
218b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang bla// de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer// rgol ba gang la bya bo 'am mi bya yongasu rtog pa de dag med kyang bla// de 'dra'i rgol ba sgra ma yin pas de la dpal zhesu zhig zer// so so'i ljags
219a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma la// mtshan ma chos kyi snying por bcas// shri pad+ma Ta ba mu khA yo gI shwa ri/ hi hi hi hi hi/ rdo rje thul mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzub mo rtse mnyam bkug pa ni/
219a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog te zhes grags pa yin// sngags bcas gnas su bzhag bya ste// rim bzhin mtha' nas dgrol bar bya'o// oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par
219a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol// la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/
219a4(rgyud 'grel): lA lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi// la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa 'grub// sna tshogs ban+d+ha brtags pa las// sna tshogs bdud rtsis rnam par dgang // lnga lnga lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// mtshan ma rnam pa lnga dang ldan//
219a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i tshogs ston bdud rtsi 'grub// rang 'byung gdod nas rnam par dag/ mnyam pa'i don ldan rol par mdzod// byin brlabs rgyan dang mtshan ldan pa'i// mi mo rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin
219a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis rlabs shig rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba chen po rnam par rol// grub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// mnyam nyid mi g.yo la so Da ba'i// stod tsagru rnams blang byas nas// sil snyan
219b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi sgra rnams dang // gar gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya// Tak+ki hUM dzaHTak+ki hUM dzaHtra tra tra tA tra tra tra/ Ta ta pA Ta tA ba hAM/ Ta ta b+he Ta ta be/ hi ngoH/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta ba/ tA D+ha ba/ ta Ta ba/ ta Ta pa tra thA/ bdag cag dam tshig 'di la
219b2(rgyud 'grel): mngon zhugs pas// bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mos phog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag
219b3(rgyud 'grel): gis// 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams su rab snang ba// lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjeri rab gnas te// re smon thams tsong dus 'dir thob par mdzad du gsol// de nas bzlas brjod rnam gnyis sam// thig le/
219b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sam phra mo gnyis// rnam dag mtshan ma gsal ba dang // mtshan ma med pa'i don bsam bya// mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid
219b5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pas bsgom par bya// thun bzhi'i skabasu gtor ma gtang // rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // rang las phyung ste mdun bzhag nas// gsol btab las la bskul bar bya// oM khyed kyi sems can don
219b6(rgyud 'grel): kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'gro ba'i don la dgongs// oM badz+ra gats+tsha muHde nas phyag rgya rnams bkod pa// rim bzhin bdag la bsdu bya na/
220a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum sems dpa' hUMl thim// rang bzhin thig le mnyam pa'i dbyings// rjes 'byung mtshan ma'i skur gnas te// mtshan dpe rgyan dang cha lugs gsal// go cha go bcings bsrung bya zhing // dbang
220a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur dbu rgyan cod pan ldan// kaM haM/ oM TuM haM/ rat+na mA ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM paT+Ta laM ba a bi laM ba hUM/ spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// lha nyid du ni bsgom bya ste// dbang po'i snang ba yul dus rnams// dkyil 'khor
220a3(rgyud 'grel): rel pa'i tshul du brtag/ bza' btung byin rlabs ma nyams bzlas// sgyu ma gnyis med ye shes rol// byed spyod tshogs gnyis rgyu ru brtag/ thams cad 'gro ba'i don phyir spyad// gang zhig dang po'i las can rnams// rab
220a4(rgyud 'grel): du bzung zhing cung zhig tsam// bsgra las byung ba'i dge ba des// rta mchog dkyil 'khor 'grub par shog/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba// slob dpon ku ku mdzas mdzad pa rdzogs
220a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po bi drA ka ra sid+d+ha/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba lha rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
220a6(rgyud 'grel): oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra ya~M swAhA/ sarbam
221a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor tha~Md kyi rje su 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhug so/
221b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarba maN+Da lA nut+si ta ra sha sra pany+tsa bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjesu 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang
221b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig thog mtha' kun gzigs shing // thams cad don 'byung gsang ba'i tshul// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid ma 'dres stobs// rigs kun 'khor lo'i gnas rdzogs shog/ rang bzhin dpa' bo kun tu snang // 'joms byed chos
221b3(rgyud 'grel): kun ma 'dres pa// yon tan tshegs bdag rol pa'i sku// rigs kyi lha mo tshogs rgyal shog/ dngos med gsang ba'i phyag rgya che// de dag ma lus mtha' sel mdzad// kun 'byung kun gyi bdag nyid don// thabs mdo cho ga
221b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par gsal// der 'jug de yi gnas ldan pa// sgra yi rgyun gyis don tshogs bskyed// mngon 'byung gnas kun 'grub byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor thabs rnams 'jug par bshad// dkyil 'khor thams cad rjes
221b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o// 'jug thabs cho ga lnga pa'i don// sten pa'i lung las gsal bshad pa// gzhung 'di bsdu bar 'os pa yin// don kun 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ thabs kyi cho ga mang po yis// der 'jug lam kun rdzogs
221b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pas// dri med dag pa'i rgyud gzung mdzod// ji ltar gsang sngags legs sbyar bas// dngos grub tshul mang thob 'gyur ba// don dam bya ba mthar phyin pas// gzhan rlon tshogs rnam par dag/ myur bar phyag rgya
222a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshogs 'jug/ bla med dngos grub don kun rtogs// bstan pa'i tshul gyis gdams pa'i rgyun// ji ltar bya ba'i sgo ston byed// shin tu sbyang dka'i las rnams dag/ nga sngags rten 'brel mthu
222a2(rgyud 'grel): yis 'grub// tshul rnams mnyes dus mtshungs 'jigs// gnas dang gnas pa'i tshogs rnams rgyas// rgyas par 'dri dag kun bstan phyir// thabs mang tshul gyis theg pa kun// ngo bo byang chub sems gnas skyong //
222a3(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin bskyed du med pa'i chos// gzhan dag theg chen mchog zhugs pas// sngags tshul 'dus pa'i cho ga shes// byin rlabs brda don yon tani gnas// dbang bskur byang chub rje su slob// rang sems rnam dag dri ma
222a4(rgyud 'grel): med/ gsang sngags cho ga rdzogs par 'gyur// des ni dngos grub kun thob cing // phrin las bya ba 'gag pa med// dang por bdag gzhan srung 'dod pas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnas bya// de dag 'grub byed
222a5(rgyud 'grel): yan lag gzhan// dngos kun gsang ba bstan pa'i sgo// thog mar skyabs 'gro ba yis// rten gnyis dag par sbyang bya ba// de dag thun mong khyad par gyis// mngon par 'gyur ba'i don chen 'grub// sangs rgyas chos
222a6(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun la// dus kun skyabasu 'gro byas na// gzhan gyi phyogs rnams 'jig byed cing // bag med 'khrugs pa'o nad kun zhi// rgyal ba'i 'khor du gyur pa'i phyir// rang gi sdom pa dam tshig gzung // de yang rgya che blo dmi
222b1(rgyud 'grel): te/ ma lus khams rnams kun tu spyad// ji srid rtog pa'i rgyun gnas pa// de srid rtog pas nyes par 'gyur// 'di dag slob dpon la brten te// dam pa'i rjesu gzhol bar bya// rkang gnyis rnams kyi gtso bo mchog/ sangs
222b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mchog la bdag skyabs mchi// zhi tshogs 'dod chags sogs 'joms pa'i// theg chen chos la skyabasu mchi// thugs rjes don mi gtong ba yi// spyod bcas dge 'dun la skyabs gsol// dus 'di dag nas
222b3(rgyud 'grel): gzung byas te// ji srid stong po byang chub par// dngad brtson gus pas de dag kun// mya ngan 'das pa'i don du gzung // srog gcod pa yi sems can dang // gzhan gyi nor la phrog pa dang // 'dod pa log par g.yem pa dag/
222b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can dmyal bar myur du 'gro/ dbyen byed pa dang tshig rtsub dang // brdzun du smra zhing mi sdom dang // byis pa khyal ba smra ba rnams// so so skye bo slu bas bcings// gzhan gyi spyod la brnab sems dang // gnod sems dag
222b5(rgyud 'grel): ni mang ba dang // mi gang lte ba log zhugs lo// ngan 'gro dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// des na lus kyi sdig gsum dang // ngag gi sdig pa rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi gsum po ma lus rnams// sdig pa'i las kun zad byed par//
222b6(rgyud 'grel): des ni ngan 'gror ltung bas na// bag med las kun bshags par bgyi// gzhan la'ang gdams par mi byed de// dus kun ma 'dres rgya chen blos// nyin mtshan drag par gshags par bya// khyad par so sor thar pa'i tshul//
223a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba dang bzhi yan lag tshogs// rnam bzhi 'khor tshogs bcas sdom gang // ci nus bdag gis blang bya zhing // ston pa slob dpon la sogs mdun// bsgo ba'i bka' don sdom pa gzung // ci nas
223a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun bsgral ba'i phyir// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro'i don// yun ring mang du sbrel ba'i yid// phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par gzung // stong gsum 'jig rten ma lus kyi// 'gro drug sems can thams
223a3(rgyud 'grel): cad la// byams pa'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas// sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad sogs kyis// gdungs pa rnams la blta byas la// bde dang sdug bsngal brje byas te// kun gyi bde ba thob 'gyur na// bdag nyid sdug
223a4(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gyur na bla// 'gro don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// thabs mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lho de ltar 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal rgyu dang de nyid las// grol zhing thar pa byas nas ni// bde dang
223a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan par bya ba dang // bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// dang po bdag nyid bsgral byas nas// mi ldog sems kyis dam bcas te// smon pas rdzu 'phrul dpag med dang // zhi gnas lhag mthong mngon shes sogs// thogs
223a6(rgyud 'grel): pa med par 'byung ba yis// myur du mthu stobs lhas gyur nas// g.yeng med 'gro don stsol byed cing // dbugs dbyung theg chen las dgod// dus gsum gzhugs pa'i bla ma dang // dbyer med slob dpon mnyes byas la// yang
223b1(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing // gsol btab lam la gnas par bya// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal sras kun// ma lus phyogs nas dgongasu gsol// bdag gis me tog phreng sogs kun// khyed la legs par dbul
223b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi// maN+Dal bzang bcas mchod pa'i tshogs// gnas 'dir rgyas par bkod byas pas// de dag 'khor tshogs mnyes gyur cing // sdom pa'i man ngag sbyin par bsam// dus de nyid nas de srid par// zhag gcig par
223b3(rgyud 'grel): par yang lan gsum sogs// 'gro don dmigs pa rgya chen gyis// byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bya// bris sku la sogs rtse gcig tu// thal sbyar gus pas 'dug byas te// bla med byang chub 'dod pa yis// sems
223b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rgya cher nges par bskyed// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// gzhan du dbye ba med pa'i thugs// dus 'dir bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi// skye ba
223b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dang gzhan dag tu// sbyin pa las byung bsod nams dang // tshul khrims lngas byung bsod nams dang // bsgom pa las byung bsod nams kyis// dge rtsa bdag gis bgyis pa dang // bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang ni// gzhan yang
223b6(rgyud 'grel): rje su yid rang ba'i// dge bo'i rtsa ba de dag gis// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu// thugs mchog rin chen bskyed pa ltar// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas
224a1(rgyud 'grel): kyang dadus 'ang nas ni gzung byas te// bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yis// byang chub chen por sems bstong ngo de// rgyal ba rnams kyis rjesu spyo // sngon tshe 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis// dza ltar byang chu
224a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen// grong khyer rgyal ba'i rgyal por gyur// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing // 'gro ba thams cad don du gnyer// de dag 'khor ba las bsgral lo// gnod sems dus mir khro ba dang // ser sna pa ni phrag dog nyi
224a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzung ste byang chub dag/ thob 'gyur don gzhan dag kyang spang // dge ba bcu sogs spyang bya zhing // sdig dang 'dod pa spang bar bya// tshul khrims sdom pa la dga' bas// sangs rgyas rjesu bslab par bya// bdag nyid myur ba
224a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis ni// byang chub theb par maM sde zhong // sems can gcig gi rgyu yis ni// phyi ma'i mu~M mthur gnas par bgyi// tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab zhing khams rnam par sbyang bar bya// ming las gzung ba byas pa dag
224a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu dag tu rnam mang thos// bdag gi lus dang ngag gi las// ci nus su ni dog par bya// yid kyi las kyang dag bya zhing // mi dge ba rnams mi bya brgal ba rnams bsgrol ba dang // ma grol ba rnams grol bya zhing /
224a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyung nas// sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams la// byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi// bdag gis sbyin sogs 'di dag gis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas sheg
224b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub smon pa'i sems dang ni// 'jug pa'i sems ngag ci nus pas// yul ngan gnod pa ci byung yang // de las bzlog ste yang dag bzung // snying stobs che zhing dpa' ba yis// las gzhan rnam par spang bya ste// bsam pa
224b2(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig gnas pa dang // dang brtson dge ba'i las kun gyis// mi mthun phyogs rnams kun spangs shing // shes rab rnam gsum bskyed byas nas// log sel ri bo thams cad 'joms// dran dang shes bzhin bskyed byas pas//
224b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu 'gro don brtson par byed// grogs 'dis bdag gzhan grol bar byed// byang sems 'phel bar byed pa ni// rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// srog gi phyir yang bsam bzhin du// brdzun tshig smra bar mi byed dang // lhag pa'i
224b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa rnam dag pas// dus kun tu ni gnas bya zhing // sems can rnam pa thams cad la// g.yo rgyu bslu bar mi bya dang // sems bskyed byang chub sems dpa' la// ston pa'i 'du shes bskyod bya zhing // yang dag par ni
224b5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan dag/ phyogs bcu'i zhing khams brjed par byed// sems can gang zhig dge ba dang // bkod bya de dang nyan thos sogs// theg pa dman par mi sbyor zhing // yang dag byang chub sems dpa' che// byang sems 'grib
224b6(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa yang // rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// dam pa'i dkon mchog bla ma sogs// mchod par 'os pa bslus pa dang // 'gyod pa'i gnas pa yin pa la// gzhan dag nye bar sbyor ba dang // sems bskyed byang chub sems
225a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che// zhe sdang tshig gis tshar gcod cing // sems can rnam pa thams cad la// g.yo dang sgyu yis spyong byed pa'o// byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang // de la gal te gzugs mchis na// nam
225a2(rgyud 'grel): mas ni kun bkang nas// de ni de las lhag par 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye ma grangs snyed kyis// sangs rgyas zhing khamos mi gang gis// rin tshon rjes kyis kun bkang ste// ston pa mchog la phul byas pas// gang gis bral lo
225a3(rgyud 'grel): nyer sbyar nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// mchod pa mchog 'di khyad par 'phags// de la mthar thug ma mchis so// 'khor lo dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa// lcags las byas pa mgo la 'khor// byang tu
225a4(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bskyed pa yis// gsal bar gyur zhes rab tu grags// byang chub sems mchog ma bskyed par// dge gzhan gang gis grol mi 'gyur// 'o mas dug ni sel lo zhes// 'jig rten pa la rab tu grags// de nyid
225a5(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyis 'o thungs pa na// shin tu dug na 'phel bar byed// mar dang bu ram sman gyi mchog/ byos pas bza' nyes dug tu 'gyur// 'bru mar stong bu'i phung pos kyang // me med par du gsal bar 'gyur// shel gang dag
225a6(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa yang // tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur ba yin// long ba dmigs bu med pa dang // brgya stong grong gzhan rgyu mi zhu// rlung dang bral ba'i me nyid kyis// nags tshal bsreg par ka la nus// gshar bral rdul gyi phung
225b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshogs// 'du bar mi 'gyur rlung gis mthor// chu rnams bsags pa'i lteng ka dag/ gnyen pas mod la 'joms par byed// sems nyid rab tu dang ba yis// dge ba'i bshes la brten bya ste// bsnyen bkur
225b2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzang po'i tshogs// bya ba'i khyad par gnas kun 'phags// mngon 'dod the tshom med pa'i yul// don kun gsang ba ston byed pa// rab tu smin pa 'di nas 'jug/ bla ma'i byin rlabs mthu yis grol// lan grangs
225b3(rgyud 'grel): mang por gsol gdab cing // phuno sum tshogs pas mthu bskyed nas// mos pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i skor// rang rgyud dag pas sdom gnas 'ded// dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs pa yis// las kun rim bzhin
225b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon gnyer zhing // phyag brgya'i bsam gtan mthu bcas paso// las kun gsang ba'i sngags rgyun 'jug/ thun mong khyad par dam tshig gis// nyes bskyed rten gnas dag par bya// thams cad sdom pas rjesu gzung
225b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing // bdag gzhan bya ba mthar phyin brtsam// byang chub chen po'i gnas spyod pa// der 'jug de nyid lam chen sgom// don kun ngo bo gsal byed pas// sgo gsum bya rgyu rtag tu brtag/ 'gro gnas sems can rgya chen tshog/
225b6(rgyud 'grel): theg chen gsang bas gzung bya ste// mthar thug cig tsam don gyi phyir// rgyal ba'i bka' don gus pas bzung // rdo rje bla ma sangs rgyas mchog/ dus gsum thugs rje gtsor ldan pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
226a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi// phyag 'tshul mchod pa'i gnas nyid yin// mi mkhas phrag dag nyams pa'i gzhi// de rmad gtan du nyams par 'gyur// thog mar don kun sgo 'jug pas// bcas pa'i dam tshig sdom
226a2(rgyud 'grel): la gzung // thabs rnams kun gyis bston pa'i sgo// mtshan med mtshan ma sna tshogs kun// ma nor de bzhin ston byed pa// rdo rje theg pa'i sngags lam rgyud// phyag rgya kun las mi 'da' zhing // mchod bstod tshogs kyi bya
226a3(rgyud 'grel): shes// sems can don spyod 'tshe ba spang // der 'jug thugs rjes rnam par gzung // rtag tu rang gi lha nyid dang // rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// stobs ldan rnams kyis spyong byed pa// de dag kun gyi sgor 'jug/
226a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// rtag tu dkon mchog mchod bya zhing // rtag tu rang gi dam chog bsrung // mchod rten gtsug lag khang bzang po// yid dag gus pa'i sems kyis gnas// lha gzhan dag la phyag byed dang // ngan pa'i spyod yul kun
226a5(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'i// theg dman rgyun gzhan snyan pa'i phyir// don kun che ba'i gnas nyams 'gyur// dran tshogs shes bzhin blo gros mthus// dad brtson ting 'dzin bskyed byas te// sdom bcas sdom min gnas ngag las// mcho
226a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson mthu yis rnam par grol// dkyil 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mo shes pas// sgrub pa ci yang grub mi 'gyur// bdag nyid chos nyid dang ldan pas// dam
226b1(rgyud 'grel): tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// sgrog chags bsad par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yod mi spang // byang chub sems kyang mi btang ste// sbrul bzang skyob dpon spyad mi bya// srid pa shin tu sgrub byed pa'o// mgon gyur
226b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bdag skyabs mchi// thog mar bslab par bya bo'i tshul gyis smin par bya ba'i cho ga ste dang po'o// nyin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'os// mngon par bsgrub kyi'i gnas gang dag/ rgyungs
226b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bsngags pa'i gzhi// phun sum tshogs pas don kun spyad// gnas malo phyag dar legs pa'i sar// rgyan tshogs bkod pa legs dgram zhing // 'phags pa'i gnas mchog mthu ldan pa'o// rten gyi bya bas don
226b4(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs// sa chu lci ba sbyin pa'i rdzas// legs snyoms byugs pa tshul khrims mchog/ grog sbur skyon bsal bzod pa nyid// kun tu spro ba'i brtson 'grus dang // mri g.yeng brtan pa'i bsam gtan dang // legs par ri myo
226b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rdzogs// pha rol phyin drug dkyil 'khor 'di// rtse gcig sangs rgyas rnams la dbul// g+ho ser mdog nad rnams kun zhi zhing // zla ba'i bzhin rgyas lha yis mchod// khyad par bla ma lhag pa'i lha// thun mong dkon
226b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog la dmigs pas// dus bzhin maN+Dal bzhi dag la// me tog sngagasu bcas pas dgram// oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ oM badz+ra tsakrA maN+Da la hUM b+h+rUM/ dkyil 'khor bzang po gnas de nyid// don gyi byin rlabs mthu ldan pas// sta
227a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang legs par bshams pa la// khrus kyi dag byas bde bar gnas// rgyud dang po yi dbye ba nyid// brtan pas nyin rer gsum zhi ba// bya ba thun mong bye brag gis// las kun yongasu dag par
227a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// tho rangs mal nas legs langs te// bgegs kyi sbyor ba sel byed pa'i// sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrungs byas nas// pha rol phyin chags mtha' yas spyad// 'gro ba rgya che la dmigs te// tshad med pazhi
227a3(rgyud 'grel): nas kun tu khyab// bag med mtshan mo'i nyes dmigs kun// dran pa bskyed cing bshags par bya// de bzhin 'bad pas dgongs mo'i dus// rang rgyud dmigs pas rnam par sbyang // rgyan rnams kun gyis legs mdzes
227a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ kun tu gzengs stod dga' ba'i yid// lhag pa'i lha yi nga rgyalo ldan// phyag rgya sngags kyus bsrung byas pa'o// me tog la sogs gcal bkram zhing // mchod tshogs gtor ma rgyas byas nas// ras ris la
227a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs glegs bam la// yang dag mos pa dad pa skyes// snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcuraro khyab pa'i zla ba bsam// sbyor ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya sngags// gnas kun dkyil 'khor legs par bskyed//
227a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa kun mkhyen sangs rgyas gtso// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams kun// sku rgyan tshe lugs byin rlobs rdzogs// rigs kyi 'od zer sprul por bcas// thams cad rgyud kun rnam dag pas// pho brang
227b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor sgo bzhir ldan// oM badz+ra tsakra maN+Da la hUM bruM/ dri chab sngags kyi byin brlabs pas// phyogs rnams kun tu byasang gtor bya// me tog mar me mtha' yas pas// bAkra shIs gzi mdangs rgya cher bskyed// gnod byed khro zar
227b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi tshogs bcu khro bo'i phyag rgyas gnas// bgegs kyi dngos po bsreg byas te// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen tshogs// dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las// rdo rje se gol rnam pa gnyis// rang gi sngags bcos mthu
227b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// lhag pa'i wAr bcus+t+waM dkrol 'khor bskul// oM badz+rI sA mA ya dz+nyA hUM/ oM dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sna tshogs lhag pa'i bsnam pa can// ma lus sems can don mdzad pa// ye shes che gnas byin
227b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs// dzaHhUM baM ho// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn mA hA ka ru Ni ka dri sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM phyogs bcu'i kun legs bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan rgyalnga sras dang bcas// thugs rje che dgongs 'gro rgyud
227b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs// thabs mkhas smon lam dbang gis spyon// oM badz+ra maN+Dal sa pa ri bA ra hUM/ 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// phyag dang zhabs ni bsil mdzad cing // dam tshig dkyil 'khor gnas 'dir bzhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma
227b6(rgyud 'grel): ya/ pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ pra na rA ga swA hA// gang dag bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan// sku mchog gsum mnga' dus gsum nyid// rab mchog theg chen bla na med// byang chub dge tshogs thugs ldan pa// rig pa gsang sngags
228a1(rgyud 'grel): chog su bcas// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa// bsam 'das brjod par dka' ba'i tshogs// gnyis med sbyor bas bstod pa'i gnas// thams cad don kun ston mdzad pa'i// dkyil 'khor kun la bdag
228a2(rgyud 'grel): cag 'tshal// oM na maHsarba ta thA gau ta kA ya bak+Shit+ta ban+d+ha nA kA ri mi// sdig las ldog pa'i sems nyid kyis// thal sbyar pus mo g.yas btsugs te// nyon mongs rgyu dang yan lag gis// rmongs pa'i tshogs 'phel 'khrul pa/
228a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// sgo gsum mi dge sdig pa las// dus kun rgyan gyis bshags pa bya// thun mong khyad par dkon mchog go/ bstan la mngon par ma dad cing // dge ba shes dam pa ston pa'i mchog/ khyad par zhing du gyur kun la//
228a4(rgyud 'grel): mi dge las kun gang bgyis la// thog med 'khor ba'i kha brgyud nas// rang bzhin bcas pa'i sdig pa kun// bdag gzhan rgyud las gang byung la// dus 'dir bshags shing bsdam par bya// gang dag phyogs bcu'o sangs rgyas
228a5(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'phags pa rnams kyis byang bar mdzod// oM sarba pA ri s+pho Ta da ha na badz+ra pA paM swA hA// gnyis med ye shes 'dag pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur kun tu dag pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur kun tu dag pa'i bdag/ bkod pa che snang sna tshogs bzhi//
228a6(rgyud 'grel): don kun phyag rgya 'byung ba'i tshul// sprul pa phyogs bcur ma 'gags pa'i// dbyer med pas ni las mdzad pa// thams cad don kun bskyed pa'i mchog/ dus 'dir skyabasu gsol ba 'debs// oM bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa/ sha ra Na gats+tsha mi/
228b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+harmA hriH/ skyon med rnam par dag pa'i sgo// rdul phran grangs med bsam 'das pa// bzhi 'byung ma lus lhag pa'i tshogs// bde gshegs kun la dbul bar bgyi// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dzA brta na ya At+ma nAM nir+yA tA yA mau//
228b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga tA shA a d+hi toSh+Tha naM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na mAM a d+hi Shiny+tsan tu swA hA// skye rga na 'chi rba klong gI/ chu bo kun las sgrol byed shog/ mi shes log rtog des bac+doMm dag/ thugs rjes mgon la skyabasu mchi// 'gro rnams
228b3(rgyud 'grel): kun la skye ba slad du// sems mchog rin chen bdag gis sbyar// dus kun srog chags rnams kyi bdag/ skyabs rnams dpung gnyen skyob gyur cig/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da ya ni/ sarba pA paM pi ka ta ka na t+ya traT tA sa ma ya
228b4(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi tsit+taM hUM swA hA// phyogs bcu'i rgyal sras bcas kyi// bsod nams sna tshogs mkhas pa'i mchog/ 'phags dang lha mi dge sbyong pa'o// brtul zhugs bzang po bla med pa// bya ba rgya chen gnas kun tshogs// drir gzhol
228b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid slob byed pa'i// bsod nams tshogs 'gyur gang yin pa// de dag kun la rjes yid rang // oM sarba ta thA ga tA pu dza dz+nyA na a nu mau dA na pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// theg chen gsang ba bla na med// rdo rje lta
228b6(rgyud 'grel): yon tan brjod// rnal 'byor theg pa'i lam gyur pa'i// rin chen sgrol mas gsal bar mdzod// dngos rtogs rigs kun sel byed pa'i// ye shes nyi ma'i thugs rje bdag/ dus kun rnam par grol ba yi// chos kyi 'khor
229a1(rgyud 'grel): lo bskor bar mdzod// oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA nu pU dzaM me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM// dus kun rdzogs par grol byed pa'i// skyob pa rnams kyi gsang bya'i sngags// nyi ma'i snying po dri med pas/
229a2(rgyud 'grel): rgya chen phyogs rnams khyab byed pa'i// nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rab tu zhi// de dag de las der mtshungs ston// ston pa 'jig rten sgron ma'i tshogaso// dus kun mi 'gyur brtan par mdzod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ga naM a t+ye shA
229a3(rgyud 'grel): ya me/ sarba ta thA gA two I tA ra tA ya/ d+har+m+ma tA b+h+yo/ sti thor b+hA ba ye swA hA// 'gro rnams kun+da lnga phan pa'i phyir// dge ba rgya chen gang bsags pa// 'khor ba'i chu bo 'joms byed pa'i// mya ngan 'das las grol bar shog/
229a4(rgyud 'grel): mA lus 'di dag gcig pa'i blos// rnam par sbyor ba gang dang gang // mthar thug dngos po'i zhi byed pa// don kun gsal ba gnyis med mchog/ oM nA maHsarba ta thA ga tA pu ni nIr+yarA yA ta ni pU dza me g+ha s+phu ra Na sa ma ya
229a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM swA hA// chu rgyun sbyangs pa ku sha'i tshogs// gnas kun dri sbyangs dag par byed// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// de dag byin gyis brlab cing dbul// dkon mchog gsum nyid gtser gyur pa// lhag pa'i yon tan mtha'
229a6(rgyud 'grel): yas tshogs// sangs rgyas la sogs rje su gzungs// rnam grol mtha' yas brjod cing bstod// rtse gcig 'dud pa'i rgyun kun tu// 'khor los gnas kun 'khor lor sbyor// dga' dang gus pa'i tshogs kun gyis// bsod
229b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams rgya chen mthuSh+Ta yas pa'o// oM nA mo b+ha ga ba tI rat+na kA tunA dz+nyA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a ra ha te samyAka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+na rat+nat+ya b+ha ba/ rat+na ba ra ye swA hA// lus snum yang na sems kyang rA /
229b2(rgyud 'grel): ci tsam nus par bskor ba bya// rgya cher 'gro ba la gnas te// smon lam mthu' yas gdeb par bya// de nas rten gnas tshigs rnams kun// thams cad bdag la rnam btud cing // 'gro ba thams cad 'gron du gnyer/
229b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag byang chub lnga bzhugaso phyir// rnam grangs mtha' ya sdu 'jug pa'i sgo// khyad par brten gnas skyabs 'os gzung // bla ma dam chos sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang // dus kun btud de/
229b4(rgyud 'grel): skabs gsol zhing // mcho 'os rnams la 'dud par bgyi// 'di dag sdig los zlog bgyid cing // bsod nams tshogs kun yongasu gzung // lus can rnams la bsod nams dag/ de dag kun la rjes yi rang /
229b5(rgyud 'grel): lus gtung thal mo sbyar byas te// gsang ba'i theg chen bshad pa dang // 'gro rnams rab tu gzhug slad du// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol// 'di dag gis bgyis bsod nams dang // bdag gis bgyis
229b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ma bgyis dang // ngo gang sems can thams cad kyi// bla med byang chub sems bskyed shog/ chos kun rnam dag dri med dbang // yongs rdzogs mi khom kun spangs nas// spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang // 'tsho ba
230a1(rgyud 'grel): bzang po rgyu ldan shog/ lus can dag ni thams cad kyang // lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing // yo byad tshogs rnams mtha' yas la// 'khor 'das srid dus gnas par shog/ bud med thams cad
230a2(rgyud 'grel): dus kun tu// skyes mchog byang chub sems ldan zhing // lus can thams cad rig pa dang // rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog/ 'gro rnams kha dog ldan pa rnams// gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang // blta na sdug cing nad
230a3(rgyud 'grel): med par// stobs chen tshe ring brtan par shog/ thams cad thabs las mkhas gyur te// sdug bsngalta tshogs rnams las grol zhing // dkon mchog gsum la gzhol byed par// sangs rgyas theg pa'i rkyen ldan
230a4(rgyud 'grel): shog/ byams sogs snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms kun gyi gzhir gyur cig/ sbyin rnams tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab kyis brgyan cing // tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs
230a5(rgyud 'grel): shing // mtshan dang dpe byad gsal bar bya// bsam gyis mi khyab sa bcu dang // rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro byed shog/ bdag gis yon tan de dag dang // gzhan tshogs rnam par brgyan pa'i stobs// nyes pa kun las grol
230a6(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // sems can kun mchog byams pa'i gtso// sems can kun yid re ba bzhin// dge ba thams cad rdzogs bgyid cing // rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal rtog pa'i rgyan sel shog/ khams gsum
230b1(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi skye ba gang // gang dag sdug bsngal nyen pa'i tshogs// bdag gis ming tsam thos pa'i dus// shin tu 'jigs pa med gyur cig/ bdag nyid mthong zhing dran pa dang // ming tsam grags pas gzhan dag kun// rab tu 'khrug
230b2(rgyud 'grel): med rnal ma'i yid// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gzhol zhing // tshe rabs kun tu rjes 'breng ba'i// mngon shes lnga po thob par shog/ sems can kun la rnam kun tu// rtag tu phan par bgyid gyur cig/ 'jig rten kun la skye bo
230b3(rgyud 'grel): gang / sdig pa'i rgyun zhugs 'dod gyur dag/ de dag thams cad gnod med par// rtag tu nig car zlog gyur cig/ sa chu me rlung 'gyur tshogs dang // sman dang dgon pa shing bzhin du// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// rang
230b4(rgyud 'grel): dgar 'gag med spyod par shog/ sems can rnams ni srog bzhin phangs// de dag la bdag cher phangs shing // bdag la de dag sdig smin cing // bdag dge ma lus der smin cig/ ji srid sems can dga' zhig kyang // gang
230b5(rgyud 'grel): du ma grol de srid du// de phyir bla na med pa yi// byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig/ gang du sa gzhi legs pa'i gnas// der nam rten gyi las byas te// bar chad rkyen kun gsal nas ni// rigs kyi ti 'dzin bsgom par
230b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ sa gzhi 'jam zhing sbyin pa dag/ gtsang ma'i gnas nas blang bya ste// dri zhim sngags kyi chus brlan nas// skyon med pha rol phyin drug sbyararo// oM na maHsarba na ta bud+d+hA naM/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ oM badz+ra badz+rod b+ha ba ye
231a1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ oM A ra dzodza~M b+hai ra dzA swAhA/ oM d+hArmad+hA twA gar+b+he swAhA/ legs par snum bsdu phyag rgya gzhug/ gdab pas sgra gsum gsal gyur pa'o// maN+Dal mchod pa rgyan dang bcas// rol makun
231a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bstod// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin gsol// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs gzhug/ mchod pa'i tshogs mang legs bsngos nas// lha gnas dbang bskur byin brlab cing // gtor mas mgron
231a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs tshim par bya// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHd+harma d+ha re swA hA/ oM pad+ma sa ma yaM a pra tI ha tau ye thA b+ha badz+ra yA swA hA/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te badz+ra satwa pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya a ra ha tau/ saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/
231a4(rgyud 'grel): suk+Sha maM suk+Sha me/ sa ma ye sa ma yaM/ shAn+te shAn+te/ saM ma ro b+hU/ a nA ya/ a paM pe/ a paM baM ya/ sho bi ti/ ma hA te dza ni ra ku le ra bA nir bA pu tr-i/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+NI te swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA gA ta ni sha ti ta
231a5(rgyud 'grel): de dza la dza la d+har+m+ma d+ha tu gar+b+he swA hA/ mtha' mar bzod pa'i gsol bya ste// byin rlabs brtan par mnga' gsol zhing // bkra shis rgya cher brjod byas pas// de dag bsdu zhing gshegasu gsol// oM A ka sha gar+b+he/
231a6(rgyud 'grel): sAhA/ ye d+harmA ha~M dr-i pra b+ha hr-i hi t+yen+te ShA ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/ teShAny+tsa yo no mo d+ha oM be thA dI ma hA shra ma NaHoM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ sa ra ha ra~M/ a ka dz+wa lo/ a kA dz+wa la/ d+hur+m+ma d+hA t+r+ya gar+b+he swA hA// bya ba'i las kun brtan
231b1(rgyud 'grel): gyu bas// phrin las bzhi bcas dngos tshogs// 'byung oM khams rnams la// rang gA sngags dang phyug rgyas gang ga// smra sa/ khrus kyi dus r+b+bag+sa d+hA// d+hU brgyus chu rgyun byin brlabs pas// bdag dang 'tshal sas
231b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yau// phyi nang gsum gyis gnas gsum spyang // oM na mo saHsarba ta thA ga tA ma hA sa ma yA shrI b+h+yAM/ byang chub sems dpa' snod gnas la// chu rgyun bzang po yi ni gnod// sdigaso bcas brgya rtsa brgyad du 'phrul// khrus
231b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol zlog rngu sel bar byed// oM dza b+hA la dz+wa lim+b+ha ye swA hA// slar yang zas kyi dus dag ru// thog mor byon brlabs dkon mchog mchod// spyang mA rgya chen mnyes byas nas// lhag mas 'byung po tshim par bya// oM a kA ro mu
231b4(rgyud 'grel): khaM sarba d+harmA NI// Ad+ya nut+pan+na tata/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA// thams cad thugs rje'i mes bsregs nas// bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis dag par byed// oM las 'dod lnga'i yon sogs// rgya chen na mkha'i kham su sbrul// dbyer med
231b5(rgyud 'grel): sku yi nga rgyal gyis// gnas rnams kun tI la ngas spyod // gA d+hA bsamo gtan la gnas pas// zab mo rgya mtsho'i mdo gdon cing sems can kun gyi don gyur pa'o// phyogs rnams mthun par 'gro bar skye// lus drug
231b6(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi bya ba kun// rnam grol theg pa bsod nams tshogs// phyogs thams cad nas bslab par bya ba'i cho gra ste gnyis pa'o// / dga' tshon dpal gyi rdo rje las// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor
232a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bcing // ting 'dzin sngags kyis bskul ba'i mthus// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun gshegs 'gyur// phyi nang phyogs kun snang ba yi// gdug pa thams cad zhi byed pa// rang bzhin sku gsung thug
232a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag/ byin brlabs gsal bas bstan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad tshogs pa yi// gdan 'dzom bka' bgros bgro mdzad cing // bar chad bgegs kun bzhom pa'i tshogs// rang gi gnas nas rnam par spro//
232a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // be con rtse gsum la sogs kyi// phyag rgya sngags la rnam 'phrul bas// thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar byed// rang gi gnas gzung brtan pa'i phyir// rang nyid rdo rje he ru ka'i// gnas kun mtshan ma bzang
232a4(rgyud 'grel): byos brgyan/ shin tu 'phro ba'i sems kun gyis// phyogs bcu sprul pa'i 'khor lo brjod// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khro bo ches// phyogs kun bgegs rnams gzir byas te// phyag rgya bzhis btab gnasu dgod// nyi ma la gnas/
232a5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsgom// grangs med sprul pa'i tshogs ldan pas// phyogs bcu'i mtha' rnams gtams byas te// mi ri 'bar ba'i mtshon cher bcas// phyogs rnams byams pa'i lto ba yis// snying rje chen po'i gnas kun gus la/
232a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di las lhag pa'i bsrung ba'i mi chog/ gnyis ming stong pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi 'ong 'bar ba// zab mo'i sngags kyis mtshams byas pa'o// phyogs gzhan khro tshogs bsrung ba'i phyir// rdo rje la sogs mtshon chad
232b1(rgyud 'grel): nyus+t+ra kArar+ya thul bA d+hI yoM rgyu// logs sbyangs byin brlabs rigs kyi lha// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor rab 'bar byas// de dag mthar phyin sel bar byed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// don kun mchog tu gsang ba'i gnas//
232b2(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid ngo bo ma bcom dbrings// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin gsal// phyogs rnams sbrul bya'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos byung rdo rje sems dpa'o // mtshugs g.yo bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi// gnas kyi man+d+ra ma gun las 'phag/
232b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar zhal phyag bzhi bzhis mdzes// g.yas sto g.yon dam ro rgyub ser ba'o// dang po bA dan gsum pa yi// phyag rgya rdo rje rtsa lnga 'dzin// gnyis pa rin chen mnga' gsor zhing // g.yan gyi dang po kha T+wAM nyid// rgya gram pa ngan
