232b4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu'i sgra// gnyis pa rin chen sna lnga'i gAzhu// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes// las bzhir gzigs pa'i skyon ldan pa// 'od gsal rin chen sna lnga'i mdang swA// rin chen phreng byas rgyu rnams spras// sku stong dar dkar
232b5(rgyud 'grel): gser res la// sku smad tshig gu'i na bza' nyid// spyi bor b+ha dkyil skur ldan par// sku yi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags// mgrin pa'i pad+ma gsung ldan par// gsung gi dkyil 'khor de nyid sngags// thug pa ka'i nyi ma'i thugs
232b6(rgyud 'grel): na par// ye shes dkyil 'khor rten gsal ba'o// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor phreng ba'i tshul// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rnams// rang gi gnas kun gzhug par bya// byin brlabs shes pas ye shes lha// rang rig
233a1(rgyud 'grel): tshul bzhin du spyan drangs te// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la bzhag nas// phyag 'tshal mchod pas mnyes par bya// de rjes phyag rgya rnam par bzhis// rang gi gnas kun brtan byas la// byin brlabs 'dod don gsol
233a2(rgyud 'grel): gdab cing // mchod bstod mnyes pa'i rol mos mchod// dam tshig gsum gyi phyag rgya yis// mdun nas sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// sngags kyi phreng ba 'khor lo'i tshul// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i ngo bor brtag/ spyod lam kun tu
233a3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams blos// dkyil 'khor gnyis med tshul bsgom zhing // byas pa'i cho gas gnyis rgyur shes pas// rang gi byin rlabs brtan par bya// ji srid kha zas dus kun dang // bya ba'i tshul gzhan de bzhin nyid// 'dri klog kha don
233a4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i// don kun sngo ba rgya chen tshogs// rang gi dbang po gnas las byung // de dag rol pa'i tshul rgyun bcas// ma nyams dus kun snang byed pas// de mtha'i chags pa grol bar 'gyur// de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'i
233a5(rgyud 'grel): tshul rnams gang dag bshad pa yang // las su bya bas 'jug pa ste// mi gnas gsal bar goms pa nyid// gdul bya'i rgyud rnams sbyang ba'i phyir// sngon 'byung sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// rigs kyi 'khor lo gang nas
233a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ de dag bsdus dang rgya chen tshogs// byin brlabs gsal bas brtan byas pa'i// sbyor ba'i don kun rdzogs par gnas par gnas// bsnyen sgrub yan laka rjes mthun pa'i// phyag rgya'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ de dag
233b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med pa'i gnas// rol pa'i byin rlab sna che las 'byung // rnga skad de nyid snang ba yi// tshul gyis de rgyud gsal bar byed// don 'byung gsang ba'i kun ston pas// dkyil 'khor kun byung bo nyid// 'di dag nang gi mtshan ta/
233b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad spyi yis chos nyid don// nam zhig stong par 'dod pa'i dus// de dag dngos kun las grol ba// dkyil 'khor gnyis med sbyor byed cing // byin brlabs mchog kun rnam par rol// nang gi ting 'dzin gsal ba las//
233b3(rgyud 'grel): thig le phra mo la sogs sbyor// dam tshig kun gyi gnas rgyas pas// brtan pa'i tshogs kun mthar phyin 'gyur// rgya chen dkyil 'khor rnam dag dang // lha yi rnam dag gsal ba'i mthus// byang chub sems sgyu ma'i dngos/
233b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams kyi kun gyi mtha' bral ba'o// spyod pa yongasu dag pa rnal 'byor pas bar chang bsal ba'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bdag gzhan bsrung 'dod pas// dben pa'i gnas su
233b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bsags cid // rdo rje sems dpa ting 'dzin sgyur// bsnyen pa'i cho gas brtun par bya// dur khyod lha yi gnas rnams dang // ma myo gnas kyi thal ba mchog/ bong pa mtshan ldan sbyar mar bzhag/ rigs kyi sngags dang
233b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas bsrung // snying po nye ba'i snying po dang // rtsa sngags lha rnams kun gyis sbyin// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal rdzogs pa'i// brgya stong khri yi bzlas brjod bya// gang dag bsrung bar 'dod pa la// thig le 'am sor ris gsu
234a1(rgyud 'grel): du shis// phyogs mtshams na mkha'i sa bcingaswA na// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med yin// de bzhin snga ma'i sbyor ldan pas// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu blangs te// rin chen snod bzang byin brlabs nas// dkyil 'khor
234a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la bzhag cing // ku sha'i chu rgyan sngags thim par// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dag/ khrus byas phog pas sngon bzhin 'grub// mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni// nyungs kar rgyal po sngags kyis
234a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// tshul bzhin chung nas sa gzhi lnga// yun rings goms pa'i brtul bzhugs ldan// phyag rgya'i rigs tshogs sna tshogs pa// rab tu grol bas gzhin dgug cing // bzang po khrus kyi cho ga nyid// dus gsum bzlas brjod
234a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams sbyar te// rigs tshogs brten gnas gdan bcas pa'i// rab tu sprul pa'i khro bo bstod// zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams la// dus bzhi rten 'brel mthun par spyad// de las byung ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// de nyang las
234a5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// de nyid las kun byed par 'gyur// dpa' bo gcig pa'i phyag rgya nyid// byin brlabs tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// rang rig snang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// phyogs bcur spro zhing gsal bar bya// sku gsung
234a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje yis// gnas gsum mtshan mo'i tshogs 'joms shing // phyogs mtshams bla 'og thams cad kun// gang 'dod de nyid ngo bor 'gyur// gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin
234b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs te// sbyor ba bzhi yis rdzogs byas pa'i// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyam par sbyor// gnas kun phyag rgya gsol bar mdzad// thams cad sprul pa'i byang chub sems// rigs
234b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams phyogs bcur rnam bkod pas// bsgrub bya gang dag de nyid la// gsang ba'i gnas su sbyor bar byed// don mthun phyag brgya 'di yos ni// 'gro gnas thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur// chos dbyangs ye shes phyag rgya las// 'od
234b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar 'khor lo'i gzhal yas khang // rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rnam par snang mdzod sbyor ldan pas// phyogs bcu legs par 'khor lo'i tshul// bla 'og dag tu byin brlab cing // dkyil 'khor bsdus drang rgyas pa yis//
234b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsrung ba bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba las// zhe srung la sogs 'joms byed pa'i// drag po chen po'i skur sbyor zhing // bsdus dang rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen// phyag brgya rdo rje'i tshogs spro zhing // rang gi sngas
234b5(rgyud 'grel): dang rnal 'byor pas// brtan g.yo thams cad bsrung bar byed// de bzhin cher gcod rengs pa 'grub// sangs rgyas glar gyi rnam 'phrul pa// sgor ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//
234b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags phyag rgya bsam gtan las// sna tshogs pad+ma la brten bya// phyag rgya'i tshogs kun kha 'byed paso// sgrib pa'i las kun rnam grol zhing // thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyor// sems dpa' chen po'i cha lugs
235a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ sems dang ngo bo la gnas bya// de bzhin nyid la smyung ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ldan// na chen tshogs 'bar brjid pa'i gnas// 'bar ba'i lta ba'i tshul bzhugs pa// rdo rje rab tu drag po'i
235a2(rgyud 'grel): me/ rab 'jigs 'bar ba mi bzang 'grub// gang dag rgyas pa'i tshul sbyor zhing // las rnams dngos grub skyed byed pas// dkyil 'khor bsdus dang rgyas pa'i tshul// gnas rnams kun tu 'gros pa'o// thams cad dag pa'i las
235a3(rgyud 'grel): la sbyar// mi gnyis ting 'dzin brtan pa'i mthus// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba// las kyi phrin las kun gyi bdag/ so so'i phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyor// ji ltar phrin las grub pa yis// oM TuM rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// go cha bgos pa
235a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bya// gnas lngar rang gi sngags dang rgyas// nyis 'gyur dag tu bcings nas kyang // sangs rgyas btsug gi nor bu bcings nas kyang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dar dpyangs 'gying dang bcas pas dgrol// thal mo brdab
235a5(rgyud 'grel): byas brtan byed pa// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// phyi nang gdul dka' drag po'i tshogs// 'di dag mthu yis 'jigs par 'gyur// thams cad kun gyis srung byed pa'i// bla na med pa'i go cha mchog/ bsod nams ye shes las brgyur/
235a6(rgyud 'grel): stobs// mthu yis thams cad 'jigs 'gyur ba// don kun gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags ting 'dzin gnas las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos sems rtse gcig gnas pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
235b1(rgyud 'grel): bcings te// zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni// phyogs kyi rigs kun g.yo 'gyur zhing // rigs dug gdon rnams sel byed 'gyur// 'di dag bsam gtan gyis 'grub pa// bsam gtan goms pa'i stobs kyis ni// dang po las kyi
235b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor byed na// phyag rgya sngags kyi mthu ldan pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe chung lcags kyu rtse mos mnan// bsam gtan sngags kyi gnas rdzogs 'gyur// rtse gcig lha yi ting 'dzin gyi// phyag rgya bsgyur te dpral bar
235b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ mi mthun gnas kun lta ba'i tshul// rdo rje bsdam po bstan byas pa'i// mdzub mo phan tshun skam pa'i tshul// nad dang zug rngu ma lus kun// 'dren byed phyag rgya'i gtso bo mchog/ rtag tu rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// byams dang snying
235b4(rgyud 'grel): rje lta bar ldan// grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings nas// mig gsal phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab ye shes mig bskyed cing // long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// rigs kyi sbyor ba mngon ldan par// phyag rgya'i yan lag brta
235b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// gleng pa'i nang rnams kun bsdus te// kha phyogs drang zhing btong bar bya// rtse gcig brtan pas yang dang yang // rdo rje khu tshur dpal sbyor bas// nad kyi zug rngun sogs kun// gong la dmigs pa sel bar 'gyur// de dag kun
235b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi gsang sngags 'di// don bzhin brtson pas rna la grags// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma sta ma sid+d+h+ya hoHde bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che/ don kun rnam par 'phrul byed pas// lag g.yas sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcing // byis
236a1(rgyud 'grel): nad med bde ba'i mchog/ 'od 'bar pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi byang chub sems dbab ste// lag g.yas klu yi gdengs ka bya// 'bar ba'i tshul ston 'bebs par bcas// mi mthun gnas rnams
236a2(rgyud 'grel): dug rgyas btab// thams cad sel ba'i las byed pa'o// bde gshegs sku ni rigs chen pos// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mngon sbyar te// bsrung ba sngags kyi rgyud ldan dag/ dga' ba'i rgyud kyis krol bar 'gyur// drag po che mchog
236a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba yis// mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams bzhag/ ru lu'i sngags kyi don sbyar bas// mkha' 'gro'i las kun 'grub par 'gyur// 'gro gzhan du 'gro phra mo sogs// thams cad rigs kyis sbyangs byas te// rten dang sbyor
236a4(rgyud 'grel): baM rnam sna tshogs dang // sngags bcas bsam gtan rtse gcig mthus// de dag nad mod bde ba dang // gzi byin mthu rtsal phun sum tshogs// me tog 'bras bu skye shing rnams// rten 'brel cho ga ji lta bar// phyag rgya sngags kyis
236a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor byas shing // rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa yis// de dag thams cad bcud rdzogs te// rtag tu gzi mdangs rgyas par 'gyur// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha'i phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams rang
236a6(rgyud 'grel): gi mtshon nyid rdzogs// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyangs bya ste// khro bo brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas// mi mthun gnas kun gzhom pa'i phyir// ji srid brtan par ma gyur par// de srid bsgom bzlas rtse gcig tu// khro bo'i tshogs kun legs
236b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhug cing // 'phro 'du yang yang don spyod pa// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon sbyor mthus// sde dpung 'joms pa'i stobs rdzogs 'gyur// de dag dkyil 'khor ji lta bur// yang dag par brtan pas sngags rnams dang // phyag
236b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu'i stobs bskyed sbyor byas nas// mtshon cha so so'i tshul bzhin du// 'debs shing 'phangs pa drag po'i tshogs// tshor bcang bsgral zhing brlag par 'gyur// mi gnyis ye shes che sbyor ba'i// zab cing rgya che dkyil 'khor nyid//
236b3(rgyud 'grel): thog mtha'i yul los 'das pa'i dngos// dpal mchog dang po'i mtshan nyid can// nyon mongs drag po'i gnas tshogs bskyed// don kun 'joms byed thams cad sku// cha lugs ji bzhin gsal ldan pa// thabs dang shes
236b4(rgyud 'grel): rab snyoms 'jug nas// rnam par spros pa'i las rnams kun// de ltar sder bcas mnan pa'i tshul// rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang // bskum nas 'degs pa'i stabs dag gi// phrin las bzhi yi sbyor bas te// phyag rgya
236b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan sngags bcas pas// g.yas g.yon sbyor ba'i rgya gzung zhing // gzugs rnams gzhom zhing mnan par bya// rigs kun sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kun dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul// gzugs
236b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs phung po lnga rnams dang // de rgyu nyon mongs dug lnga'i tshogs// yul bcas rnam par dag pa'i mthus// thams cad gnyis med sangs rgyas su// yon tan phrin las rol pa'i stabs// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
237a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnaMs// yongs bkug dbang du bsdu bya ste/ bas gtan slar dang phyag rgya mnan/ bzhin gcig pa'i btsun mo rnams// dga' zhing longs spyod dgyes pas spyad// 'di dag zag med mthu ldan pas// gnyis med 'bras bu
237a2(rgyud 'grel): chen por sbyor// ji snyed rgyu dang las kyi chos// so so'i theg pa gzhung bzhin du/ byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang / grub dang n+da dang mdangs rnams dang // rigs dang phyag rgya'i khyad par kun// so so'i las kun spyod cing gnon// rgyu 'bras
237a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i tshul// so so'i mthu yis sbyor byed cing // rnam pa'i don kun los rnams spel// bsod nams ye shes rdzogs pa'o// nye bar spyod pa lha mo'i tshogs// don grub gsang ba kun nas 'jug/ rigs mthun ga
237a4(rgyud 'grel): bzungs sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya 'phrul pas de non 'gyur// nyon mongs gnas kun rgyu rdzogs pa// dregs byed lha rnams dbang mdzad de// rigs kun dkyil 'khor cha lugs kyis// byin brlabs gsang ba lha mo dag/ rang gi
237a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// 'jig rten gsum tshogs rnam bkug cing // mthu rtsal rdzu 'phrul 'brog bya ste// 'da' ba med par las bzhin dgug/ rigs kun phrin las rnam pa'i stobs// dregs byed sder bcas
237a6(rgyud 'grel): mnan byas te// chung ma rgyan tshogs yo byad rnams// mthu yis dbrog cing longs spyod do// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum dag gi/ mthu chen sde brgyad dbang ldan sogs// phyogs skyong bcu po la sogs rnams// yud tsam
237b1(rgyud 'grel): zhig gis 'dir bkug ste// gang gi rten la sbyor bstims nas// sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang du byed// ma lus 'jig rten kun grags pa'i// zhi dang rgyus sogs las rnams kun// de dag rnams 'byor mthu sbyor bas/
237b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// las kun dngos grub tshogs shes pas// bdag gzhan don kun spyad pa'i rnams// mi 'jigs gnas gsum theg pa dang // rten 'brel gsang bas kun bstan pa'o// de ltar dgug
237b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dbye ba dang // bsod dang sgong dang rengs pa dang // rmugs pa la sogs las rnams kun// 'di nyid mthu yis grub par 'gyur// so so'i ting 'dzin sngags bcas pas// rten cing 'brel pas sbyang byas te// don kun
237b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang bas sna tshogs pa'i// tshul rnams sna tshogs brjod pa bzhin// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kun gyi// thun mong cho ga bzhin gyur pa'o// yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo drag/ byin rlabs tshogs bskyed brtsam par bya//
237b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen rdzogs sgrub pa tshul bzhin du// rten cing 'khor la sbyor bsdu// de dag gsang sngags brjod pa gdon// thog mar 'khor lo tshul bzhin du// rtsibs brgyad bcu drug mu khyud gnyis//
237b6(rgyud 'grel): A li kA li mnyan byos te// shar gyi gnasu sbyor bar bya// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi rnams la// yi ge gsang sngags rdzogs par dpod// drag ngal ring thung tshul bzhin du// g.yas g.yon phreng ba thabs shes rgya// oM a
238a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM shrI de ba te badz+ra satwa s+t+waM tAn mo swa tus+t+wa~M/ sArba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI nI na hUM hUM swA hA// rig sngags phreng bas bsgyur byas pa'i// 'khor las gnas kun dag par 'gyur// 'di nas dam tshig dkyil 'khor/
238a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// gsal bar bskyed cing brtan byas nas// ye shes lha dang gnyis med par// phyag rgya bzhi yos rgyas btab cing // mchod bstod lkog gnas cho ga rdzogs// dus kun tshogs bsags dngos grub bzhi// 'jug pa po
238a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams phrin las sna tshogs 'grub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas dngos grub bzang po ni// bdag gzhan kun la phan phyir du// ma nyams kun la 'jug pa'i sgo// don kun
238a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang dang spyad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor zhing // gzugs dbyibs thams cad ldan pa'i rgya// byin brlabs dbang bskur gnas rdzogs pas// sngon du bsnyen cing sgrub pa dang // rten gyi mtshan ma goms byas te//
238a5(rgyud 'grel): lngas kun byi ba'i sgo rnams dag/ phyi rol pra se cho ga dang // rten 'brel mthu las brtag par bya// 'byung ba lnga yi khams kun las// rang rig sbyor ba'i phyag rgya sngags/ sbyang zhing byin brlabs bsrung byas pas// don kun lha
238a6(rgyud 'grel): yi ngo bo nyid// yang dang yang du sngags brjod cing // yi ge gcig las kun ston 'gyur// de ltar phyi nang sna tshogs bdag/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che ro rnams kyi// phyag rgyas brten pa'i las byas pos// bden brjod mtshan
238b1(rgyud 'grel): ma sna tshogs skyon// nang gyi yo shes zag pa med// dgas kyi dkrol 'khar mgan ste// de nyid thugs kyi gsang ba mchogs sa spyan la bsgya b+ha ste// sngags bcas bdun pa brjirjod rlu bat+ta// don kun gsang brgyan/
238b2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// de dag ting 'dzin goms pa las// bden brjod sngags kyi mthu bskyed cing // dus gsum chos rnams ma lus pa'i// rang rig tshul gyis gsal bar byed// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dkyil 'a
238b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i cho ga rdzogs// so mo'i rten 'brel rdzas rnams lnga// phyag rgya sngags bcas don rnams bsgrub// 'di dag rgya smin tshogs pa'i mthus// rang gi ngo bo brtan par 'gyur// r-I lu mig sman bcud kyis lem// ral gri gas
238b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur la sogs rgyas// de dag dmigs pa'i yan lag gis// las kun rdzogs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// 'khor chen po nyams dgra'i gnas// chog tshogs rnams rdzogs pa'i gso// don ni rang gi rdzas das/
238b5(rgyud 'grel): las// don kun dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// sa sa rlig pa phyag rgyur bcas// yun rings mtha'i las rdzogs pa// ji bzhin 'jug pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bden pa'i chos kun gsal bar ston// phun sum
238b6(rgyud 'grel): chags pa ra ldan pas/ sngon gyi ba'i mams tog so// khyong nga rgyus kyis sari mo la la sa rkyo myol 'i po gang dra ba'i// sngon du blo po rdzog
239a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga po dag/ shA lnga'i grogs dang bcas par bsags// ban+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa rnams// phyogs mtshams dbus kyi gnasu dgod// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin pa'i// pho brang gdan khang pa
239a2(rgyud 'grel): sa nas// yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku phra mo// spro dang bsdu bas yongasu rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngam tshig nyid// gnyis med bsgoms pas gsal bar 'gyur// 'di dag rang rang mthu bskyed pa'i// byin rlabs rten
239a3(rgyud 'grel): 'brel stobs rdzogs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstims// dgug gzhug gnyisu med par gnas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses// zhi ba'i btung bo bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yi
239a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dngos grub thob// tshul bzhin rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che// 'khor lo chen po gnas rgyas par// bdud rtsi gsang ba bsgrub bya ste// rang rig rgyur rkyen tshogs pas so// bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam bzhi yis// byin brlabs
239a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas te// rigs dang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul// gnyis med thabs dang shes rab gsal// 'od dang du ba dri sgra rgyun// lha mo'i gzugs dang mang du 'phel// yi ge dgu dang bcu gcig dang // bcu
239a6(rgyud 'grel): bdun nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs// bar skabs sngags kyis gsal byas pas// phyag rgya'i gnas kun rdzobs par 'gyur// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// dmar po hrIHyid kun sdud de// rta mchog yon tan rol pa'i
239b1(rgyud 'grel): mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor kun mnyos mdzad// tshogs chen yongasu rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor gnas kun spro bsdu ba// ye shes 'khor lo gzhug byas te// bdud rtsi gsang ba chen po'i rgyun// rdo rje sems
239b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso lha mor bcas// bsdus dang rgyas pa'i 'khor lo rnams// de dag rim gyis khyab byed pa'o// bdud rtsi shel gong dag pa'i gzugs// bsnyen sgrub yan lag rnam pa bzhi// cho ga'i don kun+da rab tu rdzogs// 'di dag skyed
239b3(rgyud 'grel): dang spro ba dang // rgya chen spros pas kun gsal zhing // sangs rgyas rigs sogs 'gro ba'i tshogs// kun gyis dngos por 'di gyur cig/ thams cad bsgrub pa'i bdag nyid kyi// ras ya na'i bde ba'o// 'dis ni bsrung ba
239b4(rgyud 'grel): byas na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de nas tshe gnas bskyed pa'i phyir// mkhas pa de nyid dkyil 'khor bzhin// cho ga rdzogs pas brtsams byis te// phun sum tshogs pas kun spyang rdzogs// mgon po che
239b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa'i sku// cho ga shes pas bsgom par bya// byin brlabs rong gi ngango tshul bstan// lha mo'i tshogs rnams rdzogs par gnas// rtag tu bsnyen skyob yan lag bzhi// sbyor ba bzhi rgyun cho ga rdzogs// phyogs dus
239b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rten sdud cing // bzlas brjo gsal pos brtson pas 'grub// thod pa mtshon dang ldan sngags pa// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnasu bzhag/ thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis// phyogs kun sangs rgyas
240a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar 'gyur// nyi ma'i 'od zer sna tshogs pas// tshe gnas byin brlabs bskyed par bya// ye shes 'khor lho kun bsdus te// rang rig gnas kun rgyas par mjed// 'od 'bar g.yo ba la sogs
240a2(rgyud 'grel): kyirtadangos grub bzang po rtags rnams kun// yi ge bdun dang bcu gcig pa// bco lngas 'phro 'du rdzogs par 'gyur// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig ni// gnas kun rgyas par byed pa'i mchog/ rigs kun dkyil 'khor gnas gas
240a3(rgyud 'grel): bas// phrin las bzhi yi dngos grub 'grub// de dag dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang // sdus tshogs gang la mos pa bzhin// dmigs par bya ba'i bsgrub bya rnams// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor so so'i gnas// phrin las gsang ba 'ang
240a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud kyis// so so'i phrin las mnyam par sbyor// rang gi gsang sngags ji lta ba// rang gi ting 'dzin rtse gcig nyid// don kun gsang ba la dmigs te// phyag rgya'i gnas kun rdzogs par spyad// des ni ni rgyas dbang drug gi/ dngos
240a5(rgyud 'grel): grub thun mong las 'phags pa'i// rnam pa mang po mtshan ldan zhing // de dag las kun rdzogs par byed// don 'di gsang ba la brten nas// rgya chen sngags don tshul mang po// de nyid rnam kun gsal 'gyur te// thogs pa med
240a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub pa'o// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig gnas// des ni dngos grub kun sbyor zhing // 'gro ba rgya chen la dmigs pas// mchog gi ye shes bsgrub par bya// bsnyen sgrub kun gyi sdom 'gro ba'i// cho ga rgya chen rdzogs gyur nas//
240b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du// rang rigs dngos grub rnam par sbyor// rten gyi dbye ba rnam bzhi ste// dbang po yul dus bsnyen sgrub sogs// rang gi 'jug pa tshul bzhin du// cho ga rdzogs pa'i yan lag rnams// phyag
240b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i gnas kun la brten nas// don dam gsang ba spyad par bya// gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig skyed pa rjes spyad sdug/ go rim so so'i khyad par dag/ mu 'dres gsal bas don kun rdzogs// de yi dam tshig de
240b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ de dge tshul gyis las kun la// rnam par sbyor bas rdzogs par 'gyur// dngos grub mchog gi mchog
240b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba// phyag rgya la gnas gsang bas 'grub// rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yi// rje su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // kun la myang bar byed pas na// shin tu sbyor bso rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi//
240b5(rgyud 'grel): ro sa ya nA'i bde ba des// rdo rje sems dpa' tshe 'grub pa'i// yang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi
240b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang po kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyad na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo kun gyi
241a1(rgyud 'grel): grub chen po// 'khor lo grub pa rab tu grub// theg chen gsang ba gnyis med pa'i// don mchog 'bras bu'i lam ston pa// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs mdzad de// rje su 'jug pas spyad pa'i lam// 'di dag
241a2(rgyud 'grel): don tshogs rgya chen las// nye bar bstan pa'i cho ga rnams// bdag don sgrub pa'i thabs tsam zhig/ legs bshad gsal bar byas pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bstan pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i yul// mchog
241a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de gsal sgo rnams gzung bar 'os// thun mong dang mchog dngos grub bstan pa'i cho ga ste lnga pa'o// / dam pa'i bka' don rgya chen
241a4(rgyud 'grel): po rnam kun sdud par su yi nus// de dag don ni 'dor byed pa// tshul ldan gsang ba'i man ngag mchog/ legs bshad dri med dge ba bzang // cho ga'i gnas kun rnams gsal bas// 'jig rten 'di dag kun sgrol zhing //
241a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen nyid rdzogs gyur cig/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rjesu bstan pa la 'jug pa'i cho ga lnga pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po ku ku rA dzes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
241a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI badz+ra ha sa dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba rma rin mchog gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// / sarba mang+ga la/
242a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhugaso/
242b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi ni maN+Da la bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa
242b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan mi mthun tshogs 'joms rgyal ba'i sku/ ye shes dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag/ shes ra bo rnam 'phrul brgya dang nyi shu brgyad// rob 'od thabs sbyor de rnams phyag
242b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal// rang rgyud las bsgrubs drag po'i tshogaso/ 'joms// dbugs 'byung sna tshogs rang gi rigs las sbrul// rten dang brten pa'i 'jig rten rnam 'phrul mdzad// khams gsum snang mdzad gtsor byas phyag 'tshal
242b4(rgyud 'grel): te dgongs mi dz+nyA bzhi lam 'bras bu gsang ba'i don// dpal ldan sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog rgyu dag las// dkyil 'khor drug gi gsang don rnam bkod nas// chog
242b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags bsrung zhing byin rlabs gnas pa dang // sgrub don skyob ma las su rung ba'i phyir// rgyud bzhi'i yan lag phyogs mthun khos bsdus pa'i// rigs drug gzugs brnyan cho ga bshad par bya// bde chen sangs rgyas
242b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam 'phrul lo// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes par ni// thams cad bdag nyid rje su bsgrub// rten gnas phun sum
243a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ldan pas// sngon 'gro'i bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te// sa gzhi sta gon gnas pa dang // gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor rtsom sgrub cing // 'jug pa'i sbyin sreg gtor ma'i las// rab gnas dang
243a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur la sogs rnams// bdag gzhan smin cing grol ba'i phyir// dam pa'i lung bzhin bsgrub par bya// gzhan don rtsom pa'i blo ldan pa// rang bzhin mngon par 'dus byas pa'i// thun mong khyad par dbang thob nas// yon tan rtsal
243a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gang yang rung // dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags// dgug mchod las sbyor srung ba che// myur du gshegasu gsol pa yi// de nyid bcu sogs las la mkhas// khyad par las kyi rim pa yis// gsal mdzad rgya che grol ma
243a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyamatsho ri rab nor bu rdzing // na mkha' sa gzhi gsor bzhin gnas// des shing 'jam la snyan par smra// dang brtson shes rab dang ldan pas// thos bsam bsgom pa'i las la sogs// sems can kun la byams sems can//
243a5(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms gnas// pha rol phyin pa drug ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor rgyud dang bla ma dang // zab mo'i chos la rtse gcig dga'// bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med cing // bstan po byang chubo don gnyer bas// dang/
243a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bla ma dri med la// lan gsum yon bcas gsol ba gdab// rigs kyi bu khyod 'byor ldan nam// dgos pa'i rdzas rnams gang yod smos// ma tshogs pa rnams rnyed 'gyur na// phun sum tsho gos dus gzung bar bya// dkyil
243b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun tu ma zhugs shing // dam tshigs rnams ni spangs pa dang // gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// sgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub po// kun tu sna tshogs skul bzang por// bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal bya bzang // bdag med
243b2(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid dang ldan pas// dam tshig la sbyang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// bskal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na// shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad
243b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i phyir// skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal// stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang rgyal rnams ni skal pa ngan// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // log par lha dang ldan pas
243b4(rgyud 'grel): na/ skal ngan mu stegs 'jig rten rnams// dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi pu la'ang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal srid mchog rnams bsdus pas na// rta
243b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongasu 'dzin med pas// thob pa thams cad skal ba ngan// bde ba thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal pa bzang // lta ngan dam tshig la sdung ba'i// slob ma thams
243b6(rgyud 'grel): cad skal pa ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub par 'gyur// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs
244a1(rgyud 'grel): par/ kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgos pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams
244a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tu// rnam pa du mya sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyaste dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag/ rnam pa du ma sgrub par 'gyur// pad+mo skyed
244a3(rgyud 'grel): mos tshal dga' sdang // chu bo dag gi mdog dag tu// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// rnaM pa du mas 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // pad+mo skyed mos tshal nyid du// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal tho
244a4(rgyud 'grel): dgos pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// tshe lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
244a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i gau bgos la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar// phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi sa raM// kha dog kun+da dang ci 'byo
244a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra ba// de yi 'khor lo mchog
244b1(rgyud 'grel): gis mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis byas pa yang de bzhin no// snying rje byang chub sems ldan pas// khams gsum gnas sogs blta
244b2(rgyud 'grel): te// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnam dag pa'i// chos bdag med pa'i rnam par bsam// rigs kyi rnam 'phrul las byung ba'o// rnam gsum nus pa mthu bskyed de// phyag rgya mthu ldan dag pa'i phyir// g.yas pa'i nyi ma drug dkyil
244b3(rgyud 'grel): du da hUM oM hrIMHhrIHtAM haM las// rig drug sangs rgyas bskyed par bya// g.yon pa'i zla dkyil drug dbus su// mi 'gyur a dkar gsal 'bar bas// rigs mthun lha mo drug bsam bya// 'phro 'du mdzad ces gnyis med 'gyur/
244b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra gnas chos kyi phyag rgya ste// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa'o gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yis// gnas gsum gsum brlabs brgyan byas te// bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba yi// sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin la gnas
244b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ dbang po mdun du dgug byas nas// 'phags dang sems can la dmigs te// bcu bzhi'i bya ba rgya chen tshogs// yongasu dag pa'i gsum gnas bzhag/ bsrung ba'i 'khor los mtshams bcod nas// bzhi yi ting 'dzin
244b6(rgyud 'grel): rten dang bcas// sbyor ba bzhi la legs gnas shing // dmigs pa gsum gyi bya ba sbyar// gtso bo gang gi dkyil 'khor rtsom// de nyid bzlas brjod 'bum yin te// 'khor gyi lha mo'i tshogs rnams la// re re la yang khri 'am
245a1(rgyud 'grel): stong / gzhan yang bsnyen pa rnam lnga ste// grangs dus mtshan ma mthong ba dang // gnang ba thob dang 'gog pa yi// 'khor lo goms pa las byung bas// rang sems dag pas gtor ma brtsam// thun
245a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i sbyor bas 'jug byas te// cho ga yan lag ston 'gro rnams// rdzogs pas dkyil 'khor las dag brtsam// so so'i rigs kyi sbyor ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don ched du// tshogs rdzogs bar chad bsal bad
245a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mnyes las kun grub bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi brtag par bya// des ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs// so so'i rang gnas nyams dga' ba// nags tshul me tog lcug ma'i ri// rin chen 'byung gnas rgya
245a4(rgyud 'grel): mtsho'i ngogs// me tog 'bras bzang nyams dga' ba'i// de bzhin dgon pa'i gnas mchog ni// sa gzhi chags med dbus mtho zhing // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin rtags// shAr dang byang gzhol dngos grub gnas//
245a5(rgyud 'grel): lho nub gzhol bas 'jig rten pa// nub byung mtho bas las phra mo// shar mab+h+yo dbus dma' 'grub mi 'gyur// nA mkha' 'khor lo rtse brgyad pa// sgrub gnas las mthun so so'i dbyings// pus nub tsam du brko byas /
245a6(rgyud 'grel): slar la sa des dgang ba 'am// chu rgyun gong ba dri ldan la// mnyam gzhag rdo rje dril 'dzin shar// gom pa brgya yi gnas nas log/ sngags bcas mtshan ma brtag cing sbyang // gzhan yang rnam shes phyag rgya da // yis
245b1(rgyud 'grel): byug brgyas brtag par bya// rgyal po'am yul gyi bdag po la// bsrung ngam rlon gyis ny+tsa bar bya// bar chad mong paltos dbus su// rAng ro/ m+b+ha lo sbyor ldan pas// rgyun bcas sa sa'i skyil klung gas// 'byud dur+m+ma
245b2(rgyud 'grel): baud+yA d+ha rgyal gnas byas nas// sa gzhi lnga tshogs srung ma la// mchod sbyin gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad par las kyi bdag po dang // snying rje lan chags gyur pa dag/ mya lus dgug cing tshim byas nas// bsgo zhing
245b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho ba ron gyis brjod// d+hI yI chu yis legs gtong zhing // sbyor ba bzhi pa legs gnas pas// bdud rtsi'i rgyus kyis snang bya zhing // yi ge gsum gyis dag par bya// lto 'phye'i rim pa shes byas la// dngos gru
245b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bring gas myi don ste// mgrin lci blos mo man chud du// gnas gzhan snang bar byab seMn// rnam+b+ha pa gsogs rtse ma dang // so pa gnas si lA/ sa gzhan 'dzum maung sgyus skyes te// d+hI ts+tsha rgyas snang dag na
245b5(rgyud 'grel): bcag/ dkyil 'khor gnas kyi chung mnyam bya// sor bani khru klu d+hA lAs byed tshod // gas po'i chang b+hUnyam 'byung du bstod// rin chen gyi sbyin snying po d+ha gtsu/ chos nyid dag pa'i'o sngags rjo tsa laM// dz+ha yi chu las
245b6(rgyud 'grel): byugs par// sna tshogs mchod gtor nyer sbyor nas// rnal 'byor grogs bzhi dang bcas pas// rang rig gtso 'khor lnga bsgrims te// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya// oM bruM ga ga ne khe AHhUM/ na mkha' dag pa'i rang
246a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin las// 'byung ba rim rtseg ri rab ste// rdo rje sa gzhi rab dang // bla re gur bcas 'od 'phro ba'o// rdo rje gtams pa bgyi byas te// rang gi gnasu bzhag par bya// oM me di ni badz+ri b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ thal
246a2(rgyud 'grel): mo sa la lan gsum du// lha mo rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// mdog gser bum pa'i mtshan ma can// lus phyed sa la bton byas te// mdun na bka' nyan tshul gnas la// mchod gtor zhabs bsil sogs dbul
246a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing / ji srid las rdzogs rnams kyi bar// de srid dbang por gsol ba gdab// skyab pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sbyor ba'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ skyob pa shAkya
246a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag kyang bdud las ni// rgyal bar bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri// lan gsum gsol ba btab byas nas// lha mo dgyes pas mdangs byung ste// slob dpon chen po'i dkyi
246a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mdzod// dga' ba chen pos las bsgrubs shing // bcu gnyis rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'i// rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis// dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa la// phyogs bzhi'i lha mo bstod cing bskul//
246a6(rgyud 'grel): oM byams chen na mkha'i rigs sbyor ba// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'jig pa'i gnas// rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos mchog can// yang dag ye shes spyod pas grol// a la la la la ho// oM thugs rje'i gnas mchog dge ba'i
246b1(rgyud 'grel): dngos// mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba'i gzhi// yon tan rin chen mchog ston pa'i// rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol// a la la la la ho// oM dga' ba'i pad+mos mtshan ldan pa// kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med/
246b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsang gsum sngags 'don pa'i brjod 'byung tshig las 'das pa'o// a la la la la ho// oM btang snyoms gnas ngan dra ba sel// phrin las bdag po stobs dang ldan// bye ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing // 'phrul pa'i
246b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// a laM la la la ho// oM sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gtso// sdig pa thams cad las grol zhing // bsod nams dngos grub 'grub pa yi// rgyal
246b4(rgyud 'grel): ba kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ mthong dga' mthong ba grol byed pa// lam mchog gsang ba chen po'i tshogs// bdag nyid chen pos bstan du gsol// a la la la la ho// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i bdag/ sna tshogs
246b5(rgyud 'grel): rta mchog rol pa'i sku// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs mtshon cha 'bor// ma lus kun la bka' bsgo zhing // mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa yis// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas nas// rab tu myur bar g.yo mdzad cing // dgug gzhug spros
246b6(rgyud 'grel): pas rol pa'i tshogs// ma ta a yi 'phro 'du yi// rdo rje me 'od rlung sogs kyis// bshig gtor ra bas gzhir bcas// bskor zhing bskor ba'i rnam par gnas// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril 'khrol zhing // sum+b+ha ni yi sngags brjod de// khro
247a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rang gi gzugs 'dzin cing // mtshon cha 'bar ba rnams spros pa'o// hUM lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang // dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs// gshin rje ma mo mkha'agro'i tshogs// gnod sbyin
247a2(rgyud 'grel): drag po mA lus rnams// gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung byed sa yi bdage po'i bka'// thos po tsam gyis myur du dngas// nga yi bka' la 'da' ma byed// gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che// rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM gas//
247a3(rgyud 'grel): thal ba'i tshogs bzhin gshig par byed// rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'i// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// gang dang gang gis bdag tshig btsog/ 'dod gsum skyes rnams dwags bya ste// 'jig par
247a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur phyir gzhan 'dis med// sa lo yongasu sbyor byas te// bgegs med bya phyir phur bas gdag oM g+ha g+h+na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+rI kI lA ya/ bar+d+ha d+ha
247a5(rgyud 'grel): A dz+nyo pa ya ti/ k+ShA ya b+hAk+tsit+t+ra badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT// gsum brjod dbang ljon mams dag nas// thugs rnon sngags bcas lan gsum bskor// rkang pa bskyod nas lag pa bskyed// tsuMd+ya b+hUd ngo mtshar zla
247a6(rgyud 'grel): mig tshu la// rab dga' 'brang ba'i sngon ma 'dag sa// g.yas 'dren g.yon 'dren mig gi bar// bairla rgyas nu ma 'gying ba dang // kha ya~M pad+ma 'dzum bcas pa// dkar da mar mche ba gnyer po dang // oM oM phreng zlum
247b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur zhing // rta mchog rol pa'i gar thabs kyis// khams gsum 'dul ba rmad du byung // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ gar sogs rnam 'phrul bsam yas kyis// drag po'i tshogs 'joms gnas sbyor
247b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing // rang gi las gnas bsrung bar bya// ba yI rnam lnga dri bsres pa'i// bdud rtsi rdzas sogs kyis byugs kyis// lha gnas dri yi thig le la// me tog sngags dang bcas pa 'gram// mchod pa'i rnam grangs legs brjod
247b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsam par bya// bzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang rung bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor lo dmigs shing // mdun gyi dkyil 'khor nyes par bya// so so'i bstang
