247b6(rgyud 'grel): che ge'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon gyur las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang ba bdag gis bris// brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang // bdag nyid rnams la mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan khyod lo bdag gus te/
248a1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes mdzad 'ongs par gyur pa las// thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// bya ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyir// 'bras pan chub sems tshogs dang // gsang sngags gsang ba'i lha nyid
248a2(rgyud 'grel): dang ra 'byung tshogs 'jig rten skyong ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rjes dga' ba// bstan la gnas pa'i phreng ba dang // legs sbyor mchod pas mchis pa dag/ dbang por brtan par zhugasu gsol// bu khyod tshul
248a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan snod yin pas// theg chen gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyon// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dgra bshad par bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas tshogs 'das rnams dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung
248a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs pa// de kun gas sngags zab mo yi// cho ga nga po 'di rtogs nas// skye mchog rang gi gnas nyid du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan meng brnyes// gas
248a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags sbyor bas mnyam med pa// bcom ldan che ge'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bdud tshegs shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen mtha' dag rnam bcom pas// de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di
248a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu skyabasu 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor mkha 'gro gsang sngags can// 'khor los bzhugs pa'i bdag nyid rnams// kun la skyabasu 'gro bar gyis// dpa' bo
248b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo 'khor bcas dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// khyad par du yang 'gro bar gyis// ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag
248b2(rgyud 'grel): gis dus 'di nas bzung ste// ji srid snying po byang chub par// de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med par// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung // slob ma sbyor dang dngos bzhi yis// dbang po yan lag rnam bkod de// bsod nams
248b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mchog rgya chen po// yan lag bcu bzhes dag par bya// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum po bzung bar bya// bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang // bgyid la rjesu yi rang ba// mgon po'i spyan
248b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs rnams dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi// bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la// dang bas rab tu yid rang ngo //
248b5(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bgyid cing // tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag ni gus par skyabasu mchis// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ji lta bar// skal ldan byang chub
248b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' yis// thugs mchog byang chub rgya chen po// 'gro ba rgya chen don la dmigs// mgon rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// ma lus phyogs bzhugs dkyil 'khor rnams// dus 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas par
249a1(rgyud 'grel): bla med rgya che dang bas gzigs// ji ltar dus gsuM bde gshegs rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyid// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la//
249a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// bdag gis brtan par bzung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// de
249a3(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams te bzung nas ni// nam du yang ni mi spang ngo // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bya// rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi//
249a4(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig yid du 'ong ba lnga// nyin re bzhin du lan drug/ sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// badz+ra'i rigs chen dog pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni bzung bar bya// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom
249a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang bdag nyid du bzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung // ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi// ma brgal ba
249a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bdag gis bsgral// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // thams cad mya ngan 'das la dgod ngo do// dge ba'i las rnams 'od dag gis// 'jig rten sangs rgyas myar grub nas// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams//
249b1(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub dgod par bgyi// gnas gsum mtshan ma'i yi ger bcas// rdo rje sngags bcas dri yis byugs// mgo bor me tog mdun du spos// mar me dris byug snying ga ru// u dum+ba rA la sogs shing // drang po gas med
249b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bu rjes bral// sor tshad bcu gnyis dri yis byug/ rtse mo me tog bcas pa la// rigs sngags mang du bzlas byas te// dben pa bdar nas byin pa dang // me tog la sogs byin byas la// bya ba'i bye brag rim bzhin bstan/ shwar
249b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kha bltas mi smra bar// bca' zhing so rtsa'i skyon bsal nas// lci bas sa gzhi ba ge tsam// rnam lngas maN+Dal byas pa ru// phan tshun ngag tu mi lta zhing // drang po'i mdun du tshems shing dor// de tshe mtshan ma'i bye brag ni//
249b4(rgyud 'grel): mau bdag la bstan pa dang // rtse mo gyen du phyogs gyur na// mchog gi dngos grub mtshan ma yin// gzhan du kha bstan dngos grub 'bring // mtshams dang byang du bltas pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi las 'grub 'gyur// rtse mo thur du
249b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pas nI// sa 'og dngos grub nges par 'gyur// phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo bye brag gis// las bzhi'i mtshan ma shes par bya// dri chub byin brlabs sngags ldan pa'i// 'thor thung khyor gsum khu ba shal bya// oM hri bi sh+tsa
249b6(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA pA pa ni tsA sh+ya bi sho d+ha ya// sarba bi kalpa a pa nAM ya hUM/ yi ge bsngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i// ku sha sngas dang ston du sbyin// hUM AHoM a hi e/ hriHa tAM/ a haM oM/ sarba ru ta te ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rang sngags
250a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum bzlas pa'i// srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa// ku sha gsum 'gyur spro pra'i tshang // dpung par bsrung ba'i don phyir bcing // kun mkhyen bad+hi kham 'byung ba// u dum+ba ra'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam
250a2(rgyud 'grel): nA ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung srang // gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang gis sems can dpag med don// mya ngan mi 'da' byung nus pa'o// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang
250a3(rgyud 'grel): gis sdig pa spyod byas pa'ang // dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong bas ni// de dag thams cad zad par 'gyur// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// mnyam par gyur pa gzhan gang yod// tshe 'di nyid la sngags bzlas pas// bla med gnas
250a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'gyur te// sdug bsngal kun 'byung nyams thag pa'i// ngan 'gro'i gnas ngan spong bar 'gyur// des na spyod mchog los 'di la// blo gros shin tu brtan pas na// de ring khyod ni rnyed pa mchog/ bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur//
250a5(rgyud 'grel): gang gi rgyal ba thams cad ni// sras bcas rnams kyis bstan pa ni// blo mchog ldan pas yongs bzung ste// gnas ni bdag nyid chen po la// theg chen gsang ba'i gnas dag tu// des de 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin// lam mchos
250a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dpal dang ldan// theg chen gsang ba cher 'byung bas// khyod ni 'gro bar 'gyur bas na// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sta gon gnas mchog de nyid du// mchod dbul gtor ma btang byas te// ku sha'i sngas stan
250b1(rgyud 'grel): legs pa la// mi smra dge ba'i sems bcas kyis// seng ge'i nyal sngabs legs pa yis// rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya// slob dpon nang du bzhugs mnyam bzhag/ dkyil 'khor mchod cing bstod par bya// mthar mtshan
250b2(rgyud 'grel): ma bzang mthong na// yi rang dngos grub rab 'bring bstan// ngan pa'i ltas dag sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma sngags dang phyag rgyas bzlog/ ba yi rnam lnga dri bsras chu// sngags kyis sbyangs pas dag par bya// mkha' dbyings dbang
250b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa'i// rin chen rgyan las byung ba 'am// 'byor med sa las byas pa ru// bum pa mgrin
250b4(rgyud 'grel): ring lto ba zlum// nag po dri bral kha gyed can// dri zhim tshon dkar gyis byugs shing // pad+ma'i lta saSh+ma brgyan// grang bzhin tshogs pas legs gnas la// rigs kyi tshogs byin brlab cing // cha rig nyi shu rtsa bdun bsags// buM
250b5(rgyud 'grel): pa lha yi gnas yinA te// kha brgyan mgul chings rta babs brgyan// gzungs thug thugs rje chen po'i rtags// sman lnga thugs rje byang chub sems// 'bru rnams lha yi rang bzhin yin// rin chen rnam lnga sku yi 'od// snying
250b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thugs kyi dbyings// spos sogs tshul khrims yon tan rgyal// rang gi gnas su dgram byas nas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug rnams// dam tshig lha dang gnyis med par// mchod bstong bzlas pa 1
251a1(rgyud 'grel): byas te// brgya stong brgya lhag grangs tshang nas// sngags kyi chu dang gnyis med gyur// ras gtsang me tog gcal bkram zhing // shing bzangs lo ma 'bras bur bcas// rdo rje gzungs skud phreng bas mtshan
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad bdug mchog bsrung bar bya// dkyil 'khor bsgrubs pa'i rdzas thogs la// rten rnams lha yi rim pas dgram// bskrad bsrung sbyang zhing tshe bzung la// byang nas g.yon skor sgo bzhir bzhag/ mchod dang khrus
251a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi las dag kun// phyi mtshams khyams kyi gnas dag tu// las kun pa ni kun ldan pa// rnam rgyal rang gi gnas mchog mdzes// slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing // rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// shes rab mtsho ldan bcu gnyis
251a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// thig sgrub sa rU pa tshad ldan pas// sngags bcas lha mos bsgral byas pa'i// ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur la// skom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha// rin chen thod pa'i snod bzhag la// rigs kyi yi ge'i sngags kyis bskyed
251a5(rgyud 'grel): sU tra mA ti kra myA d+h+r-i/ oM A hUM/ mig gi blta bas bkug byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rigs rnam gzhug par bya// nyi zla 'bar ba'i lcags ka yis// gnyis med gcig tu gnas pa dag/ mchod dgul bstod pas mnyes
251a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// gtso bo'i sngags brjod bsgril bar bya// oM daM b+ha dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHoM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ oM aHhUM/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog nus gnas pas// de nyid gsum gyis gsang sngags bzla/
251b1(rgyud 'grel): dzaHgdags gtso bo'i thugs ka nas// rang gi smin mtshams drang por 'dren// stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongasu gsol// rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan pas// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing // 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar
251b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// oM a n+yon+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmA/ pa ra s+thi ra A nu ga tra sarba d+har+m+ma/ a t+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA hUM// grogs mchog rdo rje phyag rgya yis// dza gsum lte ba'i gnas su 'dren// rdo rje khu tshur sarar+ya bzhag cing // da
251b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i thig skud gdab par bya// sher nub lho byang thig bzhi yis// logs dang mtshams su gdab par bya// dang po cha chen bcu drug las// khyams kyi snam bu ma gtogs pa// cha bran bzhir bzhori dgod byas pa// phyi
251b4(rgyud 'grel): nas bcu drug rte bab bsgo// rtsig pa brgyan bcos g.yon pa nas// rab pa dur khrod ci rigs brtag/ dbu mAM rang gi rigs 'khor lo// dkyil 'khor so so'i cha bzhin pa'o// thig gdab cho ga rdzogs byas nas// ye shes
251b5(rgyud 'grel): skud pa mchod bstod cing // phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gasdang sngags kyis// rang gI gnasu gshegasu gsol// rigs kyi nga rgyal sbyor ldan pas// mig gnyis nyi zla'i blta ba yis// hi bcas sgro dang cha rnams dbye// oM badz+ra ba
251b6(rgyud 'grel): ka a kra ma hUM/ oM thams cad rnam 'phrul rang bzhin mchog/ dngos med zhi ba'i 'od ldan bsal// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gter tshon 'byin// dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlabs// mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnams gsal bas//
252a1(rgyud 'grel): nyes pa'i zug rngu dag par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid 'grub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs rnam su// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/
252a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar// rab tu brtag pas su zhig nus// rang gi lha'i rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par
252a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ cho ga lhag gam ma chang na'ang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// tshad ldan rnam par byed pa la// rnam 'khor phreng ba'i ra bas mdzes// rta bab so brgyad kyis rnams spras shing // bar khyams
252a4(rgyud 'grel): cha chen gcig gi tshang // ka ba mchog brgyad gdung rnams la// so so'i mtshan ma'i phreng bas brgyan// rin chen rdor sogs tog ger bcas// kun tu sna tshogs skul bzang ngo // kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun
252a5(rgyud 'grel): tu sna tshogs grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla kham bzhin// pad+ma dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ji ltar
252a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas pa dpal// rta mcheg phyag rgya rdo rje'o// rin chen lnga sogs phye ma rnams// snod mdzes legs par blugs byas te// cho ga gsum gyis rigs
252b1(rgyud 'grel): kyig+ha// spyan mig 'bar byas dgug byas te// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med gzhug/ mchong bstod rang gi gnas nas dbye// oM badz+ra tsai tra sa ma ya hUM// dkar po mthing kha dmar ser ljang // rigs drug so so'i rgya
252b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// pany+dza ra gi go rims bzhin// byung shar mtshams nas brtsams nas no// hU~M brjod rdor 'dzin g.yon gyis bris// re khA ma yo ma 'dres par// mchod dbul thod pas bkab nas ni// bden pa brjod cing blta bar
252b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ 'di ni chos dbyingasna rnam par dag/ saums can khams ni rab sgrol byed// dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor las rnams shis
252b4(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// thig ni phyi nas btab pa la// tshon rtsi nang nas dgyes par bya// dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyi nas ci bde shes pas bri// nyes pa kun las rnam grol bso// tshon gyis las ni yang dag brtsam// rtse gcis
252b5(rgyud 'grel): las su rung byas te// mtho zhing drang ba'i rgyan bcas pa'o// re kha dma' basmra mi 'grub cing // yon pos gdung ba skyed par byed// chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag/ 'chi 'am na bar 'gyur ba yin// lhag chad las
252b6(rgyud 'grel): ni nad 'byung zhing // phyogs 'khrul rmongs pa'i las su 'gyur// pad+mo so so'i gdan ngag la// rigs kyi mtshan mos brgyan pa dang // kun tu sna tshogs bskal bzang po// rang 'byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam
253a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhung dang mda' dang de bzhin te// skal bzang de bzhin skal ba bzang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+ma rgya gram dpag
253a2(rgyud 'grel): med tshe'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// lha mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs bsgrubs nas// mnga' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor ba'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'i mchog
253a3(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing+gi lcug ma dang // pad+mo rta mgrin 'phang 'tho ba// rta mgrin ljang gu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin te// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs rgyas kun gyi ras yin// thams cad bdag
253a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// gling bu dang ni pi waM dang // ku mu ta dang muny+tsar// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// rim bzhin snying po sngags bcas pas// rang rang
253a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma sngags bcas dgod// mtshams bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi// bdud rtsi lnga yi thod par bcas// rgyan bcas mchod pa ma lus pa// phyogs mtshams steng 'og gnas dgod// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin
253a6(rgyud 'grel): du ni mkhar gsil dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin lce'i phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga yab dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen sgron// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de
253b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang // me long dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo rje ser po sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya'o// lha mo rdo rje glang sogs kyang // 'khor lo'i mtshan mas bsgyur te dgod// rdo rje 'bar ba khA T+wAM
253b2(rgyud 'grel): ga/ thod pa kham por de bzhin no// dmar chen po dang snying na go/ shwa chen po yang de bzhin no// rnon po mnga' dang de bzhin 'dre no// chang dang chu yang de bzhin te// lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me dag dang // rdo rje 'bar
253b3(rgyud 'grel): ba kha T+wAM ga/ gzhu dang kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// 'khor lo rtse brgyad rnon po dang // sna tshogs pa dan dril bur bcas// me tog la sogs lha mo brgyad// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// pad+ma sna tshogs dmar po dang // mthing
253b4(rgyud 'grel): kha ser po le brgan dag/ pad+ma'i mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun// pad+ma'i snying po bud med brgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // bsrung cing bsal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhano// pad+mo dmar po tri shu la//
253b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma sna tshogs 'khor lo che// pad+ma ser po chu smin rgyal// pad+ma le rgan rdor rtse lnga// gling bu la sogs pad+mas mtshan// bcu gnyis la sogs dgod par bya// gzhu dang mnga' dang ral gri dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur
253b6(rgyud 'grel): bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag/ mchod pa'i mtshan mas bsdu ba dang // mnga' dang gzhu dang ral gri dang // rdo rje nyi ma 'od zer bcas// rin chen gling bu la sogs rnams// so so'i gnas su dgod par bya// sna tshogs rgya gram la sogs
254a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+ma dang // rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa gnyis// dkyil 'khor gang gi gnas zhugs pa// lha mo'i mtshan ma rab bstan te// khyad par las kyi mtshan ma
254a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / yi ge'i rigs kyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog rigs kyis rnam 'byed cing // mtshan ma'i phreng bas mdzes byas pa// bar khyams sa gzhi dkar po la// dbus ni kha dog lnga ldan pa'o// shar sgo kan+ta'i 'od gsal zhing // gser
254a3(rgyud 'grel): mdog lho yi sgo phyogs brjid// nub sgo pu sha rA ga'i mdog/ byang sgo in+d+ra nI la'o// rta babs rgyan bcas mtshan ma'i tshogs// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mtshan dang ldan// pad+ma rdo rje me 'od kyi// kha dog rang bzhin rnam par gnas// dur khrod
254a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mdog khyad par dang // thun mong dbye bas rnam pa bstan pa'o// 'dod 'byung bdud rtsi'i mdog can la// phyi yi ra ba bai DUr+ya// de ni sna tshogs bum pa dang // mchod pa'i tshogs mang rab dgod cing // rgyan sogs phreng
254a5(rgyud 'grel): bas mdzes byas po// sna tshogs me tog sngags bcas dgra ma// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang // mthing kha sor po kun bsdus pa// me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro// rgya skyegs mthing kha
254a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'i tshogs// tshon sna lnga yis btsos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dang // snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub// khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te// rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa/
254b1(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'grub// tsan dan gnyis dang bla rtsi dang // ga pur na ga la lA ti// 'dug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad las 'grub pa'o// gar dang tri dang gu gul dang // sa rdza ga pur bla rtsi dang // rdzas
254b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag las btsos pa'i mar// mar me byas na snang ba skyed// tsan dan gur gum bri ka dang // ga bur dang ni gla rtso dag/ btsos pa'i bdug pa bsgrub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgya spyos mchog 'gyur// ka ko la dang sug smel dang
254b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram ngag dang sbyor// shing tsaM pa Ta lo ma dang // na le sham dang ga pur sbyar// ha sa ka ri'i shing mar gyis// smras pa kha yi spos yin// me tog dkar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can
254b4(rgyud 'grel): la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la kha dog dkaR+Sha// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan dan bdug pa sangs rgyas lo// rdo rje can la du ru ka/ spyan ras gzigs la ka pi ta// lce pog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me'i phreng ba sangs
254b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgyad// stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan dan spos// rdo rje can la gur gum yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma
254b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ me tog phreng dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang // spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje can la dbul du rung // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga yiso// dkyil 'khor rdzas bcas bsrung byas nas// sta gon
255a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' bteg pa rnams// rang gi gnas su ma nor dgod// gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs te// dkyil 'khor mnyes
255a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las rdzogs nas// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsal ba gdab// rgyan bcas rdo rje dril thogs pas// yi ge brgya ba'i sngags bcas kyis// bkang zhing stang stabs sbyor ldan pas// dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor
255a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bstod// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa shes byas shing // las 'grub par chad bsal ba'i phyir// gtor ma'i cho ga rgya chen pos// 'jig rten pa yi mchod sbyin bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// so so'i maN+Dal legs
255a4(rgyud 'grel): dgod de// shar du chu dkyil dkar po'i tshul// lta ba gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru bzhi bar khyams sgo dang bcas// rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan tshogs mdzes// gtso bo'i mdun du lha chen po// ka las byung ba drag po yi// mig
255a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum tri shUl dgra sta dang // ral gri thod pa sha khrag bcas// sngo skya thod pa zhugs pas dkris// nyi zla rin chen phreng bas mdzes// dbu ma ljang skya thod pa thobs// na ri'i rgyan bcas rnams khril gnas// g.yas su tshangs pa
255a6(rgyud 'grel): oM las byung // gser mdog gdong bzhi phreng bas mdzes// khams gsum skyo ba tshul rnam 'grub ma// mdzes ma kun gzugs rin chen 'dzin// dbang po mig stong a los byung // rdo rje rtse gsum zla 'dra'i mdangs// 'dod pa'i
255b1(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod kun la rol// sha ci dkar mo rin chen dang // g.yon du hA las khyab 'jug ste// nag po drag chen khros pa'i gzugs// 'khor lo rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu// gzugs chen chen mo pad+ma'i mdog/ 'dod dbang dam pa/
255b2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i// ser skya sna tshogs rgyan gos can// snang ba'i mda' 'dzin mos pa'i dpung // drag mo gnas rgyal rin chen skyes// kun kyang rang rigs g.yog 'khor dang // stan dang long spyod tshogs bcas pa'o// dbang po dkar skya
255b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum 'dzin// gshin rje sngo gnag thod dbyug gdengs// chu lha dmar ser zhags pa thogs// gnod sbyin ljang gu in+d+ra nI ra// dbang ldan ser skya rin chen mdzod// me lha dmar ser bgrong phreng bum// rlung lha dud kha ba dan phreng //
255b4(rgyud 'grel): bden bral ljang sngon rin chen dbyig/ rgyan btsas bzhon pa chung ma'i tshogs// las mdzad pa yos 'khor bran dang bcas// sde bzhi nyi ma zla bo'i lha// sa bdag sa yi lha mo gnas// rang mdog mtshan ma rgyun dang ldan// g.yog
255b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhin pa'i gnas la 'khod// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor zur gsum gnab/ gsum zla sam khyams dang snod // mdun du las dag mkha' 'gro ma// g.yas su rdo rje rin chen ma// g.yon du pad+ma sna tshogs ma'i// mkha'
255b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lnga rnams 'jigs pa'i tshul// phyogs bzhi mtshams kyi khyams ngag la// dur khrod mkha' 'gro chen mo brgyad // sgo bzhi'i gnas bsrungs drag mo'i tshogs// ru lu ru lu'i sgra 'don ma// kun kyang b+h+yo las rnam 'phrul zhing //
256a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag gri gug thod pa thogs// mi yi thod phreng legs byas mtshan// dam tshig mtshan mya g.yog 'khor bcas// nub kyi pad+ma dmar po lnga// klu brgyad yi ge phu las byung // sna tshogs sbrul mgo gdengs ka
256a2(rgyud 'grel): can/ phyogs mdog rin chen snye ma dang // bcas pa'i thal mos phyogasu gus// nor bu'i rgyan phreng chung ma dang // longs spyod g.yog 'khor bcas pa yis// rang gi las bzhin rnam par spyod// byang du maN+Dal 'byung chen dbyibs//
256a3(rgyud 'grel): ser po bar khyams drug pa la// a nri su tri pri du las// 'gro ba drug po ma lus pa// sgra bzhir 'byung po ma lus rnams// gzugs bzhag ring ba mi sdug dgod// rang rig sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sbyang zhing byin brlabs sku rdzogs
256a4(rgyud 'grel): par byas nas rang rig bdag pos brgyan// rang gi rigs las rnam par dag/ sgeg po dang ni na chung dang // mos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig pu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can blan mo de bzhin te// lan tsha la sogs
256a5(rgyud 'grel): ro kun dang // ka ra la sogs bdud rtsi sbyin// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sha dang chang du ldan pa yin// a mra la sogs tshig gur bcug/ ha sa ka ri mar la sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya// spung dang rgya skyes
256a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur nas/ shun pa gro ga la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams la spos dbul ba// sha dang chang dang rnam par spang // glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang //
256b1(rgyud 'grel): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa ngan dang // sha dang chang du bcas par ni// gtor ma'i mchod rten sna tshogs pa'o// bdag gi dbang phyug skal bzang po// rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma'i
256b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog ldan pa ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po kha zas sna tshogs pa// sha dang chang du ldan pa dag/ glu dang sil snyan skal bzang kun// rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul//
256b3(rgyud 'grel): kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang // sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang // sha yi sbyor ba sha skam tshogs// bshos dag rdo rje rtu la dbul// thod pa snod du sbyar ba yi// bza' btung bca' ba sna tshogs rnams// ha hoHhrI yis bsreg
256b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyang brlab// mgron tshogs rnams la bsngo bar bya// mchod pa rdzas chen ma lus pa// dang po dri yis chus sbyangs pa// sna tshogs sgra rnyan ba dan tshogaso// bkod pa'i mchod gtor byin brlabs spel// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems
256b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sogs// rta mchog gzugasu sprul byas nas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// mgron gyi tshogs rnams bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ye// e a rA li b+h+yo a a dza dza/ 'khor bcas bsdus pas 'ongs pa dang // dam
256b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum bstan// oM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma yas+t+waM/ oM badz+ra gu dri sh+ya ho sa ma ya ho oM badz+ra gu Sh+ya dri sh+ya hau sa ma ya phaT/ e daM puSh+pe d+hU pe dI paM gan+d+he/ pU dza s+pha ra Na ar+g+haM ba li khA ha/ yaM las bskyed pa'i gzhu
257a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra dbyibs// ba dan g.yo bas mtshan ma'i steng // raM byung me yi dkyil 'khor dmar// 'bar ba sku gsum r+ya yis mtshan// ga byung thod pa mtshan ldan na'ang // 'od gsal chags med la gnas pa'i// mi
257a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chi lnga sogs phyogs dang mtshams// a las byung ba'i zla ba dang // hUM las rdo rje dgab par bya// hUM oM hriHhI traM haM bzhi pa'o// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hri tha// rI ma bzhin sngags dang mtshan ma drang // sku gyur 'phro dang
257a3(rgyud 'grel): 'du bu yis// ye shes bdud rtsi bkug byas te// rdo rje bzhugs nas snod bzang bltam// zla 'dra 'od zer lnga bcas pas// dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas mnyes par bya// oM 'jig rten kun gyi gtso mdzad pa'i// 'jig chen dregs
257a4(rgyud 'grel): byed stobs ldan pa// bde gshegs sras mchog byin mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ldan snying rje can// dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas// de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang // brgya byin 'dod khams chung mar bcas// lha chen 'khor
257a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas tshogs dang // phyogs skyong brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // mkha' 'gro drag po gsum 'dzin ma// dur khrod ma mo'i tshogs bcas dang // gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang // mkha'
257a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro drug po 'khor bcas rnams// sku gsung thugs sogs sbyangs byas nas// rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams// gnas 'dir 'dus pa'i dam tshig can// mchod gtor rgyun dang bcas pa bzhis// dam tshig srungs shig ngas
257b1(rgyud 'grel): chag can// las la sogs pa'i mya' 'gron chags// mkha' 'gro chen ma'i 'khor bcas rnams// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i phyogs mdzod cing // las mAd+hA rdo rje ldan mdzad pas// shar+g+has nga drag las zung ca// theg na
257b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags bsrung ba dang // nang dang gdon sogs zhi ba dang // tshe dang bkra shis spel ba dang // bde legs 'brus bu grub par mdzod // oM aM hUM pad+ma ba mu khi hUM hI// rta mgrin phyag rgya rnam gnyis kyis// las rnams dngos grub tshegs
257b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ dngos grub dbang du byas nas ni// rang gi gnas la dgod par bya// oM tri badz+rA DA ki ni me ba liM ta pra tAts+tsha hUM khA hi/ oM ha hri ha haM/ thugs rje chen pos gzigs nas kyang // sna tshogs rgyud rnams sbrul mdzad pa
257b4(rgyud 'grel): gar mkhan 'khor lo'i rgyud mnga' ba// drag po zhi mdzad khyod lagaso// sna tshogs gar gyis rnam par 'phrul l-i phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje la sogs mtshon tshwas rol la phyag 'tshalo// ma lus lha'i ma tshig skyong de li phyag 'tshal//
257b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rtsal rdzogs bcu shubs la phyag 'tsha lo// oM A ti b+hu ho// a li la la la ho// oM dur khrod dang ni dur khrod dang // rI ba'i su la dang 'bab chu'i gling // khyim grong blong gi ngogs gnas sogs// zhing khams grong kha
257b6(rgyud 'grel): stong pa dag/ sems can snod dang thang sogs pa// chu yi gnas mal khyad par du// drag po nag po drag chen po// ma mo dang ni mnyam par gnas// nag po gcog pa 'jig su rung // dga' las 'das dang log 'dren ma/
258a1(rgyud 'grel): gdol pa chen po lam bkyi// sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug ma// g.yon ldan mar me 'jib byed mya// grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor cho ga/ bajigs pa'i gzugs 'dzin 'jigs chen mo// mche ba gzugs
258a2(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'jigs pa nyid// thod pa'i phreng ba 'phyang ba dang // mthu chen lag na kha T+wAM gaM/ lag na dgra sta ral gri dang // rdo rje mtshon cha gzhu yi lag/ mkha' 'gro chen mo de nyid che// las rnams rjesu sgrub par byed// rnal 'byor dkyil
258a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rgyal chen po// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen las// skyon med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// thams cad gnas nas tshogs pa rnams// rang gi dam tshig las mdzod tsog/ oM ka k+ko D+ha na/ badz+ran+d+ha
258a4(rgyud 'grel): na/ kha khA dA na/ sarba dush+tsa naM/ ha nA hA na/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya/ shIn+ti ku ru/ hUM hUM phaT phaT dz+wa la swA hA/ oM AHhUM muHbadz+ra gats+tsha// dkyil 'khor chen po thog ma dang // bar dang tha ma'i gnas rnamasu// zhi rgyas dbang
258a5(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod dang // las kun bA yi sbyin sreg brtsam// gsang sngags kyis ni 'grub byed cing // sbyin sreg las kyis 'bras bu 'byin// sgrib pa thams cad don yod byar// sngags bzlas sbyin sreg shis pa yin// bzlas brjod
258a6(rgyud 'grel): grangs ni bcur 'gyur te// sbyin srog sngags grangs bcu cha'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogasu// las pa kun dang rgyas po brtsam// byang du zhi ba lhor mngon spyod// nub tu dbang dang dgug pa'i las// thab khu gi ni ma
258b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu ru// khru gang zabs byed brko zhing // kha khyer rim gsum bskyed byas la// rim bzhin sor ni bzhir bzhir gnas// zhi la zlum po rgyus gru bzhi// dbang la zla gam gru gsum drag/ dkaraR+Sha sAr dmar gnang rnam ban
258b2(rgyud 'grel): las kun dbyibs drang mdog kun ldan// 'khor lo rin chen pod+ma dang // rdo rjes mtshan cing phreng bas brgyan// tsan+danA dkar po de na da ka'i// shing sogs 'o ma dang ldan pa'i// mngar gsum dri yi chu sta byugs pa'i// zhi ba'i
258b3(rgyud 'grel): khang pa zlum por brtsig/ gser zhing bil ba ma ngan dang // 'bras bu me tog dang bcas pa// gau wang dz+nyA ti sa ru po'i shing // rgyus la rin chen zur brgyad dbyibs// rgun shing kham bu d+haM ka ri// nags kyi k+Shi ba ma dr-i mar sogs
258b4(rgyud 'grel): gur gum dri sogs dam+bAr po'i mdog/ dbang la rtse gsum zla gam dbyibs// bse shun sta ru marga taM// seng ldeng srug po'i 'bras bu'i shAMng // chag gis bdug pa'i rdzas bcas pas// drag po'i dbyibs bzhin bstan pa'o//
258b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo'i chu las byung ba ni// sor bzhi brgyad dang bcu drug gnyis// so sor dmar gyis byugs pa la// me tog dri bcas brgyan par bya// thab kyi phyi rol nye 'khor dag/ ku sha rgyan dang mtshon cha dang // me long rngamya yol ba bcas
258b6(rgyud 'grel): tshon sna lnga'i thag pas bskor// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// sman mar 'bru rnams bdud rtsi chang // me tog rim gyis brgyan pa dang // til 'bru nyungs kar mngar gsum rdzas// 'o ma 'bras chang zho mar chan// gro 'bras ma sha
259a1(rgyud 'grel): nas sro ba// bil ba ku sha star ka dur// dz+nyA ti pha la 'bras bu gsum// u dum nags kyi lcug sogs shing // rin chen phreng ba ba ngan sogs// mi 'chi lnga dang lcags kyu bcas// sgrub pa po yi mdun du
259a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ g.yas su rdo rje dril bu dang // yam shing til 'bru rlung g.yas bzhag/ g.yon du dro chu me tog bcas// duR+Sha ku sha'i chun po bzhag/ mchod yon yan lag brgyad ldan pa// mchod rdzas kun gyi sna la dgod// hUM
259a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i sbyar bas bgegs bsal zhing // rdzas rnams bsrung sbyong gnas su dgong // rdo rje sems dpo'i sbyor ba las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsal byas nas// chas gos lnga po bgos byas te// phyag rgya lnga sogs rgyan
259a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mtshan// bdud rtsi'i raM lu khar bcug cing // dbang po kun la thig le mtshan// snyoms 'jug phyag rgya'i tshul bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sogs rnam pas// byams pa'i semaso sogs nyor bzhag ste// dus bzhi'i
259a5(rgyud 'grel): bye brag dbye ba yis// so so'i stan la legs gnas pas// phyogs bzhir lta tshul las la dmigs// ku sha rus pa mtshan ma'i dbyibs// dag byed g.yon pa'i ming med brgyan// lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing //
259a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro ba sbyangs byas nas// 'phags dang sems can la dmigs te// mdzad pa rgya chen rab spyod do// gzhi rten sbyor ba la gnas pas// dmigs pa gsum gyi las rdzogs nas// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya yis//
259b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya// mdun du dpal mchog las byung ba'i// raM bsgreng las dang rjes mthun pa'i// dkar ser dmar gnag po rims bzhin// zhi rgyas las mdzad me lha bskyed// mig gsum gdong bzhi ra
259b2(rgyud 'grel): pa can// gsus po che la phyag bzhi pa// mi 'jigs bgrang phyed spyi blugs dang // dbyug pa srad bu'i phreng ba thogs// sum mdo ris mtshan yum dang 'khril// pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par gnaste// dbang bskur byin brlabs dbu
259b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan can// me ri 'bar ba mtshan bcas pa'o// dzaHhUM baM ho'i sbyor ba dang // sngags tshigs 'od zer phyag rgya yis// sgyu ma'i cha lugs 'dra ba yi// lha nyid gnas su dbug par bya// g.yas ni myi 'jigs sbyin pa las//
259b4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bong srin lag rtsar bzung bskyod// oM e h+ye hi/ ma hA b+h+yo te/ de ba r-i Shi dwi dza satwa// ma ti kri ta a nu ma hA sa mot+to ha ba b+ha/ oM ba b+hA ka ag+na yai swA hA/ oM ma hA kro d+ha shwa ra~M sarba tra pa byaM sho d+ha ya swA hA/ gnod mdzes
259b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bgegs bskrad de// gnyis med phyag rgya bzhi yis gdab// dge 'dun rgyal po smad 'tshong dang // rigs dran shan pa'i rigs dag gam// me long me shel gtsub shing dang // rdo lcags sbyor ba'i me slangs
259b6(rgyud 'grel): nas// g.yas nas lan gsum bskor byas te/ sngogs dang phyag rgyas rlung g.yab g.yab// oM a Tak+ki hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM a dz+nyA na dz+wa la raM/ g.yas pas ku sha chun po yis// phyogs rnams kuH
260a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang gtor bya// lag gnyis mchod yon phyag rgya yis// dung chos blangs te dbul bar bya// dgang gzar rgyar ni sor bzhi la// zabasu sor gnyis tshad brkos pas// rtse mo rgyun 'jug sor bzhi pa//
260a2(rgyud 'grel): bang 'dab bug pa rtse'u chung chang // rang gi phreng ba'i mtshan mas bskor// khru gang rdo rje rin chen bcas// blugs gzar sor gnyis phyed brkos shing // pad 'dab rdo rje'i mtshan mas brgyan// thog mo bar dang mtha' mar
260a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas// bar du rdzas gzhan sna tshogs pa'o// oM badz+re a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wA la sarba smiM ku ru sarba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ me sbar ba yi don tshong du// ngagang blugs gsum 'am bdun phul la// bgegs kyi mtshan ma brtags byas/
260a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ zlog gzir mnan pa'i las rnams bya// oM na maHsa man+ta ag+ne yai swAhA/ dgang blugs dbul ba'i sngagaso// oM sarba pA paM da ha nA ya sAhA/ til gyi'o// oM ag+na ye badz+re na swA hA/ yam shing gi'o// oM sarba bA
260a5(rgyud 'grel): da hA na badz+ra ya swA hA/ tIl dang mar bsres pa'i 'o// oM sarba saM ba de swA hA/ zho yi'o oM sarba si ma te swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dur ba'i myu gu mar gyis byugs pa'i 'o// oM ma hA be ga yi swA hA/ nas
260a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi'o// oM badz+ra g+hasma ri ye swA hA/ gro'i 'o// oM badz+ra bi dzA ye swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i'o// oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ ma sha'i'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA// 'bras so ba'i'o// oM pu she ye swA hA/ 'bras ma gus pa dang mar bsres
260b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// oM mahA sh+lo ba ye swA hA// bil+la dang star ka'i 'o// rdzas gzhan sna tshogs gang yin dag/ rigs kyi gtso bo'i gsang sngags sam// yi ge bdun nam lnga yis sam// rang maung sbyar bas dbul bar bya// oM pra bar
260b2(rgyud 'grel): sa twa kA ra pra tIts+tsha ho swA hA/ zhes bya bas yang dgang blugs dbul lo// de nas nye reg stsogs dag byas// mchod pa lnga yis mnyes pa dang // bden pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod byas nas// rang gi las la rab tu bskul// lag
260b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thal sbyar bskyong byas te// rdzas rnams lan gsum sbyang bar bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI li bi maM la ri lu ti badz+rI Tak+ki nA~M hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ de gnas gzhal yas gdun btsas la// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
260b4(rgyud 'grel): dgu/ bzhugs gsol zhabs bsil sogs dbul zhing // mchod bstod cho ga rgya chen bya// las kyi cho ga bzhin du ni// me gnas khang pa gang na skyed cing // dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin dgod// ye shes lha tshogs
260b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan 'dren tshugs// mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes pa dag/ so so'i las la rnam por sbyararo// rang gi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor drug/ sbyor sngags mtha' ma'i gnas spel// yum shing 'od la dbul byas te// til zho nas
260b6(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag tu'o// ku sha duR+Ya gtsug tau ra la// mar khu nas gro so ba dang // ma sha ka sogs zhol du dbul// zhu ba'i rdzas kun de bzhin no// spos rnams shangs la me tog spyan// dri mchog dkar dmar me yi 'ong // mchod yon
261a1(rgyud 'grel): 'thor 'thung phyag tu dbul// bdud rtsi ljags la gos mchog sku// rin chen phreng ba dbu dang snyun// rol mo'i rdzas rnams mdun du'o// de nas slob dpon la sogs pa'i// sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan sbyang
261a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// bsrung zhing shis pa'i las kun dang // 'dod doni gang yin gsol ba gdob// slar yang mchod cing bstod byas te// dgang blugs phul te mnyes par bya// gzugs brnyan gnas nas spyan drangs pa// slar nyid ra
261a3(rgyud 'grel): go gnas su dgod// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dag/ dam tshig lha dang gnyis su dbye// mchod bstod phyag rgyas gshegasu gsol// bskyed pa'i rim bzhin bsdu bar bya// mthar yang me lha mchong bya ste// gshegs
261a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol rang gi gnas su bsdu// sna tshogs rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// gnas kyi sa gzhi nyer mdzes par// slob dpon khrus byas rgyan gyis klubs// rdo rje dril 'dzin sbyor ldan pas// rab gnas bya bar 'os pa dang // sna tshog
261a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i rdzas rnams bsag/ rdo rje khro bor byin brlabs pa'i// mtshan ma'i rdzas kyis bgegs rnams bskrad// tshogs bsags bsrung ba'i 'khor lo dang // gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang // ye shes lha dmigs
261a6(rgyud 'grel): las rdzogs nas// rab gnas rten rnams sbyang bar bya// bsang gtor sngags kyis gtor byas nas// nyungs kar sngags bcas lan gsum du// kham por me yi nang du bsreg/ slar yang chu yis shis par bya// oM sarba bA
261b1(rgyud 'grel): da ha na badz+ra ya swA hA// ba yi rnam lnga legs sbyar ba// 'dag chal rnam lnga bdud rtsis sbyar// duR+Sha'i pir gyis sku byugs te// brlan 'jig pa la me long ngos// hUM oM hrIHhrIHtraM haM/ oM dag ku sha'i chu rgyan gyis// dri ma'i mtshan
261b2(rgyud 'grel): ma dag par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga tra ka ya bAkr-it+te sho d+ha na badz+ra swA hA/ dri zhim sbyar ba'i mar byugs te// skyu ru ra yi 'dag tshal dang // shun pa lnga yi rdzas rnams kyis// dngos sam me long gzugs brnyan phyir// mdun gyi sangs
261b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams kyis mnyes byas te// sta gon gnas shing dgongs bya'i phyir// spos snong bzung ste gsol ba gdab// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan gnas nas byon mdzod de// sgyu 'phrul chen mo
261b4(rgyud 'grel): lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugasu gsol// mgon mchog gonas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchod zhes la// 'di don bzung bar bya ba dang // byang chub sems mchog 'phel bar mdzad//
261b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan rdo rje che ge mo// rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po thugs rje brtse ba yis// nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan
261b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan bdag ni gus pa la// bka' drin cho ga bya bar 'os// 'gro ba'i 'khor nas sgrol mdzad pa// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongasu gsol// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gang dag gsang sngags kyi lha dang // 'jig rten
262a1(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'i lha tshogs dang // 'byung po rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan pa// mngon par dga' ba'i gnas bstan pa// rdo rje'i spyan dang ldan pa'i tshogs// rdo rje che ga mo bdag gis// rigs pa'i rgyal po cha ga
262a2(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas yo byad ci 'byor zhing // 'gro la phan phyir bgyid par 'tshal// bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// thugs rjes nye bar dgong so nas kyang // rab tu gnas pa'i las rnams la// byin gyis brlab par mdze du gsol//
262a3(rgyud 'grel): sku gzugs lugs mo la sogs rnams// gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang rig lha yi rnam par bsam// phyag rgya bzhi yis bstan par bya// pu ti rigs kyi lha nyid las// gsung sogs yi ge'i rnam par 'gyur//
262a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten la sogs bzhir bcas pa// mos pa'i lha rnams gang yang rung // dzaHhUM baM hoH'i sbyor ba yis// lha rnams brtan par bzhugasu gsol// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes pa dang // sngags mang brjod cing na/
262a5(rgyud 'grel): bza' g.yog/ de nas snga dro'i dus su ni// snga ma'i sbyor bcas tshig gis bskul// bzhengs gsol gos sogs bsal byas nas// sngar bzhin sgom bzlas mchod sogs bya// ji ltar bltam ma thag tu ni// de bzhin
262a6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs kun khrus gsol ba// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma~M ya shrI ye hUM// dri med ras kyis rlan phyis shing // dri zhim rdzas kyis byug par bya// dngul snod
262b1(rgyud 'grel): mar dkar sbrang rtsis bkang // gser thur rtser blangs spyan la byug/ oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// me yaM sreg khang bzang po ru// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya// oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa nA sar+b+ba/
262b2(rgyud 'grel): sA d+hA ne swA hA/ oM me lha'i me tog shin tu dmar// lha yaM dri yos nye bar b+h+rUM gas// me tig bzang po 'di bzhes la// gnas 'di nyid du bzhugasu gsol// oM mar me 'ong bzang 'bar ba ni// ngan 'gro'i mun pa 'joms
262b3(rgyud 'grel): byed la// lha yi mig 'byed dam pa 'di// bdag la dgongs te bzhengasu gsol// oM tsan+dan gur bum sbyar ba yi// dri mchog bdug pa 'di bzhes la// dbang po'i sgo rnams tshim pa'i mchog/ byin gyis rlobs pa bzhes
262b4(rgyud 'grel): su gsol// oM sna tshogs lha yi dri ldan pa// sna tshogs ga pur gyis ni brgyan// sna tshogs hUM las yang dag byung // dri mchog 'di dag bzhi su gsol// oM kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa'i// bza' ba'i bye brag sna tshogs
262b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams// zhal zas thams cad phun sum tshogs// 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU paM A hUM/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM/ oM badz+ra nai be d+ya A hUM/ oM dpag bsam shing sogs rgyu las
262b6(rgyud 'grel): byung / lha yin bza' ni ra na 'phags// btso ma gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan sogs dbul// oM badz+ra sa ma ye swA hA// de nas mchod pa'i rol mo'i tshogs// sna tshogs rnam par dbul bya zhing // dpa'
263a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i glu dang dbyangs kyis dbul// bkra shis 'don zhing bskor ba bya// dbang bskur lha yi cho ga yis// byin brlabs bskye de brtan par bya// sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs pas// las bsgrub byar chad
263a2(rgyud 'grel): bsal bar bya// sngags can byin po rlabs bskyed 'dod pas// khrus byas rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bsham so nas// ting 'dzin rim pas bskyed par bya// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas
263a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ dgug gzhug mchod cing brtan par bya// rong gi gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// bkra shis glo bcas brjod par bya// phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra// 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs
263a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis de ni skye dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mi mchod pa// chos kyi dam pa
263a5(rgyud 'grel): skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyi mchod pa'i gnas// tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo che shes
263a6(rgyud 'grel): dong dpal gyi gzhi/ de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba'o// don rnams ma lus mtshungs par brtul ba yongs ldan pa// tshogs kyi las dgyes thub pa'i ba
263b1(rgyud 'grel): shis gang byung ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ 'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i// gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ dbang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shrI
263b2(rgyud 'grel): gang byung ba// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni// rmad du grags pa'i che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa// bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i
263b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams lo zhi byed shog/ dgyes shing namo phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ dka' thub tshul du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs// lha yi tshogs kyis yongs
263b4(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis nges ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' ba// bai DUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng na bzhugs// skyil mo krung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shA
263b5(rgyud 'grel): shis gang // bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams lo zhi byed shog/ chu bo'i 'gramA nA tsaR+Sha'i gang gis yongs bskor ba// shin tu rmad du byung ba'i sred pa sel mjed pa// klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas bya yi bkra shis gang // @#
263b6(rgyud 'grel): des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs// mang po btul te sa stengs dang ni na mkha' la// bcom ldan bkra shis rnam po sna tshogs gang byung ba// bkra
264a1(rgyud 'grel): shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sdug bsngal mtha' dag gizhag phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te// nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam btul nas// ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i
264a2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shiso des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer bA ra nA ser drang srong mchog bzhugs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo mchog bstan pa yi bkra shis gang // lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du
264a3(rgyud 'grel): byung gyur pa// bkra shis nges kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal bzhon pa dang // 'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag/ nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa//
264a4(rgyud 'grel): kra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ 'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te// tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs// sna tshogs thogs pas yongasu bskor ba'i bkra shis

264a6(rgyud 'grel): gang / bkra shis nges kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa// mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i

268b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra satwa ta a b+hiny+tsa mi// slar nyid slob ma'i lag pA las gtang // lan gsum gtod de thugs kar bzung // thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//
268b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje snyems bdag bdag po'i bdag/ kun rtog ye shes rang bzhin gyi// gar dbang ngo bo rdo rje'i dbang // dril bu mdun bzhag byin brlabs te// dkre zheng slob ma'i lag g.yon gtang // 'di ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi//
269a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshang // khyod kyis rtag tu bcang bar bya// byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// oM a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis snying
269a2(rgyud 'grel): bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams// srid pa'i dam pa byed par 'gyur// bya ba'i ye shes rang bzhin gyi// rta mchog ngo bo dril bu'i dbang // rdo rje dril bu bsnol ba'i phyag/ sbyor bcas slob ma'i mgo bor
269a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ gang phyir chos rnams rnam dag pas// sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin nyid// dbang po'i spyod lam gang dang gang // bde mchog sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// oM shrI che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta
269a4(rgyud 'grel): ya ho/ chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin gyi// rnam snang ngo bo mig gi dbang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshig gis kyang // rgyas mi thebs shing mi smos te// de la gnod par mi 'gyur//
269a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas mna'i ni bsgrags byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yi// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal te// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyod byed pa//
269a6(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mi ngag dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying las khrag chen 'thung bar 'gyur// semaso can
269b1(rgyud 'grel): khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid ni sgrub par bya// rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad//
269b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad pa// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// mgon khyod thugs rje'i rang bzhin
269b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dbang bskur sogs// bdag gzhan don gyi bya ba rnams// grub byed dbang bskur bdag la stsal// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya che// zung zhig yang dag gzung bar gyis// de ring rdo rje slob dpon che//
269b4(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i tshogs rnams bzung bar gyis// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gnas// rtag tu khyod kyis kyang bzung ste// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya
269b5(rgyud 'grel): tiSh+Tha e Sha traM d+ha ra ya mi/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad // khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bskyed// oM ma hA badz+re hUM/ oM badz+ra baN+De/
269b6(rgyud 'grel): Hyid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir// dam tshig phyag rgya zhes byar brjod// lus kun brtan byed gang zhig ni// phyag rgya rab tu grags pa yin// oM ma hA kA ya bAk+Sh+yat+ta ma hA sa ma~M ya hUM/ mochod tshogs gar bskor bstod dang
270a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ dgyes pa'i brtul zhugs dbang chog gi/ sems dpa'i nga rgyal rnal 'byor las// snyems bcas me tog phreng 'phang bya// deng nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// sras bcas kun nas
270a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rol// rdo rje sems sogs rab sbyor bas// bdag bsgreng bde chen mchod pa mdzod// oM badz+ra lA b+h+yo hUM/ sgeg dang bcas pas phreng ba 'phyang // sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// bcom ldan kun du mi 'bral te//
270a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba de yi rgyan yin no// mA l+ye hUM/ lus can can kun la dman kyai// glu dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig brjod pas// bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub mchog/ myur du bde ba myong bar 'gyur// gi br-idz+dzi k+Shi taM hUM// ger bcas thal mo sbyor
270a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar byos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i phrin las kyi// gar dbang tshul bzhin bsgyur bar gyis// oM badz+ra nA~M t+ye hUM/ rdzogs sangs rgyas lnga spos 'bul ma// brtul zhugs bzang pos
270a5(rgyud 'grel): legs par tshim// lus can bde gshegs cha 'dra bar// ye shrIs+t+ra can gyis tshim par gyis// oM bad+d+ha d+hU pe hUM/ me tog sangs rgyas rnams 'thor// byang chub yan lag tshogs pa'i sgo// mtshan bzang dpe byung kun ldan pa'i
270a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa'i sku thob 'gyur// b+hu badz+ra puSh+pe hUM// chos kyi mig 'bying sgrol gsal bas// rdo rje chos dang 'dra ba ru// sems can ma rig mun thoms pa'i// ye shes snang ba gsal bar gyis// tha brje AM waM me hUM
270b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rnams la dri sbyor zhing // tshul khrims phung po shes rab dang // rnam grol ye shes mthong ba yis// byang chub lus can rnams la byug/ a badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ bdag gzhan don grub lus kyi tshogs// thun mong 'bring
270b2(rgyud 'grel): po tshogs gyur pa'i// zho rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // sdang gnod nges pa'i las kun dang // 'byed rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnams// thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis// ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang // thogs med mi
270b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byings skas 'dzeg cing // gser 'gyur ri lu nyi zla gzung // char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs// rnam shes bsgrub dang ye shes bsgrub// phyag rgya shes pa'i dngos grub dang // thams cad bsgrub cing grol bya yi/
270b4(rgyud 'grel): don nyid yang dag grol bar gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing // sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyas// phrin las gzhan dag sbyor ba yi// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub gnang // ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis//
270b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa yi// rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal// oM badz+ra me tra a pa ha rA phaT laM b+ha hI// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal lo dri ma med//
270b6(rgyud 'grel): gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung // rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa// chos rnams de bzhin shes bgyis la// sems can don la yang dag byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas rigasu skyes// thams
271a1(rgyud 'grel): cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal// rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin// dag cing bsal la
271a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa med// bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso// rigs kyi yi ge mtshan ldan pa'o// mnga' 'phang ba dang 'khor lo gnon// g.yas par dung gi sgra 'byin zhing // g.yon par rang gi glegs bam mo//
271a3(rgyud 'grel): oM pha rol phyin drug las rnams kyis// sems can kun don rab sbyor zhing // 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod mya ngan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// the tshom rtog tshogs gtsang mdzad pa'i// chos kyi dung ni sgra sgrogs shing /
271a4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags snying po'i gsang chen 'di// snod ldan kun+da la rab tu shong // des ni rgyal ba thams cad la// phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis// khyod la rtag tu srung bar mdzod// mdor na
271a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams rnams su// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs su// rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor du gsol// rdo rje gan su bad+mo gshegs rin// pad+mo las kyi rjesu gnas// 'di ltar nga yis khyod
271a6(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan// rdo rje dpal ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dngos po mchog tu sgrub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las grol// kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa b+hur b+hu ba swaHdus gsum rgyal ba thoms
271b1(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis// dus gcig tu ni lung bstan pas// phyag rgya chen po'i sngags bcas mthus// skad cig dus kyi lung bstan mdzad// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsuMn ni gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chas
271b2(rgyud 'grel): bral bar// khyod kyis nam yang bya ma yin// ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur// sngags sogs rgyud rnams 'dzin par gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lha rnams kun gyis mthun/
271b3(rgyud 'grel): par bsrungaso// sems can kun la snying brtse bas// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris// rtse gcig nan tan bskyeng nas ni// sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhugs shing mthong
271b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa yi sA// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // khyed rnams rab tu dgyes par gnas// bde chen thog pa 'di la ni// phyin kyang 'chi ba yod med cing // mtshungs med thub par mi 'gyur te// ces kyang mi 'jigs
271b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' bar gyis// srid pa kun tu dag pas na// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das so// byang chub sems ni yongs mi spang ba// rdo zhes bya'i phyag rgya ste// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom
271b6(rgyud 'grel): med/ dam pa'i chos ngag mi smad cing // ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya// mi shes snod min rmongs pa la// nam yang bstan par mi bya'o// rdo rje dril bu mi spang ste// slob dpon ngag la gus par gyis// khams gsum gyi ni
272a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la srid che// bdag por rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing // bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bas// grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin// 'di yis khyed rnams dus 'di ru// sangs rgyas thob par the
272a2(rgyud 'grel): tshom med// dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas// slob ma yon 'byung rgyal por 'gyur// slob dpon blo gros dam tshig ldan// brtan g.yo'i mtha' las rnam par grol// lam mchog 'jug soT dbagra dbyung ste// ngal
272a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gnas ngan kun tu spangs// rigs kyi 'khor gang yin pa yi// brten pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid// rten gnas khang pa rgyan bcas pa'i// rnam dag rang bzhin rgyan bstan zhing // bskyed pa'i las lam bye brag sogs//
272a4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon phyogs gcog nas 'jug pa'i// rig pa'i yan lag rgyad don bzhin// slob dpon dbang bskur don du bstan// de nas sna tshogs rgyun rnams dang // mchod pa kun dang gtor ma ku no// snga ma bzhin du phul byas te/
272a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha rnams bstod par bya// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog bdag gis dbul bar bya// gang la yongasu gtang dka' ba// de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yong ni shin tu khyang
272a6(rgyud 'grel): par can// de dang de ni bla ma lo// de ni zad par 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod gyur pa 'am// 'on te sems la bgos pa dag/ de bzhin yang na dgos par bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// gal te de la mchog bangag
272b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ de yang ngan pa'i yon dbul na// kun gyi slob dpon brnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal thob// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis blu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub
272b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi yon// mi chen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis blu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin la dpal sbyor ba// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig zangs dang nor bu dang // shin tu dkar dang ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni
272b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang // pad+ma can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams cad dang // rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// rta mchog shin tu brgyan pa
272b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / shing rta rin chen bkang ba dag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no// de nas dben pa'i gnas ngag tu// dris byugs maN+Dal legs bshams nas// sna tshogs rgyun sogs me tog bkram// bla ma bde ba'i stan lo bzhag/
272b5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab phun sum mtshan ldan pa// snod ldan dbang thob dam tshig gnas// yon bcas bla ma la phul nas// ston mo'i g.yos sogs dga' longs spyod// rdo rje yol bas par bcad la// gus pas rgyab nas gsol
272b6(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab// dpal ldan mgon po bde ba che// bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bode stsol mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis// yang
273a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag don mchog rnam dag pa// ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi// mchog gi dbang bskur ba bzhin du// de bzhin bdag sogs 'gro kun gyi// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med
273a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel// gang gis byang chub bla med pa// di ring bdag gis thob par mdzod// blo gros thugs rje chen po yis// brtse ba'i gsung gis slar brjod pa// bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rgyal ba
273a3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bde chen sbyin// ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis// rang gi gnas su legs par sdong// de nas phyi nang khrus sogs kyis// dam tshig lha mo sbyang byas nas// nyungs kar sngags kyis bgegs bskrad cing //
273a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba rjes sbyor gyis bskyed de// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs byas nas// rol pa'i brdas bskul spro ba bskyed// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// sleb ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs
273a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rat+na gi swas+t+ra mchog dbang bskur zhing // byang chub sems de dag pa'i chu// rtog tshogs dri ma dag par byos// oM ma hA bo d+hi ts+tshat+ta sa mA ya a bi Shiny+tsa hUM/ a ho su kha zhes brjod cing // longs spyod gnas la gzhug
273a6(rgyud 'grel): byas te// rigs kyi cha lugs gsal ba dag/ tshu zla sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin// rdzogs rim bcud rdzogs bla mo mchog/ 'gro ba skyob pa'i blo ldan pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gsang gnas don// slob mas rgyu ngol rab bskul mdzad
273b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ldan yum bcas b+h+ra ma la// mchod cing gastsol ba ga ba par bya// kye kye mgon pa bde ba che// rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung // phyag rgya mi phyeng rab sgrub pa// mngon sum nyams myong bskyed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid chen
273b2(rgyud 'grel): po s+ya dzI lta bar// gtso bos bdag la mdzad du gsol// rtog pa'i dri myos bsgrub pa rnams// byang chub chu yis dag par mdzod// rigs mthun mtshan ldan byin brlabs pa'i// lha mo bu yi lag tu gtang // dga' ba'i gnas chen
273b3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo 'di// sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong // legs par zung zhing blo gros mchog/ dga' ba 'i mchod pa rab tu gyis// thabs gzhan gyis ni 'chang rgyo// 'gro ba'i de dag thams cad 'gyur// de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid du/
273b4(rgyud 'grel): nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na mang // blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// lha mos phyogs la dga' ba'i bzhin// rgyas mdzad pa
273b5(rgyud 'grel): kha phye bstan// khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can// dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang // rak+Sha gA bu ra mo s+ya dang // bud med rnams la dang gus dang // b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog pa// smos shig grogs po bde ba can// lha mo tsa phyir bdag mo
273b6(rgyud 'grel): spro do khu khrag la sogs bza' ba dang // bud med rnams la rtag gus shing // dga'i ba'i pad+ma ra'i bgyid cing // rmad byung gsal ba'i pad+ma 'di // thams cad bde bar yang dag ldan// rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyod na// de nyid bde chen
274a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dral mi 'gyur// chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can thams cad rnam par dkrol// bde chen rgyal ba 'di nyid ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin bcas// nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo'i tshogs//
274a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la bzhugs rab tu rgyas// b+ha ga'i mkha'i dbyings na mkha'i dbyings// 'byung po lnga po rgyan bzhin dgod// lte ba ze'u 'bru ge sar zlum// 'dab ma brgyad sogs rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su gnas pa ni// de nyid
274a3(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi bde chen gzugs// b+hany+tsa mok+Sha ho// dben pa'i gnas mchog dri bcus brgyan// yol ba'i ra ba stan bde ba// thabs shes sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang // rjesu sbyar dang sbyor chen bsgom// ka ma la yi gtsug lag gzhug/ ma
274a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bde ba'i ye shes bskyed// dngos grub shis dang mu~M shaMs las// yi ge lnga bcu'i mtshan ma rtag/ ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra/ snying rje chen po mkha' 'dra zhing // rdul thar pa zhing chos// rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do//
274a5(rgyud 'grel): byang sems rdo rje lce yis blong // mchod yon dbul bskor gtang rab gtang // bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis// dbang bzhi'i rim pa bstan pa'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rnam gsum phyag rgya ga
274a6(rgyud 'grel): rung las// gnyis med bde ba'i ye shes don// mngon sum nyams myong rgyang la bskyed// de don rtog pa bdun pa las// rgyas par bstan pa'i gzhung bzhin bslal// phyi nang gsang ba gsang chen gyi// dbang bskur dam pa bzhi dag
274b1(rgyud 'grel): las// rmang gzhan la las bum pa dang // gsang ba shes rab ya shes dang // bad chen bzhi pa zhes brjod de// da ngan rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o// khyad kyis sreg chags bsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// dang
274b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang pa shes rab ye shes dang // bde chen bzhi pa zhes brjod de// de don rang bzhin mtshungs pa'o// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// mu byin par yang blang bar bya// 'dod pas log par g.yem par bya// brdzun gyi tshig
274b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang smra bar bya// rdo rje blam byang chub sems// srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems// dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nas// lhag pa'i lha bzhin rin chen tog/ phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma'i las rnams rdzogs
274b4(rgyud 'grel): byas nis// rab tu bcas po'i rin chen sogs// bla ma'o zhabs la btung de dbul// de nas brtsams te dus kun tu// bla ma bzang la rab gus dang // thubs rje brtse ba nyer bzhags nas// bdag la dgongs shing gzigs
274b5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// 'gro ba kun gyi don gyi phyir// smon lam rgya chen gdab par bya// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rim pa bzhin// bsdu ba'i cho ga rgya cher bya// sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i bye brag gis// mgron tshogs ma lus dgug par
274b6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ bkra shis glu gar rol mo'i tshogs// de nyid longs spyod nye bar gnas// mgon pos ji ltar rnam bkod pa// dedon gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud // rab bsdus dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dri med yan lag
275a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i tshul// rnal 'byor 'jug pa yan lag tu// bstan pa'i dge bas 'gro ba rnams// rlung gi ye shes zag pa med// bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis rgyal bar shog/ dpal
275a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ku ku rA dzas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
275a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po gu lin dra gu b+ha// zhu tshon gyi lo tsA ba dran pan na mkhas bsgyur ba/ phyis kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// / oM su \u0f7f
275a4(rgyud 'grel): tI l-I badz+re ye swAhA/ sarba mdal// bkra shas/
276a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga bzhu'o/
276b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarba bud d+ha sa ma yo g+hi ga Da bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga ces bya ba/ dpal mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo//
276b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan bde chen sems dpa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras mchog 'khor lo'i gnas// rnam 'phrul cho ga ston mdzad pa'i// sku gsung dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas thams
276b3(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog las// tshogs kyi cho ga bshad par bya// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad rang nyid rtag
276b4(rgyud 'grel): tu bzhugs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pas// kun ldan tshogs kyi 'khor lo yin// rigs kyi bkod pa so so'i gnas// phun tshogs par bstan pa 'am// yang na bde ba'i gnas dag tu// skyed mos tshul la
276b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs parA bsgrub// mar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang // yar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu mtshams gnyis// der ni dang po gdun bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na da 'gyur ba'i// sna tshogs pad+ma ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams
276b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dag pa'i gdon// sangs rgyaso kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas sbas// dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa
277a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ rdo rje tshig dang mchog la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri la sogs ldan par// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
277a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog bsgrub// slob dpon mgon la legs zhus nas// phun sum tshogs pa'i rjes 'jug cing // sangs rgyas brda dang ldan pa yis// me tog thogs te 'gro la bskul// rnal 'byor pho mo thams cad kun// dga' zhing
277a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ba'i sems can gyis// do nub bdag gi gnas dag tu// tshogs kyi cho ga mdzad par gsol// e ma bu ni snying rje che// gal te lag pa'i phreng ston na// 'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin// phreng ba mngon par btang byas nas// dam
277a4(rgyud 'grel): tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang // dpa' bo gzhan don spyod pa'o// de nas nub mo 'dus pa dang // phyi nas 'dag chal dri chab chu// khrus byas me tog gis brgyan cing // rnal 'byor dag chos sngags kyis sbyang // de nas nang gI
277a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khrus byas te// sngags kyis bsrung zhing byin brlabs nas// dam tshig tshogs rnams bskang gso zhing // rim bzhin nang du 'gro bar bya// dam tshig brda sogs brtag pa'i phyir// khro bo'i rgyal sngon las mkhan gnyis// rig pa'i
277a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags brjod mthong bas 'dzin// bsrung ba'i don phyir sgo 'gram gnyis// khro rgyal rgyan sngon dag gis mdzes// dam tshig rnam par spyod pa'o// dngos grub rin chen dbyug to 'dzin// dpal ldan dpa' bo 'dul bar mdzod// mkha'
277b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// dam pa'i mtshan ldan bdag thong zhig/ oM ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ rdo rje slob ma chen po dang // rang gi grogs mchog lha rnams la// bskor zhing phyag 'tshal rang nyid kyi// stan la gus
277b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis 'dug/ yon bdag las mkhan gang rung gis// sa gzhi legs bsham dri bcas chus// khru gang la sogs tshad mnyam pa'i// maN+Dal rgyanA dang bcas par bsham// rdo rje 'dzin gnon sngags kyis ni//
277b3(rgyud 'grel): bsang sbyang bsrung zhing byin gyis brlob// rig pa chad dag rnam phye la// dkyil 'khor sngags kyis me tog bgram// oM badz+ra re khe hUM/ 'jig rten pa yi miN+Da la ni// de yi 'og tu brtsam par bya// phyogs bzhir dkyil 'khor
277b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam bzhi 'am// yang na gcig tu dgod par bya// dbus su rta mchog lha mo ste// zla gam lha mchog chen po'i gnas// bar khyams dang por phyogs skyong lha// gnyis par mkha 'gro'i tshogs rnams te/ gsum par klu rgyal
277b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bcas tshogs// bzhi par 'gro drug 'gegs tshogs so// so so'i las drang mthun pa yi// tshogs pa'i rgyan rnams dgram par bya// mchod yon mchod sogs rim gro dang // nya sha la sogs bza' ba dang // tshong
277b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi myos byed phreng ba dang // g.yon du nye bar dgod par bya// g.yas pa dag tu chu yi snong // ku sha'i mun por nyungs kar bcas// mdun du mchod yon bzeng zhal dang // rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya'i tshogs// mchod pa'i phyag rgya
278a1(rgyud 'grel): shes tshogs rnams// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dang po la// mchod pa kun gyi gtor ma'i tshogs// phyag rgya shes pa'i rdzas rnams ni// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor la// bkod de bsrung sbrang shis par
278a2(rgyud 'grel): bya bsod nams tshogs kyis dag byas nas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting badzin gyis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor ldan pas// bsgom pa'i yan lag ma nyams pa// rigs kyi rnam b+haR+Sha
278a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing // bdun gyi dkyil 'khor gnyis med pa'o// dkyil 'khor dag gi las bya'o// chang la stsogs pa'i yo byad rnams// mdun nas phyag tu ci rigs dbul// ltos shis
278a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor rgyun mdzes rnams// 'di lnga rnam rtog yod ma yin// bram ze khyi dang gdol pa rnams// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// oM ma hA sa ma yo/ ku ru ku ru d+hA ro ku ru hU~M phaT/ bde gshegs de ni sdig
278a5(rgyud 'grel): med cing // 'dod chags stsogs pa'i skyon dang bral// gzung 'dzin dri ma rnam parar+ya spangs// de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag gnyis kyis// pad+ma'i bskor ba byas nas ni// rol pa'i bcas pas
278a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlab bzung // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// ji bzhin du ni 'jug par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas// chang sogs rdzas rnams byin gyis rlob// g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i gzugs can dang // khyad par du ni bskor ba nyid// shel
278b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi gzugs kyis byin brlab cing // thams cad bdud bdud rtsi'i ngo bor brtag/ de nyid yang dag spyod pa 'dis// rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag/ ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya// sgyu ma lta bu mdzes pa yi// 'o byed sogs
278b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyor kun 'khyud pa// sems can don du yang dag sbyang // de nas mna' ni bsgrags byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yi// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas thams
278b3(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi dag dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings nas//
278b4(rgyud 'grel): snying nas khrag chen 'thungs pa yin// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzor mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis
278b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig med stobs kyis khyod ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// tshogs kyi dpa' bo'i ston mo las// slob dpon ltos kyi rim pa'o// de nas khrus byis dri yi lus// ji ltar
278b6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa'i gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sems can khams ni ma lus gdon// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa nyid
279a1(rgyud 'grel): du bsgrub par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par bya// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo sogs// sgo bsrungs dang ni ldan par bya// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pas//
279a2(rgyud 'grel): skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de ni rnam par 'phrul par mdzad//
279a3(rgyud 'grel): brtan zhing grub pa'i slong byed pa// kun nas skyong ba'i bde ba ni// stong pa rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegasu gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' bskal bzang dpal khyod
279a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ oM e h+ye ti b+hA go wan ma hA kA ru Ni ka tr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya sa mya s+t+waM dzadz+dzahUM baMHho s+t+waM// de nas yang dag par gsal bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams la// bur gyis phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul
279a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// oM AHhU~M/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa
279a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// klu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus byed pa yi// rab 'byam las la sbyor du rung // gang dag grub par ma gyur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa//
279b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// de nas ro mchog bza' btung nas// glu tshig sil snyan la sogs la// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// dkyil 'khor tshogs bcas dbyer med
279b2(rgyud 'grel): blos// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag gzhan tshogs pa 'dod dgus mchod// rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus med par dbul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha 'gro sgyu mas tham
279b3(rgyud 'grel): cad rab sbrul rnam par sprul// te n+te te hUM/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul
279b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro bo'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// ru lu ru
279b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu mas thams cang rab sbrul rnam par sprul// hUM shi shwa bi shwa hUM/ A~M badz+ra satwa sa ma
279b6(rgyud 'grel): ya~M/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su pa Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+ta ma b+ha baM/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarbaM sid+d+hiM me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma ku ru su tsi me tsit+taM/ shre yaH
280a1(rgyud 'grel): ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+rI ma me muny+tsa/ badz+ra b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma yA/ satwa A/ de nas zos shing 'thungs pa yi// lhag pa'i tshogs rnams kun bsdus te// gong du bkod bya'i
280a2(rgyud 'grel): bkong ma dang // so sor byin brlabs bsngo bar bya// ha ho hriHyoM sbyor ba yis// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dod lnga'i tshogs// mdzes pa'i phyag rgya smin mtshams gnas// sngags bcas mgron tshogs bsdu bar bya// oM ha hi
280a3(rgyud 'grel): ru lu ru lu hUM bAM ho// badz+rI DA ki ni b+h+yo/ e a ra l+li ho dza dza/ oM su~M b+hA ni suM b+hA dzaHhUM baM ho/ A kAD+D+h+ya ya/ A kAn+d+ha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ to Sha ya to Shu ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ e a ral+li ho/ hriM hriM hraM/ hUM la s+ya rnam
280a4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'bar ba'i sku ston cing // 'jig rten lha chen yab yum zhabs kyis gnon// drag po'i dkyil 'khor sti tshogs ston mdzad cing // dbu ma rta skad 'tsher zhing gar mdzad pa// nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od mnga' sku la rdzogs
280a5(rgyud 'grel): khro rgyal 'khor btsas ma lus gshegasu gsol// 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po dang // de bzhin tshangs pa brgya byin sogs// khyab 'jug 'dod dgra'i dbang phyug dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha dang klu// gang drag rdzu 'phrul
280a6(rgyud 'grel): mthu mnga' rnams// bran mngags g.yog dang chung mar bcas// dpang po'i spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin// rang gi dam tshig dran byos pa// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir// 'khor bcas gnas 'dir gshegasu
280b1(rgyud 'grel): gsol// 'od zer sngags kyis sbyang byas nas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon paR+Sha gsal// oM kak+ka D+ha na/ bab+hAn+ta na na/ kha khyA da na/ sarba duSh+Ta ma/ ha na hwa nA/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya/ a mu kA s+yA/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/
280b2(rgyud 'grel): dza swA hA// bdud rtsi bsam gAta nau dAmigs nas nI// bdud rtsis kha ni dag par bya// oM gu ru t+yo ta khA hi/ sa ma ya br-i shaM khA hi/ bak+ShA su ga na/ b+hu tak+She tre p+pa tistaM b+ha ya hi hai/ lhag ma kha chu'i tshogs kyis bran// dgyes pa'i
280b3(rgyud 'grel): longs spyod rnam par rol// oM 'jig rten kun gtso mnga' mdzad pa'i// lha chen dregs byed stobs ldan pa// bde gshegs sras sogs bran mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ldan snying rje can// dbang phyug chen po chung
280b4(rgyud 'grel): mar bcos// de bzhin khyab 'jug tshangs pa dang // brgya byin 'dod dga' chung ma bcas// lha chen 'khor bcas tshogs rnams dang // phyogs skyong brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // klu chen brgyad po 'khor bcas dang // mkha'
280b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro chen mo gsus badz+rI na ma// dur khrod ma tshogs bcus dang // gzhan yang lha srin sde brgyad dang // 'gro ba sdug po 'khor bcas rnams// sku gsung thugs sogs sbyang byas nas// rang gi lha yi gzugs 'dzin rnams//
280b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'dir 'dus pa'i dam tshig can// mchod gtor rgyun dang bcas pa bzhes// de ma tshig bsrung zhing dam chog can// las la sogs pa mkha 'gro'i tshogs// mkha 'gro chen mo 'khor bcas rnams// rnal 'byor
281a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa'i grogs mdzad cig/ lus mdzad rdo rje bran ban+d+has pas// hrI rgyus dbang drag las grub cing // theg can gsang sngags bsrung ba dang // nad dang gnad sogs zhi ba dang /
281a2(rgyud 'grel): shis sbrel ba dang // bde legs 'bras bu grub par mdzod// oM sarba duSh+TAn/ b+hI nA g+ni na/ gats+tsha hUM phaT/ de nas sna tshogs gar gyi rgya// ngag mdzes stobs kyis bsgyur bya zhing // sna tshogs bu rnams snyan pa'i dbyangs/
281a3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ba'i tshogs kyis legs par blangs// rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar ba// rlung gi snying gar bzhag nas su// sems can thams cad la dmigs te// sprin la mi rgya chen gdab par bya// sems can thams cung sku
281a4(rgyud 'grel): med cing // dus kun du ni bde gyur cig/ sangs rgyas nyid dang 'brang 'gyur ba'i// lam de nyid la zhugs nas kyang // ma skal ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams dgrol brla shog/ kun gyis rigs 'dzim ba
281a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// sku gsung 'bras bu skye 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor gtsug lcag dam tshig la// da lta nyid du gnas par shog/ dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu bya ste// ye shes lha tshogs gshegasu gsol// dam tshig gastsal
281a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes bsrung bar bya// gzugs brnyan dben pa'i gnasu bzhag/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad// rjesu mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang sems can don la
281b1(rgyud 'grel): dgongs// oM A hUM muHbadz+ra gats+tsha muH/ gsang mchog snying po dri ma med// tshogs gnyis gcig tu rab sbyor ba// ye shes bla ma'i rtsal rdzogs don// dpa' bo longs spyod spyad pa'i thabs// sgrub thabs snga ma'i yan
