281b2(rgyud 'grel): lag tu// cho ga'i dbye ba bkod byas pas// 'gro rnams tshogs gnyis rnam 'phrul nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob shog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i tshogs kyi cho ga zhes bya ba// slob
281b3(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A nan+da gar+dz+dza dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dran pan na mkhas bsgyur bA las// phyis lo ts+tsha ba lha rin po ches bcos
281b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phyab pa'o// / dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhug so// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka nA ma no pi ka/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo//
281b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos dang dngos med rtog bral zhing // thugs rje mdzad pa sna chog snang // thabs mkhas khro ston rgyal ba'i sku// ma lus 'jigs la phyag 'tshal te// mkha' gro sgyu ma'i rjes 'gro ba// de nyid sgrub thabs cho ga ro bcas
281b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i bde skyed do// cung zad 'jug pa'i don phyir bshad// theg chen bla ma bzang los byung // yon tan stobs sogs kun nas mdzes// rab tu sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor mchog/ 'dod pa'i lha la dang mos
282a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dud// tshul khrims brtul zhugs la sogs kyi// thabs mkhas yan lag rnam spyad pas// de gnas goms byed las rdzogs te// kun tu 'khor lo mthar phyin 'gyur// byams sogs ched med
282a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi rnams kyis// 'gro rnams thams cad nye bar gzung // shin tu dag pa'i gnas nyid du// bde ba'i stan la legs par gnas// yang dag dkyil 'khor bzang po dang // yang dag khrus kyi cho ga dang // yang dag mchod rgyan
282a3(rgyud 'grel): gtor mar bcas// yang dag phyag rgya sngags sogs ldan// thams cad yul kun rnam dag pa'i// byang chub sems nyid brtan pa las// thugs rje nyi ma'i mtha' yas zer// thams cad yul kun khyab par gsal// yi ge
282a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi 'phro 'du las// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen po// 'khor lo me 'od mtshon cha'i phreng // khro tshogs sbrul bcas tsham rngam tshogs// phyogs bcur bstan par bya ba'i phyir// hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya sngogs kyis bsrung // rigs
282a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge mtshan mar bcas// phra mo'i skur gsal 'phro 'du yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu byas te// gtum rngam khros pa'i cha lugs can// thams cad gcig tu sbyor ba'i mthu ste// dam tshig rgyal po he ru ka3
282a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis mthing ka'i mdangs// 'od 'bar dur khrod rgyan gyis brjid// khro rtags mtshan ma kun rdzogs shing // nyams dgu'i rngam brjid tshul dang bcas// spyan dmar mche gtsigs khro gnyer can// g.yas
282b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga gdengs// g.yon par snod bcung kha T+wAM bcas// klu rgyal brgyad kyis nyes mdzes shing // spu rnams rdo rje 'od 'bar ba// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spro// rdo rje phreng ba phyag rgya lnga// rdo rje phrang ba phyag rgya/
282b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dbu rgyan sems dpar bcas// gnas gsum 'od gsal drug byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor la gnas sku gsung thugs// phyogs bcur spro zhing bsdus pa'i mthus// byin brlabs gnas gsum brtan par 'gyur//
282b3(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i 'od zer rgya chen pos// rigs kyi khro bo kun bsdus te// rang gi gnas su brtan byas nas// 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// phyi nang mchod pa sna tshogs kun// rgya cher spro zhing dag par dbul// tshad med bzhi
282b4(rgyud 'grel): yi phyag rgya yis// sku gsung thugasu sbyor bar bya// ting 'dzin sems dpa'i mtshan ma la// sngags kyi 'khor lo spro zhing bsdu// oM shrI he ru kA hriM swA hU~M// mar me phreng ba 'khor ba'i tshul// yan lag rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos
282b5(rgyud 'grel): grub mtshan ma kun sbyin cing // yang dag byang chub bstan par 'gyur// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma
282b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmog su yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las dngos grub thams cad spyod// dngos po med par ba ga sbyor
283a1(rgyud 'grel): bas dan mkha' kun dang mnyam par spyod// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu bstan pas 'grub par 'gyur// spyod lam kun tu ma nyams par// rnal 'byor yang dag ting 'dzin gnas// rnam
283a2(rgyud 'grel): pa mang po yul bcas kun// thabs dang shes rab rol mo'i tshogs// bza' btung dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad tshim 'gyur cing // bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen la// 'gro rnams dag par
283a3(rgyud 'grel): nye bar sbyor// kun tu cha lubs chu zla bzhin// mgos chags pa med pa'i rgyal// thams cad chos rnams blang der med// bya ba'i lam rdzogs mthar phyin 'gyur// tshe 'dir yon tan chos kun dang // rigs 'dzin go 'phang
283a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par brnyes// thams cad sbyar ba'i rgyud chen po// de nyid nges par bstan pa'i don// phyag rgya gcig pa'i sgrub thabs mchog/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug/ legs par bsdus pa'i bsod nams kyis//
283a5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum thams cad bcom ldan 'angs// stobs mchog dang ldan he ru kar// yang dag nyid du grol gyur cing // dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po thu bo ra dza hastis mdzad pa rdzog s+ho//
283a6(rgyud 'grel): oM su pra tISh+Tha badz+ra ye swA hA/ dkra shis/
284a1(rgyud 'grel): he ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhugs
284b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra he ru ka sA d+hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po bde chen las byung ba'i// rigs sku ye shes
284b2(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi bdag/ dreg byed rgyu 'bras 'joms mdzad pa'i// stobs chen khro rgyal dpal la 'dud// yang dag grub pa'i las gzhung gis// bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi rim pa las// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// dgos don 'brel
284b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgo nas bshad// rtsod du sems can 'dul dka' zhing // log pa'i lam la gnas dag la// mdzad sbyong zhi byas mi 'dul phyir// khro bo'i phrin las bstan pa yin// de nyid sgrub pa'i gzhung dag la// log rtogs 'khrul pas bslang
284b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ nges pa'i gzhung don rtogs bya'i phyir// legs bsdus bstan pa bsal bar bya// 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rtsal ldan dog/ shes rab kyis ni blo phyi nas// nges par brtogs pa'i sa gzhi las// bla mas nges pa'i lung 'di
284b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan// snrums pa yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs can// de dag goms nas nyam su blang // grub pa'i dbang phyug phun sum tshogs// blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// bsgrubs kyang grub par mi 'gyuraro//
284b6(rgyud 'grel): phung byed gi nyig bsreg pas na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa min// dur khrod dang ni mya rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa ngag/ rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ khyi dang nang gi rdzas pas ga
285a1(rgyud 'grel): rang rgyud dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bgegs tshogs nye bar zhi bya dang // chags bsags bsrung ba'i don chang du// 'byung ba'i gtor ma gtang nas ni// gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams bya// bdag nyid rlung
285a2(rgyud 'grel): gri lhar sbyor bas// lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing // bdag dang 'gro ba sbya ngo byas nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i rnam par bsam// snying ga'i sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor mdun du bsam byas nas// rtse gcig
285a3(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis mchod sogs dang // 'gro don spyod pa rgya cher bya// rdo rje sems dpa'o la sogs pa// thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa yi// zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes byas te// bsnyen pa'i dus sku
285a4(rgyud 'grel): goms byas nas// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs par bya// de yang spyi dang so so yi// sgrub pa'i bye brag rnam gnyis te// bsdus dang rgyas la dga' ba yi// dbye ba gnyis shes par bya// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la/
285a5(rgyud 'grel): dmigaso pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// na mkha' grin dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// oM ma hA shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na sa b+hug Achos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cang su ma
285a6(rgyud 'grel): las// chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin med// mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i nga / oM d+ha ma d+hu saHa mr-i Na/ srad cig ma mos skye gnas te/ hU~M ni 'od par 'phros pa'i mthus// rdo rje rgya thams gzhi la/ rab
285b1(rgyud 'grel): dang bla re dang // phyogs bcur me 'od 'bar ba yi// mtshon cha'i phreng bas 'khor bar bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas nas// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'od
285b2(rgyud 'grel): zer tshul du sproso nas kyang // ma lus nyes par khyab byas te// re zhing rngam pa'i tshul du dgongs// e lAs mkha' dbyings glu gsum dkar// bzang po'i mkha' dbyings gyen bsgreng mra/ yaM las rlung dkyil gzhu yi dbyibs//
285b3(rgyud 'grel): dung kha sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha'// baM las chu dkyil dkar zhing zlum// bum pas mtshan pa mA ma ki/ laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi spyan la rdo rjes mtshan// khaM las Dik+ta'i dba' klong 'khyil// 'dod chags
285b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i rang bzhin rtags// kaM byung keng rus ri rab ste// rin chen rgyan spras rdo rjes mtshan// raM las me 'od dmar ser la// gru gsum gos dkar mkha' yi dbyings// de dbus bruM las gzhal yas khang // gru
285b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sgo dang sgo khyud can// rin chen thod pa sna tshogs dang // nyi zla rdo rje'i rgyan gyis mdzes// dkyil 'khor zla gam gnas pa la// re'u mig dgu pa rdo rjes mdzes// sna tshogs lha mo'i phreng ba dang // phan gdugs rnga yab rta/
285b6(rgyud 'grel): babs ldan// zhing 'phrul tshangs pa'i g.yang gzhi sogs// dur khrod rgyan gyis 'jigs par brgyan// rin chen ka gdung tog dang bcas// gdon yon sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes// dkyil 'khor phyi yis gnas brgyud du//
286a1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod shrIng dang zhing skyong dang // phyogs skyong rnal 'byor 'tsho dang sprin// klu rgyal la sogs gnas brgyud du// sha za 'byung po gshin rje dang // mkha' gro byA bI ro la sogs// ces spya pa rba sogs sgra
286a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byin cing // ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad// rang byung mchod rten dang bcas la// phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gnas// de dbus 'khor lo'i lte ba la// pad+ma drag byed nyi zla'i steng // dpal mchog dang po gnas gyur
286a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// sprul pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas mjed// chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na// dngos med mtshan ma kun dang bral// byang sems ye shes dang po'i gzugs// A lI zla dkyil gsal bar bsgom// byang sems
286a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gnyis pa'i brtags// de steng kA li nyi mar bcas// mtshan dang dpe byed gasngal ba'i don// mdzad pa'i 'phro 'dur bcas pa'o// de dag 'od du gyur pa las// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar po bum pa hUM gis mtshan//
286a5(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI a haM/ gdod ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// dang po rdo rje chen po yin// 'od zur lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs dbyings bzhugs pa las// 'od zer phreng mdzes brjid
286a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mchog/ de la sku mchog phyag rgya yi// sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sarba a/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra tas+t+waM/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems// mngon byang lnga yi bdag nyid do// dpal ldan rdo rje
286b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' che// dkaR+Sha dmar zhal lnga phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' can// dbu la rin chen phreng bas mdzes// lus kyi ba bu'i gnas rnams
286b2(rgyud 'grel): su/ dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyi bdir gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par gnas// oM na maHsarba tA thA ba/
286b3(rgyud 'grel): ta k+Sha ya b+hAk+Shit+ta gu Na karma badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba yi// gnas gnas hUM dang as brgyan te// ye shes rdo rje phaT dang bcas// rtse mo nor bu 'bar bas mtshan// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil
286b4(rgyud 'grel): can/ mdog si r+ya lci ba ze'u 'bru dmer/ sa ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas// dz+dzaHhUM bAM hos rol pa bya// oM pra be sha ya phaT/ a la lA la la ho/ bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes
286b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nas// 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid gsum sbyang // sku gsung thugs kyi rgyan gyis brjid// thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas// stong gsum til gang 'bru 'dra rnams// sangs rgyas drug gi gsung du 'gyur
286b6(rgyud 'grel): ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim// thugs ka'i gnas su zhugs pa dag/ bde ba chen po'i gnas nas babs// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i sems// sku dang bcas pa 'od du gyur// sngon gyi goms shugs lha mo bzhi
287a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul mdzad de// stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yong med mthu// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' bskal ga /
287a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal khyod bdang // ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud bskul nas// thugs rjes 'gro la gzigs mdzad de// 'bras bu'i sems dpa' snga ma bzhin// cho ga gsum gyi gsal bar byas// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje
287a3(rgyud 'grel): semasau dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas thaMng bsdu bar mdzad// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus la// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas rgyas// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par
287a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo los// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sred byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams
287a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni yang dag brtan pa bzung // sna yis dbugs ring dro ba la// rgyal ba'i sbyor ba'i phyag rgya 'byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje khro bor
287a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur nas phyung // oM shrI he ru ka sa ma ya heHsarba duSh+Ta/ sa ma ya mu dra d+hU pa b+haM dzaM ka hUM phaT/ snga ma las ni gnas byung ste// bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin// khrag 'thung mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i
287b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan/ 'byur ba chen po'i 'od zer can// zhal g.yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar// dbus ma mthing gnag nug po'i zhal// g.yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste// rgyab ma chags mdzad dmyur po'o// smin mtshams khro
287b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyer glog bzhin 'gyur// spyan gsum khyo gnyer mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal// dbu skra sma ra ser gnag mdzes// spu rnams rdo rje gyon du 'khyil// sgeg pa dpa'o 'jig su rung // rgod dang gshi dang 'jigs par byed/
287b3(rgyud 'grel): snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang // rdo rje ba T+Ta dril bur bcas// de 'ogro gnyis kyis 'jigs byed kyi// pags pa klubs kyi tshul du bskon// gsum pa gnyis na mang
287b4(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu// g.yas kyi bzhi pas dur khrag badzin// g.yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa ru// snying chen po yis bkang ba'o// la lar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i me 'od can// g.yas pa ba dan gsum pa phyag/
287b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar phreng can// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// thod pas gang ba g.yon pa na// 'bar ba chen po skra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// zhal
287b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // 'bar ba'i lta ba gar byed pa// rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'am 'tsho bar byed// gti mug dbang mdzad theg chen
288a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ glang chen ko rlon stong g.yogs mnabs// 'dod chags gzhan gyi rgol ba'i tshogs// tshar bcad stag gi pags pa yin// nga rgyal thugs rjes 'gro sgro la rtags// 'jigs byed chen po'i tshar ma/
288a2(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang gzung 'dzin rnam dag pas// gnas brgyad sbrul gyi phreng ba can// chags pa gnyis dang ldan pa yis// sku la rak+Sha'i thig les brgyan// phrin las sna tshogs mjed pa yis// thal ba'i tshom bus mtshan pa yin// byang sems
288a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ldan dri bral don// zhag gi ri mos spras pa'o// phrag dog sku gsung rgyan ldan pas// thong phreng thong dang sngar la thogs// dregs byed zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// nyi zla snyan gyi gong rgyan byas// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi//
288a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yIs// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// oM AHhUM/ thugs gsal nyi ma lnga gnas pa'i// ye shes sems dpa' hrIHdang bcas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor
288a5(rgyud 'grel): byA yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// lha mos bdud rtsi'i bum pas bkrus// thod phreng la gnas rigs lngas brgyan// lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yis// mdzub mo gnyis ni mdung rab cing // gung mo mthe bo'i rtse
288a6(rgyud 'grel): mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bsgyur// gteg nas khro gnyer lag bzhag ste// hi bcas dbang bskur sngags brjod bya// yab yum mkha' gsang hi dang bcas// rdo rje pad+mar bskyed byas nas// ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ba//
288b1(rgyud 'grel): baR+Sha yi dbus su bsgom byas nas// ling gu pad+mar byin brlabs te// khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs skye'o// byang chub sems de kun tu dgod// mA lus nye bar khyab byas nas// 'dod par bya bar rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dud zlog
288b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gzugs la gzung // gsang gnas so so'i gdon drag la// chos kyi snying po'i lha gnas bskyed// hrI las dpal chen he ru ka/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod// hrIHlas lha mo go rI ma// hrIHlas de bzhin tso
288b3(rgyud 'grel): mA/ d+b+hiHlas lha mo pra myo yin// d+h+r-i las bet+tA phyogs bzhir dgrod// mtsham su hUM phaT las byung ba yi// lha mo puk+ka la sogs bzhi// maM khaM yaM raM las byung ba yi// phyi rol mda' 'dzin la sogs bskyed// a A aM aH
288b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po las// lha mo me tog la stsogs rnams// dzaHhUM baM hoHyi ge las// sgo bzhir rta mgrin 'phang mtho sogs// b+ha gra la ni ling ga bzhag/ ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nas// khrag mthung 'dra ba'i sku gnyis ni// spro zhing rang
288b5(rgyud 'grel): la thim par bya// hUM badz+ra gu h+ya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo ge shwa r-i hUM/ gau rI dkar ser zhi ba'i mdangs// zhal bzhi phyag brgyad brjod pa'i stabs// g.yon brgyad gar gyis bzhugs mdzad cing // mnga' bzhin dus gcig bkang ba la//
288b6(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i mgo bzhi sbyangs pa ste// 'phro 'du dang bcas mdun du bzhugs// hUM hUM badz+raM tsaN+De shwa ri kha T+wAM gau ma hA badz+ra ka pA la mA la ku ru ku ru lU hrIHtsau rI dmar po drag po'o zhal// g.yon pas lcags kyu kha T+wAM 'khyud// g.yas
289a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gung mos rtsibs brgyad bstod// g.yas btegs g.yon stobs lho yi phyogs// hUM badz+ra nA rA ya ni dzAM// phra mo dbu gnyis gong ma pag/ 'og ma dmar po phyag bzhi pa// g.yas kyi dang pos rdor rtse lnga/
289a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi dang pos kham phor 'chang // 'og gnyis khu tshur so sor 'chang // 'khor lo 'dzin cing bteg pa'i tshul// g.yas brkyang stobs bcas nub phyogasu// rmongs tshul mdog dmor pad+ma la// hUM badz+rI ba tA ke dza/ pra ta mdag
289a3(rgyud 'grel): dmar pad+ma la// hUM badz+ra ba tA ke dzaM/ pre ta mdog dkar slong tshur gzigs// g.yas nas kham phyor bdud rtsis bkang // g.yon pa ba dan gsum pa mdzad// dga' bzhin byang gi phyogasu gnas// hUM badz+ra hA rau ni ma Ta/ puk+ka drag po gar
289a4(rgyud 'grel): byed tshul// bol bzhi brla dpung dkar ba la// lus bsgrubs nya bzhi dma' ba ste// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// g.yon pas dpag bsam lcug ma 'dzin// gar gyi gzugs thabs 'gyur dang
289a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas// me mtshams 'khor lo'i stan la gnas// hU~M badz+ra shU le gra b+hi ta ma taM// tsan ngan gyen du dbugs 'byin tshul// gzhan gyi srog 'phrog kha dog gnag/ g.yas paswa ra~M skyes rdo rjes mtshan// rlung 'byor rdo rje khu tshur 'jim
289a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas tri shUl gar dang bcas// bden bral 'khor lo'i stan la gnas// hUM badz+ra ki shits+tshin+da ma ta/ g+hasla ro ldan tshul du gzigs// ser nag g.yas pas ral gri 'dzin// g.yon pa me thabs g.yon brkyang tshul// ru
289b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshams 'khor lo'i stanA la gnas// hUM badz+ra pa mA la pU sheHta// ske sha kun gyi las mdzad ma// khrag 'thung dpal dang 'dra ba ste// g.yas pas rdo rje dung khrag gsor// g.yon gyis thod pa zhags par bcas// rdo rje kha T+wAM se ra
289b2(rgyud 'grel): kha/ dbang ldan 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// kun kyang thod phreng sbrul dang bcas// zhing lpags rlon pa gos su gsol// gdan ni pad+ma sna tshogs la// zhing dang nyi mas mtshan pa'o// he badz+ra ra ti paM/ mnga' 'dzin dkar mi mda'
289b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu// me mtshams phyogs kyi gru chab la// oM ma hA ra ta badz+ri ho// kha T+wAM ser mo kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje dril can bden bral mtshams// oM badz+ra lo tse ne ye ya// 'khor lo 'dzin ma dmar ser mo// rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa rlung gi
289b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// raM mAp+tA shrI badz+dzi hi/ sna tshogs bdUn ljang khu la// sna tshogs 'phan+da dril dbang ldan mtshams// a badz+ra puSh+pe/ mye tog ser mo me tog snod// rdo rjes mtshan pa bar khyams me// A bad+d+ha d+hU pe/ spros me ston mo rdo
289b5(rgyud 'grel): pog/ khyams kyi bden bral pade gnas pa'i// AM badz+ra I lo k+She/ mar me dmar mo rdo rje sgron// bar 'khyams rlung phyogs pad+mar gnas// aHbyATI grAt+te/ dri chab ljang gu dag byed 'thob// bar khyams dbang ldan
289b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar gnas// oM badz+ra a ku sha dzaHshar sgo rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar// g.yas na rta gdong g.yon lcags kyu// oM badz+ra pA she hU~M/ lho sgor phag gdong sngon mo ste// g.yas pas mche ba g.yon zhags 'dzin// oM badz+ra
290a1(rgyud 'grel): shri kha le baM/ nub sgor snang byed dmar me ni// phyag gnyis nyi zla lcags sgrogs 'dzin// oM badz+ra g+hat+ne hoHbyang sgor thal byed mdog ljang gu// sangs rgyas gzugs dang dril bu'o// lha mo 'di dag thams
290a2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang // rin chen rgyan dang na bzas klubs// sku mdzes khros pa'i rgyan cha badzin// sgo ba cung zhig 'gying ba'i tshul// kun mkhyen ye shes los grub phyir// 'khor lo'i lha rnams thams cad kyi// mig la sangs rgyas
290a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam snang mdzad// rna bar rdo rje nyi ma yin// kha la pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ sna la rta mchog rol pa ste// lus ni rdo rje ha ru kA/ yid la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas// gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing // thugs kar ya
290a4(rgyud 'grel): shes sems dpa' gnas// rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam// gnyis med 'od zer lcags kyu yis// slong ba dpal gyiso bskul mdzad cing // mdzes pa'i phyag rgya gyen
290a5(rgyud 'grel): du bsgreng // smin mtshams dbus su gtang par bya// dzoHhUM baM hoHshri he ru ka/ me hA badz+ra/ A ka Da D+ha ya/ A ka Da D+ha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to lA ya to Sh+ye ya/ badz+ra DA kaM nAM/ hr-i da ya hUM hUM phaT/
290a6(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+re sarba duSh+TAM sa ma ya mu dra pro b+han+ya kra hUM phaT/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can de ni slang dam tshig dgongs// gnas 'dir brtse phyir ga shegs
290b1(rgyud 'grel): mal// dz+nyA phyug rgyas g.yas nas bsko// gar ba swA thAl ldan gsum bajug// e d+h+ye haM thA ga d+hA sa/ ts+tshab b+h+yo/ rul chu rmAd+d+haH/ ar+g+ha h+nA dz+dza sh+yaho// sa ma ya sams m+b+ha/ dzaHr+m+mAHhU~M//
290b2(rgyud 'grel): ru kA/ e h+ye hi/ tr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM e a ra l+li ho/ hU~M hraM hAM/ dad pa dang nI dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang lus kyang // gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du
290b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol// thugs rje che la thabs mkhas pas// gdug pa gdul phyir gsheg su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon gsheg su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par las// sbrul
290b4(rgyud 'grel): pA mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs// thod phreng phyag rgya bcings pa las// g.yas nas rim bzhin bskor bar bya// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+re/ sarba duSh+TA na/ sA ma ya mu d+ha/ pra be shA ya/ shrI he ru ka hU~M phaT/ dzaHhUM baM ho/
290b5(rgyud 'grel): shrI he ru ka/ mahA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAnA/ sa ma ye mr-i tra/ pra b+han tsakrA shAM he ru ku hUM phaT/ pad+ma gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'drar// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas mu~M lus
290b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol// rdo rje thal mo bskyed nas kyang // sor mo bsnol te bskyod par bya// oM shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya haM/ sarba duSh+TAn/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pr-i b+han tsakra hUM/ kA ya bAk+Shit+ta/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ sems can don phyir nan
291a1(rgyud 'grel): tan mchog bskyed cing // ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog gi gnas// bdag la gsal zhing brtan par bzhugs gsol// rdo rje khu chur bcings
291a2(rgyud 'grel): pa las// mthe bong mthe chung so sbyor bsgreng // oM shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ sar+b+ba duSh+TA na/ sa ma ya daMSh+Ta/ a pASh+To pa ya hUM phaT/ che mchog mnyam sbyor 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// thugs rje khros pas gdug pa 'dul mdzad
291a3(rgyud 'grel): pagasang sngags rmad byung drag po'i phrin las rnams// lhun gyis grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// ngam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum ni// rim bzhin bcings te bskul bar bya// oM badz+ra gu h+ya tr-i sh+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra gu
291a4(rgyud 'grel): h+ya dr-i sh+ye sa ma ya ho// oM badz+ra gu h+ya dr-i sh+ya sa ma ya phaT// dam tshig sa la ba~Mzhes pa yi// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma bsrungs sam// grub pa'i mchog dag ma stsal la// sku gsung
291a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang 'gal ba'o// zhi bar gyur par gdon mi za// zil gnon bsrung zhing bsdig pa'i phyir// las kyi phyag rgya rnam gsum bcing // dzaHhUM baM hU~M/ shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+TAn/ sa myA ya mu dra/ pra b+han tsakra/ bak+Sha ya
291a6(rgyud 'grel): bak+Sha ya/ bi dz+nyA sa ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ he b+ha ga bAn/ pu tak+Sho pA ya hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugasu bdag sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha' 'gro'i cho gas bcas pas bsduso// /
291b1(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI ka rA mu ka sha ra yA ya nA maHoM shI r+yA ga sa ma yU ya na maHoM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra dzA lA yU ya na mUHoM shrI badz+re gan+d+he pra dzA la yA ya nA maH/ a tI b+hU te/ pra tI b+hu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ban da naM kA ro ya mi/
291b2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ye gI ni/ a la la ho/ oM bdag med phyogs bral don ngam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// nam
291b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i lus can gang yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srin byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad ma'i// phyi nang mkha' gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das
291b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgya gsol// sangs rgyas khro byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar
291b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang // rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// gos chen po dang klubs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi tshe// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po che// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin
291b6(rgyud 'grel): tu khro gtum gdug pa yi// sems can khams ni rnam sbyang zhing // 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgya chen dbang phyug mchog/ se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten bcos// lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs//
292a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa ba ngan gsum pa byas// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkhas las 'byin// g.yas dang
292a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba dbab pa'i gar byed pa// skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas lo// rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed sbyar bar bcas// shi ba'i ro ldang bsgyur
292a3(rgyud 'grel): yis// bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas// zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbug 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog go/ tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin
292a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsumo las rgyal// de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang // rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul bstan dang // dur khrod dag ni gor byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs pa bsreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgyar
292a5(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gnas// gzigs po rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzod de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog po/
292a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyab btab rmongs byed mnabasu gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhags// hUM a la la la la ho snang bar mdzod do// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol//
292b1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs kun+da las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus bdag la man bsdu gsol// nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyi mche
292b2(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'o// yi ge brgya pa dang ldan pa'i// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni// lha rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu// sngags dang sbyar te bskul bar bya// oM pa na pau/ pe nu su ra ta/ ti pu pa ra
292b3(rgyud 'grel): mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa mu ya/ yo gi sid+d+hi A hUM/ oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdza du gsol// mchod pa chen po
292b4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa thams cad grub par mdzod// a la la ste mched pa 'bul// a la la sde dam tshig bskongs// a la la ste dgyes par mdzod// a la la ste dngos grub stsol// dgyes mnyam
292b5(rgyud 'grel): longs skyeng mchog la rol// oM shrI badz+ra rA ga puSh+pe bu d+hU pe d+hu/ a lo ke hrIHgan+d+he gaM/ badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ badz+ra gI ti hrIHbadz+ra nr-i Ne aHa la la la la ho// bde bar gshegs pa khro rgyal gtso// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes
292b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi srid pa rgya mtsho mtha' yas kuni// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tang khaM ung+ga te/ s+pha ra NA ha~M maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad
293a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung / rang las ma byung gar yang med// gtsang med dri rtog kun bral ba'i// bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos// bdag sogs gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir// mnyam pa chen po'i rgyan chen po'i rgyan
293a2(rgyud 'grel): la Do la// o na maHs+yarba tA thA ga ta paM pany+tsa a mr-i ta AHhUM/ kA ya sid+d+hi aM/ bA ka sid d+ha AH/ tsit+ta sid+d+hiM hUM/ au shrI he ru ka i dan d+hu pe/ puSh+pa pe/ dI pa/ gan+d+he/ bi laM ta/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ shI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha kha/ khA tsi
293a3(rgyud 'grel): khA hi khA hi/ dzaHhUM paM hoH/ shI he ru ka ma hU~M badz+ra/ a bi shaM ya/ a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be shi yi/ pra tIts+tsha haM/ shre bAn kha kha khai/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ sgeg pa dpa' bo mI sdig 'jig su rung // rgod dang ga
293a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin// gir byas grub po rnal 'byor pa// gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che// zla ba la sogs snying po can// maM
293a5(rgyud 'grel): sa la sogs dro mchog stsol// me tog la sogs tsan+dan phreng // bzang dgur dbu lo bzhesu gsol// mi mo rnams kyi rig byi'o mchog/ byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM da
293a6(rgyud 'grel): phaT kyis ldan par brjod// oM shin tu brgyan pa'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog/ bkra shis dbyangs dang gar gyis bskyod pa yis// lha mo rdul snyed phyogs bcur spro byas nas// byang sems bde ba'i mchod pa'i rnams
293b1(rgyud 'grel): par rol// hUM hUM hUM/ ma hA su kha bo d+hi tsit+ta a la la la la ho// he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drangs te// dur khrod mchos
293b2(rgyud 'grel): gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying ste rA ra bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+haM rgya mtsho bskyil// mkha 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas rnams// ma lus bzhes nas mnabasu gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+re sarba
293b3(rgyud 'grel): duSh+Tan ma ma ya mu dra mA ra kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ hrid ya paM pa hUM phaT/ ngi ni zo byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral ba dang // gdul dka' ba dag gdul bya'i phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// dza dz+dzaHbaM ho
293b4(rgyud 'grel): shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+re sa me ya/ ma hA sa ma ya/ ma hA sa ma ya/ ma hA rak+Sha/ ma hA tsitA/ ma hA su ta/ ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta/ ma hA ar+b+ba pra tIts+tsha ho/ kha kha kha/ le le le hU~M b+h+yo hUM b+ho hUM b+h+yo/ ko ta sha ko ta sha/ ko ta ko ta/ pa sa
293b5(rgyud 'grel): pAr+Neki ra rA ga/ ko la sha/ ko lA ko la/ ko la bi/ ka la ba/ sh+tsa tha/ rnam dag sgrib sbyang srid gsum skyon bral zhing // ston ka'i zla gsal dr-i med zhal mnga' ba/ bcom ldan pad gshegs dri med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
293b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yab// shes rab lha mo rigs kyi yum rnams dang // phyag rgya gtum chen rngam pa'i tshogs la sogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi zhing rnams rdzogs// dgyes
294a1(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i dus kyi mchod par sbyar ba 'di// bzhes te a la la ste dgyes par mdzod// oM badz+rI I sa hUM/ pe sa hUM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dz+dzaHhUM baM hoHpra tId+hats+tsha baM hoH/ ya nas/
294a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid chos sku dag pa las// log rtog dbang gis sgro dang skur btab ste// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin// de bzlog don du rgyal ba'i dam mnos pa// rgyal po zho khro'i thugs dam ci 'gal ba// thugs
294a3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i ngang can rnams la bzod par gsol// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ khyod kyi thugs rje na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mkha' 'gre'i dkyil 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa yis// 'gro la brtser dgongs tshangs par
294a4(rgyud 'grel): stsal du gsol// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcad gtubs lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phrog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam mthong bas mod la 'tsho
294a5(rgyud 'grel): bA dang // gzi mdangs lus la 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis// 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khamasu snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rje rab gnas te// re smon thams cad dus 'dir 'grub par+ya mdza du gsol//
294a6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa'i sngags 'khor lo// lha rnams kun gyi gnas zhugs pa// yan lag rnam gsum ldan byas te// gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsam// dang po rten dang brten pa'i sngags// 'khor lo'i tshul ldan shes
294b1(rgyud 'grel): rab thabs// yi ge mtshan ma sku yi gnas// bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rtse gcig gnasu 'khor ba dang // las dang rgyu dang 'phro ba las// mchod bskul las mdzad bsdu byed cing // dkyil 'khor gsal
294b2(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur pa'o// las kyi spyod pa kun sbyor zhing // dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gasngal// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ thun mong gi snying po phrin las kun la 'jug po'i yi ge 'bru brgyad pa'o// so so'i las la snyoms
294b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug nas// rlung gi mtshon ma sngags dang bca so// 'phro 'dus rang gi las mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs ldan bzlas par bya// oM shrI he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya haM/ sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu d+ha pra be dza ka hUM phaT/ Sh+ya
294b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyi snying po rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// sngags gzhan rim bzhin+da gsal ldan pas// go rims 'khrul med bzlas brjod bya// las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul bya zhing // rang gi gnasu bsdu bar bya//
294b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes sku// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya// gzhan yang thig le 'am phra mo dge/ lho dang dkyil 'khor rnam dag gi/ mtshan
294b6(rgyud 'grel): mas dmigs pa sbyang byas te// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por gnas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas grub byed pa'i// tshogs kyi dga' bde'i long spyod kyis// rnal 'byor tshogs
295a1(rgyud 'grel): kun mnyes bya'o// rta mchog mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas pa// lhag ma'i mchod pas mAnyes byas nas// rang gi las la sbyar byas te// dngos grub don phyir mtshamasu bzhag/ gang zhig thun bzhi
295a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par// dkyil 'khor ngo nyid bsgoms pas ni// ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegasu gsol// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu// slar nyid sbyor ldan bsrung byas te// spyod lam rnal 'byor gnas par
295a3(rgyud 'grel): byad tshogs 'gyur spyod lam bya ba yis// dus kun tu ni 'gro don brtsam// sa steng 'gro la grags pa yis// 'gro ba thugs rje rnam dag ston// rnam bkod rgya mtsho 'khrugs 'dra las// bde ba'i grog lam don gsal
295a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// srin bus grong khyer gsal min yang // dman rnams don phyir cung zad zhig/ sgrub don dam pa'i gzhung gsal byas// grags sogs ngan rtog blos ma yin// thugs rje'i dgongs mdzad ji lta ba bzhin// ngal
295a5(rgyud 'grel): ba las byung nyi zer gyiso// khams gsum mun sogs ser mdzad nas// yang dag grub pa'i 'bras thob shog/ dpal he ru ka'i sgrub thabs zhes bya// slob dpon chen po hUM mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogaso//
295a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra si ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de lha rin po ches bsgyur cing bstan la bstan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka sA d+ha na/ bod skad du
295b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i sgrub b+hI thaH/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tsha lho// bde chen las byung 'gro ba'i mgon// ye shes sku rigs kun gyi dngos// rgyu 'bras dregs tshogs 'joms mdzad pa'i// khro rgyal stobs
295b2(rgyud 'grel): chen dpal la 'dud// yang dag grub pa'i las gzhung gis// snyen skyob bzhi yi tshul 'jug la// khra bo'i dkyil 'khor nam 'phrul bcas// dgos don 'brel ba'i sgo nas bshad// rtsod dus log pa'i stobs rgyas pa'i/
295b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul dka' rgyun srang shing me ltar// mdzad spyong zhi bas mi thul baR+Sha// thugs sbrul shugs kyis las bstan mdzad// de nyid sgrub gzhung phyag rgya'i tshogs// bdud rtsi bcud bral 'khrul rtog sbyad // des gzhung don
295b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod sgro bas lo// tshul gyis legs bsdus bstan pa dbye// 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor rtsal 'chang ba// shes rab don ni blo phye nas// nges par bstis pa'i sa gzhi la// bla ma nges pas lung 'di bstan// snum pa yi ni dam tshig par//
295b5(rgyud 'grel): ring 'jigs pa'i rtul zhugs can// dI dag goms nas ny+tsAmyas blang // sgrub po'i dbang phyug phun snam tshogs// zlo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'phreng byed gi nyi ga bsregs pas na// bas
295b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du bstan pa mon// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i pags pa dag/ rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur// phyi dang nang gi rdzas bsags nas// rang rgyud sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor
296a1(rgyud 'grel): pas/ bgegs tshogs nye bar zhi bya dang // tshogs bsags bsrung ba'i don ched du// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas ni// gsang ba don gyi las rnams bya// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyar la// lus ngag yid gsu
296a2(rgyud 'grel): mthu bskyed cing // gnas gsum 'gro ba sbyang byas nas// rang bzhin rnam dag lha yi sku// rnam gsum sems dpa'i 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor mdun gyi zla dkyil bzhag/ rtse gcig sems kyis mchod sogs dang // 'gro don spyod
296a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rgya chen bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor gsal zhing // rdo rje se gol gtogs pa'i mthus// thams cad 'dus pa khro bo'i sgra// thugs sngags mtshon cha'i tshogs sgo mdzad// rdo rjes gzhir ba gur// bla re mtshon cha me 'ong 'phro// 'khor
296a4(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba gdan bcas la// rigs kyi khro bo rab 'jigs pa'o// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra sa
296a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad kun la'ang khyab par bsam// chos kun stong gsal rang bzhin med// mi dmigs snying rje chen po'i ngang // oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
296a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis// mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas pa// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'od zer tshul du spros nas kyang // ma lus nye ba khyab byas te// re zhing rngam pa'i tshul du dgongs// e las mkha' dbyings gru gsum dka la/
296b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i mkha' dbyings gyen bsgreng nas// yuM lasna rlung dkyil gzhu yi dbyings// dung khwa sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha'// paM lAs chung kyil dkar zhing zlum// bum pas mtshan pa mA ma kI/ laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru ba
296b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma rdo rjes mtshano// khe lus dak+She'i dpa' klong 'khri la// 'dod rgyags chen po'i rang bzhin rtags// byang ke a ra rab ste// rin chen rgyur smras rdo rjes mnam// ra las me tog dmar sem+b+ha// grwa gsum ras mtshan gos da
296b3(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA b+has// dbus su b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // gru ban+de sgo khang sgo khyung can// rin chen thong ba sna tshogs mkhrugs// nyi Ta rdo rje rgyan gyis maHsa// pang gdugs rnga yab rta babs ldan// 'ad yon sna chags rgyan gyis mdzeste// dkyi
296b4(rgyud 'grel): na / sa/ sa sa
296b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyangs// dram thang shing dang shing spyod dang // phyogs stong na ra ma tsho rang sbyin// b+h+rUM rgya la dag gan brgyung du// shAzla 'byu ga shin d+ha dang // Sh+Ta b+h+yo ts+tshany+tsi langs sogs// snrung khrosags sgra 'dzin ci // cho ma cho
296b6(rgyud 'grel): la longs spyod mdzad// rang 'bru mchod rten dang bcas pa// phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gnas// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi lte ba la// kha gang na dregs byeng kyi zlab stong // dpal mchog dang po gnas gyur nas// 'khrul pa'i ting 'dzin
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas mdzad// chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na// dngos med mtshan ma kun rtog bral// zla dkyil A li gsal ba dang // nyi dkyil kA li gnas pa dag/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// mtshan bzang dpe
297a2(rgyud 'grel): byad gsal ba'i don// thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa las// 'od dpung kha dog sna lnga nyid// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar po bum par hUM gis mtshan// gdong ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings// dang po'i rdo rje chen po yin// badz+ra a haM/ 'od zer drub
297a3(rgyud 'grel): go 'phro 'du ba'i// dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs dbyings zhugs pa las// 'od zer phreng mdzes brjid pa'i mchog/ de las sku mchog phyag rgya che// sngags kyi 'khor los gsal bar byas// ma hA su kha badz+ra
297a4(rgyud 'grel): satwa/ hrIHhUM baM hoHsu ra tA ste/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems// mngon byang lnga yi bdag nyid do// bde gshegs rigs kun rdo rje'i dngos// nyon mongs dri bral chags pa'i bzhin// g.yas sngo g.yon dmar rgyab zhal ser// phyag
297a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rdo rje rtse lnga bsgyings// rdo rje kha T+wAM ba dan dril// 'og ma gnyis kyi mnga' dong gzhu// rin chen rgyan sogs na gza' klubs// thor tshugs mtshan dpe phyag rgyas spras// rdo rje rtse lnga'i cho ga ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtugs byas te// sngags
297a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bA krit+ta ku ma/ karma badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnams// dkyil 'khor dug gi rdul phran gnas/
297b1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlabs par bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rang rig 'od gsal phyag rgya yul// mkhril ba'i phyag rgya hUM las brgyan// ye shes rdo rje rtse lngas phaT// rin chen thur
297b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad 'bor bas mtshan// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can// mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar// si ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas// dza hUMHbaM hoHsa rol pa bya// oM pra be sha ya phaT// a la la la la ho// byang sems bde chen 'od zer gyis
297b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad nas// 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyang // sku gsung thugs kyi 'od brgyad brjid// thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas// stong gsum til gang 'bru 'bras rnams// sangs rgyas gsung gi yi ge'i
297b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim// thugs ka'i gnas su zhu ba dag/ bod chen gnas bdus rim bzhin bcas// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes// sku bcas 'od dpung kha dog lnga// sngon gyi goms shugs lha mo bzhes// phyogs
297b5(rgyud 'grel): byA'i nA nI bsgral mdzad ngo // stong pa shin tu rnal 'byo yod mod mthu// na mkha' bzhin du dam+b+ha tshig nye byar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhi su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal 'byor bdug/ ye shes
297b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyud 'tshul nas// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te// 'bras bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin// cho ga rdzogs pas gsal bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rjes gol gtogs byas/
298a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas rgyas// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi
298a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo las// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sna yi rtse ma
298a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs rings bro ba las// rgyal ba'i sbyor ba phyag rgya 'byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje khro bor bsgyur nas byung // oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duny+dzaH
298a4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya mu pa/ prA baM dzaM ka hUM phaT// snga ma las ni gnas 'gyur te// bskal pa'i me do pung 'khrigs pa'i tshul// dbu skra sma ra ser gnog brdzes// spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil// sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigasu rung // rgod dang ga
298a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// g.yas g.yon dang pos rdo rje dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// gnyis pa dag na 'jigs byed kyi// pags pa rlung gi tshul du bskor//
298a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas dbang bskur dbu rgyan chu// tha ma gnyis na dung chen khrag/ thod par sha chen snying gis bkang // dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar bsgyur// la lar zhal gcig zhal gsum sku// mthing gnag 'jigs pa'i me 'od 'bar//
298b1(rgyud 'grel): g+ha ya s+t+ra pa ba dan gsum pa phyag/ rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar phreng can// rdo rje kha T+wAM dril bu bcas// thong khrag gang ba g.yon pa na// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus lhur drug/ dur
298b2(rgyud 'grel): khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // 'bar ba'i lta byas gar byas pa// rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM gu/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed//
298b3(rgyud 'grel): gti mug dbang mdzad theg chen rgyan// glang chen ko rlon stong g.yogs mnabs// 'dod chagaso gzhan gyis rgol ba'i tshogs// char gcod stag gI shAm thabs yin// nga rgyal thugs rjes 'gro sgrol phyir// 'jigs byed rman
298b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yang bzhi gyon// zhe sdang gzung 'dzin rnam ngag pas// gnas brgyad sbrul gyi phreng ba can// chags pa gnyis spangs gnyis ldan pas// khyag gi thig les chom bur brtson// phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa yis// thal ba'i
298b5(rgyud 'grel): tshem bu'i mtshan ma can// byang sems gnyis dang mi 'bral don// zhag gi ri mos spras pa'o// phrag dog sku gsung rgyan ldan phyir// thod phyed thod dang se ral thogs// dregs byed tshogs rnams zil mnan pa'i// nyi zlas snyan
298b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi gong rgyan byas// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i spyod pa yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// oM AHhUM/ thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i// ye shes sems pa
299a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM dang bcas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// lha mo bdud rtsi'i bum pas khrus// rin chen dbu rgyan rtse mo tsag/ rdo rje phreng ba'i rigs dag dang // thod phreng la gnas
299a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs lngas brgyan// log pa shin tu brkyang ba yis// 'dzub mo gnyis ni mdud par bcing // gung mos mthe bo'i rtse mo mnan// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu bsgyur// bteg nas khro gnyer la bzhag ste// hi bcas dbang bskur sngags
299a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya// yab yum mkha' srang hi dang as// rdo rje pad+mo bskyed byas la// ling ga 'greng bya rang byung ba/ kharla yis dbus su gzhug byas te// dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba las// he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor bskyed// byang chub sem
299a4(rgyud 'grel): de kun tu dag/ ma lus nye bar sbyad byas nas// 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // gsang nas so so'i gdan dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// hi las dpal chen he ru ka/
299a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dgod// hrIHlas lha mo dkar mo ste// de bzhin hrI las rkun mo yin// d+hiHlas lha mo rmongs byed ma// d+hI las thal byed phyogs bzhir ro// mtsham suM hUM phaT las byung ba'i// spos byed la sogs lha
299a6(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi// maM khaM raM las byung ba lha mo bzhi// mnga' 'dzin la sogs phyi rol mtshams// a A aM AHyi ge las// lha mo me tog la sogs pa'i// dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi rnams las// sgo bzhir rta mgrin 'phang mtho sogs/
299b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha gA la ni ling ga bzhag/ ling la rdo rjer byin brlabs nas// he ru ka yi sku gnyis dag/ spro zhing rang la bstim par bya// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hi sarba duSh+Ta na sa ma ya mu dra pra paM dza ka hUM phaT/ dz+nyA dkar mo dkar ser
299b2(rgyud 'grel): lci ba'i mdang swA// zhal bzhi phyag brgyad 'jigs pa'i stobs// g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs par mdzad// mnga' bzhi dus gcig bkang ba la// tshangs pa'i mgo bzhi dbyangs pa ste// spro zhing bsdus pas bsha du bzhugs//
299b3(rgyud 'grel): oM bad+d+he gu h+ya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo gi shwa ridz+dza/ rkun mo dmar ser drag mo'i zhal// g.yon pas ljags kyu kha T+wAM 'khyud // g.yas pa'i gung mos rtse brgyad bstod// g.yas bat+teg stabs gnon lho yi phyogs// hUM b+h+rUM badz+rI tsaN+Da
299b4(rgyud 'grel): ri kha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+ra ka pA la mA la ku lu ru lU hrI dz+dza// rmongs byed mdog gnyis gong ma phyag/ 'og ma de mar mo phyag bzhi pa// g.yas kyi dang pos rdo rje gsum// g.yon gyi dang pos kham phor 'chang // log gnyis khu
299b5(rgyud 'grel): tshur ro la gtong // g.yas bteg stobs gnon lho yi phyogs// rmongs tshul nub kyi phyog skya'o// hUM badz+ra nA ra ya ni d+hId+d+haM/ thal byed mdog dkar spong tshul gzigs// g.yas na mthong ba bdud rtsis bkang // g.yon pa ba dan
299b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa'i gar// dga' ba'i bzhin bcas byang gi phyogs// hUM badz+ra pa ta ke dz+dza/ spos mo drag mo gar byed tshul// phal bzhi brla dpung dkar ba la// lus sbubs dmar gsal yan lag sngo// rdo rje rtse lnga dpag bsam
300a1(rgyud 'grel): shing na g.yas g.yon gar gyi 'gyur ba bcas// me mtshams 'khor lo'i stan la gnas// hUM badz+ra shu le gra b+han+da ma Ta dz+nyA/ ri khrod ro rtags tshul 'chang zhing // ser gnag g.yas pa ral gri 'dzin// g.yon pa
300a2(rgyud 'grel): me thab rdo rjes mtshan// g.yon brkyang rlung mtshams 'khor lo ston// hUM badz+ra ki shits+tsha ta ma Ta dz+dza/ kun spyod kun gyi las mdzad cing // g.yas pas rdo rje dung khrag gsol// g.yon gyis thod pa zhags par bcas// zhal bzhi mthing
300a3(rgyud 'grel): gnag gtso bo'i bzhin// rdo rje kha T+wAM se rAl kha/ dbang ldan 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// hUM badz+ra pe mA lo pA she ma Ta dz+dza/ kun kyang thod phreng sbrul mdung dang // g.yang gzhi brkyang te gos su gon// gdan ni sna tshogs pad+ma la// yi
300a4(rgyud 'grel): dwags nyi mas mtshan ma'o// mdA'e 'dzin dkar+ya mo mnga' dang gzhu// me yi mtshams kyi gru tshong la// hi badz+ra rA ti bid+d+ha/ kha T+wAM ser mo kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje dril can bden bral mtshams// baM ma hA ra ta bad+d+ha ho d+h+waM/ 'khor lo 'dzin pa dmar ser
300a5(rgyud 'grel): mo/ rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa rlung gi phyogs// oM badz+ra lo tse ne yaM ya dza/ sna tshogs pa ngan ljang gu la// sna tshogs 'pha ni dril dbang ldan phyogs// raM ma hA shrI badz+ra hiHd+hIHdzaHme tog ser mo ma toge snod// rdo rjes mtshan pa bar bya
300a6(rgyud 'grel): me// a ba dz+ra puSh+pe hUM d+d+he spos me sngon mo rdo rje pog/ bar khyams bden bral bang gnas pa'o// a badz+ri d+ha padz+dzaHdmar mo dmar me rdo rje sgron// bar khams rlung phogs pad+mar bcas// a badz+re a lo ke b+h+rUM/ dri chab ljang gu dag
300b1(rgyud 'grel): byed snod// 'thor byed dbang ldan pad+mar gnas// a badz+ra gan+d+he dz+dza/ shar sgor rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkaR+Sha// g.yas na rta gdong g.yon lcags kyu// oM badz+ra aM ku shi dz+dzaHlho sgor 'phags gdong sngon mo ste// g.yas pas mche ba gaman/
300b2(rgyud 'grel): zhags 'dzin// oM badz+ra pA shwe hUM dz+dza/ nub sgor snang byed dmar ma ni// phyag ginyis nyi zla lcags sgrog 'dzin// oM badz+ra shring kha le baM dz+dza// byang du thal byed mdog ljang gu/ sangs rgyas gzugs bcas dril bu 'khrol// oM badz+ra gan+d+he
300b3(rgyud 'grel): hoHdz+dza/ phyi yi lha mo bcu gnyis tshogs// rin chen rgyan phreng na bzas klubs// khro brjid 'dzum bag mtshan ma 'dzin// sgo ba cung zhig 'gying ba'i tshul// kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir// dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi//
300b4(rgyud 'grel): mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// rna ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// kha la pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ sna la rta mchog rol pa'o// yid la rdo rje he ru ka/ lus la rdo rje sems dpa' gnas// gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs gsal bas// thugs kar
300b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' gsum sngags bcas// rang rig dkyil 'khor spyan drangs nas// dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam// dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las// rdo rje se gol gar dang bcas// dpung mgor lan gsum bsdu ba'i rgya// gnyis
300b6(rgyud 'grel): med 'od zer lcags kyus dgug/ ye shes can gyi spyod yul con// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// sems can don slad dam tshig dgongs// gnas 'dir brtse phyir gshegasu gsol// mdzes pa'i phyag rgya gyen du bsgreng //
301a1(rgyud 'grel): smin mtshams dbus su gtang par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya ya/ a kan+d+ha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ toShA ya to Sha ya/ badz+ra DA ki nI naM/ hr-i da ya hUM hUM phaT/
301a2(rgyud 'grel): oM he ru ka badz+ra sa mi ya mu drA pra ba/ dza ka hU~M phaT/ pad+ma'i phyag rgyas g.yas nas bskor// gar thabs thal mos lan grwa sum gdab// ngad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku zhi ba'i ngang /
301a3(rgyud 'grel): las kyang // gzugs sku 'jo rdul bstan du gsol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// gdugs pa 'dul phyir gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dpal dang ldan// tshogs kyi slob dpon pA shweg su gsol//
301a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rtogs pa'i khyad pa ra las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn dzAHhUM baM hau// ru lu ru lu dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi d+hI sh+ya ho// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ye s+t+waM/ e h+ye haM a ru l+li ho/ hriM hriM hriM/ thod phreng phyug
301a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyu bcings pa laso// g.yas nas rim bzhin bskor bar bya// bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bskul ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas gshegs rnams bzhugasu gsol//
301a6(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn/ sa ma ya mu dra a ba~M sha ya/ a be sha ya/ pra be sha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rdo rje thal mo bskyed byas nas// sor mo bsnol bsdoms bskyob par bya// sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing /
301b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // mi gnyis don gyi dngos grub mchog gi gnas// bdag la stsal cing brtan par bzhugasu gsol// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta na sa ma ya mu dra pra b+han tsakra hUM phaT/ kA ya
301b2(rgyud 'grel): bAk+Shi d+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha bAdz+ra hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// mthe bo mthe bo chung bsgreng bar bya// hUM mchog mnyam sbyor 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// thugs rje khros pas gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// gsang sngags rmang byung drug po'i phrin las
301b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// lhun gyis grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol// oM shrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a ba staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ dam tshig phyag rgya rnam gsum ni// rim bzhin bcings te bskul bar bya// oM badz+ra gu h+ya tri sh+ya hos
301b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sa mo yo ho// oM bad+me gu h+ya tri sa ma ye phaT/ damra tshig s+ya la bzhengs pa yi// dpalnga chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang btsas// dam tshig tshul bzhin ma gshegs sam// grub pa'i mchog dag ma stsal na/ sku
301b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs lngas 'gal bar ro// zhig par gyur par gdon mi za// zil gnon bsrung zhing bsdigs pa'i phyir// las kyi phyag rgya rnam gsum bcing // dzaHhU~M baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn sa ma ya mu pra ma raM pra b+han tsaH
301b6(rgyud 'grel): bak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya/ bi d+ha sa ma ya bi d+h+waM sa ma ya/ b+hu ta k+She tri pra ti staM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sku gsung thung su bdag sbyar bso// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha' 'gro'i tsho gas bcas bsdus pa'o//
302a1(rgyud 'grel): oM shrI badz+ra ka ra mu kra shar yA ya/ na maHoM shrI badz+re kha T+wAM gA pra dzA lU yA nA maHoM shrI badz+ra gan+d+he pra dz+wA lA yA na maHa ti d+hA ho/ sarba ta thA gA ta/ ban+da nAM ka nAM kA ro ya mi/ ma hA yo gi ni/ a lA la ho// drAt+ta
302a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hu ho// smin ma g.yon pa 'jigs tshul gyis// ru lu ru lu bcas brgad 'dud // oM bdag meng phyogs bral don dang thugs chung cing // byams dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga'i yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus lus mi 'da' ba'i//
302a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzags byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshalo// na mkha'i lus can gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srid byams ma'i tshul gyis grogs mdzad cing // phyi nang mkha 'gro'i tshogs la phyag
302a4(rgyud 'grel): 'tsha lo// ha~M a ti b+hu ho// tshad med bzhi yi phyag rgya yis// gnyis su med par bstan byas nas// dmin pa'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis// rang gi de nyid las sbyor ba'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de
302a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la srung nam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyur gsal// sangs rgyas khri 'byung khro ba ni// thal bar 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon mo 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
302a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po snang // rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu khrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// gos chen po dang blugs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yos// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shin tu khro gtum
302b1(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa yi// sems can khams ni rnam sbyang phyir// 'di ni dpal ldan he ru kA'i// rdo rje rgyu chen dbang phyug mchog/ se ral khwa yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten bcus// lag pa g.yon par thod pa thogs// g.yas pa
302b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dan gsum par byas// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// na mkha'i kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bar
302b3(rgyud 'grel): baSh+Ti gar byed pas// skyil mo krung ni phying bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o// oM mahA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sa ma ya mu dra/ pra baM dzAM ka hUM phaT/ ma hA mu dra hi/ dkar mo thugs mchog zhi ba'i mdangs//
302b4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs tshul phyogs kun gar bsgyur zhing // mda' bzhi dus gcig 'phangs pa yis// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar byed// hUM badz+ra gu h+ya sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo ge shwa ro hrIHma hA mu drA hrIH/ rkun mo rgyas mdzad drag po'i bzhin// thug
302b5(rgyud 'grel): rje skyo bas 'gro gnas 'dren// kham sa gsum las rgyas gnon pa'i stabs// kun tu myur ba'i tshogs pa bstod// hUM hU~M badz+ra tsiN+Da shwa r-i kha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+ra kA la nA lA ku ru lu ru wA hrIM/ ma hA mu tra hU~M/ rmongs byed dbang gis chags
302b6(rgyud 'grel): tshu lo 'chang // zhal gnyis mthun pa'i stabs bcas pas// gnas gsum rnam dag sku gsum sbyor// bdud rtsi bcud ldan 'khor lo'i rgyu// hUM badz+ri a na re ya ni dz+haiM/ thal byed drag mo slong ba'i tshul// snod bcung bde ba chen
303a1(rgyud 'grel): po ra rol// ba dan gsum pa'i gar thabs kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dga' mngangs gsal// hUM badz+nyA pa ta ke dz+r-i/ ma hA mu drA hi/ sbos mo phrin las rnam 'phrul zhing // kun snang gsal bas drag pa'i tshul//
303a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rigs 'byung lnga yi mtshan// kun 'byung gar thabs 'gyur bar bcas// hUM badz+re hA r+ya ni phaT/ mA hA ru tI hA/ gtum mo 'dod bya'i las la brtson// gzhan gyi srog 'phrog 'gyur ba med// 'thor byed rigs kyi mtshan ma can//
303a3(rgyud 'grel): gar bcas rtse gsum dbugs 'byin tshul// hUM badz+ra shu le gra b+hin+d+ha ma Ta/ ma hA ru tra~M ha/ ri khrod chos nyid r-i myong bas// shes rab mtshon chas kun gcod cing // sreg byed rigs kyi phyag rgya 'chang // rigs kyi tshul gyis gar byed pa'o//
303a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM badz+ra ki shits+tshin+da phaT/ ma hA ru tra tau/ kun spyod tshul rnams kun gyis rol// dbyings dang ye shes chags pa'i las// stong gsum mi gtong 'ching byed pa'i// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i cha lugs can// hUM badz+re pai mA la pA sho phaT/
303a5(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ru tA hi/ byams pa'i mnga' 'dzin sgeg po'i tshul// ma btsos zung du 'jug pa'i gzhu// mnyam nyid 'phro bas kun brtson pa'i// rtse gcig phyin las 'gyur ba med// he badz+ra ra ti paM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ thugs rje sna tshogs khyab pa yi//
303a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrar bcas sku gsung thugs rgyal byed// gnas gsum las rgyung dag byed pa'i// yon tan kun gnas 'phrul pa'i mchog/ baM ma hA ra ti badz+re ho// ma hA ru tra hi/ dga' byed myur ba'i brtul zhugs 'chang // las rgyud gcod byed
303b1(rgyud 'grel): theg pa'i mchog/ zab cing rgya che kun tshul gyis// yon tan brgyad 'dzin byed pa'o// oM badz+ra la tsa ne yAM yaM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ btang snyoms sna tshogs phrin las sku// gzugs mdzes bskyod pa'i dgra dang bcas// dag byung blun
303b2(rgyud 'grel): las bsnyengs pa med// thams cad ye shes rnam spros pa'o// raM ma hA badz+ri haHma hA ru tA hi/ sbyin pa'i mchog rnams rnam par grol// gzugs mchog lha rjes me tog rgya// sa gzhi mdun rol g.yas g.yon bstod// sna
303b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs srung bar thor byed pa'o// a badz+ra puSh+pe/ ma hA ru tra hi/ tshul khrims dri mchog tshim byed pa'o// bdug spos legs par sbyar ba'i mchog/ g.yas bskor bteg ste phyogs bcur bsgyur// mdun du phyogs par sngo byed pa'o//
303b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+hU paM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ bzod gsal shes rabA tIng 'dzi ni// phun tshogs srel byed me mar rgya// kun tu bskor ba'i gar bsgyur zhing // thugs ka'i mtshan ma gsal ston pa'i// oM badz+ro A lo ke hUM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ brtson 'grus
303b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// chos kun dag byed byug pa'i dri// srin mtheb brang nas rtse gsum 'thor// phyogs kun dngos bcas rnam dag 'gyur// aHbadz+ra gan+d+he/ ma hA ru hI/ pad+ma ban+d+ha'i bdud rtsi bstod// myang ba rngub pa ltar byed cing //
303b6(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rdo rjer bcas// dgug po'i tshul mchog las grub bo// oM badz+ra oM ku sha dzeHma hA ru traM hrI/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i rgyu// sna yi myung ba rngub pa yi// rin tshon zhags pa gsol dka'i tshul// rang gi las
304a1(rgyud 'grel): la sbyor byed pa'o// oM badz+ra pA she hUM/ ma hA ru tra hi/ rdo rje lcags sgrog nyi zlar bcas// mig mtshungs zhen par lta ba yis// khams gsum kun la gzigs pa'i rgya// phyag rgya'i las kyi bstan byed pa'o// /
304a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra shrI kha le baM/ ma hA ru tra haM/ mtshams ldan sku mdog bdud rtsis bkang // thams cad bdag nyid myang ba yis// ston pa'i gsungs dbyangs kun tu sgrogs// thal 'jigs rgyad rnams slar 'tsho mdzad// oM badz+ra gaN+Da hoH//
304a3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ru tra hi/ gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa yo rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mching ston kun gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshur
304a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byed mnabs su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtsha' bde bar bzhugs// hUM a la la la la ho snang bar mdzod // rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig bdag la 'jug tu gsol//
304a5(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa ni ban bsu gsol// nyon mongs ma lus bsal bar mdzad// gsungs nas pad+ma rdo rje ya// sa bon gsang sngags 'phro 'dur bcas// rgyal ba'i gsung tshogs gnyis
304a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// rdo rje gsang gsum tshig 'don pa'i// oM suM b+ha gasta ma hA de bi hi ri mi ri shrI ye hi swA hA/ badz+re dzi swA hA/ oM bA ka badz+ra AHhUM do thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo gnyis kyi mche ba gtsig/
304b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin mya// yi ge brgya sngags ldan pa yi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgyas ni// lha rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu// rnam gsum mthu yis bskul bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las// mthe'u
304b2(rgyud 'grel): chung gnyis ni rab brkyang nus// so so'i gsang sngags sbyar ba yi// las kyi sngags bcas don sbyor ba'o// / lhag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ngag gis// 'dzub ma'i mthe'u chung mdzes sbyar
304b3(rgyud 'grel): te/ rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor mA kun gyi tshul// oM ba na baM na/ be nu su ru ta/ pu pA ra mu/ sarba ta thA ba ta/ sa ma ya/ yo ga sid+d+hi A hUM/ oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tsham/
304b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dam pa grub par mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzad du gsol// a lo la ste mchod
304b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'bul// a lA la ste dam tshig bskyongs// a la lA ste dgyes par mdzod// a la la ste dngos grub stsol// dgyes mnyam longs spyod mchog la rol// au shI ra ga bar+d+ha a puSh+pe pu/ a d+hu pa d+hA/ A lo ke hrIH
304b6(rgyud 'grel): ban+d+he badz+ri ra ti paM/ baM ma hA ra ta badz+re ho/ oM badz+ra lo tsa ne yaM yaM/ raM ma ha shrI hi/ a la la ho// bde bar gshegaso khro rgyal gtso// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyi// srid pa brgya mtsho thams cad kun// kun bzang mchod sprin
305a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu rolA// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ baM shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ung+ku te/ s+phA ra Na hi maM ga gA nA khaM swA hA/ oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'byung // rang las ma byung gang yang med// gca
305a2(rgyud 'grel): sle'i d+hi rtog kun bral ba'i// bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos// bdag sogs gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir// mnyam pa chen po'i rgyal la rol// oM na maHsarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta AHhUM/ oM kA ya sid+d+hi au/ oM bAka sid+d+hi
305a3(rgyud 'grel): AHoM tsit+ta sid+d+hi hUM/ oM shrI he ru ka i daM d+hu pa puSh+pa dI pa/ ban+d+ha/ ba liM ha/ pra tIts+tsha ho/ shI b+ha ga bAn kha khaM kha le le le/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka/ ma hA badz+ra/ a bau sha ya a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra
305a4(rgyud 'grel): be sha ya/ pra tIts+tsha haM/ shrI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sgeg po dpa' bo 'jig su rung ba dang // rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed pa dang // snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la sogs pa'i// sku yi dngos po shin tu bsgyur ba yin//
305a5(rgyud 'grel): gar byas grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che// bza' ba la sogs snying po can// maM sa la sogs bro mchog stsol// me tog la sogs tsan dan phreng // bza' dgur dbul gyis bzhesu gsol/ mi mo
305a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi reg bya'i mchog/ byin gyis rlobs shig rnal 'byor pa// sgrub pa'i rdzas 'di thams cad la// hUM dang phaT kyis ldan par mdzod// hUM shin tu brgyan pa'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog/ bkra shis dbyangs dang
305b1(rgyud 'grel): gar gyis mchod byas pa'i// lha mo rdul steng phyogs bcur spros byas pa'i// byang sems bde ba'i mchod pas rnam par rol// hUM hUM ma hA su kha tho d+h+r-i tsit+ta/ A la la ho// he r+yA ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnadu
305b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsang snying sti rar bcas// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas rnams// ma lus bzhes
305b3(rgyud 'grel): naswa bAsnamasu gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ma hA bad+d+ha sarba duSh+To sa ma ya mu tra ma ra kha kha kha/ khA hi kha hi kha hi/ hr-i da ya pi pA hUM phaT/ nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams ma lus bsgral ba dang // gdul dka' ma lus gdul
305b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir+ye/ sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// dzaHhUM baM ho/ shr-I he ru kA/ ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma ya ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+Sha/ ma hA tsat+ta/ ma hA ba su tA/ mahA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ mA h+ma ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha ho// kha khA khA/ le le le ho/ b+h+yo hUh+na
305b5(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo// ko tak+Sha/ ko tA ko ta ba sa pa sa/ ka ti ra ba/ kau lA k+Sha/ kro la ko lA/ ke la pa/ sha Da tha/ rnam dag sgrib sbyangs sring gsum skyon bral zhing // sten kAM'i zla gsal dri med zhal mnga' ba// bcom ldan bde ga shogs
305b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed pa'i yab// shes rab lha mo rigs kyi yum rnams dang // phyag rgya gtum chen rngam pa'i 'khor la sogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi zhing rab
306a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs/ dgyes shing rol pa'i dus mchod sbyar ba yi// bzhes te a la la skye dgyes byar mdzod// oM badz+ra I sa hA/ be sa hA sa ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ ru lu rA lu hUM b+h+yo d+h+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pra tIn+na ho// ye nas
306a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam nyid chos sku dag/ log rtog dbang gis sgra dang skur btab ste// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs ngo bor smin// de bzlog don phyir rgyal ba'i dam mnos pa// rgyal ba zhi khro'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje'i drung can
306a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams la bzod par gsol// bcom ldan dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka/ khyod kyi thugs na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mkhye' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa yis// 'gro la rtser dgongs tshungs par stsal du gsol/
306a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag dam tshig 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// bcang gtu bo lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // grib mas phyog pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa// sku yi phyogs tsam dran pas mod la 'tsho ba dang // gzi mdangs lus la
306a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa bye ba stong phrag gis// 'od kyis phog pas 'jig rten khams 'dir snang ba dang // lus ngag sems dang tshe ni rdo rjer rab brtan te// re smon thams cad dus 'dir grub par mdzad du gsol// rnam gsum sems dpa'
306a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi phreng // dkyil 'khor kun gyi gnas zhugs pa// yan lag rnam gsum spro bsdu yi// gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsam// rim gyis rten nyid rten sngags dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul ldan shes rab thabs// yi ge mtshan
306b1(rgyud 'grel): ma sku yi gnas// bgrang zhing grangs 'das tshogs spyod pa'o// rtse gcig gnas 'khor ba las// langs shing 'khrul 'khor 'phro ba dag/ mnyes skul lus mdzad bsdu byed cing // dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur pa'o// las
306b2(rgyud 'grel): kye sbyor ba kun sbyor zhing // dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsol// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ thun mong bsnyen pa las kun la// 'jug pa'i yig 'bru ba rgyang pa'o// so so'i las la snyoms 'jug las// rang gi mtshan ma sngag+sa
306b3(rgyud 'grel): phre ngo gnyis// 'phro 'dus rigs mthun las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs kyi bzlas brjod brtsam// oM shrI he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya hri sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya dra pra pa tsakra hUM phaT/ khyad par gtso bo'i snying po'i sngags// yi ge
306b4(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang rim bzhin sngags gsal bas// go rims 'khrul med brjod par bya// bzlas rdzogs mchod stong bskul byas nas// rang gi gnasu bsdu bar bya// gzhan yang thig le phra mo'i tshogs// dkyil
306b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha ni rnam dag kun// mtshan bcas dmigs pa'i las sbyangs pas// chos sku'i phyag gsal gyur bsgom// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas 'grub byed pa'i// dga' ba de'i longs
306b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod tshogs 'gyur bas// rnal 'byor longs spyod mnyes par bya// rta mchog mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas pa// lhag pa'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ rang gi las la sbyar bar bya// dngos grub don phyir mtsham su bzhag/ mnyam/
307a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog/ don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas bsgom par bya'o// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid
307a2(rgyud 'grel): med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thaM du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigasu yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// gang zhig thun bzhi la sogs par//
307a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bsgoms pas ni// ye shes dkyil 'khor gshegs gsol zhing // dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin du// slar nyid sbyor ldan bsrungs byas te// spyod lam rnal 'byor gnas par bya// tshogs 'gyur spyod mthun
307a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yis// dus kun du ni 'gro don brtsam// mgon mchogs steng kun grags pas// thugs rjes 'gro don rnam dag ston// rgya mtsho 'khrugs 'dra rnam log pas// ngos don rnar bkod pa'i sgo/ don gsal srin bus grong khyer
307a5(rgyud 'grel): min// dman sogs ma 'ongs gzung bya'i phyir// sgrub don dam pa'i gzhung gsal byas// kheng drag ngan rtog blos ma yin// thugs rje mchog dgongs mdzad bzhin// ngal ba'i dge sogs nyi zer gyis// khas gsum mun tshogs gsal
307a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur zhing // yang dag grub pa'i 'bras tho bo shog/ dpal he ru ka'i zla ba du slob dpon chen po'i hU~M gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ras ha dang / sgra bsgyur lo tsAb ma rin mchog gis bsgyur cing gtan la pha
307b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// // slad kyi lo tsa ba phyi ma dag gis sum thug tu zhu chen bcos pa'o// // bkra shis//
308a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag pani'i don snang bar byed pa bzhugs//
308b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tsi tu r+NaM gran+d+ha lo ka nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tsha lo// mkha' mnyam gsal ba gnyis
308b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i// yon tan rin chen sna tshogs bzhi// thams cad rang bzhin bde chen sku// bkod pa kun snang rol ston 'dud// bstan pa'i snying po dri med dka'// gsang don gsang ba kun gyi mchog/ bsdu zhing de don gsal
308b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i// mchog rnams kun la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud dag las// rim 'jug sgrub chen don bkod pa'i// tshig don rtogs dka'i rim pa dag/ rnam gsum dgu yi gzhung gsal phyir/ bsnyen
308b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub cho ga'i rim rgyus par// dngos gzhi dgongs mdzad sbrel bsdus pa// dam pa'i rjes 'brel mtha' gnyis bsal// gzhung bral 'khrul sogs dgag phyir bshad// bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs rgyas
308b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun dag bde ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid bzhin du bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas
308b6(rgyud 'grel): kun dag bde mchog go// rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin te// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye// yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs
309a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor bas// myi 'gyur dam pa grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs mA la sogs la// rnal 'byor 'gyur bar mi 'gyur gyi// byang chub sems la rab brtson
309a2(rgyud 'grel): nanade las rnal 'byor ltar 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad snang grol dbyings// kun gsal stong nyid zung 'jug dngos// rang bzhin ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen po mchog gi rgya// byang sems mkha' dbyings
309a3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa las// yon tan ma skul kun 'byung snang // sna tshogs snang ba'i sa ma 'grub// rtog spyod zhen chags yul las 'das// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyir sbyor ba// thabs kyis snying rje'i bdag
309a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid rnams// de bas do ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
309a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mchog yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyis sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yis// sems
309a6(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das 'byor de nyid ni// thams cad sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pas// sems can kun don rnam 'phrul nas// myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/
309b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das dus bskal pa rim bzhin du// log pa'i lam zhugs rnam drug pos// bdag gzhan gnyis ka phyung byed cing // dregs byed chen por gyur pa la// thabs gzhan dag gis mi 'dul phyir// sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po
309b2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs mdzad gsang ba bla ma'i mchog/ rnam 'phrul chen po bstan pa yin// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa la// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhug/
309b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni rlung byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che bu'i lha// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs mdzad mchog/ 'khor lo gsung ba'i rgyud chen dag/ rim bzhin brda' don gsal mdzad cing // des skyes phyag rgyas gtan la dpal// shes
309b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i dkyil 'khor gsal gyur nas// rten mchog gi ni don sbyar nas// yan lag bzhi snang bcu drug tshogs// rgyu rkyen tshogs 'bras mdzad bcas rdzogs// gang zhig yun rings sbyangs pa'i mthus// snying rje chen po'i goms
309b5(rgyud 'grel): shugs can// dang brtson lta bas blo gsal zhing // nges brtags dkyil 'khor dbang thob pas// smin lam rdzogs byed 'gyur med gnas// bla mas bsgo ba'i don bzhin sbyong // bdog gzhan don sgrub la mya la gnas// blo gros mchog
309b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur gsang ba'i snong // dkyil 'khor theg par ma bzhugs shing // dam tshig spangs shing gsang don rmongs// shes rab che dang snying rje bral// log sman gus pa med spongs bya// gang du 'bras bu phun tshogs shing // bden pa'i
310a1(rgyud 'grel): dgon pa nyams dgu' ba// gzhan dbang dgra yi tshur ma med// chu mchog shing gis mdzes byas par// kun tu sgo/ bskal bzang byor// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tsho/ dngos pa rnams/
310a2(rgyud 'grel): bder bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse mo rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'o// sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag gi mdo dag
310a3(rgyud 'grel): tu/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // pad+mo snyed mos 'tshal nyid du// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis// rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// mkhar ni rnam pas
310a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang // de bzhin chu ngo'i 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// yul 'khor yo byad brgyan bcas dang // cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gnas kyis gzhi mdzes byas te// sgrub
310a5(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu dbye ba las// sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bdag gzhan bya ba sna tshogs 'grub// gzhan don dmigs pa'i las la ni// slob dpon de nyid bcu sogs shes// chad ldan rang rgyud dag pa yis// dkyil 'khor dbang
310a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur sgrub pa dang // phul las tshogs bsags bsrung don du// bsnyen 'gro bsnyen pa rdzogs byas pas// sa gzhi sa bon la 'jug cing // yang dag dkyil 'khor rgyas pa yi// gzhung bzhin 'jug par bya ba ste// rtog pa sna tshogs
310b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'phros pa'o// bdag don bya ba de las gzhan// sa gzhi sta gon sngon brtsams phyin// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor babyas// lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing // bdag dang 'gro sbyangs byas nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i rnam par bsam//
310b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i rgyud sogs gsungs pa yi// gtor sbyin chen po'i cho ga yis// mgron tshogs bzhi po tshim byas nas// bsgo ba'i phrin las drag tu bya// phyogs bzhir bsrung ma'i stegs bu la// bsrung ba'i yi ge brtsams te bzhag/ yang dag
310b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gas dra ba'i dam can so so nas// 'du ba las ni ma gtogs shing // nyan pa las ni mi dbang ba'i// bgegs dang 'byung po thams cad kun// da lta nyid du so sor dengs// ji ste bka' las 'das gyur na//
310b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // rdo rje mtshon chen 'bar ba yis// gtan du brlag cing phung bar 'gyur// hUM badz+ra dza la raM yaM khaM tsakra bi shwa hUM phaT phaT/ thabs dang shes rab bsgrub pa pos// phyi dang nang gis bskang bshags kyis// rin
310b5(rgyud 'grel): chen snod mdzes dri yis bsgribs// rnam dag ris gsal ji bzhin pa'o// thugs ka'i 'od zer sgro bsdu yos// dkyil 'khor mdun du dbug bya ste// dga' chen dpal las byung ba yi// se grol dpung mgor lan gsum gtog// rdo rje
310b6(rgyud 'grel): bcing skyo'i se gol gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma dza hUM/ oM thams cad spros bral de nyid che// mkha' mnyam ye shes rtog med mchog/ gnyis snang so sor smin dgongs mdzad// thugs rjes smon lam
311a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs mkhas pas// dbang po'i gzhu bzhin ci 'dul ston// phyogs bcu'i rgya lnga sras dang bcas// lha mo dag mchog dam pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dgongasu gsol// dza hUM baM hoHoM e h+ye hi
311a2(rgyud 'grel): ma hA ka ru NI ka s+ya ma ya s+t+waM/ sna tshogs gar las byung ba yi// rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar// oM rdo rje rgyal po yon tan mchog/ byang chub mchog ston 'dren mdzad cing // nyon mongs mtsho skems sgron mas brgyan// thugs rje can+da la
311a3(rgyud 'grel): skyabasu mchi// phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sangs thub pa slas tshogs bcas// thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la// gus par phyag 'tshal skyabasu mchi// oM a d+hi b+hu hUM/ oM hriHhriHtraM hUM// mtshon cha drug gi tshul
