311a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ong+ga yIs// thal mo khA yI gnas su gtug/ oM na maHsarba tro ta hUM/ oM hriHhrIHtrAM ho// mchod pa so so'i rjes mthun par// lha mo gar bcas phyag rgya bcing // oM stong gsum mi mjed gnas 'di dang // gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i
311a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi// las kyi long spyod mngon rgyud dang // sangs rgyas yon tan snang ba yi// mchod rdzas bzang po khyad par can// dngos su sbyar tshogs sems kyis sbrul// me tog gzugs mdzes kha dog dang // dbyibs rnams sna
311a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs mtha' yas mchog/ bdug spos dri mchog khyad par can// so so'i rgyu las byung ba'i dri// mar me rin chen shing gi 'od // mun po'i tshogs 'joms gsal byed rgyun// dri mchog bzang pos sbyar ba chu// rnam rtog dri ma dag
311b1(rgyud 'grel): byed rgyun// bza' btung sna tshogs rgya lus byung // tshim byed ro mchog brgya ldan rdzus// yan lag brgyud ldan khrus pa'i rgyu// mchod yon tshul du dga' bde'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'bul na// mgon po thugs
311b2(rgyud 'grel): NAM kun gyis bzhes oM badz+ra puSh+pe oM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ki hrIHoM badz+ra gan+d+he he haM/ oM badz+ra nai bai t+ye traM/ oM badz+ra A ha ra hiM/ sman dang 'bru yi rnam pa dang // bla re na bza' rgyal mtshan gdugs// ba dan phreng ba sna
311b3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dang // do shal dbun rgyan sor bdub spras// dam pa rnams kyi longs spyod rkyen// bsod nams mthu las byung ba yi// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// nor bu rin chen 'khor lo'i mchog/ blon po dmag dpon
311b4(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo bza'// rta mchog glang po rin chen mchog/ rnam sbas nye ba'i rin chen bdun// bkra shis rdzas mchog bcu drug mchog/ bum pa bzang po rgyan la sogs// pa Ta'i phreng ba mdzes sogs rnams// dkyil 'khor kun la
311b5(rgyud 'grel): legs 'bul na// mgon po thugs rje can gyis bzhes// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ a laM ka ra pa na pe nu hUM swA hA// bo d+hi d+ha sha ra ta me g+ha pa ra na hUM/ oM sna tshogs gzugs mdzes sgra snyan zhing // dri zhim ro mchog brgya
311b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa// reg bya'i bde ba sprin phung bzhin// na mkha' gang bar byung ba dang // gang gzhan 'gro ba drug po dag/ lha tshogs lha mor bcas 'gyur bas// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs mdzes par// glu dbyangs tshigasu bcad pa dang /
312a1(rgyud 'grel): bro tsho Da kAr gyis bskyod byas pa'i// stong gsuM rdul snyed sprul byas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun la legs 'bul na// mgon po thugs rje can gyis bzhes// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te d+d+ho/ bi sh+ya mu khe b+h+yaH
312a2(rgyud 'grel): sarba tad khaM ud+b+ha te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga no khyaM swA hA// oM rigs lnga'i dam tshig rje sa chen po// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i dbyibs// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun grol zhing // rgyud lnga'i sems can bdud rtsi 'di// snying po tshim
312a3(rgyud 'grel): byed bcud kyi mchog/ byang chub sems sogs bde ba'i rgyun// ma lus kun gyi reg bya las// rol pa sna tshogs snang ba dong // snying gsum brtan g.yo'i dngos po dang // nyon mongs sgo gsum spyod tshogs dang // phung po khams
312a4(rgyud 'grel): dang skye mched kyi// gzugs bzang mchod sprin thams cad kun// sku lnga rigs lnga ye shes lnga// lha mo sras bcas ngo bo nyid// 'khor 'das snang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// sna tshogs dngos med byang chub sems// gnyisu med par
312a5(rgyud 'grel): 'bulo lags na// mnyam nyid blang dor med pas bzhes// oM na maHsarba pany+tsa rA sa ya na a mr-i ti hUM phaT/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha hUM/ brda med rtse gcig sems nges par// rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyar// hUM bdug dang mtha
312a6(rgyud 'grel): yas sems can gyi// mgo'i spyan sngar bshags pa ni// thog ma med nas dus 'di'i bar// mi dag las kyi dbang song ste// nyon mongs sgo gsum skyes pa yis// mi dge bcu dang mtshams meng lnga/ lha lo ge blo sbyar zhes
312b1(rgyud 'grel): log gis// rnam grol lam las gol gyur dang // nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongasna tshogs// shes dang mi spong gzhan gzung dang // 'gying dang bgyid du stsal ba dang // gang gzhan rje su yi rang bshags// mgon po rnams kyi spyan las
312b2(rgyud 'grel): du/ rang bzhin kha na ma tho sdig/ mi 'char rim bzhin nges bshags shing // phyis kyang mi byed sdom pa bzung // bcas sdom so sor thar pa las// rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa dang // skyabs 'gro mkhan sogs slob dpon spangs//
312b3(rgyud 'grel): dad pa'i dge 'dun dbyen sogs dang // log 'tsho nyes byas phra la sogs// tshul khrims zhig 'gyur las rnams bshegs// hUM byang chub sems sogs ma skyes shing // sdom po rnam par spangs pa dang // pha rol phyin
312b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhung nyams pa yi// log pa'i lam la zhugs pa dong // tshungs pa'i gnas nas bsdu ba bzhi// lam sogs sum cu rtsa bdun dang // ma 'dres 'bras bu mdzad par bcas// spong spangs sdig rnams dus 'dir bshags//
312b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsang ldan rdo rje che ge mos// rdo rje slob dben smod 'ga' zhing // lha spangs mched la 'khus pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya spangs pa dang // snod min gsang ba bsgrags la sobs// gnyis gsum nyi shu rtsa brgyad sogs/
312b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag che shas nyams las 'das// 'gyod sems nges par bshags par bgyi// oM nA maHkA ya bAk+Shit+ta sarbo pA paM shud+d+ha shud+d+ha hUM swA hA// 'das dang nga ltar ma byon tshogs// rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams kyi// dang brtson
313a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rab che bskyed cing // rgyu 'bras tshogs gnyis bsags byas nas// mdzad pa bcu gnyis la sogs dang // khyad par gsang sngags mdzad pa yis// 'gro rnams lam gnyis mdzad thob la// bdag gi rjesu
313a2(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ngo // lam gzhan 'phags pa rang rgyal dang // nyan thos so so skye bo yi// dge bsam sgom sogs gang spyad la// phrag dog med par rjes yi rang // phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// mgon po thugs rje'i dbang
313a3(rgyud 'grel): gis ni// 'gro ba'i mes pa bzhin ston cing // sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bar// dam chos btsun par mdzad pa'i che // bskul ba'i sa la bzhugs pa dang // dzA ltar tshangs pa'i rgyal tshogs kyi// chos 'khor 'gro ba'i don bskor
313a4(rgyud 'grel): phyir// gser gyi 'khor lo stong ldan phul// 'jig rten mgon la bdag gsol 'debs// rgyal ba bde gshegs bcom ldan 'das// thog ma 'di nas tha ma'i bar// mdzad pa rnam gsum mthar phyin nas// sku lnga ye shes chen
313a5(rgyud 'grel): paur ni// myur du sprul pa bsdu bzhed rnams// 'gro rnams kun gyi don slad du// bskal pa ji srid gnas kyi bar// gzugs mang sbrul sku'i tshul bzhugs shing // mtshan dpe chu 'phrul mi 'jigs stobs// bkra shis tshogs kyis
313a6(rgyud 'grel): brgyas mdzad cing // rtag tu nyi zla sgrib gsal ltar// snyoms mdzad 'gro ba'i mun sel mdzod// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal rgyu dang de nyid las// bsgral zhing thar pa byas nas ni// bde
313b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ldan par bya ba dang // bla med 'bras bu bskyed bya'i phyir// dang po thabs kyi bdag bskal nas// smon lam rdzu 'phrul dpag med dang // zhi gnas lhag mthong mngon shes sogs// thogs pa med par 'byung ba yis// myur
313b2(rgyud 'grel): du mthu stobs rtag gyur nas// g.yel med 'gro don brtson byed cing // thams cad dbugs dbyung byas nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas bkod pa'o// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
313b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / bla ma rdo rje lcam dral dang // dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dgongasu gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// skye ba 'di dang gzhan dag tu// dge rtsa spyi dang khyad par don// sngon gyi dgyis bgyid la rjes yi rang // ji ltar sngon
313b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi de bzhin gshegs// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs gyur pas// bla na med pa'i byang chub tu// thub mchog rin chen bskyed pa ltar// bla med yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub chen por sems bskyed de// rgyal ba rnams kyi rjes
313b5(rgyud 'grel): skyob// mdor na 'gro ba ma lus pa// sku gsum 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor drug gi sprul pa yis// rnam par rol pa'i don gnas bya// de las byung ba'i 'bras bzang mchog kun mkhyen gnas mchog snyoms mdzad pa/
313b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos rnams gang la'ang chags med de// byang chub sems dpo'i los chen pos// 'gro ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob shog/ sna tshogs snang brags rnam grol ba// dbyings na cho 'phrul dpag med/
314a1(rgyud 'grel): de yi cho 'phrul de nyid pas// na mkha'i mtha' ltar sngo dang bral// 'khor gsum yongasu dag par ni// mnyam nyid bde ba chen po'i ngang // thams cad 'du 'bral med pa yi// don nyid ngo bo lhun grub shog/
314a2(rgyud 'grel): rje khu tshur gnyis gzhibs te// mtheb chen bsgrengs nas g.yob par bya// oM badz+ra gan+d+haM muHrdo rjes thal mos lan+da gsum du// mi drug slad gnyis brdab par bya// oM badz+re tu sh+ya ho// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// mnya
314a3(rgyud 'grel): snyoms nyid du dmigs nas kyang // byams pa'i sems ni nyer gnas pas// sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dag gis// gdungs pa'i nyams thug gang yin po// de dag sdug bsngal med 'dod phyir// sems can grangs med
314a4(rgyud 'grel): skur sprul nas// 'od zer mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshogs// dpag med sprul pas don mthun tshul// byams po chen pos khyab par bya// rnam gsum snying rje chen po yis// de dge bde ba thob byas te// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga sogs
314a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// bde ba dag la sgrub bya ste// yod bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar// sems can grangs med skur sprul nas// 'od zer mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshogs// 'phangs med sems can kun la gtang // don ldan dga' ba chen po'i tshus
314a6(rgyud 'grel): reg pas 'gro ba'i bag cha gos kun// rim gyis byang sems la maM rnam bdun// myur bar byang chub rdzogs mthar phyin// sku dang ye shes phun sum tshogs// bkod pa'i yon tan dpag med snang // gzhir gyur btang snyoms
314b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i blos ngan pa'i mtshan rtags bral nas// gsal sems snyoms gnas bral ba med// rang bzhin byang sems mnyam pa'i dbyings// mi rtog ting 'dzin chen po yis// mtha' las grol ba'i sems nyid bskyed// 'di ni
314b2(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i gnas gzhi las// mchog tu gyur pa'i tshad med bzhi// snying po sngags kyis sgro byas la// rigs bcas 'od zer khyab par gnas// phyogs gzhan rtog pa sna tshogs kyi// rkang dang se mnan chogs dang // gsor bu shis
314b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i las// las kyi cho ga gzhan bstan pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'i// dpung mgor se gol brdabs byas nas// rdo rje bcings kyo'i se gol sgras// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa/
314b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun// dam tshig mchog gi gsang sngags kyis// til gyi glang bu bzhin du rgyus// shin tu gdug cong gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor pas// khro bAr
314b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// de nas sna rtse'i rtsom/ yid ni
314b6(rgyud 'grel): ra yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs rings dro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'byung // bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje khro bor bsgyur nas phyung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bas thal 'jig/ @#
315a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar// dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// 'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drug/ dur khrod
315a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma khro gnyer bcas par bsgyur// 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu lang dbang chen de dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje'i
315a3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar bcas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/ rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// thal bar 'gyur ba 'ang 'tsho bar byed/
315a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis lcags kyu ral kr-i ste// g.yon gnyis zhags pa thod pa thogs// 'og mya gnyis kyis mda' dang gAzhu// brkyang bskumya nyi ma'i gdan la gnas// de yi 'bar ba'i nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi zad pa// bskyed
315a5(rgyud 'grel): nas ma lus bdud la sogs// gdug pa rnams kyi khrag zla nus// rang sngags 'od zer g.yo ba'i mthus// shin tu bgegs mengs mthong nas// rdo rje sa gzhir sogs bsgom// 'khor lo me 'ang mtshon char bcas// 'dod pa'i
315a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po dregs chen pos// sum+b+ha ni sngags brjod cing // brjid gnon khro bo chen po'i tshul// phyogs bcu'i bgegs rnams bkug mdzad nas// pho mor bsnol te nyi mar bkod// so so'i tshogs bcas myos par mdzad// oM su s+thAn
315b1(rgyud 'grel): suM b+hU hUM/ gr-Ih+Na gr-ih+Na b+h+yAM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ in+d+ra ye dzaHya ma ye dzaHpA ru na ye dzaHgu be ra ye dzaHag+ne ye dzeHni ri tI ye dzaHbe ram+b+ha ye dzAHi shan ye dzeHtsan+na ye dzaHs+yAr+yA na
315b2(rgyud 'grel): ye dzaHsu ri ta na ya~M dz+dzaHa tI pa tA yai dzaH// ye shes tshe las sprul pa'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar mthing nag sgyu// rdo rje thod khrag ral gri zhags// tho ba lcags
315b3(rgyud 'grel): byu ga ya smA dang ga yon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i cha lugs brgya sa// oM bad+h+r-i ka d+hA dI dzA ya ts+tsha// han d+hu nA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ya m+b+han+na kAhU~M shwAd+d+hi phaT/ oM hrIk+Shu~MHhUM la b+h+rU~M yaSh+TAM/ Sh+TASh+mA la? b+hU phaT/
315b4(rgyud 'grel): kr-id+d+ha a b+h+yAM twAka?dz+nyA lId+hAb+h+yan+ta \u0f7f/ A~M badz+nye d+hAnAM m+nA dar+d+hab+h+yAM/ h+yA \u0f7f/ aub+h+yaHU AHs+yaid+d+ha/ b+hU Ta/ au badz+dzikr-Id+h+ma.a tash+tsAt+tiH/ oM bid+d+hikr-I d+hAH
315b5(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM/ b+hin+da d+hIn+do hUM phaT/ oM bidz+rI kro d+hi d+h+r-i ka ra hUM/ g+har+Na gaur+Ne hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha~M ma hA ba la b+h+rUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje bdud rtsi rna ma 'phrul pas// rdo rje tho ba phyag bsdams shr-Ing+tha// phyogs mtshams steng 'og bcwa
315b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// ringag gnas su nges par 'debs// oM badz+ra g+ha g+ha~M g+ha te ya sarba duSh+Ta na phaT/ badz+ra d+hi ro ad dz+nyA pa ya to/ kA ya bkr-it+ta/ badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkrol 'khor rnams// 'jigs pa
316a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha me 'od 'phro// rigs mthun khro bo'i 'khor tshogs dang // dbang bskur rigs kyi skus brgyan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs
316a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas brgyan// dril bu rgyal ma mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pas na// rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang //
316a3(rgyud 'grel): mar me dri la sogs par ldan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog sgrub// me tog dkar dang dmar ba dang // mthing ka ser po kun bsdus pa/ me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan
316a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga las 'phro// rgya skyegs mthong la ljang gu'i mchog/ tshon sna bzhi yis btsos pa dang // dkar po lnga yi phyag rgya dag/ snga ma bzhin du mnyam par 'gyur// khams las byung ba thams cad dang // srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te//
316a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim pa// snga ma bzhin du mnyam pa 'grub// tsan dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang // ga pur na kA la la gyi// bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gar dar dri dang gu gul dag
316a6(rgyud 'grel): sardza ga pur gla rtsi dang // rdzas 'di dag la btsos pa'i mar// me mar byas na snang ba skyed// can dan gur gum pri ka dang // ga pur dag ni gla rtsi dang // btsos pa'i bdug pa bsgrub pa ste// spos kyi phyag rgyas spos mchog 'gyur/
316b1(rgyud 'grel): kA ko lA dang sug sbrel dang // glu sgang ga pur gla rtsi dang // 'di dag zhib tu btags pa ni// seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar// shing rtsa pa tra lo 'dra dang // na le sham dang ga bur sbyar// hA sa ki ri shing mar gyis// smras pa kha si
316b2(rgyud 'grel): spos yin no// me tig dmar po sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa// 'jig rten dbang la kha dog dkar// ser po mkha' las byung ba la// tsan+dan bdug pa sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la du ru ka/ spyan ras gzigs la
316b3(rgyud 'grel): kA pi ta// lce spog rdo rje nyi ma la// mar me'i phreng ba sangs rgyas la// rdo rje can la mar me bdun// spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya// steng ni rdo rje nyi ma la// sangs rgyas rnams la tsan ngan spos// rdo rje can la gur gum
316b4(rgyud 'grel): yin// spyan ras gzigs la tsan+dan dmar// ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la// me tog kun dang bdug pa kun// de bzhin mar me thams cad dang // spos rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rdo rje rta la dbul du rung // sgeg mo dang ni na chung
316b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // mo sa dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang // gcig pu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra// g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te// lan tsha la sogs ro kun dang // ka ra la sogs bdud rtsi sbyin// bdag nyid kun gyi ro 'grub pa// sha dang chang du
316b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa yi// bza' ba sna tshogs 'grub pa ni// dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste// tshe yi dam tshig rab tu bsgrub// a mra smin dang rgun 'brum dang // ba na so dang nai le ka ra// a ka ru la sogs pa yi// 'bras bu'i
317a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya thams cad 'grub// ka ra sbrang rtsis byugs pa yi// a mra la sogs tshig gu byug/ ha sa ra ka ri mar sogs// mnyam pa'i dri yis sku bar bya// yung dang rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i// tshon gyis
317a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun par kha sgyur nas// shun pa grog la sogs byas// mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul ba// sha dang chang ni rnam par spangs// glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal
317a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa ngan dang // sha dang chang du bcas pa ni// gtor ma'i mchog ste tshogs pa'o// bdag gi phyugs te skal bzang po// rdo rje las ni dpal grub pa'o// bshos dang gtor ma dkar po dang // pad+ma me tog ldan pa ni// spyan ra
317a4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang gtso bo la// phul nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub// rgyal po kha zas la sogs pa// sha dang chang du ldan pa dang // glu dang sil snyan skal bzang dag/ rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul// kha zas kun gyi ro kun dang /
317a5(rgyud 'grel): sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang // sha yi sbyor ba sha skam dang // bshos dag rdo rje lha la dbul// gzhan yang bza' btung longs spyod tshogs// g.yos kyi ston mo mang du bsham// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs kun nas//
317a6(rgyud 'grel): spos chen sil snyan phreng thogs shing // gar do byangs bro thabs drug 'gyur rtse// gzeng bstod dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas spyod// hUM 'phags mchog thugs rje'i dus la bab// khyad par bstan pa'i dus la bab// dam tshig bskang
317b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus la bab// dngos grub stsal ba'i dus la bab// mthu chen mthu stobs bcom ldan 'das// dpal chen dbang bskur bcom ldan 'das// dngos grub mchog stsol bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi las rnams gang bsgrub
317b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'bras bu dus 'dir mchis par mdzod// a la la ho b+ha ga bAn/ sa maM ya ho/ sa ma ya ha/ sA ma ya s+t+waM/ oM ye nas rnam pa kun ldan pa'i// gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gsal la brtan pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
317b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med brda' yis mtshan mar bya'o// oM stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams kyi// skye 'gro rdul snyed gnas pa kun// bde gshegs lnga yi dkyil 'khor dbyings// phyogs dus
317b4(rgyud 'grel): kun nas tshogs pa'i lha// gnyis su med pas phyags 'tshal lo// hUM oM hri traM haM/ a ti b+hu ho// pra ti b+hu ba/ ta thA ga to gu ru pa ti a la la ho// lus ngag spyi dang khyad par gyi// gsang sngags brda yi phyag rgya 'dzin// byin
317b5(rgyud 'grel): rlabs mtshan ma gsal grub phyir// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid spyad par bya// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad du// dam tshig rtags kyi mtshan ma yi// dpal gyi chas brgyad rgyan dang bcas// 'khor
317b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyu rkyen 'bras bu rnams// thugs rjes rtsad nas gcod pa'i phyir// spyi dang khyad par rtags dag dang // don gyi sgo nas gzhom par mdzad// sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas// phung po dur khrod gzhal yas khang // dga' ba
318a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i glu dang gar// dngos kyang mchod pa'i rdzas su sde// dbang sgyur chen po'i ting 'dzin sogs// thams cad tshul bzhin byin brlabs te// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru las// 'bar ba'i khang pa rnam
318a2(rgyud 'grel): par brjid// rang 'od sa bon so so las// bkod pa'i rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor tshe// sku gsu thugs kyi gsang chen pos// bsgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlabs// kro d+h+ye shwa ri dag byed kyis// mtshan ma'i gnas kun spyad par bya//
318a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ldan pad+ma'i pho brang bu// 'chi med lcags kyu tshogs pa dag/ dpa' bo 'bru dgu'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad bdud rtsi byang chub sems// mchod dang gtor tshogs zhal zas rnams// kun bzang dkyil 'khor rnam par
318a4(rgyud 'grel): dgra/ oM ma hA badz+ra tsakra maN+Da la hUM/ hUM oM hi traM haM/ oM AHhUM/ ba oM ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri sarba tra ba pyaM sho d+ha ya AHhUM/ oM AHhU~M sarba pany+tsa a mr-i te hUM hri tha/ oM te dzo ba li te b+ha la b+hi taM gu h+ya sa ma ya swA hA// sngo so'i ting
318a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin phyag rgya dang // sngags kyis gsal bar byas nas ni// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas rnamasu// de dag so sor dgod par bya// dkyil 'khos 'gro rdzogs byas nas// bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi yis// las
318a6(rgyud 'grel): kun 'bras bu'i gnas sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// dang po chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun mnyam sbyor ba'o// oM
318b1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA nA badz+ra sA b+hA bA At+ma ka ha// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thams cad du yang khyab byas la// chos kur stong gsal rang bzhin med// mi dmigs snang rje chen po'ang/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu sa b+hA byA At+maH/
318b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' dbyings sna tshogs la gnas nas// cir yang gyur pa'i yig 'bru bsam// 'od zer tshur du 'phros nas kyang // ma lus nye bar khyab byas te// re zhing ngam pa'i tshul du dgongs/
318b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung mkha' dbyings gru gsum+b+ha dkarA// gyen pasgreng bzang po'i mkhar dbyings nas// yoM 'byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs// dud kha sra mkhregs sgrol ma'i mkha'// baM las chu t+pal dkar zhing zlum// bum pas mtsha
318b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mA ma kI/ l-i las gser gyi sa gzhi ste/ gru bzhi spyan ma rdo rjes mtsha no// khaM las sna tshogs can+da gyi mtsho// lcags ri mu khyung nor bus mtshan// sum las ri rab po rim lcog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyu las grub/
318b5(rgyud 'grel): lus me dkyil dkar sder 'bar// zur mangs gos dkar na mkha'i dbyings// sra mkhregs rdo rje'i gzhi'i steng la// kun 'byung 'khor lo sna tshogs 'bum// de dbus bum las gzhal yas khang // ye shes rin chen sna
318b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs brgyan// nang gi dkyil 'khor gnas rnamasu// re'u mig 'khor lo mtshungs pa brgyad// rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs kyis brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma gdan mis mtshan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim gnas brgyad du// dur khrod
319a1(rgyud 'grel): shing dang zhing skyong dang // phyogs skyong rnal 'byor mtsho dang sprin// klu rgyal de dag gnas brgyad du// sha za 'byung po gshin rje dang // mkha' 'gro bya khyi ro langs dang // ce spyang khros pa'i sgra 'byin
319a2(rgyud 'grel): cing // ro yi tshogs la longs spyod mdzad// rang 'byung mchod rten dang bcas pa// phreng ba rim gsum phyi rol gyi// ra ba'i mtshamasu gnas pa las// kun 'byung rgyan gyi mtshan spras pa'o// de dbus 'khor lo'i
319a3(rgyud 'grel): lte ba la// pad zla nyi ma'i gang na snyingasu// dpal mchog dang po gnas mdzad nas// 'phrul draga'i ting 'dzin mngon par ston// chos rnams thams cad rnam brtags na// dngos med mchen ma kun dang bral// zla dkyi
319a4(rgyud 'grel): A laM bcu drug bzhi// nyi dkyil kA lis brgyan pa'i 'od// 'phro 'du mdzad par bcas pa yis// nyis 'gyur mtshan dang dpe byad gsal// de dag 'od du gyur pa la// 'od dpung kha dog sna lnga nyid// hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga
319a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dkar po bum par hUM gis mtshan// thog mtha ma med pa'i dbyings// dang po rdo rje chen po yin// badz+ra a haM/ 'od zer lnga yi 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor drug gi las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs dbyings zhugs pa las//
319a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer phreng mdzes brjod pa'i mchog/ de las sku mchog phyag rgya yis// sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa a/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsu rata s+t+waM/ de dag ye shes byang chub sems// mngon byang lnga yi bdas
319b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid do// shel mdog kAr+t+ti 'od 'bar ba'i// ri bo nyi ma'i mdangs chags pa// bzhin 'dzum snum zhing nyams tshogs rgyas// chags tshul dar la bab pa bzhin// zhal phyag mtshungs bzhin sngo dmar ser// g.yas
319b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga 'bar// gAyon pa kha T+wAM dril bur bcas// 'og ma gnyis kyi mda' dang gzhu// rini chen rgyan dang na bza' dang // mgul du do shal dpung rgyanA dang // phyag zhabs gdu buM se mo do// mtshan dpe phyag rgya 'i mdze
319b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya ni// gnas lnga dag tu gtug bya ste// sngags kyis bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs sogs rnam par bsam// oM na moHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bkr-it+ta pu Na karma badz+ra sA dz+nyA ba
319b4(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko hi// lus kyi ba spu'i gnas rnamasu// dkyil 'khor drug gi rdul phran gnas// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+h+r-i tu swa b+hA nga At+ma ko haM/ rang 'ong yum
319b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khril ba las// gsang gnas hUM dang AHsa brgyan te// ye shes rdo rje phaT dang bcas// rtse mo nor bu 'bar bas mtshan// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can// mdog ser lte ba zo 'bru dam+bir// sau ma ya sogs brda
319b6(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa rol pa byaM// oM pra be sha ya phaT/ oM la la la la ho// bde ba chen po'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes mdzad de// 'gro ba'i lus ngag yid rtog sbyangs// sku gsung thus
320a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyan gyis brjid// stong gsum til gang 'bru 'dra rnams// thams cad 'od kyis slar bsdus nas// sangs rgyas drug gi yi ger gyur// ba spu'i bu ga kun tu thim// thugs kwa'i gnasu zhu ba dang /
320a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chen po dga' ba'i mes// sku dang bcas pa 'od du gyur// sngon gyi gom shugs lha mo bzhes// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul byas te// stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthu// na mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar
320a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ ye shes gsal ba'i rgyud bskul nas// thugs rjes 'gro la dmigs mdzad de// rgyu yi rjes mthun
320a4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i sku// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par 'gyur// mtshan ma rgyan sogs cha lugs dang // sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te// thams cad
320a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya// oM AHhUMHthugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'o// ye shes sems dpa' hUM sngags bcas// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis// las kun grub byed dngos grub
320a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// thugs ka nas byung lha mo bzhis// bdud rtsi bum pas khrus byas nas// gnas gsum dbang bskur dri bral byas// slar 'dus tshangs
320b1(rgyud 'grel): bug gnas su thim// mthe bo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyi sa stur/ lhag ma don po rgya// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// sor
320b2(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad nang du bsnol// rtse mo ngos rnams kun spyad nas// mthe bong rdo rjes mnan+da pa ni// sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste// grong bzhin mgo bo'i gnas lngar gtug/ rin chen thong phrong skur bcas 'gyur// oM a
320b3(rgyud 'grel): b+hI ShIny+tsa maM// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog/ dpung rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya// oM rat+na mA le u b+hi Shiny+tsa traM// dbu rgyan bcings pa bcings nas ni// 'gying zhing mtha' nas grol bar bya// oM pa Ta laM bA a
320b4(rgyud 'grel): b+h+r-i Shiny+tsa hUM/ dar gyis mtha' ma dbyangs pa ltar// byas nas thal mo brdab par bya// oM badz+ra d+hASh+ya ho// khams gsum dag ni rin chen gzhan// sangs rgyas rin+da chen lta bu med// sangs rgyus kun gyi rin po
320b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe/ dbu rgyan can ni de bas mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrog pa// lha yi chu ni dag pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu yis// rje su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i
320b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo rnams// dga' ba mchod pas gsal bar rjesu mchod byas pas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde grub mdzod// oM ma'o// mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i
321a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig rol cig ho// yab yum gsang gnas hUM dang dzaH// rdo rje pad+ma bskyed byas nas// ling ga 'greng byar rang byung ba// brla yi dbus
321a2(rgyud 'grel): su gzhug byas te// ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs nas// rdo rje sems sogs sku bstod do// byang chub sems de kun tu dgra/ ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas// 'dod par bya bo rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung //
321a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas so so'i gdan dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// hU~M las rdo rje sems dpa' ste// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gdan lo'o// dzaHlas dpal ldan bde mchog ma// hUM las e ma bde mchog ma/ baM las
321a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo snang mdzad ma// hoHlas de bzhin slob ma mo// 'di dag gtso bo'i phyogs bzhi yi// re'u cha'i gdan la rim bzhin gnas// oM las sangs rgyas byang chub ma// bruM las chos kyi 'khor lo ste// haM las khams gsum rnam
321a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal yin// khaM las 'dod pa kun mdzad ma'o// 'di dag shar la sogs pa yaM// raM mig 'khor lo'i rtse la gnas// oM las gling bu traM pi baM// paM las rnga chen rdza rnga ma// lha mo 'di bzhi me mtshams kyi// 'khor lo'i rtse la
321a6(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin gnas// a las me tog A spos me// aM las mar me a dri chab// 'di dag mtshams kyi gnas bzhi ru// rim pa bzhin du bskyed pa'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhi ru// rta mgrin 'phang mtho la sogs bskyed//
321b1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha gar lingadrug bcug byas nas// der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa AHdza hUM baM hoHsu ra tastA dza/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // thabs la
321b2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa'i phrin las kyis// 'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni// skye ba dag gi rigs yin no// bde mchog 'gying bcas gar mdangs can// g.yon pas gzhu 'dzin g.yas mnga' 'dren// rin chen phred mdzes gos rgyan klubs/
321b3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don dbyung spro// dzaHbar+b+ba tiSh+Tha sa ma d+h+waM// mo thAr phyin rigs mthun las mdzad ma// skur 'dus shar gyi gdan la gnas// e ma bde ba gser gyi mdog/ g.yas pa'i ling ga rdo rje mtshan// g.yon pa'i b+ha sa
321b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen snod// bde spos 'gying bcas lho phyogasu// hUM badz+rI kI li kA li trAM \u0f7f/ snang mdzad mar po gasra ba // sgo/ rdo g.yon dag gi/ 'gying bcas thod pa'i snod bdud rtsi// kha T+wAM ga brten nub phyogs gnas// baM badz+ri Ni sma ra ta d+hI// slob ma mo ni mdog
321b5(rgyud 'grel): ljang ser// g.yas kyis mnga' bcas bdag po 'khyud// g.yon pas dkyil tshul bdud rtsi'i snong // sangs rgyas sku 'dzin byang gi phyogs// ho badz+re kA me shI r-i traM dz+dza// kun kyang rgyan bcus zhi ba'i mdangs// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar
321b6(rgyud 'grel): chags pa bzhin 'dzum bteg pa'i mchog/ bdag po chags tshul bskul bar byed// sangs rgyas byang chub dkar mngang so ngam ro// tshangs pa'i mgo bzhis mtshan pa yi// mnga' bani dus gcig 'phen pa'i tshul// 'phro 'dus 'khor
322a1(rgyud 'grel): lo'i shar phyogs nas// oM aM ma du badz+ri g+h+raM g+h+raM dzaHchos kyi 'khor lo dkar mdangs ser// g.yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo la// 'khor lo rtsa brgyad gnyis brtsegs bstod// 'khor lo'i lho phyogs rtse
322a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// oM bar+d+ha me g+he gu lu gu lu bruM dz+nyA/ khams gsum rnam rgyal dmar skya'i mdog/ g.yas gnyis ti shul rtse gsum bstod// g.yon pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// gar mdzad 'khor lo'i bum phyogs nas// oM ma hA sha ra ta
322a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ri oM dz+dza// 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'i mdog/ phyag gnyis dpag bsna mo me tog shing // lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin// gar mdzad 'khor lo'i byang du gnas// oM khaM badz+rI shwe shi hUM hUM dz+dza// gling bu sngon mo rdo rje mtshan// sna
322a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sgra sgrogs me yi phyogs// e he ra ti badz+ra pi la sau ra~M tra Tad+d+he// pi baM ser mo rdo rjes mtshan// glu dbyangs drug ldan bden bral phyogs// he ra ti bad+d+he te te taM dz+nyA// rdza rnga dmar mo rdo rje'i rdo// brdung mdzad rlung mtshams la gnas
322a5(rgyud 'grel): 'o// he r+yA ti bad+d+ha hA se hA pa~M dza// rdzu dz+wa ljang gu r+dz+dza rnga la// rdo rjes mtshan brdung dbang ldan phyogs// he ra ti badz+ro N+yai t+yA be pa paM pa dzaM dz+dza// me tog dmar ster rdo rjes mtshon// gzhong thogs me yi mtsham su gnas// oM puSh+pe dz+dza/ spos
322a6(rgyud 'grel): me dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan// smrig thigs bden bral mtshem su gnas// oM badz+ra d+d+he po // mar mi dmar po rdo rjes mtshan// gsal 'dzin rlung gi mchim su gnas// oM badz+ra A mo ki d+hU/ dri chab sbrang sku rdo rjes mtshan// ngas
322b1(rgyud 'grel): 'thor dbang ldan mtshan su gnas// oM badz+rA gan d+h+ye d+d+he/ rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar mdangs can// lcags kyu rta mgo ljang gur shar// oM badz+ra AM ku sha dzaHphag gdong nag mo zhags pa g.yon// g.yas pas che ba lho yi skor/
322b2(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra pA sha hUM d+d+he/ snang pa dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis// nyi zla lcags sgrog nub kyi phyogs// oM badz+ra shri kha le paM dz+dza// thal byed ljang gu g.yas dril bu// g.yon pas ban d+ha sku bcas b+h+yAM// oM badz+ra g+haN+De hoHdz+dzaHlha mo
322b3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag mdzes pa'i mngangs// rin chen rgyan dang phreng bas brgyan// kun mkhyen ye shes las grub phyir// dkyil 'khor lho rnams thams cad kyi// mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// rna ba rdo rje nyi ma brgya// kha la bad+ma
322b4(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang phyug// sna la rta mchog rol pa mchog/ yid la rdo rje he ru k+Sha/ lus la rdo rje sems dpa'o// gnas gsum phyag rgya'i tshogs ldan zhing // thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// rang rigs dkyil 'khor spyan
322b5(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas// dbang bskur rigs kyi mtshan ma bsam// lag gnyis gar thabs bskyod byas te// g.yas g.yon mdun rol bskor bar bya// rdo rje bcing ba'i rgya gnyis pas// rdo rje se grol brdab par bya// dmigs med
322b6(rgyud 'grel): mkha' ltar dag pa khyab pa'i sku// spyan 'dren gshegasu gsol bar mi dmigs kyang // thugs rje'i ngang nyid chos sku dag pa las// ye shes sgyu mas rol cing gshegasu gsol// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' stobs bcu'i
323a1(rgyud 'grel): shugs ldan zhi ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos rnams rab tu rdzogs// dpa' bo chen po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// mkha' 'gro kun dang thabs gcig gshegasu gsol// thugs rje chen po'i sku mnga'
323a2(rgyud 'grel): gsung gnyis rdzogs// mi 'jigs thugs mnga' seng ge bskyod du med// gdug pa'i tshogs mang zil gyis gnon mdzod pa// bcom ldan 'gro la brtse slad gshegasu gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoHe h+ye hi b+ha ga ban// ma hA ka ru Ni
323a3(rgyud 'grel): ka/ tr-i sh+ya ho// se ma ya s+t+waM/ rdo rje gar las byung ba yi// dbu ko gzhug bcing dang pad+ma'i rgya// bde gshegs po brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang gis dgongs nas kyang // 'khor
323a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas gshegs shing bzhugs su gsol// oM A hUM/ k+Sha ya b+hukr-it+ta tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba ngan gsum par bya// sri zhor bcas shing bteg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sem
323a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam g.yos thal mo sbyar bar bya// sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil
323a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnon mdzad pa'i// rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// gnyis mod ye shes gnyis can rnams mtha' yas// snang stong gnyis med bide chen dbyings la rol// kun 'byung yon tan rtsol med lhun grub snang //
323b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung // mdzad pa rgya man 'grogs med kun grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pas bya ba kun rdzogs mdzad// sna tshogs sku sbrul rigs kyi sku gnas mchog/ zab cing rgya che gsung
323b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs rdo rje'i glu// ye shes zag med thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs// rin chen tshogs kyis legs spras kun 'byung zhing bdag gzhan spyod tshogs las rnams 'bras mthas mthar phyir// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i
323b3(rgyud 'grel): lha la phyag 'tshal lo// oM AHhUM/ a tI b+hu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta naM kA ro ya mi a lA la la ho// oM oM ti b+hA hUM/ ta thA ra/ ta sa ma yo ga sid+d+hi A hUM// skad kyi gsang ni mtho dman dang // gro 'gyur hUM las sogs pa'i glus
323b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gying la sogs pa'i tshul bcas nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// oM pa na pe na pe nu su ra ta/ di pu pa ra mu/ sarba ta thA ga ta/
323b5(rgyud 'grel): sa ma yo ga sid+d+hi AHhUM// gyen du 'tho dang thur du 'bebs// gsal me 'dregs sogs so so'i rgya// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // rgyud mang rgyang drug sil snyan brdung // dngos 'byor 'phrul pa gang yang rung /
323b6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// oM A hUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshags pa dam pa grub par mdzod // ngam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad
324a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par mdzod// a la la ste mchod par 'bul// a la la ste ngam tshig bskongs// a la la ste dgyes par mchod// a la la ste dngos grub stsol// dgyes mnyam longs spyod mchog la
324a2(rgyud 'grel): rol/ oM shrI rI rA ga hUM/ oM badz+re puSh+pe hUM/ AHbadz+ra d+hU pe d+hu/ A badz+re A lo kr-i hUMH/ A badz+ra gan+d+haM gaM/ oM he ra ti badz+ra bi la sin traT/ ha ra t+ya badz+raM g+hi t+ye te ta/ he ra ti badz+ra g+hi te te taM/ he ra ti badz+ra hA se ha ha be/ he ra ti
324a3(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra nr-i t+ye pe be pe pa dza/ a l+ya lA la la ho// tshad med bzhi'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor mdun bskul g.yo byas nas// dga' ba'i khams snyoms 'od dpung tshogs// ma 'dres so so'i gnasu bstim// hUM sems dpa'
324a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgos pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems
324a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po'i bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// ba dan gsum
324a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rtse lnga thugs kar gdod// kha T+wAM ba dan dril bskyod sgra// 'gyi ngo tshul sku yi gnas su brtan// lhag mthong thabs kyi mda' gsor zhing // zhi gnas shes rab gzhu yis mdzes// g.yas dang gas
324b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas nas// dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// oM ma hA su khA badz+ra satwa aHdzaHhUM baM ho/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ ma hA su tra hUM s+t+waM// zla ba'i kha
324b2(rgyud 'grel): dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad+mo 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// baR+Sha yi dbus ni dkar la dmar// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar rig pa'i dbyung
324b3(rgyud 'grel): phyug pas// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i 'od // pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad+ma la sogs
324b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pas so// mi mjed la sogs brgyan pas bzhin// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / dbrog pa dag kyang khyab par mdzad// bdag la 'khyud pa'i
324b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yis// yan+ta lag+na zlums cud 'phrog pa 'gru'o// dzaHbadz+ra d+hiny+tsi sa ma ke mA Ta/ ma hA mA TA hUM// rnam po sna tshogs dmachog chags// bde ba 'bab pa'i gar byed na// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog
324b6(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi lha mchog chen mo'o// hUM badz+ra kI li kI li hUM/ ma hA mu tra hUM/ se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad bcas rdo rje rgya raM mchog/ baM badz+ri Ni smA ra ra ta Ta/ ma hA
325a1(rgyud 'grel): mu tra hUM/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por grub// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// dbus kyi lha mo mchog chen mo// hoHbadz+rI kA ma shwa ri tAM/ ma hA mu tra hUM// gtsub
325a2(rgyud 'grel): lag ji lta'i rjes mthun par// dpal rdzogs rgya che gar dag gis// mnga' bzhi yongasu 'phongs nas ni// bdud bzhi las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// oM aM ma du badz+ri b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ ma hA mu tA hUM/ rkang pa bteg cing phab pa dang /
325a3(rgyud 'grel): bshig ste 'phang pa'i stabs ngag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya stong nas ni// khams gsum dag las 'chongs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra me b+ha gu lu gu lu bruM/ mahA mu traM hUM/ bya bi dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pa dag gis
325a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du// sna tshogs phyag rgya gar byed cing // khams gsum d+ha ba ni bsdu bar bya// oM ma hA shar da badz+ra oM oM/ ma hA mu tra hUM/ lcags kyus gang yang 'ung bzung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med
325a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rtsen nas ni// dpag bas mo shing dang yongasu 'brub// oM khaM badz+ra shau shor hUM hUM/ ma hA mu trahUM/ gling du len pa'i tshul ston cing // dzaM ltar 'bab pa'i ger byed pas// stabasu glu bcis bgyings pa'i tshul// yod
325a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog sngags kyis las mdzad pa'o// oM he ra ti ba la badz+ra bi na sa~Mn traT/ ma hA mu kr-itrA~M/ pi wa len pa'i tshul ston cing // dza ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// sna tshogs bsgyur cing 'dzin 'phrul// dga' dbyings bskur
325b1(rgyud 'grel): bas gnas gsum bskyod// he badz+re g+he te te te/ ma hA mu tA hUM/ rbang to/ tshul ston rnal 'byor pa'i// ji ltar dbab pa'i gar byed pas// sku gsung theg chen rgyad ston pa'i// phyag rgya gar gyis kun las rgyal// oM he ra ti badz+ra hA
325b2(rgyud 'grel): se h+ya ha baM/ ma hA mu tra hUM/ rdzo rnga'i tshul stan rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed cing // g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab blta ba'i bzhin// bzhi sbyor glu btsas kun bstan pa'o// oM he ra ti badz+ra nr-i te pe pe paM dzaHma hA mu tra hUM/
325b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i mchog gnas rnam par grol// gzugs mchog lha rdzas me tog rgya// sa gzhi mdun rol g.yas g.yon stong // sna tshogs spungs pa 'thor byed pa'o// he ra ti badz+ra puSh+pe/ ma hA mu dra hUM/ tshul khrims dri mchog
325b4(rgyud 'grel): tshim byed pa'i// bdug mchog spos legs sbyar ba'i mchod// gra yas bskor bteb ste phyogs bcur bsgyur// mdun du phyogs par sti byed pa'o// oM badz+ra d+hU pa ma hA mu tA hUM/ bzod gsol shes rab ting nge 'dzin// muH
325b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gsal byed mar me brgya// kun tu bskor ba'i bar bsgyur zhing // thugs ka'i mtshan myu gsa' la ston pa'o// oM badz+ro A lo ke/ ma hA mu da hUM/ brtson 'grus rtse gcig gyur pa med// chos kun dag byed byug pa'i
325b6(rgyud 'grel): dri// srin mtheb ring gnas rtse gsum 'thor// phyogs kun dngos ni bcos ngag 'gyur// oM badz+ra gan d+ha/ ma hA mu dra hUM/ pad+ma can de'i bdud rtsi bsngod// myang brngub pa ltar byed pa'i// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya rdo rjer bces//
326a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs pa'i tshul las grub pa'o// oM badz+re aM ku sha dzaHma hA mu drA hUM/ rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa'i rgya// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis// rin chen zhags bcas gsol ka'i tshul// rang gi las la sbyor
326a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// oM badz+ra pA she hUM/ ma hA mu drA hUM/ rdo rje lcags sgrog nyi zlar bcas// mig btsums zhon par blta ba yis// khams gsum kun la gzigs pa'i rgya// phyag rgya'i las kyis bsten byed pa'o// oM badz+ra shre kha le yaM/ ma
326a3(rgyud 'grel): mu dra hUM/ mtshan ldan sku mchog bdud rtsis bkang // thams cad bdag nyid myang ba yis// stong pa gsung dbyangs rgyun mi 'chud// thal 'jig rgyud rnams sgyur 'tsho mdzad// oM badz+ra g+hAN+Te hoHma hA lu dra hU~M/ rdo rje sems dpa' sku
326a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang dpal khyod bdag/ bdag cag bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// kye de bzhin gshegs po kuni gyi bdag nyid bde// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna chog bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul/
326a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog grub bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsil// dzaHhUM baM hoHkye bde ba chen po'i mchog kun gyi// bde bas zung la rnam
326a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'phrul par mdzod// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro slob ma gzung du gsol// mtshan ma'i yi ge pad+ma'i dkyil// kun gyi rtse la bsgom byas nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba yis//
326b1(rgyud 'grel): rang sngags chos kyi phyag rgyar bcas// oM na mo badz+ra sarba stu ta sarba bud d+he b+h+yaHhUM swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sbyor ba'i sngags kyi mthu ngag gis// las sogs mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med par
326b2(rgyud 'grel): kun la sbyar// mdzub mos mthe bo mnan nas ni// rang gi mthe byos mdzub mo min no// dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mug gi 'bras bur bya// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// khong skyong du ni byas nas su// gsang sngags
326b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sbyor bzhag ste/ r-i bzhin mtha' nas grol bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la yA/ badz+ra satwa te ne pa tiSh+Tha/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to sh+yo me b+ha ba// a nu rak+to me b+h+r-i ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yan+ne/ saH
326b4(rgyud 'grel): r+m+ma su tse mo/ tsiSh+TaM shre yaiHku ru b+h+yAM/ ha ha ha ha ha~M// b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+re mA mo muny+tsa bad+d+hi b+hU ba la hA sa ma ya satwa AHsrin lag mthe chung yan lag dbus// methe bo legs par bzhag par bya// do nas khu tshu bcang
326b5(rgyud 'grel): sa nA~M// mdzub mo legs par dgug par bya// gsang sngags la sogs sbyor byas pas// so so'i las la gzhug bya ste// las kyi phyag rgyu'i 'ching grol gyis// rang gi phrin las kun spyod pa'o// dman pa'i phyag rgya rnam
326b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhis// dngos grub sna tshogs las sbyor ba'o// bde bar gshegs bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// sid pa'i rgya mchi mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM na maHsarba
327a1(rgyud 'grel): thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu ge b+h+yaHsarba tang khaM ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM 'byung ba lnga las thams cad 'byung // rang las ma byung gang yang med// gla tsang dme'i dri rtog kun bral
327a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// bdud rtsi byang chub sems chen pos// bdag sogs gnyis med mchod pa'i phyir// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol// hUM ma hA su kho bo d+hi tsit+ta a la la ho a la la ho// oM mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam
327a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid mchog gi chos nyid can+da// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam pa med pa'i chos mchog can//
327a4(rgyud 'grel): oM yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnam
327a5(rgyud 'grel): nges par gsol// oM rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'o chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje'i chen po'i bdag nyid
327a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu rnam par snang // oM tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yis// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog tu gsol mdzad cing //
327b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yongs mi 'gyur// oM e ma'o// shin tu bzang po'i dngos grub mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na glo 'phyang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum rnams la rtag tu
327b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam po bdag la stsol// oM phyogs bcu na mkha'i mtha' klas par// sems can kun gyi don
327b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub la// ji ltar thugs kyi dbang phyug bzhin de nyid spyod par bdag gyur cig/ ji srid thog ma med dus nas// 'khor ba yi ni mthar thug par// de srid sems can phan pa nyid// mtha' yas spyod par bdag gyur cig/ sngags
327b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshul gyis sems can rnams// de tshe bdag gis dul 'gyur zhing // kun gyis rigs 'dzin gnas thob nas// de nyid mgon po mthong bar shog/ lha rnams kun gyi gnas zhugs pa'i// ye shes sems dpa'i sngags
327b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo// nyi zla rten dang brten pa'i sngags// 'khor lo'i tshul ldan shes rab thabs// ye shes mtshan ma sku yi gnas// yan lag rnam gsum ldan byas te/ gsal ba gnyis kyi sgo nas brtsams// bgrang bya las ni
327b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'o// rtse gcig gnas su 'khor ba dang // las dang rgyu dang 'phro ba las// mchod bskul las mjed bsdu byed cing // dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur pa'o// oM badz+ra satwa ma hA sa ma ya AHhUM swA hA// thun mong gi
328a1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa'o// so so'i las la snyoms bzhugs nas// rang gi thun mtshams sngags yig bcas// 'phro 'dus rang gi las mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs kyi gsal
328a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o// oM ma hA su kha badz+ri satwa AH/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra tA s+t+waM/ khyad par gyi snying po yi ge bco brgyad pa'o// sngags gzhan rim bzhin gsal ldan pas// go rims 'khrul med bzlas brjod bya// las rdzogs mchod
328a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod bskul byas nas// rang gi gnasu bsdu bar bya// thun mtshe ma ste gzhan du byasam bya ba// bzlas brjod khyad par phyed pa'i tshang // bzhi 'am drug tu rim bzhin bzla// kun bzang mchod pa nas brtsams te// de mthar phyin
328a4(rgyud 'grel): bu'i las rdzogs nas// glu gar dbyangs kyis dngos grub bskul// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par sgrub byed pa'i// tshogs kyi dga' ba de'i longs spyod kyis// rnal 'byor bcas
328a5(rgyud 'grel): mnyes par bya// lha rnams mnye sde shing tshim pa dang // las kun bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// las rnams ma lus bsdus pa yi// sbyin bsreg cho ga rgyas par brtsam// rta mchog mkha' 'gro 'khor bcasngo pa// lhag pa'i
328a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas nyes byas nas// rang gi las la sbyar bya ste// dngos grub don phyir mtsham su bzhag/ nang par dkyil 'khor mchod bstod cing // bskor bcas rgyun du bshags te gdon// ye shes dam tshig gnyis med bsdu//
328b1(rgyud 'grel): rdul tshon gtsang ma'i gnas su bzhags/ rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibasu ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyis bdag/ kun gyi bdag la gzhug par bya// chags pa med cing ma chags med// dbu mar
328b2(rgyud 'grel): yang ni dmigasu med// bud med kun gyi rgyu sbyor 'di// gnyis su med pa'i theg pa'i mchog/ mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor kun gyi gzhi// don dam bde ba chen po'i sku// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes kyi// lha nyid brtson pas
328b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// mdzod gnas dpa' bo gzugs brnyan mchog/ rin chen sna lnga'i phreng bas 'khrigs// mtshon gang zla nyi'i gdan la gnas// pho brang sgo bzhi gdan pad+ma// chos kyi snying po nyi shu gcig/ mnga' mangs 'khor
328b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i tshul 'tshong ngo // mi gsal gsal ba'i rnam par brtag/ 'phro 'dus rigs kyi skur rdzogs shing // rgyan chas chu lugs gsal byas te// rang gi phrin las spro byed pa'o// phyag rgya bzhi rdzogs dbang bskur ldan// ye
328b5(rgyud 'grel): shes dkyil 'khor gnyis med bstim// mchod bskyod las la bskul gsal 'grub// yun rings mtshan ma lnga yi mthar// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la dmigs to// kun gyi gos dra ba'i mdzod rgyas par// dmigs
328b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig bzhin gsal bar ru// brtan par gyur nas spro bar bya// rgya cher gnas gsum rdo rje la// bum pa'i khang par dkyil 'khor bsgom// rim bzhin gtso bo'i rnam pa gnas// 'khor gyi lha mo mthar thug par// dkyil
329a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gnyis med rdzogs pa'i mthar// mnyes mdzad 'gro ba'i don la sbyar// dpa' bo mtshan ma gsang gsum sngags// 'phro 'du'i phreng ba kun 'khor bas// 'gal med 'khor lo'i rnam pa bzhin
329a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas kun bar chad med par brtsam// smig rgyu du ba srin bu me// mar me zla nya'i 'di bzhin du// thig le rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i lam la sbyor// gnyis med rol pa'i mkha' bsang du/
329a3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i mtshan ma gsal gyur nas// bum par rten dang brtan pa'i lha// gtso bo nas gzung rim par bsgom// phyag rgya rgyan chas cha lugs kyi// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // phyag rgya bzhis mtshan yang bskur
329a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras// skye mched byin brlabs gsal bar bya// ye shes lha dang sbyor gnas nas// dman pa'i phyag rgya bzhi yis gdab// mchod bstod 'gro ba'i don spro ba// rim bzhin mtshan ma lnga yi bar// lha rnams kun sbyor
329a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas rgyas pUr// rnam gcig skul gsal ji lta bar// spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul brtan pa// phra rags dkyil 'khor mthar phyin pa'o// des na phrin las dngos grub kyi// phra mo'i las kun brtsams pas 'grub// de ltar
329a6(rgyud 'grel): thig le phra mo'i tshul// dkyil 'khor lha yi rnam dag gis// mtshan mas dmigs pa snang byas te// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por gnas// gang zag bzhi yis dbye ba yis// rang gi phrin las sbyor ba'i mthus// bskyen
329b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub yan lag bzhi rdzogs te// mchog gyur phyag rgya bzhi mthar phyin// bsnyen sgrub sbyor ba bzhi dag gis// dang po'i dkyil 'khor mnyes byas pa// spyi yi bsnyen pa dang po ste// thun mong bzhi yis dkyil 'khor yin//
329b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas// bar tshad med par zhi rgyas dbang // phrin las sna tshogs sgo dag nas// nye ba'i brten pa brtsam pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi las la 'jug/
329b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po zhi ba chen po'i las// rgyud sbyang bsrung zhing lhag gnas dang // dngos grub shis pa brtag pa'i phyir// rnam snang dkyil 'khor nye bar bsnyen// de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste/ phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom//
329b4(rgyud 'grel): nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyings dag ni// ri'u mig zlum lo 'khor los brgyan// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnar spras// snroDa pad+ma'i gdan gyis ma// phyi rol rab du khrod nga// kun 'byung la blo yu 'bri ma tshwa// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yi sems da
329b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// sku mdog rgyan cha nas bzung ste// byin rlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya// rang 'od rig pa bskyed pa nas// lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug brtsam// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i rgyud gzigs te// kham dang 'khor lo las
329b6(rgyud 'grel): byung ste// zhing oM bruM khaM gis bskyed pa'i// 'dul phyir rnam snang mdzad du gyur// gser mdog zhal bzho phyag bzhis mdzes// zhal gsum dkar dmar ljang gu'i mdog/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la// sna tshogs
330a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mas brgyan pa 'am// lhung bzed mkhar gsil chos gos dang // dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yi sbas// sku gsung
330a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing // dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du/ dzaM ltar rog
330a3(rgyud 'grel): pas mnyam sbyar nas/ mdzub mos mthe bo rtse mo bzhi// yongasu bsgyur te bteg nas su// dpral ba'i gnasu bzhag par bya// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM// rin chen myu gu 'khor lo'i phreng // dar dbyangs dgyes pa'i thal mor
330a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rang 'ing yum dang 'khril ba nas// gnas nas kham dang shi brgyan te// ling ga 'bar ba'i rin chen phaT/ rtse mo 'khor lo rnam par mdzes// rnam thar pad+ma e dkyil can// mdog ser lte ba ze 'bru dmar/ sa ma
330a5(rgyud 'grel): ya sogs brdas bskul nas// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa rol pa bya// ling ga 'greng ba rang byung ba// brla yi dbus su gzhug byas nas// ling ga mtshan mar byin brlabs te// rdo rje dbyings dug sngon kye'o// gsang gnas so so'i
330a6(rgyud 'grel): gang na ngag la// chos kyo snying pos lha rnams bskyed// kha~M las rnam par snang mdzad nyid// dbus kyi gdan la bsgom par bya// shaM las sangs rgyas dbyangs ma ste// raM las de bzhin dpa' mo ma// maM las kun tu
330b1(rgyud 'grel): bzang mo yin// tha ltas zad med snod 'dzin ma'o// 'di bzhi'i gtso bo'i phyogs rnams// pho brang pad+ma bzhi la gnas// haM las sangs rgyas sku ldan ma// cha las lha mo zhal mdzes so// traM las de bzhin sbyin chen
330b2(rgyud 'grel): mo// daM las na mkha'i spyan ma yin// gling bu ma sogs lha mo rnams// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas nas// der ni mtshan ma bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs
330b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o// oM b+hu khaM dza dzaH/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag/ gtso bo yab yuM la gzhug bya// sangs rgyas dbyangs mchu shel mdangs// rgyan mdzes lce yi phyag rgyas mtshan// oM
330b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra sar+b+ba d+d+ha/ dbul mi gser mngag phyag gnyis kyis// rgya lang 'khrol zhing gar mdzad pa'o// oM 'adz+reraSh+TA d+hi/ kun tu bzang mo dmar gsal mdangs// phyag gnyis rdo rjerin po che// oM badz+rad+harmam /
330b5(rgyud 'grel): blad med snod 'dzin sna tshogs mdog/ rgyun chos snod dang dud 'dzin pa'o// oM badz+ra karma thA d+h+waM/ 'di bzhi dbus kyi lha maM ste// phyag rgya'i sku dang 'khrig par bzhug/ sangs rgyas kun ldan ma long mdog phyag gnyis
330b6(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod thugs kar 'dzin// haM satwa badz+ra dz+nyAM/ zhal mdzes sngo skya phyag gnyis kyis// me long mngangs gsal rlung yab 'dzin// tshe badz+ra rit+to d+d+haM/ sprin chen bai DUr+ya mdog phyag/ rdo rje'i sprin las ser ba 'beb// te @
331a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma d+hA/ na mkha'i spyan ma gur bum mdog/ phyag na pad+ma la gnas spyan// daM bi shwa badz+red+d+he/ 'di dag phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// l+h+wa mo 'di dag mdzes pa'i mang
331a2(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dar phreng bas brgyan// byin rlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur// sbyor bas rang rig dkyil 'khor bskul// zhi ba'i tshul bcas mdun du gzhug/ rdo rje dpal
331a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi thal mo bsgyur// sam+b+ha bA gA yos pas phyag rgya'o// oM a tI b+hU oM// gar bsgyur rdo rje thal mo bsgyur// g.yon bskor spyi bo'i mtshamasu bzhag/ bskal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i gru// mchod pa thams cad
331a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// tshad med bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams gnyisu med par gyur// oM rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// srangs
331a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// de ni dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// btso ma gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab
331a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub po// rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de las theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yis// sor mo kun la reg pa ni/
331b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol tu phyin gsal yin// g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyas// sems dpa'i
331b2(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo krung bcas na// dpung rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// oM b+hu khaM ma hA mu dra oM/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas kyang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni// sangs rgyas kun brjod dngos grub rnams// ma
331b3(rgyud 'grel): lus lus pa med par 'grub// oM badz+ra satwa shaM ma hA mu tra oM/ de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dgag/ dpa' bo ma yis dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// oM badz+ra rat+na
331b4(rgyud 'grel): raM ma hA mu dra oM// pad+me'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin lag pa g.yon pas dag // byang chub spyod pa rab grub rnams// mya lus lus pa med pa 'grub// oM badz+ra d+harma maM ma hA mu dra oM/ rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur
331b5(rgyud 'grel): yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkang nas ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// oM badz+re karmA ma hA mu dra oM// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs na su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab
331b6(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// haM satwa badz+ra ma hA mu tra e/ bud med phyag rgya bcings nasu// lag pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma
332a1(rgyud 'grel): lus lus pa med pa 'grub// tshe badz+ra rat+na ma hA mu dra oM// rta mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni// thams cad dgug pa rab bsgrub pa// ma lus lus pa myed pa 'grub//
332a2(rgyud 'grel): traM badz+ra pad+ma ma ma hA mu tra oM// dpal 'grub spyan gyi khu tshur ying // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// snang ba thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// daM bi shwa badz+re ma hA mu dra oM// oM 'jig rten
332a3(rgyud 'grel): rten khams mang rdul phan snyed// grangs med khyab par spros pa yis// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab dag tu// phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab dag tu// phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen
332a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs// rnam 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs// rnam par 'phrul pas rol mdzad do// rnam par snang mdzad dpal sbyor ba/ a la la ho// bde grub mdzod// oM ru ru
332a5(rgyud 'grel): s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo ts+tsha ne sar+b+ba r+tha sid+d+hi ni swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par bzhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa po// spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas
332a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang // sngags bcas rim bzhin grol bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// bdag gi mthe bo nang du gzhug/ zhi ba'i las rnams bsgrub pa yis// phyag rgya sngags rnams mnyam sbyor ba'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod
332b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dag/ byin rlabs sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul// mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya// smon lam rgya chen btab byas nas// bzlas brjod thig le phra mo dang // dkyil
332b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor de nyid gaud+ha rung gis// mtshan mya'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// sgrib sbyang bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir// rin chen bum pa byab pa'i rdzas// sngags kyi pra ti me tog phreng // bza' btung phyag rgya bdud rtsi'i tshogs//
332b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyes mgron tshom las grub byed// tshogs dang sbyin sreg lhag mo'i las// las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing // rang gi gnasu bskus nas ni// mtshan ma kun dang yongasu grol ba'i// mnyam nyid dbyings
332b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// yod pa ma yin med pa min// dbu mur yong ni dmigs su med// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir// pad+ma gar dbang mchod byas te//
332b5(rgyud 'grel): chags bcas bsdus shing gzung byas nas// tshe yi cho ga rgya cher bya// gzhi yi ting nge 'dzin rim pa nas// phreng bas brgyan po'i bar du bsgom// nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs dag ni// re'u chu dgu dang pad+mas bskor// pad+ma'i
332b6(rgyud 'grel): lcug ma mu khyud mdzes// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan gyis mtshan// phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed// sku mdo
333a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cha nas bzung ste// byin brlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya// rang 'od rig ma bskyed pa nas// lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug tsam// thugs rjes 'gro la dmigs nas bzhengs// hriHdang pad+mo las byung
333a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha pad+ma ma ni rte shwa re hriHdpal ldan pad+ma grwar dbang phyug/ zla gsal shes mdangs zhal bco lnga// lnga bcu gnyis ldan mtshan bcas gar// zhabs bzhi mnyam pa'i pad+ma la// zla mdog dmar mdangs
333a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi pa// phyag g.yas nyi shu rtsa lnga na// pad+ma rdo rje sogs kyis mtshan// kha dog bdun ldan nyi shu lnga// rin chen sna tshogs brgyan gos klubs// mtshan dpe phyag rgya lnga yis spras// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye she sem
333a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sngags dang bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing // dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// mthe bong sems dpa' skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// lha ma rdo rje
333a5(rgyud 'grel): thal mo'i 'od// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di// rang 'byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hriHpadz+ra'i myu gu phyag rgya'i phreng // dar dbyangs dgyes pa'i thal mo bcas// rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba las// go sang gnas hrIH
333a6(rgyud 'grel): dzaHsa brgyan te/ pad+ma 'bar ba phaT dang bcas// rnam thar pad+ma a dkyil can// mdog ser lci ba zo 'bru dmar// brjes bskul byin brlabs rol par mdzad// ling ga bsgreng ba rang byung ba// brla yi dbusu gzhug byas nas// ling gi
333b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+mor byin brlabs te// pad+mo gar bdug sngon skye'o// gsang gnas so so'i gdan drug la// chos kyi snyid pos lha rnams bskyed// hrIHlas pad+ma gur dbang phyug/ gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la bsgom// dzaHyIs rnam
333b2(rgyud 'grel): paR+Sha gzigs pa ste/ hUM gis lha mo sgrol ma'o// baM gyis lha mo rgyan bcas ma// hoHyis khro gnyer chen mo'o// hUM gis gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma// he sa ni sna tshogs pad+ma yin// a las pad+ma'i na bza' ste// hoHyis 'dod
333b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang mo'o// gling bu mA la sogs pa yi// lha mo gzhan rnams snga ma bzhin/ b+ha gar ling ga bcug byas nas/ der ni hriMHyig bsgom par bya/ pad+ma gar dbang gzugs 'dra ba// sku gnyis ldan par spro ba'o// oM s+ya
333b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha pad+ma nirtaM shwa ri dz+nyA/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag/ gtso bo ya bA yum gzhug par bya// rnam gzugs dkar dmar mdangs ldan pa// g.yon pas pad+mar g.yas 'byed shar// oM sarba ta thA ga te ba
333b5(rgyud 'grel): mi dz+nyA/ sgrol ma dkar gsal g.yon dkur brten// ut+pa la sngo g.yas bud med lho// oM badz+ra pad+mi dz+dza/ rgyan can dmur mo g.yon pad dkar// ga yas+t+ra pas 'khor lo rtse brgya de nub// he pad+me pad+mi paM dz+nyA/ khro gnyer ljang bu
333b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa mthing // dkur brten g.yas pas rtse gsum byeng // ho pad+ma ni ra dza~M dz+haiM/ bde gtum dbang phyug mthong ka g.yon// pad+ma g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin// hUM pad+ma tsaN+De shwa ri hUM phaT dz+haiM/ sna tshogs pad+ma sngon mo g.yon/
334a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad 'dzin grayas 'khor lo// he m+ba hA b+hI shU pad+ma mu tre sId+hi hUM phaT dz+dza/ pad+ma'i na bza' ser mo ga yen// pad mthing g.yas pas chu sbyin rgyal// hrIHpad+ma pad+me hUM/ a r+d+ha/ rdo rje pad+ma dbang phyuH/
334a2(rgyud 'grel): ljang // g.yon+ya nA pad+ma g.yas rdo rje/ ho pad+me bI shA kra ma hUM dz+dza// 'di bzhi phyi rol pad+ma yi// shwar sogs rim bzhin gnas pa'o// 'od 'bar sna tshogs 'khrugs 'dra bcas// pad+ma rgyan btsas phreng byas mdzes// dbang bsdu
334a3(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs rdzogs byas te// dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan// sbyor bas rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskul// chags pa'i tshul bcas mdun du bzhugs// thal mo pad+ma kha 'bus bzhin// rang gi sbyor ldan snying gar ba
334a4(rgyud 'grel): mthe bo mthe'u rlung 'dragro ma bzhin// rgyas par 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// A~M a tI d+hU traMHgar bsgyur g.yas go yon thal mos brdeg// pad+mo gar gyi mchod pa 'bul// tshadang mod bzhi yo sbyor ba yas// lho rnams gnyi su med
334a5(rgyud 'grel): bya hrIHrnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gsheg sa// 'dod tshogs thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgyu dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa dag po'i phyir// shel gong bzhin du dag
334a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas rin chen rab tu sproso// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// bde ba can bzhin
334b1(rgyud 'grel): dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongasu bsgyur zhing gar byas pa// pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag ni chu rnams 'khor lo bskor// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// skyil m+bo klung ni cung
334b2(rgyud 'grel): mar bcas// oM swa b+hA ba bI shud+d+ha pad+ma nirti sh+tsa ri hrIHma hA mu dza hId+d+ha bi snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dmar po ci bdor gzung // rang gi snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul// g.yas pas 'ong ba ma kha 'byed pa'o// oM sarbo tA
334b3(rgyud 'grel): thA ga twA pad+me dz+nyAHma hA muM dra hrIHbstims pa'i lag pa gA yAMn pa yis// sgyel mo kru ni phyed mar bya// pad+ma sngon po ts+yai bder bzung // rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis// bud meng phyag rgya bcing bar bya// hUM bad+d+he pad+mi ma hA mu dra hIH
334b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgrims pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dkar po tsi bdUr bzung // 'khor lo'i phyog rgya bcings nis ni// chos kyi 'khor lho rab tu bskor// he pad+me pad+mi bi ma hA mu dr-i hU~MHbsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma
334b5(rgyud 'grel): mthing kha ci bder gzung // g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pa// dpal gyi phyag rgya ba ngan gsum// hU~M pad+mo ni ra dza~M ma hA mu dra b+hiH/ bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma dmar po ts+yai bad+mor gzung // g.yas pas rdo rje stod byed cing /
334b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag zil gnon 'jigs pa'i tshul// hUM pad+ma tsiN+De shwa ri hUM phaT/ ma hA mu tra hrIHbsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// sna tshogs pad+ma ci bder bzung // g.yas kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// khams gsum phrin las
335a1(rgyud 'grel): gnon pa'o// he ma hA bi shA pad+ma mu dre sid+d+hi hUM phaT mA hA mu dra hrIHbsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+ma mthing kha ci bder bzung // g.yas pas rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsteng bar bya
335a2(rgyud 'grel): hrihrIHpad+ma pad+mi hUM AHma hA mu dra hrIHbsnyems pa'i lag pa ga yin pa yis// pad+ma leb rgan ci bder bzung // rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyi// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// ho pad+mo shru tra ma hUM dz+dzaHma hA mu dra hrIHhrIHde bzhin
335a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad las// sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// sems dpa' pad+mo dga' bo'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i dga' ba
335a4(rgyud 'grel): bstan du gsol// a la la ho e ma'o// gar dbang thar pa'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje badzin pa'i bdag/ tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/ nyi zla bdag lags a la la ho// pad+mo sgyu ma dpal sna tshogs//
335a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mdzad dga' ba'i tshul dgar mdzod// pad+mo dam tshig sangs rgyas kyis// dbang phyug gar rnams mdzad du gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba dag/ thams cad da rung rnam par sbyong // pad+mo 'dzin pas mngon
335a6(rgyud 'grel): sum du// spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig/ oM tA re tut+tA re swA hA// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// gong ma mnyam pa rab tu bsgru'i// mthe bo mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad+ma dri med rab tu rgyas// rdeg pa'i khu tshur
335b1(rgyud 'grel): bcangs pa las// mthe bo dag lnga gung mo bzhug/ pad+ma'i khu tshur grub pa ste// thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod tshogasra dag/ byin brlabs sngags dang phyag rgyas dbul// mnyam med mi
335b2(rgyud 'grel): gla yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i phyag rgya mnyes par bya// smon lam rgyas gdab byas nas ni// bzlas brjod thig l-i phra mo dang // dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis// mtshan ma'i dmigs pa brtan par bya// pho brang bkra
335b3(rgyud 'grel): shis mtshan ldan du// pad+ma la gnas gsang ba'i ming // bdud rtsis bkang ba bsgrub pa'i mchog/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor phyag brgyar bcas// gsang sngags mtha' rgyan ma nyams par// 'phro 'du'i dmi gos pa gsal
335b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing // bsgyel tshig glu dbyangs phyag rgya'i gar// bza' btung tshegs bcas rol pas spyad// lha mnyes mgron tshom las grub byed// tshogs sgrub sbyin sreg lkog ma'i lus// las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul
335b5(rgyud 'grel): byes shing // rang gi gnas su bsduso nas ni// mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i// glanyis maud dbying su gnas par bya// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'dri// chags pa'i nyes pas mi dgos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhin
335b6(rgyud 'grel): dror gnas kyi nyes pas yongs mi gos// thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma'i tshogs skye bo ste// dpal dngo gzi mdangs kun grub pa'i// rgyas pa'i longs spyod dgod par bya// gzhi yo ting 'dzin nas bzung ste/
336a1(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom// pho brang nang gi mtshan bcas sogs// rin chen 'bar ba cha brgyad pa// nyi rim lte ba re'u chu dgu/ rin chen phreng ba mu khyud 'dzin// ka ba mchog brgyad rin chen rtog/ sna bdun
336a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i gdan gyis mtshan// phyi rol-i ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung khor yug tu bzhis mtshan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed// sku mdog rgyan chas bzung ste// byin brlabs sprul bas
336a3(rgyud 'grel): dag par bsgom// rang 'ong rig ma bskyed pa nas// lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug tsam// thugs rjes 'gro po'i rgyud gzigs te// taM yig nor bu mda' las byung // oM sid+d+haM b+ha baM sid+d+ha bu ba/ sad+d+ha bu/ sid+d+hi sma sod+d+ha shid ma hA
336a4(rgyud 'grel): bad+d+ha rat+na b+hA b+hUt+tA traM/ dpral ldan rdo rje nyi ma rgyul// gser mdog zhal bzhi phyug mdzes mtshungs// g.yas byas mnga' gsor g.yon gzhu 'dzin// mdzub bcas g.yon mig kye na du gzi gas// ga yas kyi 'gro mus ril gri
336a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin// g.yon pa pad+ma nyid dkyil la// rdo rje rje lta 'bar ba gnas// zhabs gnyis rgyal ba'i skyil mo krung // khro mapa sa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar byas mtshan// rlon chen sna tshogs rgyun dang gos// mtshan dang
336a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya lnga yis mtshon// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur zhing // bu la rigs kyi 'dag pos brgyan// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nas// mdzub gnyis
336b1(rgyud 'grel): mnyam ste phyi ru dgu/ mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang // rdo rje nor bu dpral bar bzhag/ oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ rin chen smyu gu'i phyag rgya phreng // dar dbyangs dges pa'i thal mor bcas// rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba las// gsung
336b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas hrIHdang aHsa brgya te/ rin chen par phaT phaT dang bcas// brdas bskul gnyis med rol pa mdzod// lding gi bgreng ba rang 'byung ba// baR+YA yi dbus su gzhug byas nas// ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te// rdo rje nyi mar
336b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag sngon bskyed// gsang gnas so so'i gdan dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// traM las rdo rje nyi ma ste// gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan pa'o// dzaHlas lha mo dbang bskur ma// hUM gis lha mo gter ldan mchog/ baM las
336b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu lnga mtshan mochog ldan te// ho las lha mo mchod chen mo// de bzhin oM las mnga' 'dzin rgya lI// hrI las ral gri 'dzin ma yin/ he yis lha myo nyi ma ste// hUM las rdo rje me mA'o// lhag pa'i lha mo gling sogs rnams// rdo rje sems
336b5(rgyud 'grel): dpopa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas ni// der ni taM yig bsgom par bya// rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs 'dra ba// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// oM sid+d+ha b+h+ya sid+d+ha b+hU sid+d+h+ya sa ya sid+d+ha shAM/ ma hA badz+ra rat+na b+hA ba ta t+te tAM dz+dza/ phyog
336b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur don mdzad 'dus pa dag/ gtso bo yab yum la gzhug bya// lha mo dbang bskur dkar gsal mngangs// dbu rgyan rtse lnga bum pa'i chu// badz+re sitwa dza dz+dza/ gter ldan se ri mo phyag gnyis ni// rin chen gter gyi bum pa thogs//
337a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra rat+na hUM dz+dza/ rgyal mtshan mchog ldan dmar ba'i mdangs// rgyal mtshan rin chen tog bcas 'dzin// badz+rI rat+na ma baM dz+dza/ mchod chen ljang sngon rin chen snod // rin chen mchog rdzas gang ba 'adz+ri madz+ra /
337a2(rgyud 'grel): de dag gaH'i phyogs bzhi yau// re'u tshwa'i pad+ma dag la gnas// mda' gzhu dam+bAr ser mtshan mthun phyag/ shar gyi phyogs kyi rtse la dgod// oM prA ti badz+re ni mA ta dz+dza/ rdo rje khi T+Te be n+yaH// ral gri kha T+wAM lho yi rtse// oM badz+re thA
337a3(rgyud 'grel): tihrISh+T+r-i/ rdo rje nyi ma dmar ser mdangs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nub kyi phyogs// oM tsit+ta ma ni hoSh+kaM/ rdo rje me mo ljang ser mdog/ rdo rje snod bcas m+me dzin byung // oM badz+ra ma Sha hwASh+Ti d+d+haM/ phyi rol shar sogs pad+ma'i gdan/
337a4(rgyud 'grel): chen 'bar ba'i rtsibs la gnas// 'od 'bar sna tshogs 'khrugs 'od bcas// rin chen rgyan phreng na bza' klubs// byin brlabs nga bskur rigs dag gis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// sbyor bas rang
337a5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi dkyil 'khor bskul// rgyal pa'i tshul brjid gdan la bzhugs// lus kun sa la bsnyal byas te// gnas gsum thal mo phyag 'tsha lo// oM u ti b+hu traM/ gar bsgyur rin chen thal sbyar nas// nyi ma'i tshogs mnyes
337a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dbul// tshad ming bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams gnyisu med par bya// tra rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// nor mchog rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya
337b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ nam mkha' snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs par// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkha' la 'beb// drag po 'dus pa'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid kyis
337b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul lnga gzi brjid chen po ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mnga' mchog dag/ shin tu legs par bzung ba ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan// g.yon pas 'byed/
337b3(rgyud 'grel): gyen du 'deg/ rdo rje pus mo gnyis gzhogs te// rgyal po'i skyil mo krung pacas nas// rang gi stan la 'dug na ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// oM sid+d+ha b+hu sid+d+h+ya b+hu sid+d+ha sa ma sid+d+hiM sha/ ma hA badz+ra rat+na bA b+ha
337b4(rgyud 'grel): ta ta tra/ ma hA mu tra traM/ khams gsum gnas kun dag mdzad cing // chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'o// ye shes lngas mtshan rgyan gyis spras// skyon gyis ma gos sgrib tshigs spangs// badz+ra satwa dzaHma hA mu tra traM// rgyal
337b5(rgyud 'grel): srid kun la longs spyod cing // 'phags pa'i nor tshogs zag pa med// rang bzhin mi 'gyur lhun grub rgyas// rtag tu 'gyur med rnam par spyod// badz+ra rat+na hUM ma hA mu dza tAM/ chos kun mtshan ma las rgyal zhing // yon tan tshogs
337b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan nub pa med// tshogs pa'i thugs rjes kun khyab mdzad// mchog gi mtshan mas mnyes pa'i tshul// badz+ra d+ha rmA bi ma hA mu tra traM/ mnyes mdzad phrin las kun spyod cing // kun 'byung yon snod bcud sogs// rnam kun spung
338a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sprin chen po// sna tshogs las mdzad 'gyur ba med// bad+d+ha kar+m+ma hU~M/ mad+h+yam+b+ha d+hA tI/ thabs dang shes rab 'grol ba'i mchog/ rgya chen zab ma'i sh+tsA su sbyor// chags pa'i skyon bral rgyus byung mdangs
338a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes mdzad pas bshol ba med// oM pra tI badz+re ni phaT/ ma hA mu trA trAM/ sku gsung thugs mchog rtogs ldan pas// sna tshogs sgrar bsna sa gas ky-irab mtshon tsho gas g.yul las rgyul// don d+ham+b+ha 'gyur meng mkha'
338a3(rgyud 'grel): mo/ oM badz+ra pra ti hriHmA hA mu dra tra/ sra bar+t+tan mo shigs 'gro rgyud khyab// 'od mdangs gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor tsAn lhag pa'i thugs gnyis da dkrol med// de nyid bzhin 'das tshul ston pa'o// oM tsi ta ma ni ho ma hA ma?
338a4(rgyud 'grel): drug po bskal byas 'khrigs byas nas// maM mthun gnas kyi rgyud kun bsreg/ kun+da spyod yon tan mthar phyin pa'i// gsung gsum rton bcas 'gro le ston// oM badz+ra maSh+pa ma hASh+TaM ma hA mr-i drA tAM/ traM khams gsum kun
338a5(rgyud 'grel): srid bdag/ sna tshogs mchog gau nor ldan pas// 'jam 'dum g.yul 'gyed la sogs pa'i// rnam mang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jam 'dum las// rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can// rdo rje nye
338a6(rgyud 'grel): po yi// bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub sems// mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba thams cad sgrub// myur ston a la la ho// mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur ba// khyad par 'dag
338b1(rgyud 'grel): la bstan du gsol// d+hU pa ba ta ta T+Ta Ta ta ta taM taM swA hA/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor la// mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste// mthe ba rdo rje g.yogs pa na// rdo rje khu tshur rin chen mchog/ 'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs
338b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchog tshogs bdag/ byin brlabs sngags dang phyag rgya 'bul// mnyam med mi g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya// smon lam rgya chen btab byas nas// slar brjod thig
338b3(rgyud 'grel): le phra mo dang // dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis// mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// 'byor tshogs yon tan rgyas pa'i phyir// rin chen snod bzang legs spras par// dkyil 'khor pho brang thig gis dbye// bza' btu
338b4(rgyud 'grel): brda sbyor bdud rtsis bkang // rigs kyi bsgom bzlas 'phro 'dur bcas// glu gar dbyangs kyi sprul par bya// gnyis meng rol pas longs spyod cing // rten gyi dkyil 'khor bcang bar bya// lha mnyes mgron tshi mos las grub
338b5(rgyud 'grel): byed// tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las// las rdzogs mchod bstong bskul byas shing // rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni/ mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i// mnyam nyid dbyingasu gnas par bya// shin tu gdug cing
338b6(rgyud 'grel): drag po la// zhi bas phon par mi 'gyur te// shwa rab thab kyi sbyor ba ni// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ sna tshogs las rnams brtsam pa'i phyir// rta mchog dkyil 'khor mchod bya ste// gre gar phyag rgya'i tshogs bcas pas// 8
339a1(rgyud 'grel): gri las gzhung rnam par 'phrul// de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste// phreng byas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom// nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyibs dag ni// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad mdzes// 'khor los mtshan pa mu
