339a2(rgyud 'grel): khyad mchog/ rim gnyis rgya gram pad+ma'i gdan// phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung 'khor yug gru bzhis tshad// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yi sems dpa' bskyed// sku mdog brgyan chus nas
339a3(rgyud 'grel): bzung ste// byin brlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya// rang 'ong rig ma bskyed pas na// lha mos bskul ba'i mthar thug brtsams// thugs rjes 'gro rgyud gzigs mdzad de// haM yig rgya gram las byung ba'o// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/
339a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog ljang ser zhal gsum pa// dbus steng rta mgo ljang sngon bcas// bgegs bcas drag tshul zhi madrangs khros// lag ngar brgyad pa dpa' bo'i mchog/ g.yas pas pa ngan gsum pa'i phyag/ 'degs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa dang //
339a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin// 'og ma gnyis na ral gri mda'// g.yon gyis sna tshogs pad+ma dang // shak+ti rtse gcig be con gzhu// g.yas kyi smig pa dang po yis// dngos grub gsum dang dpal mo gnon// gnyis bzhi la dga'
339a6(rgyud 'grel): ba mo// g.yon pas drag po khyab 'jug dang // gnyis pas tshangs pa 'dod pa'i lha// rin chen sna tshogs brgyan dang gos// khro 'dzum phyag rgyargya yis spras// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang bcas//
339b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog/ rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// oM a d+hi
339b2(rgyud 'grel): Shiny+tsa haM/ rgya gram phreng ba'i phyag rgya dang // dar dpyangs dgyes pa'i thal mor bcas// rang 'od yum dang 'khril ba las// gsang gnas hUM dang as rgyun te// rgya grum 'bar dang phaT dang bcas// rnam par thar pa oM dkyil can//
339b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ya sogs brdas bskul nas// dzaHhUM ba~M hoHsa rol pa bya// ling ga 'greng pa rang 'byung ba// brla yi dbus su gzhug bya ste// ling ga sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rta yi rgyal por bdag sngon bskyed// gsang gnas so so'i gdan
339b4(rgyud 'grel): dag la// chos kyi snying pos lha rnams bskyed// haM gI rta mchog rgyal po ste// gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la'o// dzA las sna tshogs pad+ma rgya// ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ma// khang par rta yi lha mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyogs kyi
339b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la'o// 'khor gzhan rigs rnams gang rung gi/ lha mo nyi shu gong ba bzhin// b+ha gar lid+ya ga bcug nas ni// der ni hUM yig bsgom par bya// rta mchog rol pa'i gzugs dag ni// sku gnyis ldan pas spro ba'o// oM suM b+hA ni
339b6(rgyud 'grel): suM b+ha hUM dz+dza/ phyogs bcur don byas 'dus pa dag/ gtso bo yab yum la gzhug bya// sna tshogs pad+ma ljang ser 'gro/ mtshan mthun phyag rgya g.yas kyi phyogs// oM b+hi badz+ra d+ha bo dz+nye/ sna tshogs rdo rje lding sngon 'phro// mtshan
340a1(rgyud 'grel): mthun phyag 'dzin grwa yon gyi phyogs// oM b+hi sha badz+ra s+yatwa dz+nyA/ 'khor gzhan lha mo tshogs bcas la// sna tshogs rdo rje brgya phreng mdzes// byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas// dam tshig dkyil
340a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsal bar snang // sbyor bas rang rigs dkyil 'khor bskul// sna tshogs tshul gyis mdun du bzhugs// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag rgya'o// oM a tau b+hu haM/ gang ngam 'on te stong yang
340a3(rgyud 'grel): rung // yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrubs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tshad med bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams gnyisu med par bya// hUM rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das
340a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnam sbyong ba// rta mchog phyag rgyas rab tu gnas// thams cad pad+mo mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo 'thon du// rab tu gnon pa'i rtsol dag gis// 'jig rten
340a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams lus gdug par 'gyur// zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag shul sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi
340a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la rmig pa bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// dbang phyug dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub mo yis// dpal ldan pad+ma sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rjer bcas shing slong ba 'grub// g.yos pas ba dan gsum tha
340b1(rgyud 'grel): byas/ g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa yis tshul byas nas// khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ haM mos byed stong pas lhag pa yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i gzugs
340b2(rgyud 'grel): ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis go shin rje'i tshogaso// stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa'i tshogs// stong pas shin tu lhag par ston// dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog dag tu// de bzhin gshegs kun
340b3(rgyud 'grel): grub par mdzod// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// ngo 'thon stobs kyis non pas gnon// e haM i hi dbang phyug tshogs// thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa yis// stobs kyi ngo 'thon dbang phyug
340b4(rgyud 'grel): gnon// sbyor chen hu lu hu lu yi// mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis mngan gyis mngon gnon pa'i// stobs kyis ngo 'thon mthu chen gnon// mnyam sbyor ru ta ma snying las// dpal mo drongs shig ra
340b5(rgyud 'grel): drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa yis// stobs kyi ngo 'byon tshangs bya gnon// sbyor chen tshangs pa'i rgyu ma las// sgrol ma drongs shig sma rata// rab kyi rtsal gyis non pa yi// stobs kyis ngo 'thon dga' dbang gnon/
340b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam sbyor kun gyis bdag las dga'// drongs shig a la la ho// gdug cing khro la rab gtum pa'i// sems can bsgral ba'i phyir sgrub zhugs/ a la la ho a la la ho/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM phaT/ ma hA mu tra haM/ mdza' bo mi/
341a1(rgyud 'grel): la bya ba'ang yin// yongs rtog de dag med kyang blang // de 'dra' mdza' bo sgyu bzhin pas// de la mdza' zhes su zhig zer// rgol ba mi la bya ba min// yongasu rtog pa med kyang blang // de 'dra'i rgol ba sgrub
341a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pas// de la su zhig dpa' zhes zer// oM shrI pad+ma ba DA ba mu kha yoM shwa ri hi hi hi hi haM// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam pa brkyang // mdzub mo rtse bsnyems bkug pa ni// dpal mchog
341a3(rgyud 'grel): rta zhes grags pa yin// rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcings la// sor mo thams cad yongasu bzung // de ltar phyag rgya gong ma dang // rang rung las la sbyar bar bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod tshogs dag/ byin+da brlabs sngags dang
341a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dbul// mnyam med maM g.yo la sogs pa'i// bstod pa'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bya// smon lam rgya che sa dbu byas nas// bzlas brjod thig le phra mo dang // dkyil 'khor de nyid gang rung gis// mtshan mo'i dkyil 'khor bstan
341a5(rgyud 'grel): por bya// glu gaR+Sha bro sngags phyag rgya'i tshogs// phrin las rnam bzhi'i bzhin lta 'dzum// las kyi bskul tshig dang bcas pa'o// sna tshogs stang stabs 'phro 'dra'i gar// lha mnyes mgron tshim las grub byed// chags dang sbyin
341a6(rgyud 'grel): sregs lhag ma'i las// las rdzogs mchod pastod bskul byas shing // rang gi gnas su bsdus nas ni// mtshan ma nyan dang yongs bral ba'o// mnyam nyid dbyingasu gnas par bya// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig mes
341b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis ngo mthon du// drag shUl sbyor bas mnyam sbyar bas// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom byar byed// phyag rgya sgrub pa'i dus su ni// snga ma las ni gnas sbyar te// bskal pa me dpung 'khrugs pa bzhin// 'bar ba'i tshogs nam
341b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bsdum// gzhi dang rten pa'i ting 'dzin nyid// sbyor ba bzhi yis gsal byas te// dam tshig 'phro 'dro'i yan lag dag/ mngon sum snang ba ltar gnas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing // mdun nas gnyis med dkyi
341b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi/ cho ga rdzogs par sbyang byas pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson pas 'bad// bsnyen par gnas pa'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru
341b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad bstan// 'phro 'du'i yan lag kun ldan pas// dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal// stags mchog yi ge'i 'bru brjod pas// des ni drag po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// dge mchog dngos grub kun bsdus te// gnas gsum
341b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing gsang mchog sgrub// khyad par gsang stegs rim pa bzhin// 'phro 'du mchod bstod bskul tshig ldan// mtha' phyin gsang sngags rgyal po yis// lhas kyi sbyor ba kun brtsam bya// mnyes shing mgron tshim las grub byed// tshogs pa
341b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg lhag pa'i las// las rdzogs mchod bstod bskul byas shing // rang gi gnasu bsdus nas ni// mtshan ma kun dang yongs bral ba'i// mnyam nyid dbyingasu gnas par bya// mas cad mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang
342a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thang du// mthong ba dang ni rag par 'gyur// dmigasu yod pa ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// dbugs dbya/
342a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnam dag drug/ sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par bya// sbyor dang rjesu sbyor ba dang // shin tu sbyor dang ster chen po// ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa// sbyor ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod// gzhug
342a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rje su sbyor ba'o// dag mjed dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nos// 'phro 'du shin tu sbyor ba yin// byin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa// sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o// sgrub chen dngos grub tshul bzhin du// mtshan brtags gsal ba'i
342a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas shes pas// bdag gzhan don tshogs lngas sbyar te// re dogs mtha' kun bral bas blang // de bzhin nyid nas brtsam bya ste// phreng bas brgyan pa'i bar du bsgom// nang gi dkyil 'khor dbyings dag ni// thig bzhis rnam par phye ba
342a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ so so'i pho byung ji lta bar// rigs bsdus dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshul// dbus su rigs bdag 'khor lo ste// shar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// lho phyogs rdo rje drag po'i tshogs// nub tu pad+mo rnam dag chos// byang phyogs yin
342a6(rgyud 'grel): tan rin chen mdzod// shar mtshams bzhi dkyil sdud pa'i tshul// lho mtshams drag po sreg byed ltar// nub mtshams dbang mdzad g.yo ba'i bzhin// byang mtshoms rgyas pa dbang chen ltar// rang rang phreng bas mdzes par bya// pho brang kha dog
342b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bzhi// sna tshogs pad+ma gdan gyis mtshan// phyi rol ra ba dur khrod dang // kun 'byung khyer yug tu bzhis mtshan// mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis// mgon po rgyu yis sems dpa' bskyed// sku mdog rgyan cha nas bzung ste//
342b2(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs rdzogs pas dag par bya// rang 'od rig ma bskyed pa nas// lha mo bskul ba'i mthar thug par// thugs rjes 'gro rgyad la gzigs nas// 'od kyi gong bu las 'phro ba'i// thig le rin chen sna lnga'i mdangs// phyogs mtshams
342b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi lte ba ni// yi ge'i 'phro 'dus mtshan ma ste// sngags kyi phyag rgya chen po'i sku// sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan chas dang // cha lugs so so'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang // ye shes sems dpa' sngags dang
342b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // dbus la rigs kyi bdag pos mtshan// so so'i dbang bskur phyag rgya dang // rang gi gsang sngags bcas pa'o// rin chen myu gu la sogs dang // dur dbyangs dges pa'i thal mor bca/
342b5(rgyud 'grel): so'i yum dang 'khril ba las// gsang gnas byin brlabs bcas bskul te// snyoms 'jug chos kyi snying po las// rigs dgu'i dkyil 'khor gsal bas bsgom// phyi nang sngags kyis spro mdzad nas// rang rigs dkyil la
342b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas la 'khod// byin brlabs dbang bskur rdzogs byas pas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyas dmigs pas// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// gnyis med dkyil 'khor rgya
343a1(rgyud 'grel): btab nas// cho ga lhag mas mnyes par bya// rnam shes ye shes bye brag gis// dkyil 'khor drug gi rim pa bzhin// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags bzlas shing // las bzhi'i bskul sngags gsang ba la/
343a2(rgyud 'grel): mtha' brgyan gyur pas gsol gdab cing // bar skabs mchod bstod 'phro 'du dang // glu dbyangs gar gyis bskul bar bya// rnam shes ye shes bye brag gis// mtshan ma gang rung gsang bar brtag/ rdo rjes mi mthun 'jom
343a3(rgyud 'grel): byed cing // 'khor los khams gsum gtso bor 'gyur// mnga' yis phra bar 'bogs byed cing // ral gris lha mon grong khyer 'joms// pad+mas lha mo la sogs 'gugs// rtse gsum lha dbang dul 'gyur zhing // bum pas
343a4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis bdud rtsi 'grub/ rgya gram sa 'og gser 'gyur rtsi// nyi mas gser mdog 'od dang ldan// lcags kyus srid pa'i rtse mor 'gro// nor bus grong khyer rgyas par byed// me long mngon par shes pa 'grub// pi paM sna tshogs
343a5(rgyud 'grel): gsung sgrogs shing // gling bus chos kyi tshig brjod pa'o// gzhan yang gzugs sogs mang bshad pa'i// yul drug snang ba'i mtshan ma kun// ting 'dzin sngags dang las sbyar zhing // bcom ldan par chad med pas gzung // gas
343a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor la// yab yum sa bon bcu gnyis bsgom// zung du spros shing 'dus pa las// rigs kyi lha tshogs snyoms 'jug pa'o// sor mo phan tshun sbyor rjes bsnol// gnyis med rdo rje thal mo'i rgya// de
343b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes rdo rje bsdams pa las// g.yon mdzub rtse mo'i nang drug tu// g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma gzhug/ legs bsdams bskyod pa dga' chen dpal// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thun mong sngon 'gro'i yan lag
343b2(rgyud 'grel): yin// dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las// gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya mongasu sbyor// de las gung mo lcags kyu ni// snying gar sbyor ba dgug pa'i mchog/ rdo rje bsnams pa
343b3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// gung mo bcing ba'i mang du gzhug/ mthe'u chung mthe bo'i rtse mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu sbyar// de las gung mo lcags kyu ni// rdo rje 'khor lo snang mdzad rgya// rdo rje'i rgya btsongs sbyor ldan pas// thal mo khong stong khebs
343b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las// gung mo de bzhin bkug nas ni// rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de// gung mo na mkha' rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te// rdo rje'i rtse mo de bzhin bsdams// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/
343b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phyag rgya dag byed pa'o// rdo rje pad mor byas pa las// gung mo bcing ba'i dbus na gnas// mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i rtse mo mde'u// rdo rje mnga' ni yongasu 'phang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings na// gung mo bcings pa phyi rol bzhag/
343b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya// ldang ba thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku// tha~Md bdag nyid ston par mdzad// legaso zhes 'grub pa ni// dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol// bsam pa thams cad ma rdzogs pa'i//
344a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba// ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag/ thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol// dbang phyug bde ba la sogs drug/ sku dang ye shes gsal ba 'grub// phan gnod byed pa rnam
344a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag gi/ mtshan ma rnams gsum snang ba na// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// gal te dngos grub mi gsal na// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // mnan dang zlog gis las brtsam zhing // spobs
344a3(rgyud 'grel): cho gas sbyar bar bya// lha mnyes mgron tshim las sgrub byed// tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg lhag ma'i las// las rdzogs rigs kyi sku brtan pas// dngos grub legs sbyor 'gyur med brtan// mchog tu gyur pa'i phyag rgya bzhes// las
344a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs 'bras bu mdzad bcas 'grub// bsod nams yoM shes tshogs chen po'i// tshogs las kun 'grub byed cing // rigs 'dzin go 'phang rdzogs byed pas// 'khor lo 'khor lo che gnas sbyor// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// rdzas
344a5(rgyud 'grel): sa sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// bud med rnams ni legs bsgrubs pa// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs// sgo bsrungs dang ni ldan par bya// sangs
344a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de na rnam par 'phrul pa mjed// dkyil 'khor so so'i ting 'dzin gyis// sbyor ba snga ma bzhin du gsal// bskal bzang rang gi
344b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor la dmigs shing // mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la// tshad med phyag rgya bzhis bstims nas// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// lha mo kun gyi
344b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam gyur pa// bde bar myong ba rab sbyar ba// mdzes par blta zhing gar byed pa'o// bud med mkhas pa rgyu ma che// mdzes pa'i bzhini rnam par 'gyur// rim mor bcas shing bteg pa'i mchol/ mdzes
344b3(rgyud 'grel): bas lta ba'i gar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor dang // rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu srid pa yang dag bsgre ba// gsang bar blta ba gnas pa'i rgya// gteg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i
344b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ni rnam 'gyur zhing // rim 'gror bcas pa bteg pa'i mchog/ bteg pa'i lta bas gar byed pa'o// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal// khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro las gyur par bcas zhing 'dzum// gsal bar
344b5(rgyud 'grel): lta zhing legs par gnas// 'dod chags mos pas g+ha yen sgo ba// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur// drag po mche ba sngon po gcig/ gdug pa zla ba 'jigs 'jigs lta// dngos po kun gyi bde ba mchog/ rab tu dga' bar lta
344b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing 'dzum// spyi bor rta mgrin 'phang 'tho ba// mche gtsigs ldang ser kha dog gsal/ lha mo kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan cing // 'dod chags bde bas dben spyod pa// bteg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'o//
345a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchus g.yog par byed// sha chen gyi ni ro myang zhing // mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan cing // bde ba kun gyi ro myang zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes par bya'o// bde ba
345a2(rgyud 'grel): myong ba rab sbyor bso// zam zim lta ba'i rnam 'gyur bcas// bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma mchog/ mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// smin mtshams khyo gnyer
345a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bar bcos// lta ba rab 'bar bar rnam par 'gyur// steg pa la sogs ro dang ldan// sgeg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa// khro zhing 'gyur ba bcas par 'dzum// lta ba gsal bar bde bar gnas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so
345a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya/ phyag rgya gru dang bcas pa dag/ hUM las sogs pas sna drangs te// mchod tshogs kun la sgyur bar bya// de nas tshogs kyi zhal zas rnams// lha tshogs rnal 'byor rnams la 'bul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan
345a5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dod dgus mchod// lha mtshan ldan sgyu rtsal can// las mkhan grogs dang bcas pa yis// pad+ma mtshan ma dpa' bos bkang // bdud rtsi rdzas mchog byin brlabs pas// bkra shis dbyangs dang gar tshogs kyis// thang rnam
345a6(rgyud 'grel): rtog med par mchod// ston mo'i yan lag gzhan dag kyang // rim pa bzhin du drang bar bya// oM thams cad rnam dag bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin te// sku lnga chos lnga gnyis med ngo bo gcig/ de phyir ngag las dag pa nyid mchod de// chos
345b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid la thim ye shes rnam par rol// a la la ho// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor kun gyis kyang // gar dang dpyangs su bcas pa yis// a ho su ka zhes brjod cing // dga' mgu'i tshul gyis blang bar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal
345b2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// lce la so so'i mchen ma dang // chos kyi snying po bsam bya ste// rang gi lus la gnas par sbyor// dus gsum rab zhi mchog rnams kyis// hUM la sogs pa glu blang zhing // lha mo'i ka krA ta sogs// glu rnams rje su blang bar
345b3(rgyud 'grel): byed hUM rab tu dga' ba'i rjesu chags pa yi// mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas bcas pa'i// rab tu dga' ba'i sbyor ba'i bde ba myos// bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// rgyal
345b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug bde mchog grub// de bzhin gshiDa u horta mchog/ rab tu sna tshogs bde mchog rol gcig ho// bde bas slong ba rnam rol snang bar mdzod// ho de bzhin
345b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro yis// sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis slob ma bzung tu gsol// oM b+hi glu yi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci bdir blang // oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa nas// rdo rje rin chen bla na ming // rdo rje chos ni gsung
345b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur// rdo rje drag po gad mo che// 'khur ba'i dbugs kyi rlung 'byin cing // 'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi// ru lu ru lu'i sgra phyung nas// hUM rdo rje las kyi mnga' gzhu phyag 'tsha lo// dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la
346a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tsha lo// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'dzin pa la phyag 'tsha lo// dpal rdo rje dril bu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshalo// te zhes bya ba gru yi rgyu// thams cad dag par rab sgrub pa'o// te lar rab tu drag cing gzhan drag la// drag
346a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang // 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la la ni// rab rno'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku// la lar rab tu nges shing zhi ba yis// mi 'gyur sbyin pa'i tshungs pa'i skur ston mdzad// la lar rab 'bar chags
346a3(rgyud 'grel): pa pad+mo yi// rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod// hi zhes bya ba glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// hi thams cad dbang phyug dam pa mi zad pa'i// gter mchog bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// kun mchog
346a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan rgyal ba bsgreng rdo rje// rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la mdzod// ka kI la lags dang gtso rgyu'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu mdangs snyan dang // ka ha la yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// hI lar mkhas pa'i gzugs
346a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'dzin// l-i las dus mtha'i dus ltar drag/ la ltar rgyal dbang bzhin du zhi/ la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'grub// de dag sku yi glu yi mchog/ phyag rgya sngags kyis sbyor bcas pa'o// tshogs skyob chen po'i dus ni// phyag rgya y-i no ya
346a6(rgyud 'grel): dag dang // brda dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// 'khor lo rim bzhin bskor byas te// dpa' bo btung bas tshim 'gyur nas// bgegs bskrang sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab// de yi dam tshig de 'byung ba'i// sdug pa dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang //
346b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu sbyor dbang sbyor chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig spyod pa rjes spyod sdug/ lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten par bya// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus//
346b2(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor ba yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi bskal bzang pos// slong bas ngal gyis ngal gyis su// gos bgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi dbyung ba bskur
346b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// rdzogs par sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag gis mthong ba yis// nges pa'i lam dang yun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan// dbang bskur kun las byung ba yis// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa// re
346b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byams tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga po dang // so so'i phyang dang sbyar byas nas// tshogs kyis dbus su bzhag pa ni// raM stA ya na kun slong ba'o// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'phra
346b5(rgyud 'grel): 'du sngags// dngos grub bskul tshig dbyangs kun blang // oM A hUM oM hriM hri tAM haM/ he pAny+tsa A mr-i ta ra sa yA na sid+d+hi/ sar+b+baR+Yo sod+d+hi/ hUM oM hi hri traM haM/ hri thar/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/ dzaM bAM san+ta ti/ e she shwa ne shA/ sA d+ha bi na ya/ sa
346b6(rgyud 'grel): ta thA ga tA dze le bra dza le/ kur+Ya ba bi kurba/ sarba shaM pa re hUM/ biSh+Ta bau sha hUM/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/ ra ga san+ta ni/ a shi sha she sha/ sarba bi na ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dza le pra dza le/ kuR+Ya bi kur+Ya/ sarba sham+ba re/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM ba hu ba wi ta/
347a1(rgyud 'grel): r+yeT tu san+na nI/ e she sha ni sh+le sh+tsa/ sarba bI nA ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA grA tA/ tsa le pra tsA le/ kur+Na b+hi krAr+b+ha/ sarba sham+bA ra/ ru lu ru wA n+yuSh+To d+hA/ shatAM ku ru ba shA gA ru/ puSh+Ti k+Shu ru/ ma ra ya/ b+h+yAMs+yAt+ma/ @T+Ta
347a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi bdud rtsi don sbyar ba'i// gsang sngags yi ge bcu gcig pas// bdud rtsi lnga par bcud len don// dngos grub gnas kun gsal bar byed// 'di dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo gzugs ston brtan par gnas// nye bar spyod
347a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// yan lag bzhi yi gnas sbyor te// mtha' sngags skul tshig 'brel pa yi// rig kyi phrin lpa gas la cwa 'gyug// i b+ha si b+h+yo ldas// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs shing // lha gzhan la yang
347a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// gnas kun thig les brgyan byas shing // rigs kyi dngos grub blang bar bya// de dus 'gro don gyi chu dang // dbang bskur las kun bcum bya zhing // bdag don 'gro ba'i gnas sbyor to// dam tshig snum pa bzung b.rany+dza
347a5(rgyud 'grel): gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud mdos rgyud srug/ sil snyan phyag rgyar bshod pa rnams// glu skad grong ma dang sbyar brdung // dzaHhUM baM hoHrot+ta mA ta/ sma ra rad/ hu lu hu lu/ br-i ti ta/ Ta ki hUM dzaM ki ni du ni b+hU n+yaM/ Tak+Sha/

347b5(rgyud 'grel): byang du zhi ba lhor mngon spyong // nub du dbang dang dgug pa'i las// thabs khung kun gyi nang rgya ru// khru gang zabs phyed brkos shing // kha khyer rim gsum dkyed byas pa// rim bzhin sor ni bzhi bzhir gnas// zhi la zlum po rgyas kyu

348a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes mtshan cing phreng bas brgyan// so'i rigs dang mthun pa yi// bu shing rang gi dbyibasu rtsig/ sor byazhi brgyad dang bcu drug gnyis// yam shing mye tog dri yis brgyan// rtse mo'i cha las rtse mo ste//
348a2(rgyud 'grel): mar gyis byug pa'o// thabs kyi phyi rol 'khor dag tu ku sha rgyan dang mtshon cha dang // me long rngam yol bar bcas// mtshon cha sna lha'i thug pas skor// g.yas su rdo rje dril bu dang // ya mya shing til dang rlung yab bzha
348a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du dzi chu me tog gis// dun+d+hak+sha sh+ya'i chun po bklag/ mdun du mchod pa rnam lnga dang // mchod rdzas gzhan yang bzhag parar+ya b+ha// mching yon yan lag brgyad ldan pa// d+h+r-i stA me tog dkar po dang // zho dang dur+yas bkang ba
