351b1(rgyud 'grel): ma nu ra/ bAr+d+ha nA g+hA tsakra/ brtan ga pastsu ka/ bzhan kAk+ShatrUT+Ta/ brdzun pa pad+ma/ la nA ga ma b+hA badrA/ byang+ka nAg sh+'u b+hA la/ bAd+d+hAnA bA kA m+b+ha/ ba nA gab kyi ka/ bar+d+hanA kA swAt+ta/ badz+ran pa byas/ AN+Dayam na pa tha
351b2(rgyud 'grel): b+hAr+N+Na pa Ta ye/ badz+ra da na d+ha ya/ badz+ra ma hAd+hA dza na/ bAd+d+ha dzAM bI ku lan+d+ha yA/ badz+ra dza b+hA lA muM khan+na ye/ bIdz+dzaHb+hA lA d+hA len+d+rA ya/ b+h+yaHka~M laM mA~M lA na~M/ badz+ra Ig+na ye/ bAd+han r-i no/ badz+rI b+hai raM ba/ bad+d+ha I shA nA ye/ badz+ra nA ga A l-i/
351b3(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI nA ga pa la ti/ badz+ra su r+ya ba/ badz+re tsan+d+ha ba/ badz+ra go tsi tri/ badz+ra pr-i ti bi de ba/ badz+re DA ki ni ka le badz+ra b+h+yo/ badz+ra DA ki ni ka laM rat+na b+h+yo/ badz+ra DA ki ni ka la pad+ma b+h+yo/ badz+ra DA ki ni kA la kArma b+h+yo// sa pa ri pa ra/ i de d+hA pa/ puSh+pa/ dI paM/ gar+b+he
351b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bau ti/ di saM ka taM/ pa lAM pra ha raM/ pr-i tIn+naM/ yu ba dz+ra dza/ mA ma sarba satwa/ naM pa ti/ ran N+ya/ su baD+ga/ d+han d+h+yA n+ya/ a yu yau ba na/ a rokya/ sat+su khaM/ a pa hA ra kaM/ shAn+ti ku ru/ puSh+Ti sU ru/ ba shaM ku ru/ ma ra ya/ sarba
351b5(rgyud 'grel): R+tha sid+d+hi hUM hUM swA hA/ oM thams cad gnyis med thugs rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung // dam pa'i dka' sbyong byang chub sems// drug po'i gzugs 'dzin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dam tshig bstan pa gnas
351b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zhing // rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i las badz+rad ma// don kun phrin las sngags kyi mthus// 'gro ba'i gnas kun rnam par dag/ byang chub sbyor ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// dam bcas phrin las sna tshoT kyis// sangs rgyas thang mnyam sbyor mo
352a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i don ston mdzad// oM shin tu drug chen sprul pa'i sku// khams gsum gnas kun g.yo mdzad pa// kaM lus sprul pa'i lha chen po// dkar ser khyu mchog gdan la bzhugs// zhal phyag man+ta
352a2(rgyud 'grel): par kr-I shul la// dgra rta ral g+h+r-i tha~M da khyug sha/ spyan gsum rab pa thong phreng rgyan// rin chen sna tshogs gos kyis klubs// zla ba phyed pa'i ru mtshon tsan+te// sgeg dgyes chags pa'i gzi mngangs kyis// u ma ljang sgra thod pa thogs/
352a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba rin chen rgyan bcas 'khyil// stobs ldan dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs// 'khor bcas gnas 'dir 'dus pa rnams// mtshud gtor rgyun bcas 'di bzhes shig/ rang gi dam tshig dran byos la// zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun
352a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / thun mong dngos grub 'dod pa'i don// bdeg sogs rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i tshogs// ma lus thogs med grub par mdzod// oM khams gsum gtso bo 'byin byed lha// oM las sprul pa'i tshangs pa'i tshangs pa che// gasngar mdos
352a5(rgyud 'grel): gdong bzhi phreng bas mdzes// grwa y+ya gnyis pa ser ral gri thogs// g.yon gnyis 'khor lo rin chen 'od // ngang pa zla ba'i khri steng gnas// khams gsum bskyod tshul rnam grub ma// mdze sa ma kun gzugs yum dang 'khril/
352a6(rgyud 'grel): oM byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo mchog/ a las sprul pa'i lha dbang rgyal// dkar gsal zla rgyas mdangs dpal phyug/ gos rgyan rin chen tshogs kyi so klubs// g.yas gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum rim// g.yon gnyis rin
352b1(rgyud 'grel): chen phreng ba 'bum// glung chen rin chen khri steng nA// shwa rtsi dkar mo'i rin chen pad// 'khril tshul 'dod pa'i long spyod tshogs// rin chen sna bdun tshogs la rol// oM stobs ldan drag po mthu bo che// haM las sprul pa khyab 'jug
352b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso/ mthing gnag khro bo'i tshul 'chang pa// 'khor lo rtse gsum mnga' dang gzhu// 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gos rgya no grub// ri dwags shing rta rin chen khri// gzugs 'dzin drag mo pad+ma 'dzin// mtshon cha 'khrigs pi'i phreng bcas
352b3(rgyud 'grel): oM ma lus 'dod chags kun gyi bdug/ b+h+rUM las byung ba'i 'dod lha mchog/ ser skya sna tshogs rgyun gyis grubs// g.yas gnyis mnga' mnga' mchog rin po che// g.yon gnyis rin chen gzhu pad+ma// 'dod dpung rin chen kun la
352b4(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ drag po gnas rgyal rin chen skyes// rin chen khri bcas r+N+Na yI tshogs// b+h+rUM yi bdud sogs mos pa'i dpung // yan lag bzhi bcas las mdzad pa// oM shar gyi phyogs nas lU chen tshigs// gsang ba'i bka'
352b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin dam tshig can// A yig sngags kyis sprul pa rnams// zhi ba'i rgyan bcas byang sems gsal// rdo rje mtshon cha gser mdog 'od// zhal phyag bzhi pa rdo rje rin// pad+ma bum pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rin chen gos rgyan yum dang
352b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rgyal po chen po'i tshul 'dzin cing // gling chen rin chen stegs la gnas// rdo rje sgyu ma sngo gsang mdog/ g.yas gnyis 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// g.yon gnyis dung dang pad+mo thogs// nyi ma'i 'od mdangs stan la
353a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ dbu rgyan phreng bya gos kyis klubs// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs sumA cu gnyis// rdo rje glang sna dkar ser mdangs// gAyas gnyis gtun shing ral gri dang // g.yon gnyis phreng ba rin chen 'khor//
353a2(rgyud 'grel): chu srin rin chen pad+ma'i khri// mche gtsigs khro tshul drag po'i spyan// btsun mo gtum chen bdud rtsi'i snod// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro bo'i mchog/ sngo nag me 'od 'bar ba phreng // g.yas gnyis rtse gsuM 'khor lo sgyur// g.yon
353a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mtshon cha me 'od phreng // ma mo'i gdan la yum dang 'khril// thod rus sbrul gyi phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje tshogs bdag ljang ser sku// rin chen gos rgyun 'jigs pa'i tshogs// g.yas gnyis bdud rtsi rin po che// g.yon gnyis
353a4(rgyud 'grel): zla ba rtse gsum bdud // rdo rje brag chen blung dkyil myur// btsun mo stobs chen brgyad kyi dbus// rdo rje srin mo sngo skya'i 'od // srid gsum thal byed rnga skad sgrogs// g.yas gnyis gri gug dbyug pa 'dzin// gasgo gnyis pad+ma'i thong pa/
353a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chang // thub dka' srin po'i gdan la gInas// yum bcas rgyan phreng 'jigs pa'i tshul// rdo rje 'gas pa gnas kun rgyal// mdog gan go mi ljags thod pa'i rgyan// g.yas gnyis zhags pa rtse gsum 'ong // g.yon gnyi
353a6(rgyud 'grel): gri gug thod pa'i snod// lus ngan sprul pa'i khri la gnas// yum tshogs pho nya gtso bo brgyad// rdo rje gzhon nu gdong drug lha// dmar ser zhi ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes// g.yas na rin chen pad+ma mda'// g.yon na phreng ba bum bzang gzhu//
353b1(rgyud 'grel): da byA pad+mo rting bcas gdan// byug+sa mya yum stsogs gnas drug ma// oM lho yi rgyal chen gshin rje'i tshogs// byung sems yang las 'phrul pa'i gzugs// khro bo 'joms byed rgyun phreng grungs// 'jigs pa'i gzugs
353b2(rgyud 'grel): mchog khyo gnyer 'gyur// mche gtsigs pa sgrogs spyan gsum bgrang // ser sbyor sgra 'brur sbya ra canA// mtshogs yum bcas thal zhags khrig/ lus byugs thod phreng ma he god+ya na// rdo rje gshon dz+nye'i rgyal chen po// sngon
353b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lho rul gri 'dzin// rdo rje gshin rje dus kyi tshogs so// mdog dmar glegs pa mo khram shing thig/ rdo rje gshin rje spang ba 'joms// ser skya rtse gsum pa ngan rdol// rdo rje gshin rje khro mchog/ sngo nag ral gri thong khrag sha/ rdo rje gshin
353b4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i 'khor lo'i glang na// dung ka 'khor lo phreng ba me// rdo rje gshin rje mdung 'dzin gnon// sngo skya mdung rtse gsum pa rlung // rdo rje gshin rje mda' 'dzin rgyu la// dmar sgyu mnga' gzhu thog phreng rgyun// rdo rje gshin rje thub pa che//
353b5(rgyud 'grel): g+hanag gri gug thod khrag sbyin// dun khrod rgya che gtum pa yi// mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed brgyad rnams kun// mdog nag mun pa'i tshogs ltar gtibs// lag na gri gug thod khrag shA/ dus 'dzin 'chi bdag bzlog byed cing // ma
353b6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i spong ba'i gdon la brtson// oM nub phyogs rdo rje klu yi tshogs// byang chub sems sogs phuM las sbrul// rdzu 'phrul mthu stobs byin brlabs can// rin chen 'bar ba'i sbrul mgo'i rgyan// pho brang rin chen khang mdzes na/
354a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rdzing bu'i tshogs// btsun mo yum tshogs dga' ba rnams// rin chen pad+ma'i skyed tshal gnas// rdo rje mtha' yas sngo sangs mdog/ sbrul zhags rin chen bum pa thogs// rdo rje no
354a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mdog dkar la// nor bu rtse dbu phreng ba'i tshul// rdo rje 'jog po dmar mngangs can// sbyin phung rin chen char 'bebaso mdzad// rdo rje kAr ko Ta nag po// rin chen phreng ba pad+ma'i rgyu// rdo rje pad+ma chu shel mdangs// 'dod pa'i zhal
354a3(rgyud 'grel): zas bdud rtsi'i rgyun// rdo rje pad chen dkar skya'i mdangs// me tog ut+pal sgra snyan sgrogs// rdo rje dung skyong gser gyi mdog/ phreng ba ljon shing me tog rgyan// rdo rje rigs ldan sna tshogs sku// chu srin rin chen gter mdzod sbyor//
354a4(rgyud 'grel): oM byung gi gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gtso// pho brang rin chen gnas kyi bdag / me'u thung zugs 'dra stobs ldan pa// byang sems ri oMT haM las sbrul// rin chen bum tshogs nir bu'i tshogs// pad+ma mdun rtsegs rin chen
354a5(rgyud 'grel): dpago bsam rgyan phreng bum pa'i lho// rgyal blon btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// rdo rje gang bzang chu shel mdog/ rin chen mkha' mdzod zla gsal mdangs// rdo rje bum bzang gser lta bu// rtse gsum bum pa lag na 'dzin// rdo rje
354a6(rgyud 'grel): nor bzang be DUr+ya// nor bu rin chen phreng ba'i tshogs// rdo rje rnam thos gser gyi mdangs// mchod rten rin chen dbyug pa thogs// rdo rje lus ngan ldang skya'i 'od// rin chen dbyug pa lcug ma'i rgyun// rdo rje gnon 'jigs mthing shun
354b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ ral gri ut+pal me tog breng // rdo rje gnon gnas nyi ma'i mngangs// shIng thogs ne'u le'i sbrul bu 'thor// rdo rje sde bzung in+d+ra'i mdog/ glegs bam rin chen bum pa'i chu// khro gnyer spyan dmar dbu m+b+ha 'khyil// ma
354b2(rgyud 'grel): ba cung zad 'dzum mdongs brgyan// rin chen go cha mtshon sna tshogs// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis myos// oM mtshams kyi rgyal chen dpa' bo'i dpung // rang gi 'khor tshogs 'dul mdzad po// byang chub sems sogs
354b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don mdzad// sa bon oM ri yaM ming las// 'phrul pas byin brlabs gzugs dang ldan// gtso bo rang rigs rgyan gyis mdzes// rdo rje me lha dmyur ser 'od// bgrang phreng spyi blugs srung bus brgyan// rdo rje srin po dmar ser
354b4(rgyud 'grel): chu srin pad+ma 'jigs byed gzugs// rdo rje rlung lha dung khwa'i mdog/ ba dAn phreng ga kha mang rgyu// rdo rje dbang ldan in+d+ra rim// be con rtse gsum 'od phreng 'khrigs// btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs las mdzad pa// ra skyes chu
354b5(rgyud 'grel): smin sha ba dang // mi ro'i stan la rin chen brgyan// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dga' rtser rol// oM sgo bzhi pho nya mthun pa'i grogs// rnal 'byor dam can skyong mdzad pa// steng 'og nyin mtshan dus 'byed cing // byang chub sems tshogs
354b6(rgyud 'grel): spyod ldan pas// tshad med bzhi yis rnam par rol// sa bon sum tsam pra taM las// 'byung ba'i gzi brjid 'od po che// btsun mo de'i gnas longs spyod// blon po ded dpon dpung bcas pas// dam chos bstan pa rgyas par mdzad//
355a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyi ma me shel mdangs// pad+ma rin chen shing rtar ldan// rdo rje zla bya chu shel 'od// bdud rtsi ku mu dang pa'i khri// rdo rje sa 'dzin gser gyi mdog/ bum pa bgrang phreng pad+ma'i gdan// rdo rje thag bzangs
355a2(rgyud 'grel): btsod kyi mdog/ gos mtshon 'brug gi khri la gnas// 'dza sten gsuMl mnga' mdzad pa'i// stobs ldan phrin las myur ba'i tshul// oM bde gshegs sras tshogs bka' nyan bran// mkha' 'gro'i rgyal po rgyal mo rnams// rnam
355a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rang gi gzugs nyid la// rang bzhin bde gshegs sku gsung thugs// phyag rgya rnam bzhi da'u brgyan dang // rigs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba'i// rgyal ba'i sras tshogs thugs rje can// bka' gsang dam tshig byos la//
355a4(rgyud 'grel): slad byung mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// rigs 'dzin sgrub pa'i grogs mdzod cig/ dgra bgegs nad gdon par chad rnams// phrin las kun gyis 'dul mdzad cing // tshe dbang bkra shis bde legs tshogs// dus kun tu ni rgyos
355a5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod // oM phyi rol ma tshogs mkha' 'gro'i sku// thams cad 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// sna tshogs dbang phyug phrin las kyi// rtag tu rang gi don brtson zhing // drug po mkha' 'kho tshogs bslus pas// gzhan don
355a6(rgyud 'grel): las la rnam par rol// sprul pa yang sprul 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gsod don sha khrag las la brtson// shar gyi rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gtso// gzugs chen na mkha'i gos gyon ma// keng rus rnam par 'gyur ba dang // mkha' chen
355b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba'i sgyu ma che// rdo rje'i thogs 'bebs mthu rtsal can// mun pa'i tshogs 'joms srung ba'i sku// rdo rje rigs tshogs mkha' 'gro'i rgyal// dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum dang // 'khor lo bdun shing glo gug mtshon// mnga'
355b2(rgyud 'grel): rnon lcags kyu zhags pa dang // ral gri thod dbyug myudung 'phen ma// mi mgo sgyu ma'i phreng ba thogs// 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha me lhur 'phro// gtum pa'i dam tshig 'brug bzhin sgrogs// shar gyi gnas mchog spyan
355b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i rtse// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i las mdzod cig/ sgro phyogs rin chen 'od madz+nyAs brgyan// byang chub gnas bsrung rdzu 'phrul che// khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i sprul pa can// gshin rje'i tshogs 'joms mche ba thogs// 'od
355b4(rgyud 'grel): chen khams gsum khyab pa mo// rin chen dbyug pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs// sngon 'gro rol gri thod khrag 'thung // 'khor lo sta ri me thab dang // bdud kyi khram shing zhags pa bdun// rtse gsum mgo thod dum bu dang // dra ba lcags
355b5(rgyud 'grel): gyu 'bar ba thogs// 'jigs pa'i 'od 'bar rin chen gnas// rgya mtsho khyil ba'i klu gnas skyon// ban chen yi dgas gdan rnams su// sprul pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar// dam bcus phrin las skal la babya// chu
355b6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs pad+ma'i 'dod chags ma// rdo rje keng rusag kun 'joms// shugs 'chang rlung gi grong khyer bdag/ sgrub pa'i gsang 'dzin phyag rgya can// ro'i phreng bas bskyod pa'i gzugs// mtshon cha grog gi phreng thogs ma// dmar mo
356a1(rgyud 'grel): thong dbyug rgya ma'i phreng // gri gug 'then thag zangs dung dang // mkha' lding mi snying khrag 'dzags ma// mnga' yi me tog lcug ma dang // rdo rje'i phreng ba thod dbyug 'chang // ro'i nags tshal lcug ma can//
356a2(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum 'khrug pa'i khrag mtsho nas// dbang po srid gsum chags mdzad spyan// byang gi rdo rje las mchog gtso// kun tu bzang mo yid kyi shugs// rdo rje gnon byed dpa' mo'i mchog/ dpal ldan bzang mo'i rgyan chas
356a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ 'bar ba'i spyan can drag po'i gzugs// las rnams kun la mnga' mdzad rgyal// ljang gnag rdo rje rgya gram khrag/ me ri 'bar bcas lcags kyu zhags// gnod sbyin dbyug pa bdud ci dang // be con zla dkyil thag mdung
356a4(rgyud 'grel): gri 'khrul 'khor me tog lcug ma dang // rtse gsum pa dran mi yi gang // gnod byed stobs mchog 'jigs pa'i ri// byang gi gtum 'phrul rol pa'i tshogs// mu mo mkha' 'gro gzugs can rnams// dam tshig
356a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi gnas grub mdzod// oM bud+d+ha DA ki ni mAM ba l-I ta prA tIts+tsha ho oM phaT khaM'o// oM badz+ra DA kA ni maM ba liM ta pra tIts+tsha ho hUMHphaT kha'i/ oM rat+na DA k+Shi ni maM ba liM ta pra tits+tsha ho traM phaT kha'i/ oM pad+ma DA kI ni maM ba liM ta
356a6(rgyud 'grel): pra tits+tsha ho hri phaT kha'i// oM kaR+Ya DA kI ni maM ba li ta pra tits+tsha ho haM phaT kha'i// dzaHhUM baM hoHA baM sha ya/ A be sha yaM/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ pra tits+tsha ho/ shrI b+ha ga bAn/ kha kha
356b1(rgyud 'grel): khA/ le lce le/ kha'i kha'i kha'i/ oM g+hu ru tro ha ka/ sa ma ya blang sha kha'i/ bak+Sha su nan/ bud d+hak+She TA pra tiSh+Tha pa ya kha'o// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas kha chus mchod pa'o// lag gnyis rgyab sbyar snying gar gtad// mar+d+ha btsA
356b2(rgyud 'grel): srin lag mig gi tshul// gung mtheb gnyis gdangs rtse sbrang kha// mthe'u chung gyen du bsgreng ba'i rgyas// 'jig rten pa yi las tshogs rnams// phyogs kun dngos grub rgyas byed pa'o// oM pad+ma ba mu kaR+Ya sid d+hi hU~M/
356b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bdun rol bsgyur byas te/ mtheb gung mdzub srin gong bzhin sbyar// dngos grub mchog rnams dbang byas pas// brtan byed mi 'bral kun spyod mdzod// oM pad+ma ba mu khe a be sha ya hri/ rdo rje kha tshur
356b4(rgyud 'grel): bcangs pa yi// mau thi bau'i rtse bzhi mche ba'i tshul// mchod gtor phyogs kun gnas bsgyur bas// las kun byu ba mthar phyin 'gyur// oM badz+ra oM sa hUM/ pU sa hUM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ oM lus+ya hUM b+h+yo/
356b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin sngags bcas ldan// gtor ma'i las bskul gnas su btang // slar log dkyil 'khor ma nyams blos/ bkra shis dngos grub bskul bar bya// oM
356b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub dbang phyug yang dag bden pa'i stobs// phun sum tshogs pa/ kun tu 'byung ba'i gzhi/
357a1(rgyud 'grel): stobs mchog mi 'jigs gdon bral 'tshe ba med// bcom ldan bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog/ oM sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba chen po'i mchog/ dkyil
357a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba'i mthus// rigs kun bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog/ oM thams cad don grub don tshogs rgya chen po// thun mongs mngon shes rnam lnga sgo gsal zhing // gser 'gyur
357a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bcud len bdud rtsi'i tshogs// bcu drug bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog/ oM mtshan mchog dpe byang mi 'gyur brtan zhing brjid// bdud 'dul bkra shis gdugs mchog rgyal mtshan dung // 'khor
357a4(rgyud 'grel): lo dpal be'u gser nya bum pa mtshon// nye ba'i bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog/ oM zhi rgyas dbang dwags mnan bzlog las rnams kun// thams cad skad cig mthu yis grub gyur zhing // bdag gzhan cha lugs
357a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas kun sbyor byed pa'i// phrin las bkra shis mi 'gyur brtan par shog/ oM rgyal ba thams cad gnyis med mnyam pa'i dbyings// ye shes sku mchog rigs dang sprul pa'i tshogs// ma 'dres dngos grub 'bras
357a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang dpe dang bral// snyoms 'jug mi 'gyur bkra shis brtan par shog/ las rdzogs rnal 'byor pho mo kun// lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgyas 'brel// oM mi gnas ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'gyur ba med pa lhun
357b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur gyis grub pa dang // rab 'byams rgyal ba'i bka' la dbang thob nas// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du 'gyur bar shog/ 'di lta bu'i man ngag lung ston cing // bka' drin che ba'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang // srog lu gu rgyud
357b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'brel pa rnams// 'og min lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog tu// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa dang // gsang chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ru// bla med sku gsung thugs mchog grub gyur nas//
357b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i mdzad pas 'gro rnams sgrol byed shog/ rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa dag/ phrin las bcu drug gnas 'jug cing // phyag rgya gsang sngags 'khrul 'khor sbyor// bsam gtan bya ba'i las bzhin du// bdag gzhan
357b4(rgyud 'grel): don 'gyur dus tshod shes// cho ga rten 'brel rdzogs par spyad// de yang rten gyi dbye ba yis// bsam gtan bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang // las sbyor 'khrul 'khor rdzas las sgrub// mos sogs goms pa'i shugs kyis
357b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug/ dang por sbyor ba mthun pa'i las// sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga rdzogs// las ky-i yan lag dag byas nas// rlung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa tsamya// gsang ba las dang mthun gnas su// grogs sogs dbang bskur byin brlabs
357b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan// mos pas byang chub mchog sems bskyed// dang brtson blo gros 'gyur ba med// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgya chen sgom// tshul bzhin the tshom med pas 'grub// de ltar byin brlabs myur ba'i mthus// las kyi rtog tshogs
358a1(rgyud 'grel): rab 'jigs pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed yod pa kun// byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab grub pa'o// bya ba dang ni bzlogs pa drang // khyab par du ni dbrog
358a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag/ yan lag kun tu byed pa'i nang // des ni nor rnams kun kyang dbrog/ 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pas// khams gsum pa yang rgyus 'deb so// thar bar byed cing gsod par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad
358a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis// khams gsum po ni ma lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas blangs nasu// gur byas nus ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa ro// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang //
358a4(rgyud 'grel): thar bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad phyag rgya la// rigs mchog gtso bo'i lha mor bcas// sna tshogs phrin las ma lus la// rang gi tshul bzhin rnam par sbyar// ras dang gro ga shing sogs la// gur
358a5(rgyud 'grel): gum gi wang tshon sna las// bdag gzhan pho mo la dmigs te// rten gyi gsang sngags sbyor bcas bri// mu khyud phreng ba rim gsum nang // sna tshogs rdo rje lte ba la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad nyis 'gyur brtsegs/
358a6(rgyud 'grel): ring rigs mtshan mes brgyan par bri// 'khor lo lte ba rnams la ni// rigs bdag rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags// 'khor lo gnyis par yi ge brgya// sde tshogs mtshams bzhir zhal zin pa// mu khyud nang mar bri
358b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags// gnyis par yi ge ma mo rnams// gsum pa rigs kyi mtshon cha phreng // bar mtshams bsgrub bya'i ming gsol 'debs// de la 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags che// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba gnyis// rigs
358b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs// thams cad d+yAshwar nas g.ya su bskor// oM AHhUM shI de ba tA/ badz+ra satwa kro ta na mos stu sti sarba bud+d+ha/ sa ma yo gI na ma hUM hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM shrI badz+ra s+pho dzAstu te su rA ga nA mo
358b3(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI dz+wA la saM b+hA ra na ma hUM hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM ma hA rA ga mu ga ta/ shrI bai ro tsi na/ sarba tsakra sa mA yo ga rA gu i ti na mA oM khaM swA hA/ oM AHhUM ka ru Na a mu lA kro d+ha shrI hi ru ka/ sar+b+ba bodz+rod swa ma yo gi ni
358b4(rgyud 'grel): sto tra na ma swa stu tra na ma hi hUM phaT swA hA// oM A~M hUM shrI pad+ma rA ga shud+d+ha shud+d+ho sarba ma hA rA ga pad+mo sa ma yo gI nI na ma hri hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM shrI badz+ra b+ha ba te o dze nya tot+ta rat+no sa ma yo b+hI ni na ma traM hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM shrI a shotapar
358b5(rgyud 'grel): kra me sarba bI shA sa ma ya gI ma hA rA ga na ma hA hUM swA hA/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pas// rten gyi sbyor ba rang nyid bzhin// rdzogs par dgug gzhug brtan byas nas// byin brlabs dbang bskur shis byas la// mchod
358b6(rgyud 'grel): dbul bstod cing gsol ba btab// grangs kyi bzlas brjod rdzogs pa dang // tshogs bsags bsrung ba la rbod gdon// sgrub pos gzungs bzlas mchod par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs pas// chas gos rgyan
359a1(rgyud 'grel): chas rdzas bsags cing // rdo rje 'phrul 'khor sngags kyi mthus// phyi rol dgra bgegs bdud dpung tshogs// nyon mongs rnam rtog nang gi las// kun sbyor phyag rgya 'phrul 'khor sngags// bsam gtan
359a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi cho ga ltar// yang dag brtson pa mthu yis 'jig/ sa chu me rlung 'byung tshogs 'khrug/ thams cad zhi ba'i gan su 'gyur// las mchog khro bo'i sbyor bcas paso// gtor ma gos dang mar me zas// yungs kar
359a3(rgyud 'grel): thal chen sngags kyi mthus// bgegs la bka' bsgo bskrad par bya// zhag bdun la sogs dus kyi mthar// sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung zhing sbyang // me dang chu yis shis byas te// phyi nang las bzhin dag pa'i phyir//
359a4(rgyud 'grel): ming rus dge la gtan bzhag cing // sngags kyi chu yis khrus byas te// dri mchog me tog bzang ldan dang // gsang sngags 'khor las gnas kun brgyan// dbang po'i sgo rnams byin brlabs nas// gos byas phreng ba gdogs
359a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// dkyil 'khor gnasu rim pa bzhin// 'jug pa'i cho ga tshul bzhin du// gsang ba'i sngags blo ldan pa yis// ro la mchod rdzas cho ga rdzogs// dkyil 'khor chen por rigs dbang sogs// bya ba'i cho ga
359a6(rgyud 'grel): skabs kyi don// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gnas brtsams pas// bsreg khang rigs mchog pho brang du// ma lus dkyil 'khor gnyis med rdzogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug bstim// rnal 'byor grogs
359b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs rgyan bcas pas// bza' btung rgyan dang bsgo ba rnams// byin brlabs rim gyi lhur gsal zhing // phyi nang gsang bu'i mchod chen dbul// lus sngags mtha' rgyan 'brel ba'i mthus// stong gsum 'gro
359b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas sbyong bar bya// me lha mnyes pas las rdzogs te// dngos grub 'dod don gsol ba gdab// mnyam nyid mi g.yos bstod byas nas// smon lame rgya mtsho don mthar dbyung // dkyil 'khor rnam gsum rdzo
359b3(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// bde tshon byang chub sems nyid sku// sngags kyis dag po'i sku gdung rnams// sku gsung thugs ldan phyag rgya che// bskol par myi gnas phyag rgya rdzogs// rgyan tshogs mchod pas mnyes par bya//
359b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// ji ltar gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas// dur khyod lha'i gnas rnams dang // mo me'i gnas kyi thal ba mchog/ thams cad bral ba'i bsrung ba ni// thig le 'am so so'i ris
359b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum bya// phyogs mtshams na mkha' sa bcings na// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu yis 'gram// lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis// gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang // khrus byas pa dang
359b6(rgyud 'grel): phog pa yis// phyogs mtshams namakha' sa bcings na// bsrung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o// mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni// yungs kar bskyed nas blang bar bya// bza' btung lus la byug pa dang // phyogs bcur gtor
360a1(rgyud 'grel): bas bsrung bar 'gyur// dpa' bo gcig pa'i brten rnams kyis// sbyor ba gsum ldan bsrung ba'i mchog/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor rgyas pas kyang // thams cad rgyas 'debs rdo sems mchog/ sangs rgyas
360a2(rgyud 'grel): kun bdag sbyor ldan pas// phyogs bcu legs pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul// bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas// bsrungs pas sangs rgyas kun dgongs 'gyur// he ru ka dpal gyi rnam 'phrul bas// thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag/
360a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsrung ba mi 'gyur che// mi mthun gdon sogs mod la zhi// sna tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas// sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// 'bar bas blta ba'i tshul bzhugs na// rdo rje 'bar ba mi bzang 'grub// rdo rje khu
360a4(rgyud 'grel): tshuchutshur gnyis bcings nas// go chu bgro ba'i tshul du bya// 'di yis bsrung bar byas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra// mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i// rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub// dus rnams kun tu 'gro gzhan dag
360a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams tshe 'phel longs spyod tshogs// 'khyil 'khor phyag rgya sngags kyi mthus// bde gshegs 'khor lo sgyur rgyalnga stobs// lha dbang klu yis dbang sogs kyis// 'dod yon rin chen gter sogs dpal// lang
360a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang nad med bde// yon tan rgyas pa'i tshogs 'phel 'gyur// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rin chen 'phreng // mu khyud yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes// rigs mchog lha'i mtshan ma sngags// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i tshul du
360b1(rgyud 'grel): dgos// bsam bya bris shing bkod pa dag/ byin brlabs brtan par 'gyur med gnas// chos sems pa yi tshul ston cing // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag dang // zhi sogs lta bas bltas na ni// rims dug nud kun rnam par
360b2(rgyud 'grel): sel// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// mthe'u chung lcags sgyu lta bur spel// mdzub mo bsnyams pa'i rtse mo mnan// nad rnams thams cad bzlog par byed// yongasu gyur te btig nasu// dpral bar legs par
360b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya// ma lus lus pa med pa yis// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje bsdams pa byas pa las// mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa// zug rngu kun las grol 'gyur zhing // nad rnams kun gyis
360b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa me // grub pa dpal gyis spyan bcings nas// dI yis phyis mig longs byas mthong // sbyor ldan khu tshur dam pa yis// slad nas kha nas drangs te btung // de bzhin rims gnod dug rnams kun// sbyor ldan khu
360b5(rgyud 'grel): tshur tshul gyis btung // oM sarba ta thA gauR+Sha ta mis ho// 'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog/ zug rngu med cing 'brar ba'i mchog/ lag g.yas sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcing // byis pa nad med bde bar bsrung // g.yos pa klu'i
360b6(rgyud 'grel): mgo'i gdengs ka brgya// 'bar ba'i chu la ston 'bebs bcas pas// dug gi las rnams 'dul byed// 'chi ba'ang 'tsho bar byed pa'i mchog/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcings pa yi//
361a1(rgyud 'grel): gung mo la ni reg byas te// gdon rnams kun las thar bar 'gyur// ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas// gung mo gnyis ni mdud par bcings// mdzub mo mthe'u chung rje mo can// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs
361a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur bteg/ smin mtshams bzhag pas mkha' 'gro yi// las rnams ma lus lus med 'grub// sbyor ba sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthus// glang po rta gya 'gro ba'i tshogs// skyed tshal me tog ldum ra rnams// thams
361a3(rgyud 'grel): cad gso ba bla nI med// thams cad bdag nyid kun spyod pa'i// gnas gsum 'khrul 'khor bsdu ba'i rgya// thun mong khams gsum las las byung // dus 'dir dngos grub las tshogs 'joms// mchog phyag rgya
361a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sku// 'dod don 'bras bu 'di sbyor dpal// chags pa gnyis tshul longs spyad pas// 'bras bzang mdzad pa chen po 'grub// khu tshur snying gar bcings pa ni// bud med phyag rgyar de bshad// bud medo sbyo
361a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus pa// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// g.yon pa 'gying pa'i tshul du byas// lag g.yas bdag gi snying gaR+Sha ni// gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas nas// bud meng+ga thams cad dbang du gyur// dpalnga ldan pad
361a6(rgyud 'grel): ma sna tshogs 'dzin// g.yon pa brdeg pa'i khu tshur dang // g.yas pa sdang ba 'grub pa dang // sangs rgyas dbang phyug ting 'dzin bya// g.yon pa dril bu sgra sgrogs shing // g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis// rdo rje
361b1(rgyud 'grel): gyen du gsor zhing bskor// sgyu ma thams cad dbyung bar bya// lag pa g.yon pa bla ma bzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis// sbyor ba sngags kyi mdangs bcas pa// mi dge'i las rnams sel bar byed// bdag
361b2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gAr 'dren tshul du// g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin// g.yas nas de rdzogs rin chen bdun// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du// pad+ma sna tshogs pa yi 'dzin// g.yas
361b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje 'gying pa yis// dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyuraro// drag po las kyi 'dul mdzad pa'i// mtshon cha gsang sngags spu gri'i 'os// gnod gdug phyi nang dgra bgegs sogs// thil bar gyur pa'ang 'ching bar
361b4(rgyud 'grel): byed// mtshon cha lnga yi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum 'dul byed rgyal bar gyur// dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang // kun tu sbyor dang 'dren dang myur// 'gongs dang 'phen drang gsal ba yis// drag po'i las rnams
361b5(rgyud 'grel): kun la sbyor// drag shul sbyor bas gnon pa yI// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba sngags ldan pas// rkang pa brkyang dang gnod pa dang // bskums nas 'debs pa'i stabs dag gis// g.yas g.yon sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ches//
361b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnams thams cad mnan par bya// sdig med stobs kyis ngo mngon du// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyu 'bras dang / byang chub pha rol phyin sogs dang // lha chen tshogs bcas mnan byas te// dga'i sdug lha
362a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshogs bcas dang // yon tan longs spyod spyad par bya'o// rdo rje snying po gzhan 'joms byed// phyir bzlog rnam par rgyal ba'i mthus// 'khor lo sngags phreng phyag rgya dang // sbyor ba kun gyis spro byed
362a2(rgyud 'grel): pas// nyam pa lag dang bde phyogs dang // thadA ka de bzhin gyen du 'dags// 'di dag bzlog pa'i phyag rgya ste// gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya// mar me bdud rtsi rdzas rnams kyis// dngos grub blangs nas lha rnams la//
362a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod bstod rta rag bro gar dang // dga' ba'i 'gying bcas blang bar bya// smin ma mig dang so dang mchu// kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas// phyag rgya yongasu grol ba yis// dkyil 'khor rgyas
362a4(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga dmigs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin// rdzogs par phyung ste mdun bzhag nas// rim bzhin mchod bstod gshegasu gsol// phyag rgya sngags bcas tshogs bcad kyis// dgyes shing brtan par 'gro lo
362a5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs// phyi rol rab rten gnas bcas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bsdu// skar nyid bde ba chen po'i sku// thams cad phyag rgya yab yum gnas// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas// dpal ldan lag pa
362a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa yis// pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar bzhag/ bdag gi mig ni gyen du lta// kaM haM rin chen rgya gram gnyis// spyi bo snying ga'i gnas rnams spro// oM TuM rdo rje khu tshur gyis// go cha bgos pa bcing bar bya// spyi bo dang ni
362b1(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba gnyis// glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu gnyis// rdo rje phreng bas bcings pa dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ dUr+ya dpyangs tshul du bcings na ni// bsgyings dang bcas pas mtha' nas dgrol// drar dpyangs dkar dam ru
362b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'phur zhing // thal mo brdabs pas brtan par bya// rdzas rnams legs par bskol nas kyang // rdul tshon chu bo chen por dor// ba yi rnam lngas logs byug cing // mchod rdzas rten sdigs ci mdo sbed// khro bo mchod
362b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod phur pa bton// bdud rtsis khrus gsol gzi byin bskyed// phyogs skyong rgyal po gsol bskyed cing // mnyes byas zhi sems gshegasu gsol// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bkang byas
362b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ brda'i mtshams la sogs pa dgrol// srung ma tshigs mchod btang rag btang // spyod lam ma nyams dkyil 'khor blos// mdzad spyod tshogs chen gnyisu brtag/ bkra shis rgya chen gdon bya zhing // pha rol phyin so Da
362b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod sbyin bsgrags// mtshan rtag bdud rnams 'joms mdzad cing // bsnyen sgrub kun gyi don gsal sbyor// tshogs dbang dkyil 'khor las la mkhas// dngos grub gdung ldan rgyal po bzhi// sku gsung thugaso lam
362b6(rgyud 'grel): ma nyams par// dus kun rgyun bzlas rgyun sbrel zhing // dngos kun sbyor ba'i las kun mkhas// gong ma'i gtsang 'tshang rgyal 'theb las// mtshams bcad bskang gso'i dngos spyang bshams// gtor dang las brtson
363a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro bskang // bar skabs dkyil 'khor dbyig so mchod// thun mtshams bzlas brjod lngas rdo rje// spyan yangs lha gsal gsang sngags gdon// gus pas rtag tu lha mnyes brtson// grogs
363a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgo bya'i las sbyin spyod// rtog bral gzungs thub phyag rgya gsol// des don zab mo'i gsang ba mchog/ rims sam yod na cig car du// mchog gi rnal 'byor sbyangs pa'i mthus// tshe 'dis bde gshegs
363a3(rgyud 'grel): yul la sbyor// dka' bo kun gyis ma rnyed pa'i// dam pa'i nor bu rin po che// gang gis drin gyis bdag las rnyed// ya mtshan rmad 'byung ston pa'i gnas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde
363a4(rgyud 'grel): chen po// 'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos// dka' thub dka' bar spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub// de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun za de bzhin thams cad
363a5(rgyud 'grel): spyod// spyod pa ci dag 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa dang // 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // rgod dam rab tu smra ba dang // gang la ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil
363a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa'ang // sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnal 'byor 'odi yis ni// thams cad 'grub par byin brlabs
363b1(rgyud 'grel): pas// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yang mi 'gyur// bud med kun gyi rgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas// bud med sgyu ma khyad par che//
363b2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dong // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud medo 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// chags ming chags dang bral ba min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigaso//
363b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog yin// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// bde bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob/
363b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba'i mchog/ de bas bde ba nyid kyi phyir// spangs
363b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas bde bya kun thob bo// kun tu kun nAs thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brta na g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to// sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang
363b6(rgyud 'grel): byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de bzhin pad+ma pad+ma 'chang // nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // de dag gi yang rigs
364a1(rgyud 'grel): yin no// dngos grub rlabs chen phrin la sogs// grangs med rgya chen don spyod pas// bdag gzhan bya ba kun rdzogs par// ye shes 'khor lo'i tshogs chen sa// rnal 'byor chen po'i don gsal 'byu
364a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya bzhi// zung 'jug gnyis med rdzogs pa'i mthus// dngos grub rgya chen zab mo mtshan// lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog ni 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba bde myong ba// 'dod
364a3(rgyud 'grel): chags ther zug brtan pa can// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bya'i mchog/ bdag gi spyad par de spyod do// dkyil 'khor rgya tshon brtan pa'i zlos//
364a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog mnyes pa'i tshul la spyang // cung zad sbyor ba klog pa na// sgo gsum bsod nams tshogs 'gyur ba'i// pha rol phyin drug smon lam sogs// 'gro don spyod pa rgya chen brtsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
364a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// rA sa ya nI bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tsho dang // lang tsho nad med bde mchog grub// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/
364a6(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams dang thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bdag don mi gnas mya ngan 'das/
364b1(rgyud 'grel): rigs drug dkyil 'khor rgya chen dang // gzhan don 'jig rten bde longs spyod// lha chen kun gyi rgyal srid tshogs// thams cad dmar mdzad dbang bsgyur zhing // 'dod don gzhan la sbyin par mdzad// sangs rgyas
364b2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs nas kyang ni sbyin mdzad na// las mchog dag ni rab 'byams dang // dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mdzad spyod mtha' yas sngags tshul dag/ las dang 'bras bu'i
364b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes 'gro byed// yan lag bzhi'i don snang ba// 'jug byed bzhi las 'bras bu'i tshul// rten gyi sgrub po snang ba bzhi// bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya lam rim dang // sa yi khyad par dngos grub 'bras// phrin las bzhi snang bcu
364b4(rgyud 'grel): drug tshogs// gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul// sum cu rtsa gnyis brgya nyi shu// rtsa brgyad yang dag grub pa'i gzhung // sgrub gzhung rgyas 'bring bsdus pa dang // shin tu bsdus pa'i ngang tshul can// go rims gnas skabs
364b5(rgyud 'grel): dadabye bar shes// thog mar sgrub blo phun tshogs pas// rten gyi yan lag bzhi ldan 'jug/ tshogs bsag rnal 'byor sbyor rnal 'byor// mthong gsal rnal 'byor brtan rnal 'byor// rim bzhin goms pa gsal ba'i
364b6(rgyud 'grel): sgo/ dang por sbyor dang brtan pa dang // yang dag ye shes rnam par grol// mtshan ma rtags kyis goms byas pa'i// bcu drug 'jug pa'i bye brag gis// thog tshen nyes don zung sdud sbyor// 'gro drug rang rgyud rtags
365a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul// theg dman snang ba phyogs gcig pa// blo gros zab mo rgya chen don// nges 'byung zung 'jug mang po'i sgo// snang ba tshul mthun khyad par can// rnam pa'i chags gsal mtha'
365a2(rgyud 'grel): yas grol// nyams myong rim gyis zhen chags bral// snang ba bzhi las bcu drug tshogs// bdag nyid gzhan tshogs gnyis kar 'brel// chags sdang btang snyoms tshul gyis 'jug/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung
365a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog lam dang // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras bzlog pa'i tshul// bden gnyis rnam shes bden brdzun brtag/ sgyu ma gnyisu med pa'i dngos// dkyil 'khor chu zla 'od gsal sku// zung 'jug bde ba chen po'i dbyings//
365a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsum mdzad pa mdzad pa yis// theg pa'i snang ba ma 'gugs pa'o// bsnyen pa las la sbyar byas nas// nye bsnyen gsal bar gyur pa las// sgrub pa snga ma'i gnas 'gyur te// sgrub pa chen 'bras bu la spyod
365a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rim 'jug bsnyen sgrub bcu gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor rgya chen gnas sbyor zhing // zung 'jug bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis// zab mo'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // tshad med phyag rgya dman pa'i rgya// gsang
365a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyag rgya mchog gi rgyas// gsal 'debs rgyal po mchog sku// bzhi yi bcu drug rdzogs byed pa'o// dang po sku gsal brtan pa dang // dam tshig ye shes gnyis med mnyes// sku gsung thugs mchog byin brlabs
365b1(rgyud 'grel): mthu// bde gshegs rigs mchog ye shes sbyor// thabs kyis rgya che lam bgrod cing // shes rab zab mo'i lam la 'jug/ zung du 'brel pas phyag rgya'i lam// gnyis med bgrod pa'i lam mchog yin//
365b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu rkyen gnyis med tshogs gnyis rdzogs// tshul bzhis bcu drug lam du 'gyur// tshogs drug rnam par sbyor ba yis// yon tan tshogs rdzogs don gsal sa// rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas sa yi mthar// bzhi
365b3(rgyud 'grel): sa bdun drug brgyad du snang // rgyu 'bras dbye bas bcu drug tshogs// rim sbyar cig car thob pa'i tshul// mis spyod lam la sbyor ba dang // sar chud las la spyod pa dang // rnam smin phyag rgya chen po dang // bya ba
365b4(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin sangs rgyas so// tshe 'dis rig 'dzin gnas sbyor zhing // de nas sangs rgyas sa drug rdzogs// 'jig rton thun mong bdag don dang // gzhan don mchog 'gyur dngos grub bzang // bdag gzhan
365b5(rgyud 'grel): las snod sgo bzhi nas// bcu drug tshogs la longs spyod mdzad// mkha' 'gro tshogs med stobs ldan zhing // mi mthun rkyen gyis 'jigs pa med// ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs bum// bdud rtsi'i bcud
365b6(rgyud 'grel): len rig 'dzin gser// sku gsung thugs sogs mi 'jigs stobs// phra zhing khyab mdzad dpal gyi gzhi// kun tu brtan pas bdag gzhan don// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod rdzogs// phrin las bzhi spyod bcu
366a1(rgyud 'grel): drug tshogs// 'bad ba med pa'i tshul gyis 'grub// mnyes shing srung mdzad btang dang grol// gso ba stobs 'phel rgyal byed brtan// dgug cing rengs shing rmongs pa dang // dbye mnan
366a2(rgyud 'grel): bskrad dang pham phyed pa'o// dam pas rgyud don rgya chen tshogs// pad mdzes nyi mas rgyas ltar byas// bde mchog mkha' 'gro'i don bstan las// khyad par lhag pa gzhan du med// de nyid cung zhig gosal
366a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir// tshul 'jug dam pa'i rjes 'brang ste// rtogs par sla don mtha' gnyis bral// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bzod par mdzad// kun mchog rgya chen dri med dag/ ston ka'i zla gsal sgrib bral
366a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar// 'gro kun sangs rgyas thams cad dang // mnyam par sbyor ba'i gnas thog shog/ yan lag bzhi'i don snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas shing dngos grub mnyes pa hUM mdzad grags pas
366a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / mnga' bdag gcan po byang chub sems dpa'i bkris/ dpal bsam yas kyi 'ching phu ru dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon paN+Di ta
366a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje bzhad pa dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po rma rin chen mchog gis dbang sgrub dang bcas par bsgyur cing bshad nas/ gtan la phab pa'o//
367a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i rim pa bzhug so//
367b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gi maN+Da la sA d+ha na kra ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems
367b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// ma 'gags rnam 'phrul ye shes chen po'i 'od// zab cing rgya che gsungs dbyangs sna tshogs sgrogs// yon tan rgyan gyis cho 'phrul bshad mthar phyin// rigs drug lha mo'i tshogs bcas rgyal
367b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ theg chen gsang ba'i lam mchog gsal mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas gnyis pas nges pa'i dgongs mdzad 'grol// 'khor 'das ma spangs las sgrol rgyal chen po// rim bzhin rgyud pa'i dam pa rnams
367b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// rgyud mchog sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang mdzod las// dkyil 'khor chen po'i las la rim pa dag/ legs bsdus rnam 'grel sogs kyis gnas byas kyang // phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub thabs gsal ma bstan//
367b5(rgyud 'grel): dam pas ma 'ongs rnams la brtser dgongs phyir// sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag don sdus te// rgya mtsho rgya chen bdud rtsi thigs pa'i tshul// yang dag sgrub don yan lag phyogs gcig bshad// dam pa'i gsungs dang
367b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyud pa mi brten cing // dgos 'brel yan lag 'thad pa'i sgrub med par// rang dgor smos tshig khra bzhin smra byed pa// gsang don smos phyir log 'dren gtso bor grag/ dgongs pa'i rim pas sgrub don ma bshad kyang //
368a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pas las rgyas myur ba'i cho ga yis// brten pa'i stobs kyis dus mtshungs grol byed pa// khyad par thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gAsal bstan bshad// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs mdzad ji
368a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin pa'i// yang dag sgrub pa'i bsnyen sgrub cho ga las// dang po rten gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sgrub pa tshon po'i los la 'jug par bya// de dag ji bzhin lags par spyod pa'i mthus// tshe 'di las drang dngos grub
368a3(rgyud 'grel): phun tshogs gnas// rig 'dzin gnas thib sangs rgyas sar 'gro zhing // zag med yon tan phrin las go bar ston// grang zhig rgyal ba rnams kyi rjesu 'jug pa dag gis ni nges pa'i don du bshad pa'i theg pa ngag
368a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang phyag rgya bzhi dang tshad mas bsgrubs te bla ma brgyud pa la brten par bya'o// de la dang po rten gyis mtshan nyid ni// zhi zhing des la gsong por smra ba dang // sgyu sogs med pas gzhan don brtson pa dang // nga rgyul khro
368a5(rgyud 'grel): gtu dang bral ba// 'gro ba kun gyi yid 'ongs zhing // dam pa'i bshes gnyen la brten te// sgrubasu 'gro ba dang / byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang / sdom pa blang ba drag bya'o// de nas theg pa chen po la mos pa'i
368a6(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyis dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / yang dag pa'i lta bas shes rab gsum bskyed cing snod kyi rim pa dag gsal bar byas nas rdo rje theg pa la mos pas de nyid kyi bla ma dam pa la brten te// dkyil
368b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du 'jug pa dang / dbang bzhi rim pa bzhin du thob par bya ba dang / de dag gi dam tshig ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas pas 'gro ba thams cad bsgral zhing byang chub kyi lam la dgos par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje
368b2(rgyud 'grel): theg pa las bshad pa'i don bany+dzi du bdag bsgral bar bya ste/ dod pa la skyon dub med pa dang / brtson 'grus la thang lhod med pa dang / lta ba la dbye gsal med pa dang / spyod pa la 'gro 'theb myed pas de bzhin
368b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te// sgrub pa rim pa'i gdams dog mnos shing lta bas mtshan nyid dang / b+h+yo bI mtshan nyid dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang // sgrub pi mtshan nyid dag the tsho med par nyam su blangaso// des bdag dang
368b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag rjesu gzung ba'i phyir gzugs brnyan kyi dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin shes shing bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi shes pas rgyas gdab pa dang / sngags
368b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhis dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyis lha la sogs pa rnams dgug pa dang / mchod pa gsum gyi rim par shes pas lha dang slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang / las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la sbyor ba'i
368b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dang / bdag dang gzhan la sogs pa ma lus rnams// gang 'dod pa bsrung ba'i cho ga dang / slar sdu ba'i cho ga dang / gshegasu gsol ba'i cho ga rnams la mkhas shing byang bar byas nas bdud rtsi lnga'i ri bus
369a1(rgyud 'grel): bcang zhing bsgrub par bya'o// de yang rdo rje rgyal po dang / rgyul 'byeb kyis ma zin par gyur nas/ gnas dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nags tshulnga phur sum tshogs
369a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'khor ba dang // yul dang / yo byas dang / rgyan chas phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas lus la sbyor ro// de la gnas ni rnal 'byor pa nyid dag shin tu nyams dga' bar gyur pa'i sa gzhi pad+ma 'dre ba las
369a3(rgyud 'grel): dbus mtho zhing nam mkha' 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ltar mngon pa/ shar dang byang du gzhol zhing phyogs gzhan mtho bar gyur pa nogs tshal bzang po me tog 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis brgyan ci / chu rgyun gsal
369a4(rgyud 'grel): bas mtha' bzhi rgyas pa'i ri 'am// ljongs sam/ thang la sogs pa rin po che dang sman 'bras kyis brgyan pa ni shin tu bkra shes par gyur to// de las gzhan pa'i las phra mo dag sgrub po la ni rigs so so'i
369a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas dang mthun par bya'o// der shis pa dang mi shis pa'i lhas brtag pa'i phyir saM pus nub tsam du brkos la slar sa des dgang ba 'am dri chu bzang po dang sbyar bas bkadA ste/ mnyam par bzhug pas rdo rje dril
369a6(rgyud 'grel): bu bzung zhing rang gi sngags brjod nas mi drag par gom par brgya'i gnas log ste blta bar bya'o// de las ma legs pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba dag la ni g.yas g.yon gyi gan su spo bar bya zhing / pra sen la
369b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs brtago/ de nas bsongs kyi tsho kyis snod dag par bya ba'i phyir// sku'i rten gzugs pa dang gsung gi sgra bsgrags pa dang // mchod sbyin po rgya cher btang zhing // gtor ma'i tshogs kyis mgron rnams tshim par bya'o// de na
369b2(rgyud 'grel): yang rnar shre bI phyag rgya'i/ ye shes kyi phyag rgyas kyang brtags nas shin tu dge bar gyur pa der bslab par bya'o// gal te mtshan ma ngan pa lta bu zhig na ni zhi ba dang drag pos gdul bar bya zhing de dag gi sbyin sreg la sogs pas
369b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyuraro// yul gyi bdag po rgyal po la sogs pa dag ni bslang ba 'am/ rin gyis nyos pa 'am/ mi snang la ni rang gi lha'i sbyar bas gtor ma btang ste/ mgron rnams tshim nas/ laso la bsgo zhing de lus
369b4(rgyud 'grel): khyad par du so'i lha mo dang / sa bdag tA pa la'i 'khor rnams la bslangs nas de dag mnyes par bya'o// de nas bzhi de dag tu dri chab byin gyis brlabs pa sngags kyis gtor zhing / tinge 'dzin gsal ba'i 'phro
369b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus bdud rtsi dang // yi ge gsum gyis sbyang ba byas nas dkyil 'khor ji tsam 'dod pa'i rgyar so gzhi brkos te/ dngos grub 'bring gi don du/ khru do dang / sor bzhi'i tshad du brkos pa'i chad 'phang du brtsig
369b6(rgyud 'grel): pabapar bya'o// de'i dus su rus pa dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / sol ba dang / sa ro rnams bsal te dri zhim po'i chu dang / sa mnyam 'jim pa sbyin po dang bsres nas brtsigs te// sman dang / rin po che dang / dri
370a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams snying po ru gzhugo// yang chos nyid rnam par dgu pa'i don pas mo// oM swa b+hA bA shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+hams b+hA ba shud+d+ho ho zhes brjod de// dri'i chus byug par bya'o// de nas mchod gtor smra tshogs nye bya
370a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyang dang / rigs kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa lngas rang nyid rgyan gyis brgyan te// sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i don du/ bruM ga ga na khaM AHhUM/ zhes brjod cing na mkha' stong pa'i rang bzhin las byung ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ri
370a3(rgyud 'grel): rob dang bcas pa brtan par gnas shing // rdo rje sa gzhi dang / ra ba dang / gur la mye 'od dang bcas par bsam mo// de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu gnas pa la phyogs bzhi// de'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni// sna
370a4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje bcings pa sa la bzhag ste// oM me de ni badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM zhes pa'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi mdun du sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo bum pa 'dzin pa bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas pa las zhol bsil dang
370a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon phul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// ji ltar
370a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud las ni// rgyal bar bya phyir dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas// ji srid las ma grub pa'i bar du bzhugasu gsol ba dang // lha mo 'gyed nas
370b1(rgyud 'grel): mdangs phyung ste slar smras pa// khyed rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par gyis shig ces brjod par bas mo// de nas sgrub pa po dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu gnas pa la phyogs bzhi'i rnal 'byor pa rgyan gyis brgyan
370b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing // lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab par byi ste/ oM byams chen na mkha'i rigs sbyor ba// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 'jigs pa'i skyabs// rnam 'byed gsal ba'i chos mchog can// yang dag ye
370b3(rgyud 'grel): shes spyod pa grol// a la la la la ho// oM snying rje'i gnas mchog dag pa'i dngos// mnyam nyid chos kun 'byung ba yis// yon tan rin chen mdzod ston pa'i// rnam 'phrul chos las rab tu grol// a la la la la ho//
370b4(rgyud 'grel): oM dga' ba'i pad+mo mtshan ldan pa// kun rtog dngos gsal chags pa med// rdo rje gsang gsum gnas ngon pa'o// brjod 'byung tshigs las 'das pa'o// a la la la la ho// oM btang snyoms gnas dran dra ba sel//
370b5(rgyud 'grel): phrin las bdag po stobs rdzogs pa// bya ba'i ye shes mthar mdzad cing // sprul pa'i dkyil bstan du gsol// oM e lu la la la ho// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
370b6(rgyud 'grel): gtso// sdig pa thams cad las sgrol zhing // bsod nams dngos grub kun 'byung ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ mthong dga' thos pas grol byed pa// laso mchog gsang ba chen po'i tshogs// bdag nyid
371a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po bstan du gsol// a lA la lA la ho// zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las khro bo rta mchog rol pa'i skur bsgom zhing phyogs bcur bsgyings bu'i tshul
371a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnas te/ mig g.yas par ma las byung ba'i nyi ma'i mes thams cad bsreg pa dang / mig g.yon par a lA su byung ba'i zla ba'i chus dag pa dang / sna'i rtse mo lus byung ba'i rlung gis thams cad 'thor zhing
371a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag gis mtshon cha khrel nas spro ba mdzad do// oM sum+b+ha ni suM b+hA hUM/ lha klu gnod sbyin 'byung po dang // dri za srin po sha za'i tshogs// gshin rje me me mkha' 'gro bdug/ gnod byed drag po ma lus rnams// rnam dag swa
371a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung byed pa yi bdag po'i dka'// thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs// nga yi bka' lngas 'da' ma byed// gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che// rdo rje rdo rje kho nAM gas// thal ba'i tshogs bzhin bshig
371a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed// rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// 'dod gsum skyes rnams bsod bya ste// 'jig par gyur phyir gzhan du gdengs// zhes lan gsum brjod cing sa gzhi skor
371a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs sbyong bcu dag gnas lngar bsdus te/ khro bo stobs po dang sprin 'dra la sogs pa'i phur bus gdab po// oM badz+ra g+haHg+haHg+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pa paM phaT/ hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya
371b1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra d+ha ro/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+ra kI la hUM phaT/ ces brjod cing / sum+b+ha ni'i sngags kyis bkug ste// dbang ldan gyi mtshams btsams nas brtsam par bya'o// de nas dpal he ru kar bsgom zhing mkha' 'gro mu brgyad dang
371b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i steng stabs kyis thams cad bsrung bar bya'o// de nas las kyi rdo rjes phyi rol gyi stegs bu la mchod gtor bshams te/ dkon mchog gsum dang por bzhag nas/ tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i
371b3(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs ma rnams dgug cing mchod pa dang / 'gro ba drug pa gnas pa'i lha srin sde rgyud la cha gcig dbul ba dang / ldan chags kyi bges rigs rnamasA la gtor ma sngos nas khyad par gyi gautor ma'i gzhi rgyal
371b4(rgyud 'grel): po sde bzhi la dbul zhing rten la bzhag ste// mnga'i gsol nas phyi mtshams bcad// de nas stegs bu tshad dang ldan pa legs par brtsig te// phyogs bzhir sbyin sregs gi thab khung bzhi dang // mtshamasu rta mchog
371b5(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'i dkyil 'khor rtsom par bya'o// de nas legs par rtsig cing byugs nas pa'i rnam pa lnga dang / dri zhimu pI'i spos dang / sman rnams bsres te byug cing // dri'i steng du bdud rtsi lnga'i chu byin gyis brlabs nas
371b6(rgyud 'grel): byug go// de nas lha rnams kyi gan su rig pas thig gdab cing bdud rtsi lngas dbusu thig le gru bzhi pa lha mo nyi shu'i gnasu zlum por byas la// de la lha so so'i sngags kyis me to// dgram par bya'o// de'i
372a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su mchod pa'i tshogs dgram snying // sbyang ba dang / bsrung ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gzhi ri ting nge 'dzin dang / rten gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gsal byar byas nas pre
372a2(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang / mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pas mnyes par byas nas bstod cing gsol ba gdab po// de yang pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/ g.yas pas spos thog lo// g.yon
372a3(rgyud 'grel): pas dril bu dkrol zhing tshig 'di brjod do// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan 'das// ma lus sems tsan don mdzad pa'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sras dang bcas// stobs mchog rgyal chen rnams la bstod// sangs rgyas thams
372a4(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon gyur las rnams grub pa'i phyir// rdo rje bsang ba bdag gis bri// brtse bas slob ma rnams phyir dang // bdag nyid rnam la mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan khyed
372a5(rgyud 'grel): la bdag gus te// dgyes mdzad 'os par gyur pa lags// bdag cag rnams la dgongasu gsol// bya ba chen po 'khor lo'i phyir// 'bras gnas byang chub sems srogs dang // gas du sngags gsang ba'i lha nyid dang //
372a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byung tshogs 'jig rten skong ba dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rjes dga' ba// bstan pa dga' ba'i 'gro ba dag/ gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan pa'i// rigs rnams 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gtso// don grub gsang ba bdag gis
372b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsam// rjesu brtse bar nyer dgongs te// gnang ba ru mdzad pa'i 'od lagaso// zhes lan gsum gsol ba btab nas// yang mchod pa cung zad phul te brtan par bzhugasu gsolo// de nas mchod rdzas dang / rnal 'byor pa'i
372b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan cha dang / bum pa dang / yo byad dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / rnal 'byor pa'i tshogs rnams 'tshogs par byas nas de'i rjes la phrin las rnam pa bzhi 'am/ yang nA gang dgos pa'i sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas rnal
372b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa rnams la stan pa bde ba la gnas te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas lus ngag yid gsum mthu bskyed cing / bdag dang 'gro ba sbyang ba dang / dbang po dgug pa dang / 'phyogs pa la tshigs bsags
372b4(rgyud 'grel): papa dang / sems can thams cad la tshogs bsags pa rnams bya'o// yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing lha tshogs rnams spyan drangs la// bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa dang // tshogs kyi mchod pas nyams pa
372b5(rgyud 'grel): bskang ba dang // gang dag dam tshigs ma 'dres pa dag ni bskye mnan bya zhing gsar bu dgra 'jug pa la ni rigs pa'i dbang lnga dam tshig dang bcas pa bzhin no// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas mtshams
372b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi las bya ste// phur pa dar gyi bcod pan can bcu drug la khro bo chen po bcur bskyed cing ye shes kyi khro bo dgug gzhug gnyisu med par byas nas mchod cing bstod do// bzlas brjod rdzogs par phul bas mnyes
373a1(rgyud 'grel): shing brtan par byas nas phyogs skyong gi gzugs la 'dug pa'i sems phab ste gdub par bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ba rnam par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi sgrub pa po dag
373a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyun chas phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / tsha ste gos lnga dang / srad bu dang / thal bas mtshan cing rdo rje rgyal mthib yu mo dang bcas pas rang gi lha gsal bar byasA la/ thig srung ros sor pa'i rgyu las byung ba sngags kyis byin
373a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs nas skal bar bya ste// ring thung ni dkyil 'khor nyid 'gyur la/ sdom phra ni sgo'i nyi shu'i tshad do// de ltar kha dog lnga'i dog pa byas nas rin po che'i snod du bzhag ste// rigs kyi ye ges lhar bskyed cing sngags
373a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlabs nas lha rnams dgug gzhug byas la/ mchod cing bstod nas bsgril bar bya'o// oM dI ba ta dr-iSh+Ti oM ku sha dzaHoM badz+ra sa ma ya su traM mA ti kra hUM/ oM A hUM/ dang po shar nas nub tu brkyang ste gdab
373a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de yang thabs kyi bsrung gnas dang / shes rab kyis gsang ba'i gnasu drangs te/ oM AHhUM dz+nyA dza zhes brjod do// stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongasu gsol// rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan pas// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor
373a6(rgyud 'grel): legs grub cing // 'gro ba'i don la bsgral bar mdzad// oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta sarba saM hUM/ zhes brjod cing / thog skor dang bcas pas na mkha' la btab ste/ dkyil 'khor bkod nas/ gzod sa gzhi la gdab par bya'o// de yang
373b1(rgyud 'grel): dang por shar nas nub tu brkyang ba'i thig go// de'i phyogs mtshams chad pa'i phyir cha bzhir byas te/ bar mtshams gnyis nas phyed kyi tshad kyis ni lho byang du bcal te// der thig gnyis pa btab pa yang phyed kyi tshad kyis
373b2(rgyud 'grel): ngos bkri'i thig rtse nas tshad pas mtshams kyi zur bzhi dod par 'gyur ba'o// de'i rjes lA shar dang nub dang byang dang lho phyogs bzhi dgra dang / mtshams bzhir gdab cing // de las phyogs bzhi'i rtse mo'i tshad kyi
373b3(rgyud 'grel): ni cha bzhi'i tshad du 'gyur te/ de dag kyang lo ma gtub pa'i thig gis cha chen+da sum cu rtsa gnyis la cha la bran dr-i so so'i gzhung bzhin dbye zhing / de'i 'og ma'i haM ru ka dang / rdo rje nyi ma lo cha bran gnyis ma phye ba'i snam
373b4(rgyud 'grel): bu'o// ra ba rim pa gsum drang / khor yug rnams ni chu bran rI re'i tshad kyis 'khor lo'i dur khrod dung ni cha bran bzhi'i ched do// de lngar thig gi las rdzogs nas/ ye shes kyi skud pa la mchod cing bstod de// slar
373b5(rgyud 'grel): gshegasu gsol nas// lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mIg gnyis la zla ba bsam zhing // hI zhes brjod nas lta ba byas nas/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ oM badz+ra be ga a k+Sha ma hUM/ zhes pas ri mo dri
373b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag par bya'o// de nas phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas tshig 'dis dag par bya'o// oM thams cad rang bzhin rnam 'phrul mchog/ dngos med zhi ba 'od ldan gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa gtar chen
374a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byin// dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlobs// mnyam pA'i sngags blo rnams gsal bas// nyes pa'i zug rngu dag par 'gyur// zhes brjod cing thams cad lha'i rang bzhin du brtag ste// des
374a2(rgyud 'grel): ni cho ga lhag ma drang ma tshang bya kha skyong bar bye'o// de nas cha dbye bar bya ste/ phyi rol gru bzhi sgo dang bcas pa la// ra ba rim gsum dur khrod kyis brgyan pa// dbus su pho brang rim pas phye ba ste// dkyil 'khor
374a3(rgyud 'grel): so so dbyibs bzhin du// pho brang gi rA ba dang / mtshams 'byed pa dang // gsang lam gyi phreng ba'o// de la tshon gyi cho ga ni// rin po che sna 'am// tshon rtsi gang yang rung ba dag snod lnga'i nang du blugs te// phyogs
374a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu bzhag nas yi ge la sogs pa'i lha'i skur bskyed cing // ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bkug ste mchod cing bstod nas rang gi gan su dgram mo// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM// dang po chen gyi go rims ni lag pa
374a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas/ dkar po dang / mthing kha dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu'i rim gyis pany+tsa re khA bres te/ mchod cing thod pas btab nas mtshan ma'i ltas brtag/ 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sems
374a6(rgyud 'grel): can khams ni rab sgrol byed// dpal ldan rgyal po che ge mo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzod// ces brjod cing bdag ste
374b1(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya'o// de yang thig ni phyi nas gdab cing // tshon ni nang nas dgye ste/ dang po rdo rje rgyal mtheb kyis bri zhing // phyi nas bde bar bri skye mtho zhing drang par bya'o// gang zhi gu re khA dma' bya dang / yo ba dang / chad pa dang /
374b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khrul pa dag gis ni mi 'grub po// de ltar tshon rtsi lnga'i mchog dag ni dbus su btab ste/ kha dog phyogs kyis phye la/ mu khyud sngon po dag la ni rdo rje dkar po 'bri'o// dkyil 'khor de'i phreng ba dmar po la
374b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs mtshan ljang gu dang / gru chang ser po'o// gzhan dag kyang so so'i rigs kyis shes par 'gyu ro// sgo bzhi ni dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o// rta babs ni kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// pad+ma'i
374b4(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ni kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// rdo rje'i ra ba ni sngo la dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o// me ri ni dmar se ro// dur khrod ni phyogs kyi mdog go/ shing dang zhing skyong ni nago/ phyogs skyong ba dang klu la sogs pa ni rang
374b5(rgyud 'grel): gi rigs bzhin no// 'dod 'byung gi gnas ni ser po la phyi'i ra ba ni sngo nag go/ de dag gi gnas rnamasu ni rten pa'i mtshan ma gang rung bzhag/ des dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te dgod
374b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa dang / mchod pa thams cad kyi gtor ma'i phyag rgya shes pa rdzas dag kyang byin gyis brlabs te bzhag par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
375a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung bar bya zhing stan+do gyi lha rnams kyi gan su dgod do// yang rdo rje rgyal po bzhi'i ting 'dzin dang rten gyi ting 'dzin dang / dmigs pa dang po gnyis kyis 'khor mnyes par byas nas gsol ba gdang po/
375a2(rgyud 'grel): nas rnal 'byor pho mo rgyun dang bcas pas rdo rje dril bu thog te yi ge brgya pas bskyang zhing / stang stabs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor la lan bdun du bskor ro// de nas rdo rje rgyal po dang / rgyal mtheb dang / las kyi
375a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / brda' sbyor ba dang / rdul phyag rgya la sogs pa so sngor phye ste/ so sor gdan bshams shing dgongs par bya'o// de dgra snga ma'i gnas ji lta ba las/ phyis mi 'gyur bya rang rang gi rnal 'byor
375a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'khod cing phyogs kun nas langs te/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dag gis byin phab nas// gnas dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mnga' gsol lo// de nas gsang ba'i theg pa'i 'jug sgo shes pas/ gzha
375a5(rgyud 'grel): yang las dpag por bya ba'i phyir brda' sgo dbye/ tha mal gyi tshig spang zhing / rdo rje rgyal mtheb kyi sgo nas lus kyi brda la gnas par bya zhing / phyogs bzhi nas phyag 'tshal zhing gsol ba gdab ste/ sbyor ba'i ga
375a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyis gnas par bya'o// gzhan yang dur khrod kyi bdag po la sogs pa gdul ba'i phyir dpal he ru ka la sogs pa'i nga rgyal gyi glang po che'i/ stod g.yogs la sogs pas lus mtshan mar bya ste/ sngag
375b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis sbyang zhing byin gyi brlabs nas/ gti mug dag par bya ba dang / 'dod chags dag par bya ba dang / nga rgyal drag par bya ba dang / nga rgyal dag par bya ba'i phyir ni mun pas pa'i rgyal// zhe sdang dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / phrag
375b2(rgyud 'grel): don dag par bya ba'i phyir ni gdags pa'i rgyan pa bgo'o// thugs rje chen po'i chags pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing srid pa gsum gdul ba'i phyir ni byug pa'i rgyan pa bgo'o// des ni duro khrod dngos po
375b3(rgyud 'grel): gdul zhing rang gi don ston pa'o// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la bsdus nas dmigasu med pa'i don la gnas pa las// yang sangs rgyas dang byedang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bslang bar
375b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam nas rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhengaso te 'dir brjod do// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor na// 'byung ba lnga yi mtshan nyid las// zhi ba'i lha na lhan ne bA'i// thugs rje 'gro kun de las skyes// de tshe sems can
375b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni// shin tu khro dragro gtum par 'gyur// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu chags shin zhen par 'gyur// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gti mug che bar 'gyur// de ltar dus gsum
375b6(rgyud 'grel): brdo ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma las// rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag/ oM ma hA shrI he ru ka sa ma ya kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas/ thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa las//
376a1(rgyud 'grel): rngam pa'i sgra sgrog te/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hUM mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// na mkha'i khro bo za byed cing // 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha 'od dpung 'khrigs// zhal du stong khams ma lus
376a2(rgyud 'grel): thim/ zad par byed cing stong par byed// rgas rgud brlag par byed pa'o// glog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// myur ba'i za byed chen po lngas// skye rga na 'chi 'joms byed cing // brlag cing zad byed stong par byed// rigs chen
376a3(rgyud 'grel): za byed khros pa'i tshe// sku nI sngo sgra thol ba'i dang // 'od zer mdo po rab tu 'khrigs// ru lu ru lus mang po zi// 'bar ba'i mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas pas// bsreg cing 'jigs pa 'thor zhing 'khrud// gong 'dir bskal
376a4(rgyud 'grel): pa kunu brlag tshe// gzhan zhig 'ongs 'jigs mA yin te/ za byed khrod pa lnga po yis// zhal du stong khams ma lus thim// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha/ oM oM ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dbu la de bzhin gshegs
376a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khro bo smug gnag/ phyag na 'khor lo dang 'dzin/ thos khrag 'dzin pa grangs med pa'i tshogs rnams sprul pa dang bcas par gnas so// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+hi/ hUM hUM ru lu phaT/ lag pa g.yas pA la
376a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khro bo sku mdog sngo skyo/ lag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / kha T+wAM gi thogs pa grangs med pa'i tsho gas sprul pa dang bcas pa'o// oM rat+na shrI he ru ka/ sa ma ya kro d+ha/ traM traM he he hUM phaT/ lag po g.yon pa na rin po che khro bo sar
376b1(rgyud 'grel): gnag/ tri shru la dang / ral gri thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa'i tshogs dang bcas par ro// oM pad+ma shrI hrIHhe ru ka/ sa ma ya gro d+ha hri na hri da ha na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yon pa la pad+ma'i khro bo dmar nag/ phyag na ral gri
376b2(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dang / gtum shing thogs pa grangs med pa sprul par bcas pa gnaso// oM kaR+Ya shrI he ru ka/ sa me ya kro d+ha/ haM haM rak+Sha hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa la las kyi khro bo ljang nag/ phyag na sna tshogs dz+yo rje dang / lca Da
376b3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu thogs pa grangs med pa sprul pa dang bcas pa'o// oM shrI b+hai ra ba hUM ma hAM ma hA de ba hUM phaT/ mtshan ma la lha chen po mdog dkar po/ lag na tri shu la dang / thod pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o// oM br-iSh+Ta kam+ba la
376b4(rgyud 'grel): tsikra hUM phaT/ snying gar khyab 'jug mthing nag/ lcag na 'khor lo dang / thod pa thogs po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// oM rAk+Sha da sha gri ba hUM phaT/ mgrin par srin po'i rgyal po ljang skya/ lag na dgra sta dang / tho ba thogs pa
376b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa'o// oM ma pa shA la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra hUM phaT/ brla gnyis la rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs pa ljang skye// rdo rje rtse gsum dang thod pa thad pa thogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'o// de dag kun
376b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang rang rang gi yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul du gnaso// lag pa'i sor mo bcu la mche ba can lnga dang / sder mo can lnga dang / sdigaso 'dis bsal bar bya'o// oM ma hA d+he ki shwa raM bi ka ma ru sha ha ha he he ru lu hUM phaT/ ye shes
377a1(rgyud 'grel): glog gi dkyil 'khor dang / 'jigs pa'i khro bo gtum po'i tshogs// cir yang gyur pa'i mtshon cha yis/ sdug bsngal gnas rnams rab tu bcom// ma rung dur khrod gzhig pa'i phyir// stong gsu
377a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnams bsgral bar bya// 'jig byed drag shul chen po yis// khams gsum cig car bsgral nas kyang // za byed chen po'i zhal du ni// 'gro kun yud tsam cig la dren// 'gro dang mi 'gro'i snod btsud 'di// 'jigs
377a3(rgyud 'grel): byed khyed lngas kun zla na dngos por gyur pa'i bgegs 'di kun// ngas bstabs khyed kyi yul la gsol// ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdung byed pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang
377a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes ni grags pa yin// ngan snod 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams can rmongs byed pa// de phyir dA ni gti mug che// rtag tu thub pa mchog yin// srid pa'i 'dod tshogs myos po rnams// 'dod chags nyid
377a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mtshams sbyor bas// de phyir chos kyi rdo rje ni// 'dod chags chen po'i mchog yin no// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed// nam mkha' bde bas bsdus pa'i phyir// bde chen 'dod
377a6(rgyud 'grel): pa nga yi no// ro la sogs pa mnyam sbyor bas// phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za// sna tshogs las kyi khro ba'i sku// phrag dog chen po'i mchog yino// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes
377b1(rgyud 'grel): sku// ye shes rno dpal mtshon cha yis// log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod do// chos nyid mnyam nyid na mkha' la// ye shes glog gi 'od 'phro ba// gnas med dmigs pa yod ma yin// rtsa ba med cing brten pa
377b2(rgyud 'grel): meng+ga/ oM dA ha da ha sUr+tha nu rA ka ga te he tu nA hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsi sarba na ra ka ga te he tun hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba na ra ka ga te he tun hUM phaT/ oM sarba kle shats+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ sarba bir+ya tshin+da hUM phaT/ surba bIr+ya kha Da
377b3(rgyud 'grel): gats+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM tri bi shwa mu la ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+tiM hUM phaT/ dpal chen 'bar ba rgyal ba'i sku// rngam brjid khros pa'i cha lugs 'bar// gar dgur dur khrod rgyan gyis bArgya ni// shes rab sku dang 'khril sbyor zhing /
377b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jo tshul ger mdzad lta bu yi// bdud dang srin bu 'dul bar mdzad// ma tang la sogs bgegs byed rnams// gzugs dang bcas pa'i tshogs bsdus te// sra kri ta yi phyag rgya yis// nges par gzugs la dbyab
377b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// gzugs brnyan bri la sogs pa la/ phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyes byas nas// sngags dang 'od 'phro phyag rgya yi// de yi 'khor tshogs bsdu bar bya'o// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings te gyen du bteg nas// oM
377b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kAM pa la d+ha ri shwa ya hUM/ A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHzhes brjod cing // rdo rje gshog pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas zil gyis man cing bstim// 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ stobs
378a1(rgyud 'grel): chen dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rnon po 'jam dpal gyi// thugs rje dang ni shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag dang 'gro ba bsrung bar mdzod// 'gro ba rnams kyi tshe dang
378a2(rgyud 'grel): srog na gson po bde bar gcod byed pa'i// bdud dang srin po'i 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsang bu'i gnyen po ni// bde gshegs thugs kyi dngos grub mchog/ srin gsum thal byed rngam pa des// kha T+wAM drag
378a3(rgyud 'grel): pos mi bzad pas// bdud dang srin bu 'khor bcas dang // gshin rje bcom zhing bsad nas ni// ro yang lho'i 'dzam gling du// bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad yin no// mgo nI lho nub mtsham
378a4(rgyud 'grel): su bstan// rkang pa byang sha ra mtsham su bstan// lag pa g.yas g.yon mtsham su bstan// nyams shing 'bod 'grogs rgyal bar 'gyur// oM sarba pA pa ka ra he ta pa bi shA ma ta ka ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA pa ka
378a5(rgyud 'grel): ra he ta pa bi shwa kha nA~M ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA baM kA ra he tra pa bi shwa A kAR+Sha ru dra hUM phaT/ gnas kyi sgo ni su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba lAs// yul las
378a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa'i zhabs kyis dbye// de nas g.yas su bskor te/ lte ba'i phyogasu e gru gsum gyi sgo phye nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas rnam par shes pa drangs te/ oM ma hA bo sha phyang zhes/ gnas gsum gyi zhing khams gang
378b1(rgyud 'grel): rung du rigs kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i srasu bya'o// de nas khog pa gzhal sa du byas te// rnal 'byor pa rnams nang du bzhugs nas// nang khrol gyi tshogs rnams dug gsum rnam par dag pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi
378b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod par dmigs shing // dga' ba'i glu gar dang rol mo'i mchod par bya'o// de nas lha thams cad la bstod cing bskul ba'i phyir rdo rje'i glu blang ste// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab rten bcas// na mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pos/
378b3(rgyud 'grel): namakha' kun las grol ba 'grub// dngos po thams cad mkha' byin pa// mkha' las sgyu ma kun blangs nas// lus pa med par der za'o// g+han d+ha ho/ g+han d+ha ho/ g+han d+ha'i sgra yis sgrol bar mdzad// la l-Ir mkhas
378b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i gzugs kyang 'dzin// la lar tshangs pa bzhin du zhi// la lar gshin rje bzhin du rngam// la lar dus dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'jig rten khams ni stong dag na// mi sdug rigs kyi gzugs 'dzin pa'i// mkha'
378b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro 'bar ma'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus lus pa med par sgrol/ zhes so// gzhan yang sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs rnams dang // za byed kyi tshogs dang / 'jigs byed kyi zhal du dbul ba ni// stabasu gsol cig te ru ka/
378b6(rgyud 'grel): gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di// phra men gsheng ma khyed rnams kyis// dbang dang rig sngags byin brlabs te// rig sngags kyis ni rmongs mdzad nas// drag po las kyis sgrub byed cing // 'di la sogs pa rnams la yang /
379a1(rgyud 'grel): de dag longs spyod rgyan du 'bul// shra dang rkang khrag 'dod pa rnams// rig sngags kyis ni byin brlabs nas// 'tsho ba phrogs nas ci bde bar// khyed kyis de la longs spyod cig/ can dang bcud yangs zab
379a2(rgyud 'grel): bab na// khor yug gtos kyi dngos po 'di// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir// 'jigs byed dka' zlog dgyes shing rol// rdo rje gsum dang sku gsung thugs// srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shu rol// rdo rje gsum
379a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bar sku gsung thugs// srid gsum 'joms mdzod tI shu la// dug gsum rtsad nas btsod pa'i phyir// khams gsum cig car bsgral bar bya// 'jigs byed drag shul chen po yis// khams gsum cig car bsgral
379a4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // za byed chen po'i zhal du ni// 'gro kun yud tsam cig la 'dren// 'gro dang mi 'gro'i snod bcud 'di// 'jig rten khyed lngas kun za na// dngos por gyur ba'i dgegs 'di kun// ngas bstabs khyed kyis yul la
379a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhes// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka ha ha ha ha ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo khA hi khA hi// shar phyogs 'jig rten lam sgo na// yang dag thar lam gcod byed pa// 'byung po gtum po nga rgyal can// khyod ni sgrib pa kun la sgrib// yang dag thar
379a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ye shes kyi// khungs brtag rtsad bcad dag las byung // bdag 'dzin bdag gi rtog pa rnams// bdag med stong pa'i tho bas gzhom// at+mA na ti ma hA shU n+ya tA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M// chos kun rtag tu rang gi ngo bos stong /
379b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras rnams dngos po rnam par 'jigs// srid pa ji bzhin yong ye stong pa ste// nyi tshe'i stong nyid mu stegs can rnams kyi'o// 'dod pa'i khams stong pa nyid// gzugs kyi khams stong pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i khams
379b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid do// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi lus stong pa nyid do// ngag stong pa nyid do// sems stong pa nyid do// gang dag stong pa nyid mi shes pa// de yis mya ngan 'das mi shes// de phyir dngos po dngos med
379b3(rgyud 'grel): pasad 'jigs pas stong nyid shes par bya// chen po stong pa zhes bya ba// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// stong nyid rjesu dran par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pas//
379b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'i rtog tshogs kun mi rtog ye shes kyis gzhom par bya'o// de nas ban+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa dag byin gyis brlabs cing // rang rang gi gan su me mar dang bcas pas dgram pa dang / dur khrod chen po brgyad dag
379b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dgod do// shAr du rkang pa g.yas pa'o// lhor lag pa g.yas pa'o// nub tu lag pa g.yon pa'o// byang du rkang pa g.yon pa'o// shar lhor dgu g.yas pa'o// lho nub tu mgo bo'o// nub byang du dgu g.yon pa'o// byang
379b6(rgyud 'grel): shar du mtshan ma'o// de ltar dug gsum gyi rkyen bsags nas// zhing skyong la sogs pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// gzhan yang dbang sgyur ba chen po'i ting 'dzin las 'brum gyi 'phro 'dus gnas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /

380a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs te/ gzhi'i ting 'dzin dang / brten gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang / mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya
380a5(rgyud 'grel): bya dang / las sbyor ba dang / thun mong gi bzlas brjod dang / khyad par gyi bzlas brjod dang / de dag rdzogs nas mtshon cing bstod pa byas la// lha rnam la thugs dam bskul bar bya// gal te rnal 'byor pa mtshan ma
380a6(rgyud 'grel): thob pa zhig gis 'jug na ni thig le 'am/ phra mo 'am/ rnam par dag pa spyad par bya'o// de nas tshogs kyi cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / lhag pa'i las ngag gi bsgom pa dang / cho ga rdzogs pa'i las la sbyaro// de nas
380b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba'i phyir gong du dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa tsam la sA ma byas pa dag la ni snga ma'i dusu par mtshams su bzhag nas rig pa'i dbang nas bskur ba dang / de bzhin du gang thob pa nas brtsams te/
380b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i bar du spyad par bya'o// de dag gi rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te/ dang po gong rol tu 'jug pa'i cho ga la/ rdo rje rgyal po dang / rgyal mtheb cho ga rdzogs pas slob ma longasu sbyongs pa bar khang gi sgo mtsham

380b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas byin gyi brlabs na gdong g.yogs te/ rin po che'i phreng ba thogs nas theg pa chen por mos shing / sems bskyed pas gnas pa la slob dpon gyis dri ste/ kye khyod ci la dga' bus 'dir 'jug pa yin zhes
380b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / slob mas kyang bdag skal pa bzang po la dga' bas 'jug pa'o zhes// slar brjod pa/ de la khyod la ci dgos zhes bya'o// des smras pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i phyiraro// zhes so// slar brjod la/
380b6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs sras bcas dam tshig pas/ yon dbul thugs rjes bdag la dgongs// sangs rgyas sku gsung rang bzhin mchog/ slob dpon mgon la skyabasu mchi// skal bzang lnga mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// dkyil
381a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor tshogs la phyag 'tsha lo// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po dgu ni gzhug tu gsol// zhes pa dang / slar brjod pa/ rgyal ba kun gyi gnas bzhugs pa'i// dkyil 'khor chen
381a2(rgyud 'grel): po nyams dga' ba// snying po'i grong khyer chen po 'dir// bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bgyi/ zhes brjod do// de nas las kyi rdo rje lhag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ oM sarba lo ga tsit+ta ut+ta pA la ya mi hUM/ zhes brjod cing

381a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis ni// 'gro rnams srid pa'i gnas nas gdon// zhes brjod do// de nas me tog phreng ba dang bcas pa slob ma'i snying gar bzhag ste/ oM bde gshegs kun gyi khyod nyid ni// de ring byin gyis brlabs pa na// de bzhi
381b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa'i gsal chen 'di// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing // dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la// nams kyang smra bar bya ba min// oM su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya thA khaM/ oM rdo rje sems dpa' dang khyod kyi//
