381b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis 'grub// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM/ badz+ra ut+pA ta tri Tha/ de ring phyin chad khyod nyid kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' nga yin pas// gang zhig sgo ba'i las rnams byos// nga la brnyas par

381b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / spyi'o rnamasu 'byung po'i sa bon gyis mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o// de nas yang / sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hUM/ zhes bsrung zhing rdo rje dril bu dkrol te/ oM dz+nyA na A ba sha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ ra ra ra ra/ tsa li ya
382a1(rgyud 'grel): tsA la ya hUM/ A hA dz+nye/ zhes brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// nam zhig ye shes babs pa'i tshe ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rtags ston par 'gyur ro// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bden pa brjod par bya ste/ mgo

382b1(rgyud 'grel): mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra be sha phaT/ ces brjod do// gdong g.yogs bsal nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir sgo dbye ste/ bu khyod dkyil 'khor legs par ltos// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// phreng
382b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gang la bab pa ni// de nyid khyod kyi rigs kyi lha// zhes te shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams shing gtso bo'i bar du lha rnams kyi ming bstan par bya'o// de'i rjes la bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis lha

383b3(rgyud 'grel): des ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo ston te/ chu'i dbang bsku ro// de nas rin po che'i rgyu las byas pa 'am/ gzhan dag las byung ba gang yang rung ste/

383b5(rgyud 'grel): che/ thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i// dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra da ra tA badz+ra a ra li ho// a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ zhes brjod nas/ de'i rjesA la thod pa'i mtshan ma drug dang bcas pa'i dar dpyangs
383b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcings te/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes rtogs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed// rig pa'i ye shes mtshan ma'i rtags// hUM badz+ra ka pA la a bi Shiny+tsa mi/ des ni so sor
384a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal rdo rje nyi ma byang chub sems kyi ngo bo dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba'o// de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa/ lag pa g.yas

384a4(rgyud 'grel): bo kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyams tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces brjod cing don bzhin du bsam par bya'o// des ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpal pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ngo bo mtshon par byed pa
384a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbang ngo // de nas dril bu sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs pa dkrol zhing slob ma'i lug pA g.yon par btang lnga// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyi// shes rab dbyings kyi rjes 'gyur ba shAng // khyod kyis rtag
384a6(rgyud 'grel): tu bcang bar bgyis// byang chub mo chog tu rgyal bas bzhed// oM a d+hi pa ti tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ zhes brjod cing de nyid rnam par dag po bstan pa'i phyir// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyi bdag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral bas//
384b1(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can rnams// dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod do// de nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rta mchog rol pa'i ngo bo mtshon par byed pa dril bu'i dbang ngo // de nas
384b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dril bu gnyis gzung ba'i phyag rgya bstan te// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba'i 'phro 'du dang bcas par slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag nas/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di brjod par bya'o// oM gAng
384b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir chos rnam rnaM dag pas// sangs rgyas ye shes rang bzhin nyid// dbang po'i spyod yul gang dang gyang // bde mchog sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// oM dpal che ga mAM a b+hi Shuny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi ka
384b4(rgyud 'grel): to ya ho zhes so// de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dpalnga rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo mtshon par byed pa ming gi dbang bskur ba'o// de ltar dbang bskur ba'i phan yon ni// sangs rgyas thams cad
384b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyal sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog kyang // rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi 'gyuraro zheso// de dam tshig dang sdom pa la sogs pa'i phyir// dang por mna' bsgrag cing sdom
384b6(rgyud 'grel): pa sbyin po ni sangs rgyas thams cing gsung dbyangs gcig pa'i sgo nas gsungs te// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bar// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byed
385a1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha rnams dang ni mI ngag dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying la khrag chen 'thung ba zhig/ sems can khams ni ma lus
385a2(rgyud 'grel): don// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// dka' thub kyis nA gzar ma bya// mi
385a3(rgyud 'grel): bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar bgyis// sdig med stobs kyis khyod ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da' bar dka'
385a4(rgyud 'grel): nga'o// zhes brjod cing sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnam pa gsum rgyus par bstan pa bya'o// des ni skyob ma'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon du byo zhing // bdag dang gzhan gyi don grung bar
385a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas bla ma la gsol ba gladab par bya ste// mgon khyod thugs rje'i bka' drin gyis/ dkyil 'khor slob dpon dbang bskur sogs// bdug gzhan don du bye ba rnams// 'grub byed dbang bskur bdag
385a6(rgyud 'grel): stsol// ces pa dang / slar brjod pa/ rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya tshe// zung zhig yang dag gzung bar bgyi// de ring rdo rje slob dpon tshe// slob ma'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar mdzod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/
385b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na bsnams// rtag tu khyod kyis kyang bzung ste// phyag na rdo rje'i btul zhugs bar+d+han// oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra ta thA ga badz+ra satwA sA mA ya tISh+Tha/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//
385b2(rgyud 'grel): rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bshad// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal byas bzhed// oM badz+ra g+haN+Da a/ e Sha traM d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hi hi ho// yid kyi lus ni brtan pa'i phyir// dam tshig phyag
385b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyargya zhes byar brjod// lus kun brtan byed gang zhig ni// phyag rgyar rab tu grags pa yin// oM ma hA kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+ra sA ma ya hUM/ zhes brtul zhugs rnam pa gsum byin na// mchod po'i tshogs dang //
385b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa'i grwar thabs kyis lha rnams mnyes bya'o// de nas rjesu gnang ba sbyin par bya ste// bdag gzhan don sgruba~M las kyi tshogs// thun mong 'bring ba mchog gyur pa'i// zhi rgyas dbang drag dgug pa dang
385b5(rgyud 'grel): sdang gnod rengs pa'i las kun dang // dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga rnamaso// thogs pa med par bsgrub par gyis// ral gri mig rnams 'og dang // thogs med mi 'bying skyes 'jog dang // gser 'gyur
385b6(rgyud 'grel): ril bu nyi zla gzung // char dbab la sogs las kyi tshogs// rnam shes sgrub dang ye shes sgrub// phyag rgya shes pa'i don grub dag/ thams cad dngos grub 'gro ba yi// don nyid yang dag sbyor bar gyis
386a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba kun gyi gnas 'jug cing // sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan rgyan// phrin las bdag gzhan gnas sbyor bri// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dngos grub sgrubya// ces brjod do// de nas yang snga
386a2(rgyud 'grel): ma bzhin du mig dbye bya ste// ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis// mig nad ling rtog bsal ba lngar// bu khyod kyi ni mi shes pa'i// ling tog rgyal bas sel bar mdzad// oM badz+ra nai tA a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hwe//
386a3(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la dri ma med// gzung 'dzin rnam bral brjod med du// rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung // rang bzhin med cing dag med pa// chos rnams de bzhin shes
386a4(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// sems can doni yang dag byos// des na sangs rgyas sra su skye// zhes brjod dri mig phye ba'i rjes la// chos thams cad kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bur snang ba la rjesu spyod par gnang ba'o// yang don dam pa dang
386a5(rgyud 'grel): yi dam gyi lha ji ltar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' dag dang mnyam sbyor bas// kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du
386a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal// oM rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin// ngag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// bu khyod kyi ni rnying la bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid gtso// zhes brjod cing // de nyid kyi don bstan par bya'o// yang
386b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mo bde mchog mas byin gyis rlabs pa'i mda' gzhu byin te// phyogs bzhi dang steng 'og tu 'gengs shing 'phen pa'i tshul byas nas// chos kyi 'khor lo mas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gdan la 'dug sde// lag
386b2(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas par dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i glegs bam sbyin zhing / g.yon par dud byin te sgra bsgrag par bya'o// oM pha rol phyin drug las rnams kyis// sems can don kun mnyam
386b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor zhing zhing // 'khor ba'i rgyan bcod mya ngan 'das// oM chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// the tshom rtog tshogs gcod mdzad pa'i// chos kyi dung gi sgra sgrogs pas// gsang sngags gsang chen snying po'i don//
386b4(rgyud 'grel): sdo ldan kun la rab tu bshod// des ni rgyal ba thams cad la// phan 'dogs drin lan mdzad pa yin// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis// khyod la rtag tu bsrung bar mdzad// ces brjod par bya'o// de'i
386b5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lha bskor bar gnas sbyin pa ni// mdor na 'jig rten khams rnamasu// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// ji ltar sna 'dul ba sna tsho gsu// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gsol//
386b6(rgyud 'grel): ces rigs lnga'i gan su sbyar bar bya'o// da ni lung bstan po las/ dang po slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ni// 'di ltar nga yis khyod lung bstan// rdo rje dang ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dngos po mchog tu bsgrub pa'i phyir//
387a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i ngan 'gro gnas las grol// kye che gu mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa// b+hur b+hu ba swaHde'i rjes la dus gsum gyi rgyal bu rnams kyis kyang phyogs bcu nas gsung dbyangs
387a2(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i sgra skad kyis lung bstan par mdzad de// kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyi srid po tha mar nI 'di yin te// gsang ba bla ni med pa'i theg pa la zhugs pas phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus// rigs kyi
387a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyuraro// khyod kyis chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang 'bral bar mi bya ste// de dag gi las la sbyar bar bya'o// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// de bas
387a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod kyis nams kyang bya ba min// ma hA sa ma ya hUM phaT/ di ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon dang // sngags sogs rgyud rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
387a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams kun gyis mthun par gsungs// sems can kun la rjes brtse bar// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du bris// rtse gcig nan tAn bskyed nas ni// sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor// zhes brjod de/ des ni lung
387a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'o// de ni dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir// dang po dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phan yon brjod par bya'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// zhugs shing mthong ba la sogs pas// sdig pa kun las
387b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam grol zhing // khyed rnams rab tu dge bar gnas zhes brjod// de nas don bzhin du spyad pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir// bude chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyi nas 'chi ba yong med cing // mtshungasna med thub
387b2(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur te// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag la nas// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'ongs so// dra ni de dag gi dam tshig bshad par bya ste// byang chub sems ni yong mi spang //
387b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje zhes bya'i phyag rgya che// gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur ze tshom med// dam pa'i chos dgra mi smad cing // ma gus spang zhing dor mi bya// mr-i shes snod min rmongs pa la// nam
387b4(rgyud 'grel): yang bstan par mi bya'o// rdo rje dril bu mi srung ste// slob dpon dag la gus par bgyis// zhes pa'i don bstan par bya'o// de ltar slob dpon gyi dbang thob pa'i phrin yon ni// khams gsum gyis ni rgyal
387b5(rgyud 'grel): srid che// bdag po rgyal chen dbang bskur zhing // bdud rnams thams cad las rgyal bar// grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin// 'di yis khyed rnams dus 'di ru// sangs rgyas thob par the tsom medro//
387b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rjes thob dbugs phyung bas// slob ma yon ngan bdag por 'gyur// slob dpon blo gros dam tshig ldan// brtan g.yo'i mtha' lo rnam par grol// lam mchog 'jug stobs dbugs phyin te//
388a1(rgyud 'grel): ngan pa'i gnas dan+da kun spangs pa'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas gdams ngag bstan pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste/ de la dang po
388a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ni gru bzhi par gnas pas/ che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyis rgyas par bya zhing sgo rnam pa bzhi yis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi mtshan nyid can no// /
388a3(rgyud 'grel): rta babs nas chos kyi 'khor lo'i bar du ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul du gnas pa ni byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du bgrod nas rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhir 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can no//
388a4(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna lnga'i rtsig pa lngas kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bcas pa phro ba ni// rang bzhin ye shes drug gi byin gyi rlabs las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshog su snang ba'i rang bzhi no// rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba brgyad
388a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin la rdo rje theg pa'i tshul gyis mtshan pa'o// rin po che dang / mu tig dang / me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa ni mdzad pa rgya chen po'i phrin las rnams yon tana? las byung ba'i
388a6(rgyud 'grel): tshul lo// 'dod pa'i yon tan drug gi lha mo ni// yul drug rnam pa dag pa'i snang ba'o// gdugs snying rje chen po'i char bab dang / rgyal mtshan bdud rnam bzhi las rgyal zhing theg pa'i mdog ston pa'i
388b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / bla re mnyam pa nyid du tshul gcig par spyod pa'i tshul// rnga yab rnam par rtog pa'i sbrang ma sel bar mdzad pa dang / zla ba phyed pa rdo rjes smon lam rgya chen po 'gro ba'i don du theg pa chen po'i sngags kyi sgo
388b2(rgyud 'grel): nas don mdzad pa dang / rdo rje rin po che dbyug po la phA de naM dpyangs pas mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa'i rtags dang ldan pa'o// de la dril bu sgra snyan pa phyogs bcur sgrogs pA ni theg pa sna tshogs
388b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi don ston pa'o// re'u cha'i cha brgyad kyi mtshan mA ni sku zhi dbang phyag dang / gsung gi dbang phyug dang / thugs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// thig bzhis legs par phye
388b4(rgyud 'grel): byabyA nI phrin las bzhi'i snang ba'o// sna tshogs pad+ma'i mtshan ma dang / mu khyud rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba ni chags pa med pa'i phrin las kun tu don spod kyang nyon mongs pa'i mtshan mra mra gos shing bde ba tshon
388b5(rgyud 'grel): po'i dbyings las sku gsung thugs kyi theg pa ston par mdzad pa'o// bum pa rgyan gyis mdzes shing bdud rtsi'i bcud dang ldan pas che ba'i yon tan thams cad kyi dbyung gnas 'chi bu med pa'i bdud rtsi
388b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rnam pa lnga'i don las yon tan gyi snang ba ma 'gags shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna tshogasu 'phro ba'o// bar du ri mig 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa ni phrin las dang mchod pa'i gnas su
389a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur cing rang gi phyag rgya mdzes pa gyur pa'o// phyi rol pad+ma la sogs pa'i phreng ba dag ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba ston pa dang / sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las
389a2(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i rnam pa dang / ye shes kyi byin brlabs kyis mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad sel byar mdzad pa'o// phyi rol gyi dur khrod chen po dag gis ni thams cad gsang sngags kyi theg par
389a3(rgyud 'grel): ngu zhing theg pa gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa'i tshul du khams gsum gyi zhen rtog sbyang ba dang / phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dag rnam par dag pa'i ngo bor ston pa'o// zhing dang zhing skyong dag gis yon tan
389a4(rgyud 'grel): mA 'grags pa'i rten gnas la sangs rgyas brgyad kyi snang ba ston pa'o// mtsho dang klu brgyad ni skyid pa'i gnas kyi rtag pa'i tshogs dag gnyisu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi don ston pa'o// rnal 'byor pho mo dag
389a5(rgyud 'grel): gis ni dbyings dang ye shes bzung du 'grol ba'i don gyis chos thams cad 'dus par bstan pa'o// sprin dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis+t+ra ni thug sA rje chen po'i sprul pa'i 'phro 'du dang
389a6(rgyud 'grel): snang po brgyad brtan pa'o// bya khyi ring mkha' 'gro la sogs sna tshogs pas ni thugs rje chen po'i sprus pa dang / yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pa'i phrin las kyi tshigs rnam par 'phro ba bstan pa yin no//
389b1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rten gyi mtshan nyid rgya cher brtan nas brten pa'i rang bzhin dag shes par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dkar dmar gyi mdangs dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sro kyi rang bzhin la rtog pa'i mtshan mas
389b2(rgyud 'grel): ma gos shing thugs rje chen pos chags pa'i las mdzad pa'o// rin po che'i kha dog sA lnga'i 'od zer mdzes pas brgyan pa ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i snang ba las rigs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'o//
389b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi dang / phyag bzhi'i rnam pa can du byung bas phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa dag gi sgo nas 'gro ba dbugs 'byin pa'o// sgeg pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum lngas rgyal
389b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing // rang gi tsho lugs bcom par mdzad pa'o// phyag bzhi'i mtshon cha dag gis ye shes rnam pa lnga'i cha ba las rigs lha'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad pa dang / thugs rje chen pos rtse gcig tu sems
389b5(rgyud 'grel): can gyi lasna la dgongs pa dang / sku gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas khams gsum las te/ gseng ba bla na med pa'i tshul ston pa dang / gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i lus kyis bskul
389b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / de'i mtshan nyid gzhan la ston par mdzad pa'o// mtshan bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dag gzhan wa khyadar du 'phags pa'i tshul gyis mdzes shing byang chub kyi mchog tu
390a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rnam pa dung ma bral ba'i sgo nas stong g.yogs dang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi las mnga' bas slad g.yogs kyis brgyan pa'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / tshang
390a2(rgyud 'grel): med pa bzhi'i phrin las dag la spyod pas dpung pa rin po che'i mdzes pa'o// gzhan yang rin po che'i ske rags dang / mgur chu dang do shal gyi dge ba bcu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
390a3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi don ston par byed pa'o// phyag dang zhabs la gdu bus mdzes shing byang chub kyi mchog tu gyur/ sen mo do bcus mtshan pa mo bden
390a4(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / dge ba bcu yongasu rdzogs pa'i rtag so// dbu la rin po che'i smyon pa dang / phreng ba dang / thod pa dang / rigs kyi bdag po dag gis brgyan ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug
390a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / rigs rnam pa lnga dang / rigs kyi mtshan mas lhag par gyur pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dang / ye shes sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i sgo
390a6(rgyud 'grel): nas de nyid kyi don bstan par mdzad pa dang / phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o// gzhan yang 'byung ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas khyad par gyi phrin las bzhis 'gro
390b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don bya ba'i phyir rigs kyi lha mo bzhi dang / skye mched la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnam par mdzad cing rigs dang ye shes kyi snang ba yon tan gyi tshogs rnam par 'phrul pa las kyis gzhan
390b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir phrin las sna tshogs dang bcas par bstan pa yin no// de ltar rnam par drag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan nas slob dpon gyi la su bya ba ni dbang bskur ba dang / rab tu gnas pa dang
390b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bu rtso mo dang / sgrub pa'i rim pa dang / tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa gzhan dag gi lam gsum bya ba rnams kyang rgya cher bstan par bya'o// de nas lha dang / slob dpon la ci 'byor ba'i
390b4(rgyud 'grel): yon gyis mchod cing rje su yi rang dbul ba bya'o// des ni slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i tshogs bstan pa yino// dau ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i skabasu dbang rdzogs par ma byas pa dang / gang zhig rdzogos pa dag
390b5(rgyud 'grel): gis gnas par 'dong na dben pa'i gan su dris legs par byugs pa'i maN+Dal la me tog la sogs pa bkram zhing bde ba'i ston pa rtsegs pa la bla ma bzhag nas/ shes rab mtshan dang ldan pa dag
390b6(rgyud 'grel): phul te/ mchod pa dang / sngon mo la sogs pa'i longs spyod kyis dgyes par byas nas/ ras kyi yol ba la sogs pas bar chad pa'i rgyab nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// dpal ldan mgon po
391a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba che// bde chen bde ba'i gnas la bzhugs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde rtsol mdzod// byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyi// yang dag don
391a2(rgyud 'grel): chog rnam dag la// ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yi// mchog gi dbang ni bskur ba bzhin// de bzhin bdag sogs 'gro kun gyis/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med
391a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ ma rig rtog pa'i rab rib sel// gang gis byang chub bla na med pa// de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod// ces gsol ba dang / de la slar yang smras nus// bu khyod ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// rgyal ba kun
391a4(rgyud 'grel): gyigyi bde chen sbyin// ting 'dzin sbyor sngags gsal ba yis// rang rig gnasu legs par sdod ces pa'o// de nas phyi nang gi sA khrus byas te// dam tshig lha mo sbyangs nas sngags dang bcas pa'i yungs kar gyi
391a5(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad cing // sbyor baM dang / rje su sbyor bas yum gnyis kyi sku bskyod par bya'o// yang dbang bskur ba dong / byin gyis brlab pa dgra rdzogs par byas nas rol pa'i byardas bskur zhing / spro bskyed cing
391a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi nga rgyal ma nyams pa'i sgo nas gnyisu med par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems slob ma'i lce la bzhag par bya'o// ji ltar rgyal ba bde gshegs kyis// rang gi sras tshogs dbang bskur bzhin/ byang
391b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems de dag pa'i chus// rnam rtog dri ma dag par bya// oM mat+ta bo d+hi ts+tshit+tA sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes brjod pa dang / slob mas kyang a ho su kha zhes brjod cing med de/ rigs kyi cha lugs bsal bar
391b2(rgyud 'grel): chu'i zla ba 'am+bu sgyu ma'i rnam pa bzhin du gnas pa'o// dris ni gsang ba'i dbang bsgyur ba'o// ying rdzogs pa'i rim pa thob par 'dod pas rdo rje bla ma mchog tu 'gyur ba la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ maN+Dal
391b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mchod pa'i tsho gas kyis rdo rje bla ma dang / phyag rgya mo mtshan dang ldan pa mnyes par byas nus/ tshig 'di brjod par bya'o// kye kye mgon po bde ba che// rdo rje sbyor las yang dag byung // phyag rgya mi phyed rab
391b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa// mngon sum nyams myong bskyed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid chen pos ji lta bar// gau tso bos bdag la bka' drin mdzod// rtog pa'i dri mas bsgribs pa rnams// byang sems chu yis dge bar mdzod//
391b5(rgyud 'grel): ngos kyang rigs dang mthun pa'i yum byin gyis brlabs la slob ma'i lag tu gta de/ dga' ba'i gnas chen lha mo 'di// sna tshogs sgyu rtsal yid du 'ong // legs par zung zhig blo gros can// dga' bde'i
391b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rab tu gyis// thabs gzhan gyis ni mtshang mi rgya// 'gro ba thams cad 'di las 'byung // de bas khyod kyis 'di nyid dang // nam yang 'bral bar mi bya ste// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul
392a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bla na med// blun po gang zhig 'di spong ba// de la mchog gi dngos grub med// ces pa'o// de nas lha mos grogs la dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas te/ 'dzum pa dang bcas par b+ha ga phye zhing
392a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan nas/ khyod kyis nus sam rdo rje can// dri chen dri chu'i bza' btung dang // rak+ta ga pur mang sa dang // bud med rnams la rtag gus dang // b+ha gar 'o byed mi rtog gam// smos shig grogs po bde ba can// zhes pa dang /
392a3(rgyud 'grel): des kyang slar smras pa/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// khu khrig la sogs za ba dang // bud med rnams la rtag gus shing // b+ha ga'i pad+mar 'o bgyid // zhes so// lha mos slar brjod de/ rmad byung gsang ba'i pad+ma 'di// thams
392a4(rgyud 'grel): cad bde bar yang dag ldan+da// rtag tu rim bzhin 'di spyod na// de nyid bde chen bral mi 'gyur// chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par dag/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol// bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni// dngos po kun gyi
392a5(rgyud 'grel): rang 'byung gnas// gang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo la// pad+ma lo bzhugs rab tu rgyas// b+ha ga'i mkha' dbyingasau na mkha' bzhin// 'byung ba bzhi po rgyan bzhin bkod// lte ba'i ze 'bru ge sar zlum// pad+ma 'dab brgyad rnam par
392a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// de'i dbus su gnas pa ni// de nyid bdud rtsi'i chen po'i gzugs// b+hany+dza mok+Sha hoH/ zhes brjod do// de nas gnas dben par rgyan bzang po bris shing / dri zhim po'i chus gtor stan bde ba la gnas te/ khang pa 'am
392b1(rgyud 'grel): yol ba la sogs pa gang yang rung bas bsgribs la// thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rjesu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin dang / sbyor ba chen po'i ting 'dzin dag rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// de nas
392b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i gtsug lag dang mthun par bde ba bskyed cing shis pa dang mi shis pa'i mtshan ma dag yi ge lnga bcu'i gnas gang la bab pa'i sgo nas brtag ste/ ma ning gi yi ge dag la bab na ni slar bsgyur bar bya'o//
392b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bde ba chen po'i don byang chub kyi sems phob nus tshigasu bcad pa 'dis btung bar bya'o// ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra// rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing // rdul bral thal ba zhi ba'i mchog/ rang gi rang bzhin
392b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid do// zhes so// de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon la yon phul te/ thabs dang shes rab dang / dga' ba dang / bcas bskor ba byas te/ gtang rag btang ngo // de nas dbang bzhi pa dag bla ma'i gang ma ngag las
392b5(rgyud 'grel): byung bzhin du phyag rgya rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba la brten te/ rang gi nyamasu myong bas me long gi dkyil 'khor bzhin du gan pa la yun ring du gsal bar brtago/ des na zag pa med pa'i ye shes bde ba chen po'i
392b6(rgyud 'grel): sku skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi// dbang bskur bdi tshon las byung ba// rin tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu mos par dbang bskur 'gyur// de nas khyad par gyi dam tshig
393a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrag par bya ste// khyod kyis srog chags bsad par bya// ma byin par yang blang bar bya// 'dod la log par g.yem par bya// brdzun gyi tshigs kyang smra bar bya// rdo rje mu dang byang chub sem+bas// srog
393a2(rgyud 'grel): gi phyir yang gtung mi bya// dran pa gsal bas gzung byas nus// lhag po'i lha bzhin rin chen tog/ ces brjod par bya'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la mchod pa dang / yon gyi tshogs
393a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul zhing bskor ba byos te// glu gar dang / bkra shisau la sogs brjod nas mgron gyi tshogs rnams la gtor ma byin zhing dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya'o// de dag gis ni gnas skabs kyi bye brag mang bar 'jug
393a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don rnams phyogs gcig tu bsdus te bstan pa yin pas gang zag gi bye brag gis so so'i gnas skabs shes par bya ste/ phyi mtshams dang / bor mtshams dang / rlung gi mtshamasu cho ga ma nor ba'i sgo nas
393a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba dang sgrub pa bsdebs pa ni lam gyi man ngag go// de dag ni dpol rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo naso bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// / da ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa rlom pa byas/ dang po rnam par
393a6(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzod kyi sgo nas zhi ba las la 'jug pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor dang chas gos lnga dag sbyar zhing zhi ba'i mchod pa dang / rdzas ngag bsags nas/ gzhi'i ting 'dzin dang / rten gyi ting 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi
393b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang / mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa dang / gnyisu med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba nas lha so so'i bzlas brjod kyi zhi ba'i las la sbyar zhing / mchod pa dang /
393b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang bskul ba dang / tshogs kyi cho ga dang // sbyin sreg dang / lhag ma'i las dang / dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim po bzhin bya'o// de ltar dbang dang // rgyas pa dang / las sna tshogs pa dag la yang
393b3(rgyud 'grel): so so'i rdzas dang / chas gos lnga dag sgyur zhing dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang / cho ga'i gzhung bsrung ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi so so'i las la sbyor ba dang / mchod sdod dang / bskul ba la sogs pa'i las rnams
393b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par byas na dkyil 'khor bsdu ba rnams rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya'o// de ltar so so'i skabasu rdzas la brten pa'i las ngag bsgrub cing / ci 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa
393b5(rgyud 'grel): po don la sbyor ba'i phyir snga ma las zhal bsgyur te/ chasA gos dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mchod rdzas dang / rgyan tshwa dang / cha lugs kyi bye brag dag khro bo'i rnam pa mthun par dur khrod chas brgyad kyi mtshon cing
393b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ rdo rje rgyal po dang / rgyal 'theb dang / las kyi rdo rjes rang gi las dang 'jug par bya'o// de nas mer me dang / ban+d+ha dang / rdzas dang / dngos grub kyi phyag rgya dag dgram zhing byin bskyed par bya'o// de nas
394a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang / yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyan drangs la sogs pa'i cho gas mnyes par bya ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi rnam pa gsal bar byas nus dbyangs
394a2(rgyud 'grel): drug gis bskul ba dang / mchod cing bstod pa dang / bskul ba dang / tshogs kyi cho go dang / sbyin sreg dang / lhag pa'i las rnams rdzogs par byas nas/ de ltar dkyil 'khor drug gi bzlas brjod kyi rim pa
394a3(rgyud 'grel): ni zhag gcig la nyin mtshan dus drug tu bcang de// thun mong dang khyad par gyis bzlas pa dag rab 'bring bsdus rgyas kyis brtsam zhing thog ma'i dus su ni bsgom pa dang / bzlas pa'i yan lag rdzogs par byas
394a4(rgyud 'grel): nas thun tha ma gnyis la ni kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa nas/ brtsams te mthar rdzogs par bya'o// de yang bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa'i dus su bzlas pa'i grangs mnyam par ji srid mtshan ma'i rtags mi gsol
394a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi bar du brtsam zhing / nye ba'i bsnyen pa dag la ni ji ltar mtsham par mthun mong gi bsnyen pa las bzhi'i sgo nas bskul ba dang / khyad par du lha so so'i bsngags brjod par bya'o// sgrub pa'i dusu yang bzlas
394a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur nas/ las gzhi'i bskul bas mthar dbyung // de nas mtshams gcig gis cho gas sgrub pa po bsam par bya ste/ rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dran par byas nas/ de nas
394b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyisu med pa'i tshul du sbyor ba'i byang chub kyis sems bsdus te/ dbang po lnga la thig la bya'o// de dag ni thams cad dag pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid lus la dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom pa'o// de nas dkyil
394b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor drug gi sbyor bas rim pa bzhin yi ge gcig pa'i sngags brjod cing / las thams cad dngos grub du bya ba dang / dngos grub thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ phyag rgya rim pa bzhin du bcings te/ rnam
394b3(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi phyag rgyo shes pa la sogs pas brtag nas/ so so'i mtshan ma dag so so'i phyag rgya dang sbyor bas dbad cing dbyangs drug blo gar dang bcas pas pas dngos grub kyi stsol byang bya ste/ mchod cing bstod
394b4(rgyud 'grel): nas mtshan ltas byung ba'i dus su dngos grub gang yin pa'i sgo nas blangs te/ dbang bskor bar bya'o// de'i dus su phan gnod byed pa'i mtshan ma ngo shes par byas nas re dogs med pa'i sems kyis dngos grub blang
394b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / bgegs bzlog pa'i cho ga dag brtsam par bya'o// gal te grub bam mi gsal na zhi ba dadong / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po dang / mnan pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho gas bsgrub par bya ba 'am/ sbyin sreg
394b6(rgyud 'grel): gis shis par bya'o// skabs skabasu mtshams kyi cho ga dang / dri chab la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma bskyang ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / bskang bshags rnams ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o// de nas
395a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa chen po mthar phyin nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma sbyor zhing 'di dang / phyi mar mi bral ba'i smon lam gdab bo// yang rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pas lhag chad bskrang zhing bshags byang byas
395a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bkra shis brjod rnying dngos grub kyi lkog ma blangs te rnal 'byor bsna longs spyod do// slar yang mchod pa'i tshogs rnams lha dang / b+h+ra mA la phul te bstod pa byas nus/ bro gar dang rdo rje'i glus dgyes par bya'o//
395a3(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor bton nas mdun du bzhag ste// mchod cing bstod nas/ bkra shis brjod cing gshi gsu gsol zhing / dam tshig dkyil 'khor ri mo bzhin bsdus nas gzugs byirnyan gyis rdzasau rnams
395a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshon rtsi dag bsdus te gsang ba'i gnasu bzhag/ de'i rjes la rdzas dang maN+Dal legs par dag pa'i tshogs bya ba gzhan gyis ma mthong bar bgyi'o// yang khro bo bcu las mchod cing bstod de/ phur pa bsdus
395a5(rgyud 'grel): la cod pan bkrol zhing khrus byas nas brda dang mtshan ma dgrol bar bya'o// de nas gtor ma rgya chen po bshams te/ 'gron tshegs rnams bsdus la sngos nus mnyes pas las la bzhago/ yang khyad par gyi bsrung
395a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dag la bsngos te/ rten lo bzhag pa'i rgyal po bzhi dang / phur pas gtab pa'i phyogs skyong rnams mnyes nas/ rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol lo// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnamaso shis pa brjod
395b1(rgyud 'grel): cing bkra shis 'don pa dang / chos sbyin brjod pa dang / 'gro ba'i don du smon lam gdab pa dang / spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor ma nyams par bya'o// dang po'i rnal 'byor snga ma'i rim bzhin bkra'// legs bstan
395b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes mthun ngam pas gsal byas gang // de don sgrub rim snga ma'i gzhung nyid bzhin// khyad par lhag pa cung zhig brjod po med// 'on kyang go rims mi gsal legaso bsgribs pas// dang po gang du bdag pas dman
395b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams// tshegs med po bas las chen bsgrub pa'i phyir// sgrib pa'i rim pa gus pos blang bar mdzod// tshe 'dis phyag rgya chen po'i lam sgrub phyir// de yi cho ga dri med legs bshad pas// dga' mdzes pad
395b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar yid 'ong tshogs rgyas la// de 'dod brten pa'i don thob tshim bzhin shog/ dpral sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nI bo hUM mdzad rdo rjes mdzad pa
395b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra si ha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba lha rin po ches bsgyur zhing gtan lo phab pa'o// / dpal ga rgya men po'i chu sa na //
395b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ saM saMd+d+hi ma hA shrI he ru ka no bi ka nA ma khod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sgrub thabs yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag
396a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog de'i// shes rab kyi ni blo phye nas// nges par rtogs pa'i sa
396a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhi las// bla mas nges pa'i lung 'dri bstan// snum pa yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i rtul zhugs can// de dag goms nas nyam su blang // blo zhan shes rab chung bas ni// bsgrubs kyang
396a3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka bsregs pas na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa min// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags par ni// cir yang 'gyur ba'i yig 'bru bsam
396a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer tshul du 'phros nas kyang // ma lus khyab pas mnyes byas te// re dang dam pa'i tshul zhes dgongs// 'od zer de dag bsdus nas kyang // dur khrod sa ru brtag par bya// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang
396a5(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // gsang ba'i don gyi las rnams bya// dkyil 'khor nub phyogs de bzhin gzhi// khaM phor ri mo bris pa dgu// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa dgram// rdzas kyis mdzes par 'khor bar bzhag
396a6(rgyud 'grel): mig gi rten yang mngon par bya// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ phyag rgya che dang ldan pa yis// ci rigs su ni las rnams bya// mi dmigs chos la blo brtags shing // ye shes can gyi byin
396b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis// thams cad tshul bzhin byin brlabs nas// rtog pa'i blo can de dag gis// skyog lus man chad rdzas kyi rnams// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dbul// dngos grub 'dod pas gsol ba
396b2(rgyud 'grel): gdab// slob dpon ji bzhin bstan bdor gnas// rdo rje'i tshul du dab can sbyin// g.yon phyogs gnas la tshul bzhin du// ji ltar 'dod paM bzhin du sbyar// gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya//
396b3(rgyud 'grel): de la 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsul// 'dod chags ye shes gsol ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogos 'khrigs pa'i 'od// thim pas rgyal mor byin gyis brlabs// ye shes dam tshig chen po yos//
396b4(rgyud 'grel): bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon de// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung bya ste// rang rig ye shes de la 'od// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag/ dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher
396b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab byas tau// 'dod par bya ba rab tu gnyis// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la bzung // de dag dngos grub chen po bas// ji ltar
396b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod par nen tan bya// dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gis// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas kyang // dam tshig chen pos bde bar gnas// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// sgom
397a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan// ston pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// sgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya// lhag pa'i rtags kyis kun mtshon nas// grub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab//
397a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med rtogs pa'i gdeng can gyis// kun mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs nas ni// dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// dngos ni a ru byin brlabs
397a3(rgyud 'grel): nas// rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang // byang chub sems ni 'od zer spro// mos pa'i thugs la mnyes bsams nas// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzung // phyag mtshan snying po
397a4(rgyud 'grel): phra mo dag/ bstan par red nas mkha' la bzhag/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas// nges kyang spro ba'i las rnams byed// dngos kyang mchod pa'i rjes su sngo// sangs rgyas
397a5(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di bsgrub pa'i phyir// sku gsum sa la goms par bya// dang por chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// thoms
397a6(rgyud 'grel): cad du yang khyab por bya// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor// zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ bsnyen pa'i don du ngo dag gyur// bsgrub
397b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// sku mdog so so'i phyag mtshan dang // rgyan dang cha lugs gsal ba dang // bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom// dngos grub dam pa blang ba'i phyir//
397b2(rgyud 'grel): snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// bskal pa'i me dpung 'khrigs pa bzhin// 'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par bsam// yA shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// gzhugs dang brten dang mi
397b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba// dam tshig zil gnon phyag byed dang // mchod dang bskyod dang bza' ba dang // tshul rigs goms pa'i blo dag gis// ci rigasu ni brtan par bya// dam tshig mchog gi mchod
397b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // bskul tshig dbyangs kyis do dag mnyes// 'khor bcas mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bud// zhags grangs dus ni brtag pa'o// mtshan ma bstan
397b5(rgyud 'grel): po byung ba na// sgrub po chen po brtsam par bya// bar chad byed pa'i bgags chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs can yang // re dang
397b6(rgyud 'grel): dogs pa la sogs pa// ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi 'byung // phan gnod byed pa rnams gnyis po// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag ni// rnam pa gsum po byung ba ni// ngogs dang chags
398a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems spangs te// bye brag tu ni shre bar+yA byA// nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don spyad // gal te 'byung po mnan par bya// kun kyang sems can don du bsngo/ sgrub pa chen po
398a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag grub pa zhes bya ba/ grub pa'i slob dpon chen po badz+ra hUM ka ra'i zhal sngo nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / bod kyi lha bya can po khri srong lde btsan+da gyi bka' lung
398a3(rgyud 'grel): gi dpalA na lin+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang du// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po hAM ka ra de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de sbubs na mkha'i snying pos
398a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
399a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyad kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad dang mkha' 'gro ma bde mchog dkyil chog bzhugs/
399b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo gI DA k+Shi nI dzA la saM ba ra ma hA tan+t+ra nA dza nA ma maN+Da la no bi ka sarba satwa su kho ta ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad
399b2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnye bar sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sems can thams cad kyi bde ba skyed me zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems de bal lo phyag 'tshalo// ma lus bdud rnams
399b3(rgyud 'grel): spro zhing bsdu bo mdzad nas rgyal gyur cing // bde gshegs rnams kyi thugs bral bsgrungs nas bde mdzad rgyal gyur te// rdo rje'i sbyor bar rang gi yan lag dga' mdzad rgyal gyur nas// khrag gri gtung bas myos
399b4(rgyud 'grel): shing btsun mo la spyod rgyal bar gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// zaba'i cing rgya che yon tana? can// myur du byang chubA ra bo sgrub pa// kun tu nub pa nyid mthong nas// dkyil 'khor che gA'i rim 'di ni// saum
399b5(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad sngon 'gro ba'i// bde ba skyed ma zhes bya ba// kha cig rje su gzung phyir yin// de nyid kyis ni rdzas gzung ba ste// gang phyir de yon rjes bzung bas// ma lus sdig pa zad pas na// 'di ni bdag gis gus
399b6(rgyud 'grel): par byas// gang phyir de yi gzugs sku ni// bris pa'i thang ka la sogs te// de yi yon tan dran sgo nas// de gzugs kha dog can du 'gyur// de rigs som nyi med pa dang // mchog tu yid dga' skyed pa ste// rigs
400a1(rgyud 'grel): meng yon tan myeng gyur cing // kha cig rnam par 'phrul byur 'gyur// des na rab rgyas gyur pa ni// gang zhig+sa 'di ni dgos min te// de lta na yang brgya ldum na// kha cig la ni dgos par 'gyur//
400a2(rgyud 'grel): med khro la gdug pa dang // le lo chags dang sdang ldan pa// de sogs skyon ni rnam spangs te// mtshan nyid kun dang ldan pa yi// skyob dpon sangs rgyas las dngos po'i// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// ni dang rgyus dang
400a3(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas sogs// 'dod dang por byed nus rnams kyi// slob mas dkyil 'khor bris pa la// lan gnyis lanA gsuM gsol padag/ sngon du bsnyen pas bgegs gzhom dang // tshogs ni bskyed par bya ba'i phyir// 'a khor
400a4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i gtso bo'i sngags 'bum bzlas// yang na lhug pa'i lha ru mtshon// gzhan gyi yang ni khri yin te// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod// bza' dang skur sogs bzang po la// mkhas pa yi sa nI brtsom byas te/
400a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba drug dang gzi' bzhi dang // skyer m+bu rnams ni bcu bani da // chos grangs bdun du bye ba la// rab gnas le sogs rgyus pa gsungs// dpyid zla ra ba 'bring dkun chung // dbyar zlar 'bring dgun zla dang /
400a6(rgyud 'grel): ge za'i lag bla ma pa bsangs// zla ba'i gza' rnams 'di dag go// rgyal dang me bzhi lha mtshams dang // snar ma bya bzhugs mon gre dang // chu smad snron dang khrums dang lag/ lnga po bdun pa bcu rnams dang /
400b1(rgyud 'grel): gang zhag gsum dang 'gengs pa dang // zla ba nya dang bcu gsum pa// tshes grangs bdun ni dge ba yin// ji ltar sngar brjod bskur bzang ni// rjesu mthun par spyad bya ste// gzhan du slob dpon rdzas 'dod pas//
400b2(rgyud 'grel): dmyal ba nyid du ltung ba yin// de lta'i rim pas spyad bya ste// ri dang grong khyer grong rdal dang // sa phyogs yid dang mthun pa ru// sa gzhi yongasu gzugs par bya// thal ba rus dum gtum bu rnams//
400b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dag pa nyid du bya// lho dang tshu lu thugs pa ru// sa ni shar dang byang du nub// dngos po kun lo kun rdzob tu// rigs ni rnam par bzhir brjod do// dmangs rigs las ni bram ze'i bar// gnag
400b4(rgyud 'grel): ser da mar dang dkar po'o// de nas dr-i n+ti shes byas te// gnag dung tshu rul paT dri drang // bzhi pa yid 'di dri ru brjod// ro yung yong ni brtag par bya// sbyar zhing rtsub pa dmAng rigs 'gyur// mngar
400b5(rgyud 'grel): pab rje rigs kyang yin te// tsha ba yang ni rgyal rigs la// gzha ni kha zhing bska ba yin// zhi dang rgyus dang de bzhin dbang // mngon spyod kyang ni 'dod po ste// sa ni 'di ltar rim brjod pa// brkos
400b6(rgyud 'grel): nas yang ni dgang bar bya// ji ltar kha dog brjod sogs rim// mkhas pa bsang gtor bya ba ste// nag po ji ltar brjod pa ni// ser po bu ram nyid yino// dkar po'i don phyir tsan dan nyid// dmar
401a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo bad+hA'i chu ny-id da // dmar po rgyan dan dag gis te// 'di nA gnas kar shes par bya// smyur ba la nA~M blun grub ste// nag pa yang ni brjod par b+ha// shA rdul ban+d+ha chu da // de bzhin naldan
401a2(rgyud 'grel): badz+rod byA ste// nag po ji ltar brjod pa ni// ser po bu ram nyid yin no// dmar po la ni tsha ba gsum// dkor po dzA ltar brjod nyid yin// sa la phur gang ba bsrung ba'i phyir// da ni bdag gis brjod par bya// n+ya gro d+ha
401a3(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba lo// rgyus pA a shwa zla shing ste// dbang la steng ljang phur bu gnas// bsrung pa la ni rus pa'o// zhi ba la sogs bye brag gi/ de nas bum pA brjod byas te// zhi ba la ni shes rab bzhin// rgyas pa la ni dngu du zang+ga
401a4(rgyud 'grel): dpyong la gA sin+na gyi rang bzhin te// bsad pa la nAM thod pa yin// dbu la sogs pa snyed gyur na// sa'i rang bzhin du mo gan \u0f7f// rten dun dang ni gur gling ts+tsha na man po dang nga chung sal dri khyi ma y-i// mkhas yis ni
401a5(rgyud 'grel): byug paraH/ zhi ba s+thA dzo b+hu ba s+t+wa~M// rgyas pa de sa~M d+ha ma dz+dza// de nas dbang gi las yin te// dgas ka zas pa'i lus yin no// nas min snang ba me // ji ltar/ khams dang chung gyur bya// la
401a6(rgyud 'grel): dngus dang gser dang ni// rim pa bzhon du lcags nyid do// pad+ma'i rnam pa dngul yin te// sor ni bcu gnyis pa nyid do// 'dab ma yang ni bzhi bzhi ste// zhi ba la sogs lha gzugs ni// ji ltar de ni brjod par bya/
401b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la sogs dkar po ste// zhi ba'i rang bzhin mnyam pa'o// rgyas pa la ni ser po ste// mchog tu gter sogs dgug pa'o// dbang la chags pa'i sems kyis te// kha dog dmar zhing 'bar ba'o// bsang
401b2(rgyud 'grel): pa kha dog nag po ste// 'khrugs shing 'jigs pa nyid yino// thig srud khru brgyad par gsungs te// gzhon nu ma yis bkal ba yis// du ma rab tu bkal nas ni// slob dpon mtheb sor bcu gnyis cha'o//
401b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dug stangs ji ltar gsungs pa ni// rim bzhin ji ltar brjod par bya// zhi ba sems dpa'i skyil nga kyang ste// rgyas la de bzhin rdo skyil krung // dbang la g.yon pa'i stangs stabs te// skyil krung
401b4(rgyud 'grel): stan la legs gnas pa'o// g.yas pas gdengs te bsnyal ba ni// bsad ba la mchog lha min bzhin// ji ltar gau rims bzhin du ni// bdag gis bzlas phreng brjod bya s+ho// zhi baM la ni shel rang bzhin//
401b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas la mu tig 'bras bur brjod// dbang la bo de rtse ru bshad// bsad pa mi yi rus pa yin// g.yer dang dngul dang mu tig dang // mthing shun dang ni byi ru ste// rin po che ni lngar brjod nas// kha rgyan lnga
401b6(rgyud 'grel): ni brjod par bya// 'dzam bu nA da bi lwa dang // skyur shing sa bon gang ba'o// 'bru ni til dang gro dang ni// sran ma nas dang 'bras bu brjod// de ltar rim pas myur ba ru// mkhas pa yis ni gzhan don bya// gang
402a1(rgyud 'grel): zhig rang don dgos byed na// rmongs pas dmyal bA nyid du lhung // dri chu sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang // dag pa'i chu dang me tog dkar// gzhan gyi las kyi rim tshul te// ji lngar brjod pa'i rim gang
402a2(rgyud 'grel): yin// ji ltar brjod pa'i bzed zhal du// mngon par bsngags te dri yis 'dug/ me tog spos dang de bzhin me// dri yis dung sogs g.ya su bzhag/ sngags kyi mchod yon snod ni g.yon// bzed zhal
402a3(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bzhag par bya// yi ge gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// mchod yon slong la bsngags par bya// zhi la mthar ni wa bshad // rgyu la mthA ni b+h+yo bshad// dbang la mthar ni hri yig ste// bsad pa'i mthar ni hUM phaT do// dang po dri chu dbul
402a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// sbrang dang bau ma gnyis pa'o// dag pa'i chu ni gsum pa ste// me tog dang bcas bzhi paro// dung chos nas ni dri yi chu// bzod zhal du ni dbul bar bya// zhal bsil thar thung 'o me sbrang // yang
402a5(rgyud 'grel): ni bsang gtor chu nyid do// dkyil 'khor bri bar bya phyir dang // bdug pa rnams ni zhi phyir dang // sa la sogs pa brtag pa'i phyir// gnas bsrung rim pa brjod par bya// thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
402a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi gnas ni bsrung bar bya// phyis nas sa sogs gzung ba ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag par bya// rtag po'i ru ru phyin nas ni// 'jam pa'i stan la legs 'dug nas// dge blos shar du kha
402b1(rgyud 'grel): bltas te// rta mchog gi ni ting 'dzin du// rnal 'byor pa yis bsam bya ste// yan lag la yang dgod par bya// oM yig kha dog dkar po yis// sa bon bral bar bsam par bya// a yig kha dog
402b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ni// longs spyod 'khor lor dgod par bya// hUM yig kha dog nag po ni// snying ga'i dkyil du dgod pa ba// ho yig kha dog ser po ni// lte ba'i 'khor lo dgod pa'o// haM k+ShaM spyi gtsug gsang ba ni//
402b3(rgyud 'grel): ljang dang sngo ba de bzhin te// 'khor lo drug tu rim bzhin du// dkyil 'khor drug ni bsgom byas te// sa gzhi rnams ni yongs gyur pas// mkhas pa yis ni rdo rje spro// rdo rje de las 'phros pa yi// rdo rje
402b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba mi zad pas// phyogs bcur kun tu gnas pa yis// bgegs kun 'bar bas bsreg par bya// der gnas yul gyis ming gri ming // mkhas pu yas ni shes byas te// thog mu nyid du zhing
402b5(rgyud 'grel): slong la// gtor ma byin te gtang bar bya// au AHhUM a mug+na ya sa pa ri lbi ra ya/ i daM ba le gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hu paM dI paM/ ak+Sha daM/ dang ma ha/ sa pa rI thA ra brI gr-ih+NA pa tsha tu/ dzauHhUM bA ho/ \u0f7fi dr-i baM liM gr-ih+Na tu/
402b6(rgyud 'grel): tu a ba ri wa ri// sar+b+bo satwa naM/ shA na ti puSh+paM/ rak+Sha war+NaM go puSh+TiM ka ro tu ka/ i daM sA naM ta ga tA te/ maN+DaM la b+hu mya/ tiSh+Tha tu hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra d+hA ra adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bi shad par gyur pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung
403a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor los bsam bya ste// rlung sogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de dag yongasu gyur pa las// ji srid mthong ba'i bar du ni// 'khor lo'i mthar ni bsrung ba'i phyir// rab lnga
403a2(rgyud 'grel): yang bzhin no// 'og gi cha yi rtsa gsum lo// steng gI mda' yI dra ba'o// ha yA ra ba la rgyu las// mkhas pasa? mkha' sogs dgod bya ste// yang ni yI ge gsum nyid dang // hA gnyis steng dang 'og
403a3(rgyud 'grel): tu'o// shes rab can gyis bsrungs bsgoms nas// b+h+rU~M yig sa bon las byung ba'i// gzhal yas khang yang bsgom bya ste// der ni baM skyes pad+ma'o// de steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni A las zla dkyil
403a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor// hUM bsam dag las rta mchog ste// bde mchog ma dang mnyam sbyor ma'o// zhal bzhi pa la dpung pa bzhi// phyog bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// rta mgrin+da rgya lho chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po dam grub pa'o//

403b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mkha' khyab 'od zer tshogs 'phrog pa'i// de'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// bdud sogs rnam par bcom byas twe// de nas mnyam par bzhag par bya// oM AHhUM hoHhUM k+Sha hraHhraHhradzar ra ra/ badz+ra
403b2(rgyud 'grel): a na lA sad+d+ha wa rA na/ s+yAr+b+ba d+hA ma pra la yA sa b+ha ba sar+b+ba mA ra ka ye ka bi g+h+nAn bi na yA ka di naM/ dA shaM dig+d+ha ta nAM ka yau wAkrIt+ta nI/ da ha da hA/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hasmi ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT// 'di ni bgegs bsreg pa'i
403b3(rgyud 'grel): sngagaso// log 'dren gyi ni bgegs la sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu bkug byas te// rdo rje zhags pas bcings byas nas// bcing ba kun gyis bcing bar bsgom// khri rgyal rdo rje phur bu ni// lte smad dpal gyi
403b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin te// phyogs bcu gdug pa'i bgegs steng du// son par nAraM sgo par bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya/ saur+b+ba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la kI la ya sar+b+ba bA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra b+ha rod a dzI pa ya ti//
403b5(rgyud 'grel): kA yU bak+ShIn+ta badz+ro kI lA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mud kAr badz+ra kI la ya a ko Ta yu hUM phaTaM/ phyogs mtshams phur bus bsrung ba la// khro bo rnams la bka' stsol bsgo// blo ldan khro rgyu la bA sAm bya ste// gsang sngags
403b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni brjod par bya// oM hUM kro te trAM haM/ kro ta nA madz+nyA nad ka ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra ta b+h+r-i ga tA rak+Sha tsakra swa b+ha ba at+ma kau haM/ zhes nga rgyal brtan par bskyed par bya'o// chad par gyur pa'i rim pa yis// de nas de la
404a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin// dag cing rtogs la s+phar byas te// bdud rtsir byas te bsgrub par bya// thog mar thal mos dgab byas te// de nas rnam par phyag rgya bcing // oM AHhUM hoHu tiSh+Tha ShA/ suM b+hA ni suM d+hA/
404a2(rgyud 'grel): ya mAn+ta ka/ big nAn+ta ko/ pam+ba daMn+ta ka/ pi g+hAn+ta ka/ a tsa la ni li la dan+te/ Ta kiM rA dza/ many+tsau ba la dzaM b+hU/ i daM ba laM gan+d+ha daM puSh+Ta dz+nyA paM dI bau ak+Sha taM dAd+ba hi/ te tsi A gots+tsha sa pa ri nU rA sA g+h+r-i/ i daM prA l-i/ b+h+r-ih+ne du Sh+Ta
404a3(rgyud 'grel): tu pI ban+d+ha/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsan+ne pA da sar+b+ba satwa naM/ shan+tiHpustaM rak+Sha thaM gup+te kur ban du/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas g.yas g.yon rkang gnyis la/ hUM hUM dgo las byung ba yi// rdo rje rkang mthil la gnas pas// rdo rje'i 'gros
404a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis gar bya'o// de nas g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang dang // mnyam dang mI mnyam pa dag dang // zlum po dang ni zla gam dang // rus sbrul rkang bstabs gcig par bya// me tog dri sogs bshams nas ni// mkhas
404a5(rgyud 'grel): pas+ya sa nI bod par bya// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par las// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub phyir// bdag ni dkyil
404a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal// btsun mo dang bcas byang chub sems// de dag thugs rje ldan pa dang // phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la gsol ba gdab// kun tu thogs med gzi
404b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// mgon po bdag la dgongasu gsol// slob ma dbang bskur la sogs dang // bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // las rnams thams cad rab sgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor du ni bzhugasu gsol// sngags pas

404b3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa'i lhag par gnas pa ste// sngags pas sngar brjod bum pa ni// grangs ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// yang na lnga 'am dgu nyid du// dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis bya// ji ltar mtshan ma de bri ba// ri baM bzhin du
404b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya// gzhu dang 'khor lo de bzhin dri// thod pa bdud rtsis gang ba dang // dpag bsam shing dang sha chen dang // de bzhin bdun pa lcang lo yin// thog mar tha mar rdo rje ste// lcags kyu de bzhin zhags pa

404b6(rgyud 'grel): bcings la// dum steng blo dang ldan pas bzhag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang sngags ni// brgyad brgya nyid du bzlas par bya// de bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// dkyil 'khor pa yis bzlas par bya// de nas yang ni
405a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i thig/ dkyil 'khor gyi nI shar gyi rgyur// gau rI sngags kyisna bzhugs nas ni// mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya// de nas gzhan yang rdo rje'i rdul// nug+sa k+Shu~M phyogasu bzhug bya ste/
405a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya// de nas lho phyogs nyid ni// skyob mra maN+Dal byas nA ni// tshe rkun ma yi swar ldan pas// rdo rtse lnga bzhag bya ste// mchod yon sogs kyis mchod par bya// de nas byang gi phyogasu ni// ro longs ma'i
405a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis// rdo rje dril bu bzhag bya ste// mchod yon sngogs kyis mchod par bya// de nas gsang sngags ldan pa yis// slob mas maN+Dal byas nas ni// me tog phreng ba l-ig thogs nas// pus mo g.yas
405a4(rgyud 'grel): ba sar gtsugs te// rdo rje bla ma'i bdud rtsi'i thigs// de lta bu ni mnyam par bya// kha cig sngags ni sgrub phyir dang // bsod nams 'dod pa de las gzhan// gzhan du 'jig rten don gnyer ba// dkyil 'khor du ni
405a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par byed // 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer ba// dad pAs mang du gnyer po yis// blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod mi bya// tshe 'di'i 'dod par 'gyur ba la// 'jig rten pha rol
405a6(rgyud 'grel): don mi 'gyur// skyes bu 'jig rten pha rol gnyer// tshe 'di yi ni 'bras bu rgyas// de ltar gus pa dang bcas te// chos ni mnyan par byas nas su// lus ngag bsdams pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mdun du tshul bzhin
405b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya// slob ma rang gis lus bcug ste// rdo rje lam nas pad+mar don// de las bde gshegs zhu ba yi// dbang bskur dkyil 'khor shar sgor gdon// de nas thal sbyar bus gtsugs nas// rnga
405b2(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzin pa chen po la// 'di lta bu yi tshig ngag gis// lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// bdag gi ston pa dpa' cheni khyod// bde mchog pa dang mnyam sbyor la// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/
405b3(rgyud 'grel): mgon po yis ni bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skabs gsum ngag kyang bdag la stsol// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// thur pa chen po'i
405b4(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer du// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de nas slob ma gtso gyur pa// de la bod pa byas nas ni// mnyam par bzhug brisems kyis// 'di lta bu yi tshigs bcas bya// khu tshur rdo rje theg chen po'i//
405b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags pa yi tshul chen ni// khyed ni theg chen snod min na// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// dus gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa
405b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams// de dag gi ni gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po de mkhyen nas// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams mkhyen pa tshad med rnyeng // gsang sngags spyod pas mnyam med de// shAkya seng ge slob pa yis// bdud
406a1(rgyud 'grel): thig ni gdang bya ste// de nyid sum cu bzhi nyid du// mkhas pa yi nI slar thig gdab// cha chung phyi rol cig dor ba// rdo rje ra ba'i thig yin te// de nA cha chung lnga gnyis ni// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i thig
406a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no// de bzhin du nI lte ba ste// nang gi cha gcig gI sarA yin// de ltar cha chung lnga gnyis la// 'dab ma'i bar yong shes par bya// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsamase nas naM// g.yas skor gyis ni bskor bya ste//
406a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyis ni thig rnams la// ye shes thig ni bstim par bya// de nas de rtes nyid du ni// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhog pas// he hi'i sgra ni brjod bya zhing // yid kyis sgo ni dbye bar bya// oM hUM hriM aM khaM
406a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni// rdul tshon kyang ni bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar tshogs pa rnyed gyur nas// dag pa'i brin pas dbul bar bya// gsal bsas lha yi phyag rgyas ni// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// dri lo dkrol rdo rje gsor
406a5(rgyud 'grel): bapa dang // rdo rje glus ni skul byed cing // dmar ba'i gos bcas gtor byin te// 'di lta bu ni bsam par bya// 'di ni tshwa dbyings dag pa ste// thams cad khams ni rnam dag pa// rang nyid sangs rgyas thams cad de// de
406a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gnas// g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis thog mar// dbang ldan napa ni bskor bya ste// 'khor lo'i gtso bo rjes 'brangs nas// sngags pas rdul mtshon bri bar bya// oM badz+ra tsit+pa sa ma ya hUM/
406b1(rgyud 'grel): phyis ni slob ma bzo bo yi// ci rigs par ni byi bar bya// drang dang 'khyogs dang chud pa dang // phra dang sbom pa nyer mtshon te// sbom po yid ni nad 'gyur zhing // phra na nor rnams zad par 'gyur// 'khyogs na 'thag
406b2(rgyud 'grel): rkyo 'byung 'gyur zhing // chad na slob dpon slob mo 'tsho// de la sogs pa'i skyon spangs nas// rdul tshon ri mo dgyes par bya// shar du sngon po chen po che// wAr ni ser po 'byung ba yin// nub du dmyor po chen po
406b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ byeng du ldeng gu nyid 'byung ba'o// dbus ni zla ba'i 'od ltar te// 'di ni rdul tshon rim par brjod// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slob dpon 'khor lo'i shar du 'dug/ rnam sapa mdzad sogs ting
406b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis// sgo bzhi rnamasu ljags 'dug ste// gru bzhi yi ni mtshums rnamasu// d+ham chos klog pa bzhi yang bzhag/ dam tshig la 'das 'jigs pa yis// slob mar gyur pa bzhug mi bya// g.yas pas rdo rje
406b5(rgyud 'grel): gsor bya zhing // g.yin pa yis ni dril bu dkrol// sngagas+ya ni oM AHhUM hUM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Te ra nA ra na/ prA ra Na pra ra Na/ saM pra ra na saM pra rA na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She tra ye pra tsa li tai/ pradz+nyA pra rA mr-i tA/ na da sAM b+hU bA pe badz+dzi
406b6(rgyud 'grel): d+hAd+ha da da yo/ saM to Sha na hUM hUM hUM phaT/ rkang pa 'degs dang 'jog pa dang / lnga po bzhin dang khro ba yi// slar ni sa gzhi mnan bya ste// sngags rigs pas mi gnas par bya// gzhan gyi rim 'di dag gis ni// sgro
407a1(rgyud 'grel): traM ma tri kra ma hUM// ye shes kyi thig gdab pa'i sngagaso// de nas de rjes nyid du ni// gong du bstan pa'i thig nyid kyis// mkhas pas mnyam par rab bzhag nas// las kyi thig ni gdab par bya// de la
407a2(rgyud 'grel): re zhig ya shes sngags bzlas pa'i// srad bu mtha' ma dkar ldan pas// dkar ba'i rdzas la spang byas te// yid kyis gtso bo'i gsang sngags bzlas// he ru ka'i gnas bsams te// khu tshur g.yon du thig gdab
407a3(rgyud 'grel): bya// g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste// dzaHyis bsgrubs pa'i lag tu btang // phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te// shar bltas rdo rje'i thig gdab bya// slar yang slob dpon lhor 'dug ste// byang du bltas
407a4(rgyud 'grel): te gnyis pa gdab// me yis phyogs kyi char gnas nas/ mkhas pas byang du kha bltas te// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// de nas yang ni bya ba yin// rlung phyogs gnas la lhor bltas te// nub kyi
407a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi thig gdab po// de nyid du ni 'dug byas te// byang gi phyogs kyi thig gdab po// yang ni me phyogs 'dug nas ni// lho phyogs kyi ni thig gdab ste// kha khyer gyi no thig dag kyang // shes rabo can gyis
407a6(rgyud 'grel): ba par bya// slar yang ma mtsham su 'dug ste// rlung gi mtshoms kyi thig gdab cing // de bzhin bden bral mtshams 'dug nas// dbang ldan mtshams kyi thig gang ba bya// slob dpon dang ni de yi cha// bskor
407b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogasu ni 'gro bar bya// dang po che chen brgyad du ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bgo byas te// de nas de rjes nyid du ni// sgrub pa po yid de la blta// slar yang de la bcu drug char// bgo bya slar yang nyis 'gyur du//
407b2(rgyud 'grel): mdor na thig rkang chang ba ru// mkhas pa yis ni gdab par bya// yang na bcu drug cha chen la// rtsa ba'i tshangs thig nas bzung ste// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// legs par thig ni gdab par
407b3(rgyud 'grel): byA/ tshangs thig nas ni drangs pa yi// tshwa ni bzhi pa legs bzung ste// na mkha' khams kyi rang bzhin du// mkhas pa yisA ni gdab par bya// de yi cha chenA lnga pa ni// nyi shu char ni bgo bya ste// dang po
407b4(rgyud 'grel): tshon rtsi tshwa nyid ni// gnyis bzhi de bzhin rim bzhino// de yi cha chen drug pa ni// nyi shu bzhir ni gdab bya ste// cha gnyis sa ni dra phyed yin// de nas gnyis ni rim bzhi no// cha chen bdun pa brgyad pa ni// sum
407b5(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gnyisu gdab bya ste// rta bab su ni shes bya zhing // lcug ma ci rigs shes par bya// gzhan yang tshangs thig nas gzung ste// 'khor lo'i thig gradab rim pa ni// rta babs bar du gdab par bya//
407b6(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'ang ci rigs shes par bya// slar yang 'khor lo'i lha dbus kyi// cha drug rnam par phyin nas ni// de na bdud rtsi brkyang nul bya// de nas de la thig gdab po// cha chen brgyad dang bcu drug tu// de la
408a1(rgyud 'grel): bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yang rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // sangs rgyas chos dang ngag 'dun la// rtag par bdag ni skyab su mchi// bdag dang gzhan don sgrub pa'i phyir//
408a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu ni sems bskyed// sems can thams cad mgron mnyer nas// byang chub sems mchog bskyed par bgyi// 'gro la phan par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub spyod mchog spyad par bgyi// de ltar gsum
408a3(rgyud 'grel): la skyabs 'gro ba// lan gsum bar du brjod par bya// de rjes de ma thag tu ni// yang ni 'di ltar bya baM yin// rdo rjes rdo rje slob ma nI// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi ni sdigs// oM AHhUM big+h+nAn+da kr-ing hUM/ zhes
408a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sngags kyis bsrung bar bya// de dag snying ga lkog ma dang // spyi bo yi naM gan rnaM su// zla bar rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo'i rang bzhin dgod par byaM// de dag rnams gyi lte ba la// yaM ge oM AHhUM bsam
408a5(rgyud 'grel): pAr bya// de nas slob dpon stan longs nas// rdo rje 'byed pa gAyasA bzung ste// slob me'i snying ga lkog ma dang // spyi bo yin gnas rnam su// rdo rje yi ni sa reg bya ste// oM AHhUM zhes brjod par bya// de nas
408a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bor me tog dang // mdun du spos ni dbul bar bya// de bzhin snying gar mar mi dang // rims bzhin dri rnams dbul bar bya// de nas ku sha'i stan dag la// slob ma nyal du byas la// cung zhig rmi lam
408b1(rgyud 'grel): sus mthong ba// nang par+ra dA la smos shig ces// rimu bzhin du ni smra bar bya// de dug rang gi gnasu btang // slob ma lhags par gnas byas nas// las gzhan la ni 'jug par bya// slob ma bskul ba byas
408b2(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// de dag dang mi dge'i mchin ma rnams// so so'i don ni rtag pa'i phyir// slob dpon rang gi gnas nyal t+ya// dkyil 'khor sa yi phyogs kyi chu// lho phyogasu ni mkhas pa yi// sha ra phyogasu ni kha~M
408b3(rgyud 'grel): lhas te// nub phyogasu ni rkang pA'o// mchod yon la sogs phul nas ni// gnas ni lhag par gnas par bya// au ho ka ma la garba sha ye badz+ro su ka ma Ni tAn+ta kra rau mI yA ga ta thA ga te te na tret+ta ha ha swA hA/ dngos
408b4(rgyud 'grel): sam yang na rmi lom du// de bzhin du ni rtag mthong dang // slob ma yis kyang de ltar te// gnyis ka'adra spyad par bya ba yin// de nas mtshan ma gyur na// slob dpon gyis ni khri bzlas te// gtor ma chen po byin byas nas//

408b6(rgyud 'grel): thog gi sna gzung nas// sngags kyi bum pa kun gyi chus// khang pa'i nang du gsang gtor bya// oM sarba sho d+hA ni hUM phaT/ las kyi thig gis rims bzhin du// ye shes thig ni brkyang bar byas// badz+ra sa ma ya sU
409a1(rgyud 'grel): ste shin tu m+b+ha bzang bya// dpung chen dag la'ang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob b+ha 'i phy-ir// bu yis blo gros 'di kyis shig/ de nas bdud rtsi tham sbyor bgyi// sngags kyi mngon par
409a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa yi// a shUd+tha la sogs pri shing // shun pa mA nyams rma med pa// tshad ni bcu gnyis sor tshod la// me tog phreng bas rtsa bcings pa// mkhas pa yis ni rim bzhin du// slob ma rnams la sbyin par
409a3(rgyud 'grel): g+ha gang yang mdun du lhung gyur na// de yis mchog gi dngos grub yin// de bzhin shar du rtse bltas nA// de la dngos grub 'bring du bshad// de ltar phyogs mtshamasna rtse bltas na// 'jig rten pa'i dadzi sa thu
409a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod// de ltar slo doR+sha ba las// gang zhig+sa kha yi 'og bas+t+ra sta nas// de li smra sa 'og dngos sgrub ni// som nyi meng pa nyid du brjod// de rjes rdo rje slob pa la// d+hI yis chu yis zer 'thung dang // dr-i ma
409a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum sbyin bya ste// oM hrI TI prad+hA d+hA mar sAr+b+ba thaM kar+m+ma anA// oM sa~M sho d+hA ya sar+b+ba bi ka D+ga a na ya trA~M// de nas yang ni nye 'dugu s+t+wa~M// dudu lam sbyor gsung sngags kyis// dzina'i rtsa la rab bsngags te// de nas
409a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags drung spyan du sbyin// de nyid bzlas pa'i sngags kyis ni// bsrung spyad mdud pa gsum ldan pa// de dag bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// slob ma rnams kyi dpung par bcing // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ ma byu
409b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar ma gyur pa'i// bdud rtsi yi ni rol gyur pa'i// chos bshad pas ni bzeng bstod bya// gal te kun mkhyen 'jig rten du// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// rgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ u dum ba ra'i
409b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog bzhin// gang phyir gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul// gang phyir mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'oda' byed nus pa// de bas kyang ni dkon pa yin// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sngar gyi sdig pa
409b3(rgyud 'grel): grang bgyis pa// dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis// de dag thams cad byung bar 'gyur// gang drag spyod pa'i mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo bAs// sdug bsngal ma lus 'byung 'gyur gyi// dman pa grong
409b4(rgyud 'grel): khyer de dag gcod// de ring khyod kyis mnyam med pa'i// rnyed pa mnyam med chen po rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas la// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongasu skye
409b5(rgyud 'grel): sti skye ba med// de phyir khyed ni theg chen la// srang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po che ro 'byung ba// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// 'di yis khyod rnams bgrong gyur nas// ye shes bla nu mong
409b6(rgyud 'grel): pa thob// de ltar slob ma la brjod nas// de yi don la gus pas mnyan// de ltar tshul bzhin mnyan nas ni// yang ni 'di ltar brjod par bya// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi// sdig pa mi dge so sor
410a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du yang shes par bya// g.yas dang g.yon bya'i rkang pa yis// rtag tu bgyings shing bsgyings par bya// oM hUM zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po'i sngagaso// g.yas brkyang
410a2(rgyud 'grel): bapa dang g.yon brkyang dang // lnga stangs ji ltar sngon bzhin brjod// oM hUM a phaT ces bya ba ni shar phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngag so// mnyam da mi mnyam rkang stabs dang // gtum zhing rab rmongs lta stangs te//
410a3(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM a phaT ces bya ba ni lho phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngagaso// zlum po dang ni rus sbal dang // dgra' ba'i gar dang lha bcas te// oM hUM a a a phaT ces bya ba ni nub kyi slob dpon gyi sngagaso// lta ba rnam
410a4(rgyud 'grel): par rgyu ba dang // shau ba lta bu de bzhin te// rkang pa dag gis gar byar ba// sa ga dang nI rkang cig yin// oM hUM hA ma ra duSh+Tan g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya// a a a hUM hU~M phaT/ byang phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sdug s+ho// phyogs

410a6(rgyud 'grel): hi sar+b+ba b+hA yak+Sha sarba b+hU ta pi sha tsa ud+ban+da a pasma ra da/ nA ki n+ya nga ya i maM ba li grih+na na du/ sa ma ya sid+d+hi/ me ma pra yats+tshan duM/ ya the baM/ ya the staM/ b+hiny+dza du/ b+ha ban+du maM/ ma ti kra ma du/ ma ma sarba kar sang+gu kha'i/
410b1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha ya sA/ yi kA b+ha wAn+tu/ hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi gtso bo'i gtor ma'i sngagaso// oM A hUM ho// b+hU mi bis+t+ra a haM sA ri in+d+ra a ti swa pa ra pa rI/ i draM b+hU li gAn+d+haM pUSh+paM d+hI
410b2(rgyud 'grel): br-i yaMk+Sha taM dwA da ma haM hAM bi e gats+tshi/ sa pa r-i ba ri/ i daM ba liM grih+nan du kha dan+d+ha bi ban dzaHhUM baM hoHsan+te pa tA sar+b+ba satwa naMnAM/ shAn+taM puSh+TAM shau k+Sha par+Ni guSh+Ti kur ban+d+ha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ slob dpon gnyis pa'i 'o// oM.oMHhUM \u0f7f
410b3(rgyud 'grel): ka ra a ki ni/ tsan+na suR+ya b+hu da maM ga la su tra pe he sa pa ti ki du sa ni b+haHzhes bA pa la sogs pa lho phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi sngagaso// oM AHhUM hoHdza[:]i bi dzaM ya pad+ma kar ko ta/ ba su ki saM b+ha ba la/ ku
410b4(rgyud 'grel): li ka A nan+ta/ tAk+ShA ka mya hA pad+me b+h+yaHzhes bya ba la sogasa? pa ni nub phyogs kyi slob dpon gyi klu'i gtwor mo'i sngagaso// oM AHhUM hoHb+he wang la ki ke tA mu shU ka ka taM mu shwA kaM kaM su ka ra gre ta b+huk+Sha a lu ka dzaM bo
410b5(rgyud 'grel): ka ra g+ha ru// d+ha mo khyed b+h+yo/ zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i gtor ma'i sngagaso// de nas ston pA yi rim pa yis// blo dang ldan pas bsrung byas te// bsrung ba'i khro bo rnams la ni// de nas bka' ni bsgo bar bya// bdag
410b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// gzugs brnyan bzhin du bdag nyid lta// dang por snying gar pad+ma la// de stangs zla rdzogs dkyil 'khor bas// der ni hUM byung rdo rje ste// de las 'od zer sprod par bya// 'od
411a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal me tog gdug sogs kyi// rang gi ming bzhin rnal 'byor mas// dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis/
411a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byas te bsdu bar bya// de nas bdun po dag bya ste// gzhan yang de nyid mchod par bya// stong pa ma yin mi stong ming // dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// chos rnams skye ba med pa ru// rgyu dang mi rgyu

411a6(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa bzhengasu gsol// zla rdzogs 'od zer lha 'bar zhing // shes rab tshogs pas dmar ba'i zhal// phyag gnyis rang gi rim 'khyud cing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam por ldan// dpa' bo
411b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang mnga' bsnams shing // rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// de nas kun gyis de mthong ste// de dag bred nas 'ongs par gyur// bdun dang phung byed 'jigs par rnams// nyams thag gsol bas
411b2(rgyud 'grel): 'debs par byed// de nas gsol 'debs gnas nas ni// snying rje khros pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// cung zad du su gnas nas ni// sna yi dbugs rings blo bton te// bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pas//

411b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams thul bar 'jigs mdzad 'di ni skye dgu'i badrag po ste// rtag tu dga' ba dang ldan gar mdzad 'gying dang bcas pa'i sku// glang chen ruswA pa sna tshogs rgyan klubs dur khrod yan lag can+da// zhal
411b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga phyag ni bcu pa la// kha dog sngo zhing 'jigs pa yi// spyan gsum smi ma ser ba ste// lus la thal bas nyes par byugs// che ba cung zad gcig pi la// gar dgu yi ni tshul dang ldan// rang 'od zhal
412a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis pa'i// shes rab dga' bas gcig mdzes pa'o// gnag cing ser la dmar zhing ljang // g.yon bskor gyis ni zhal bzhi yin// dkar zhing zhi ba steng zhal ste// phung
412a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i bdud rnams rab tu bcings// na ru'i pags pas gos 'chang zhing // gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bur bcas// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa// blo spangs gnyis gnyis por 'dzin pa yin// gnyis kyis lcags
412a3(rgyud 'grel): kyu zhags pa ste// gnyis kyis cang ti'u thod pa 'chang // mgo gnyis steng du he ru ka/ phyed krung bcas pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// brla gnyis mnyam par bzhag nas ni// bde ba chen po'i go 'phags gnas//
412a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas thod pa kha nAM 'chang // g.yas pas ba dan gsum pa'o// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog la// dur khrod du ba lta bu ste// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba'i// na tshod mdzes shing sgeg pa'o// de lta'i lha mo
412a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam pa'i// ji ltar khros par+ya gyur pa ni// de nyid du ni bkug byas to// phun sum tshogs pa'i khrag 'thung bskyud// brgyad pa'i mtha' na thig ler bcas// dbyangs yig lnga dang mnyam ldan pa/
412a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig gtso bo gyur pa las// gau rai dkar mo dbyung bar bya// mdun du gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i mgo bo 'bigs par byed// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // phyag bzhi yi ni rnam par mdzes//
412b1(rgyud 'grel): gur gyi sbyor ba la gzigs shing // g.yas brkyang ba yis rnam par bzhugs// gsum pA yi ni gsum pA la// 'og tu de nyid sbyor ba yis// tshogs bcas la ni chom rkun ma// g.ya su kha dog dmyur
412b2(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ 'khor lo sred gsum rgal bsgrigs 'dzub// g.yas gnyis par ni lcang lo ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub phyag rgya la// de bzhin g.yon pa ba ngan no// gnyis pa yi ni sbyang ba las// zla ba'i kha
412b3(rgyud 'grel): dog rmad byung ba'i// ro langs ma ni g.yon du ste// phyed krung bcas pa'i gur gyis bzhugs// bdud rtsi chen po lcug mdzad nas// snga ma bzhin du thal mdzad cing // slar yang slong bar mdzad pa yi//
412b4(rgyud 'grel): lcang lo yang ni gnyis pa sde// g.yas pa bzhi nu rgyal mtshan yin// rdo rje yis ni mtshan gyur pa'i// g.yon gnyis pa na kha T+wAM gA'o// lnga pa ya ni dang po la// lnga pa yis ni ldan par bya// 'di ni
412b5(rgyud 'grel): saM don rgyal po ste// thig le bcas las 'di ni 'byung // puk+ka si ni me mtsham su// gzugs mdzes zla ba'i kha dogra la// dkar ba'i lus la zhal sngo ba// g.yon brkyang ba yis bzhugs par mdzad
412b6(rgyud 'grel): lhung lo dong ni ba dan bcas// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon par te// dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang // kha T+wAM ga ni sngon bzhi no// gsum pa yi ni dang po la// thig le dang ni ldan pa la// gtum mo
413a1(rgyud 'grel): kha dog sngon mo ni// bden bral gyi ni mtshamasu gnas// g.yas brkyang pa yis gnas pa ste// phyag gnyis sha dang btung ba 'dzin// dur khrod me dang rgyal mtshan thang // rtag tu g.yon+da pa mdzes
413a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dang po yi ni gnyis pa la// thig les rnam par brgyan pa ste// sa bon de las zo phod ma// kha dog ljang la cung zad skya// rlung mtshams g.yon brkyang bas bzhugs shing // phyag gnyis kyis ni gar
413a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis 'og ma yis// lcong lo de bzhin rgyal mtshan 'dzin// gnyis pa yi ni dang po lo// thig le dang ni ldan pa las// las kyi phyag rgya dbang ldan du// he ru ka dpal zhal
413a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig ste// glang po'i thod pas dbu rgyan cing // sku tshe 'jigs par mdzad po mo// phyag gnyis rdo rje lcang lo dang // sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa'o// thams cad na mkha'i gos 'chang zhing // sgeg pa la sogs nyams
413a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan// rgyu ma'i rgyu thod chen po yi// phreng bas lus la rnam par brgyan// zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum ma// sgeg pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// thams cad mdzes pas phun tshogs shing // 'dzum zhing
413a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'dzum pa'i zhal// zhi ba drag por rab rmongs gtum// dga' zhing gar byed 'gyur dang bcas// shi ba bung ba lta bu yi// zhal gyi phyag rgya rnam par gnas// zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang // gar
413b1(rgyud 'grel): byed bsgyings shing lta bar mdzad// yi ge bzhi las byung ba yi// phyi rol mtshams kyi lha mo ni// so so rang gi lhag pa'i lha// rang gi phyag rgyas rol pa yi// pi wang la sogs sngags rnams ni// ha ho hriHhUM
413b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ru gonas// a AHaM a 'di sngon bzhin// me tog sogasu brtags par bya// de rnams nang gi phyogs gyur pa// rdo rje me tog sogs de bzhin// dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ 'di las kyang // sgro bsrungs rnams ni
413b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba yin// rin du 'gro sogs de dag ni// kha dog mtshan ma brjod par // gling bu ma ni dam mo la// gling bu'i sgra ni dar brtson ma// pi wad ma ni dkar mo la// pi wang la ni mngon par brtson//
413b4(rgyud 'grel): rdza rnga mo ni dkar mo lA// ku mun+ta ta nI de bzhin ljang // lha mo de rnams nang nas ni// me tog spros dang mA me dri// dkaR+Sha dang du baM lta bu dang // gsum pa gser gyi mdog can te// dri ma dmar po gur gum gyi// cung
413b5(rgyud 'grel): zad rab tu 'dres pa'o// shar gyi phyogs kyi sgo ru ni// ring du 'gro ma lcags kyu 'chang // g.yon pas lcug ma 'dzin pa la// cung zad khro dang bcas pa'o// nag mo 'gugs par byed ma la// g.yon brkyang ba
413b6(rgyud 'grel): yis gnas pa'o// lho yi phyogs kyi sko ru ni// ser mo rdo rje gdong cad ma// g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// lcags kyu kha dog ser mo 'dzin// g.yon pas mche ba 'dzin pa ste// rdo rje gdong can
414a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba// bkug pa rnams ni rab 'dzud pa'o// de nas nub phyogs sbyo ru ni// rdo rje sgrog ma rab tu gnas// phyag gnyis nyi ma zla ba 'dzin// de dag dbus na lcags sgrog ste// 'di ni dmar zhing
414a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ching bar mdzad// g.yas brkyang ba yin bzhugs pa'o// mgon po phyagA ni baicur brjod cing // phyag gnyis ma yis mgul nas mkhyud// phyag bzhir ldan pa'i lha mo ni// brgyad kyis yongasu puskor ba'o// me
414a3(rgyud 'grel): trog gling bu'i rim pa yis// de las gzhan dus gar byed cing // sgo bzhi dag tu gnas pas ni// kun nas yongasu bsrungs pa'o// 'di rdzogs dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de// rigs lnga yis ni byin gyis brlaH//
414a4(rgyud 'grel): mig la sogs pa byin brlabs te// dbang bskur ba ni blong bar bya// myig la sangs rgyas byang chub ste// gzugs ni 'dod pa'i lcug ma yin// nyan par rdo rje gling bu ste// sgra la rdzu rnga ma ru grags// sni la rdo rje me
414a5(rgyud 'grel): tog ste// dri la dri yau rnam par grags// lce la ring du 'gro ma ste// ro la thal ba 'jigs ma'o// lus la de bzhin reg bya la// pra mo ha ming rnal 'byor ma// yid la bde mchog mar brjod de// chos lA ri bong
414a6(rgyud 'grel): can ma'o// phung po rgyal ba sngar brjod do// sa la khams gsum rnam rgyal ma// sa'i khams la gnas pa naM// de bzhin lha mo A lo ka/ me'i khams la mar me ma// rlung la gu mun+da ru grags// mig ni rnam shes
414b1(rgyud 'grel): khams la ni// chos kyi 'khor lo ma ru brjod// rna ba'i rnam shes khams la ni// rdo rje pi bI ma ru grags// sna yi khams kyi rnam shes la// rdo rje yid ni 'phrog ma'o// lce'i rnam shes khams la nI// rdo rje gdong can
414b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brjod// lus kyi rnam shes khams la ni// lha mo phyag rgya'i rgyu yi gdab// yid kyi rnam shes khams lnga ni// lha mo e ma bde bar gnas// gau rI de bzhin pra mo ha// de bzhin tum+bo puk+ka s+t+wa~M// za phod
414b3(rgyud 'grel): mar brjod de bzhin dr-i// gti mug rdo rje rgya yis gdab// chos rkun ro langs ma ning ma// gling bu de bzhin pi wang dang // de bzhin lha mo rdza rnga mya// zhe sdang phyag rgya rgya yis gdab// yid kyi rnam shes khams
414b4(rgyud 'grel): la ni// las kyi phyag rgya mar me nyid// lha mo bcom ldan rim 'gro ma// de bzhin lha mo rdo rje gdong // thal bas rab 'jigs ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgya'i rgyu yis gdang // ku mun+na dang me tog spos/
414b5(rgyud 'grel): ser sna'i phyag rgya'i rgya yis gdub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab bsgrub pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum la sgyid sbyin ma// rdo rje 'dzin chen dpal rdo rje//

415a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyanu dang // sangs rgyas gtsug tor de bzhin no// de nas lha mos mchod byas+ya te// glu yi rol mos mchod par bya// r+b+he su chags pa'i pad+mo yi// dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag bas// mchod
