415a6(rgyud 'grel): phra mo'i rnal 'byor sbyor bar bya// phyag rgya chen mo gsal 'bar ma// gnas la sogs par gshegs pa mo// sdig mong zhe sdang can gus pas// rnal 'byor me ni kun gyis bsgom// khrag mthung mi'i
415b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis// 'gro ba rtsa bzhin blta bar bya// de'i phyir byin brlabs sbyor ba yis// le lo med par bzlas par bya// gang zhig bla mas bka' gnang ba// de nas legs par sbyar byas te// las glang gis ni
415b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis kyang // gzhan du mkhas pa nyon mongs 'gyur// dang po rab sngags brjod par bya// snying po de bzhin he ru ka/ rdo rje dam tshig mnyam ldan pa// rdo rjes gtum pa thoms cad ngo // dam tshig ces bya
415b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya ste// de nas nyid du rab mdzes pa// hUM yig de nas brjod bya ste// dril bu'i sgra gnyis brjod par bya// e ti'i sgra gnyis de bzhin te// de nas hUM phaT gdon par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi sngagaso// oM
415b4(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra g+hu ha s+yai tI zhes// pa ra me zhes de nas brjod// yo gi shwa ra kau paM la// ma ra da re n+we ya brjod// ru ti ri zhes pra yi zhes// de nas sma shra na zhes brjod// wa sa na zhes de nas brjod// hUM phaT yi ge mtha'
415b5(rgyud 'grel): rten no// gau ri phyag 'tshal badz+ra dang // de rjes tsaN+De shwa rI brjod// ka kal ma la ku mu ti// a ka te zhes lan gnyis brjod// sarba duSh+Ti snying por bcas// hUM dang ru yi tshig gnyis brjod// he ru ka la bod bya ste//
415b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT a yig mtha' rte no// rkun mo rnam snang tshogs tshig gzhan// badz+ra a pa ra tsi dam tshig/ pa ru g+hu ha ka pa la// ma la b+ha ra na bus shin te// sarba duSh+Tan zhes brjod do// mo ha ni zhes sri yi gzhan// ai
416a1(rgyud 'grel): hi e hi yang dag brjod// sarba duSh+Tan wo ra nI// hUM phaT yi ge brjod par bya// rmongs byed lha mo bran bya ste// pra mo ha ya oM zhes brjod// badz+ra pi ta ha la yi sgra// phyi nas sngags yig kha
416a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis so// sarba duny+tsa zhes brjod de// pi gri ta l+lo sha de re ni// pi tri ta a laM ka ra'i tshig/ mi ha na' cha ga/ mo ha na'i tshig gnyis brgyan te// sbyang bar byas te bklag par bya// de hi naM bcas pa dang // pa tsaM
416a3(rgyud 'grel): yi ti gnyis dang ni// ma pi laM pa'i tshig ni gcig/ sa ma ya de phyi nas bzlas// a nu smA ra ye zhes bya// pra ba sha ya bklag par bya// yang ni man dong zhesu bzla// sarba 'ang dbusu bzhag par bya// hUM dang phaT
416a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam ldan pa'o// rigs byed rnams kyi dang po gzung // e hi'i tshig ni lan gnyis bzla// bcom ldan 'das ma bong par bya// rdo rje gsang dbang de bzhin no// rnam pa du ma'i tshul 'dzin pa'i// gzung

416a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis brjod// sarba b+hU traM de nas bzla// nar ta nar ta pa ya gnyis// ta gnyis tshig drag bcas pa'o// ha ga'i sgra ni lan gnyis bzla// de nas hUM phaT bzla bar bya// puk+ka sI la oM zhes brjod// badz+ra d+hU pa
416b1(rgyud 'grel): g+ni bzlas// b+hU tr-i b+hU tA yang dag brjod// sarba saSh+Tan zhes snying po// a kaR+Sha'i tshig gnyis// ha nA'i tshig dang da ha'i tshig/ pa tsi nir ma thu ma ra ya// ma bi lam bi da na bcas// sa mA ya nI lan gnyis
416b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod// hUM phaT yi ge legs brjod de// tsan+d+ra li sngags btu bar bya// phyag 'tshal ba dang badz+ra'i sgra// ma he ma he shwa ra rA ldan// ha ni tshig drag bcas pa ste// hA hUM ha ni lan bzhir brjod// ru lu'i
416b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra ni gnyis brjod do// hUM gnyis b+hak+Sha sbyang bar bye// nir ma thi nau kuna? la brjod// de nas snying po hUM phaT bzlas// sgre gnyis swA hA mnyam sbyar te// g+hasma ri la sogs bsgrub byA// g+hasma rI la au bzlas
416b4(rgyud 'grel): shing // suM b+ha nI zhes sbyar bar bya// di paM ta sgra sau ma ya// brjod cing badz+ra hUM phaT bzla// gang zhig phag mo'i sngags brjod paM// las kyi phyag rgya'i sngagasu brjod// gzhan gyi sngon gyi snying po ni// rang
416b5(rgyud 'grel): gi ming bcas bod pa ni// sngagasu rnam par bzhag bya ste// oM dang hUM phaT theg mar ro// de nA me tog sogs kyis mchod// sngon brjod paM yi rim pa yi// gtor ma sha ni thams cad dang // bzla dang
416b6(rgyud 'grel): btung bar mnyam ldan pa// 'byung po kun gyi gsong sngags sam// a ra li sogs sngags kyis dbul// de nas sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros ches// slob ma rnams ni

417a3(rgyud 'grel): snang du dmigs te// dkyil 'khor du ni bzhug pa'i phyir// bla ma la ni yon dbul bya// yol ba yi ni phyi rol nas// yon gyi mchog ni blang ba ste// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la// yin gyi mchog ni dbul bar

417b3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ ho sr-id+d+hi badz+ra ya tha su khaM// de skad byang chub sems bskyed// yang na 'di ltar brjod par bya// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs gyur pa// thams cad kyis ni byin rlob kyis// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs kun

417b6(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ khyod ni ye shes gang zhig gis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dngos grub kyang ni thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta mos ci dgos// khyod kyang yang 'di dkyil 'khor ni// mthong
418a1(rgyud 'grel): min rnams la ma smra zhig/ 'on te smras par gyur na ni// de ma thag tu dam tshig nyams// spyi bor rdo rje bzhag nas kyang // 'di skad ces ni brjod par bya// 'di khyod rdo rje dam tshig ste// gal
418a2(rgyud 'grel): te khyod kyis 'di smras nas// klad pa nges par 'gas 'gyur zhing // dam tshig nyams par 'byung ba yin// me tog dang bcas rdo rje ni// snying gar bzhag la 'di skad brjod// oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis// snying
418a3(rgyud 'grel): la yang dag gnas pa ste// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral ti gshegs// de skad brjod pa byas nas ni// mna' ni rab tu bsgag par bya// pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa la// yang ni bdud rtsi bsgrub

418a5(rgyud 'grel): chu 'thungs shig/ oM pany+tsa a mr-i te ut+mA dzA hUM// dwe lta bu'i sngags kyis ni// 'thung ba dang ni spyi bau sbyin// khyod kyis brnyas par mi byA ste// gzhan khyod dam tshig nyams gyur nas// dmyal bar 'gro bar ltung 'gyur te//

418b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// de ni pad+ma'i snod du bzhag/ der ni de kun blugs bya ste// khro bo'i chu 'dzin slob dpon gyis// g.yon brkyang gis ni legs 'dug nas// de ni bdag sbyin bya ba yi// de rjes s+ho sgyu bzhin rdo rje// 'dir ni
418b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bebs 'gyur the tshimi med// A la la la la ho// sarba ta thA ga ta bi tsidi traT gi dza le// zhes bya ba ni sku dbab pa'o// rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus mr-is pa med pa 'dul mkhas
418b3(rgyud 'grel): pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ zhes bya ba ni gsung dbab po// rnam pa ming po'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par
418b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bi de mchog sgyu ma thams cad rab sprul// ru lu ru lu/ hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ zhes bya bas thugs dbab pa'o// rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyis sems can mA lus lus
418b5(rgyud 'grel): pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mus rabI sbrul rnam pa sprul// shaM shi bi shU hU~M/ ye shes dbab pa'o// de nas mig gi dngos po ci// mthong ba yin zhes dri byA
418b6(rgyud 'grel): ste// dkar ser dmar dang gnag mthong na// zhi rgyas dbang gi sang 'grub ces brjod// rdo rjes pra tits+tsha ho zhes// brjod nas me tog dkyil 'khor dor// de ltar me tog dor ba las// mchog la sogs pa'i
419a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub bshad// bde gshegs rnams kyi spyi bo 'am// spyi gtsug mdzod spur phog gyur pa// dngos grub 'bring ni thog pa ste// tha ma la phog dngos grub tha// gzugs brnyan las ni ring
419a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na// dus rIng nyen nye ba ste// lha yi lo tsa la pog na// de bzhin du yang shes par bya// gal ta lha gnyis par phog na// de la me tog gar nye ba// de dang de yi rigasu ni// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya//
419a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol byabs gyur na// dngos grub phran tshegs thob pa ste// re khA rnams la phog gyur na// slar yang skyar la dor bar bya// lan gsum par dor de nyid du// bab na dngos grub med pa ste// phyi
419a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol rdo rje ru bra laM// phog par gyur na dngos grub med// ra ba'i nang du bab gyur na// shrIn tu dra kar ba thob 'gyur te// 'di dag gi ni rim pa ste// me tog dor ba'i rim pa'o// de nas me togra phreng blangs nas//
419a5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i mgo la bcing bya ste// pr-i ti gr-ih+Na sA ma~M maM satwa// mahA pa la zhes brjod bya// mig gnyis la ni oM bsgoms te// tshogs bcang 'di brjod par bya// oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// mig 'byed
419a6(rgyud 'grel): par ni brtson phyed pa// mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad// rdo mig ni bla na med// rdo slob ma rnaMs la ni// dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan par bya// rang bzhin rnam dag bdag gi lus// rang bzhin gyi ni dri ma med// dpa' bo pad+ma'i
419b1(rgyud 'grel): pho brang du// dkyil 'khor du ni bu ltos shig/ de nas gnas dang nye gnas srog/ bang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas// byang chub phyogs chos rtsa bdun gyi// chos kyi rang bzhin khrag 'thung dpal// yan lag
419b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ni yan lag rnams// nye bar bstan pa nyid du bya// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi snod// thams cad bdag nyid mgon btud ngo // bla ma mgon lnga gsol ba 'debs// bdag la dbang bskur mdzad du gsol/
419b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma gsol btAb de d+hIs la// dab bskur baM ni sbyin par bya// rnamo rgyal bum sogs blangs nas ni// pad+ma'i steng du chu bzhago/ hUM lAs rdo rje mu bskyod do// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bsgom bya// ye shes sem
419b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs sa bon gyis// 'od zer gyis ni bskul byas te// ye shes sems dpa' zhugs nas ni// mchod nas chu'i rang bzhin bya// de nyid mi bskyod po yi tshul gyis// rnam shes phung po'i rang bzhin gyis// /
419b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam shAs phung pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dwe nasaM brdzu chen ston pa 'dis// dpa' bo'i mgror ni bkru bar bya// oM sUrba bud+d+ha d+ha taM oM b+hi ShIny+tsa mi// zhes brjod paR+Sha bya// 'di ni chu'i dbang bkur ba'o// rol mo la
419b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs cod pan la// rin 'byung sa bon oM las ni// rdo rje nyi ma bskyed bya ste// snga ma bzhin du mchod par bya// de nyid cod pan rang bzhin ste// tshor ba'i phung po'o bdag nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi bor ni//
420a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can gyis de bas mo// oM badz+ra g+hu ha sid+d+hi pa ra ma yo gI shwa ri/ ka pA la ma la rA ri ni ru ti pre ye shwa ma sha na wa sa ni hUM phaT/ ces bya ba ni cod pan gyi dbang dzi las pad 'byung 'du shes te// bde
420a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'od dpag med pa ni// rdo rje las ni bskyed bzung ste// slob ma'i lag pa g.yas par sbyin// sangs rgyas he ru ka sogs kyis// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// legs
420a3(rgyud 'grel): par grub phyir rdo rje gzung // zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o// khaM las byung ba'i ral gri ni// don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te// 'du byed dngos po'i dril bu 'di// 'di ni lag pa g.yon par sbyin// 'di na
420a4(rgyud 'grel): lag pa g.yan par spyan// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror dran// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // byang chub mtshig tu rgyal ba bzhed// ces bya ba ni/ dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'o// dpa'
420a5(rgyud 'grel): bo lag na rdo rje dril bu can// sangs rgyaso kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ rang bzhin mdzes shisau dga' ba mo// phyag rgya chen pos byin brlabs pa// 'di bdag po'i dbang bskur ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad la so Da
420a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis// slob ma'i spyi bong lag bzhag ste// rdo dril bu rdo rjer bcas// de kyang spyi bor bzhag bya ste// gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje can gyis ming dbang bskur// oM AHhoH/ khyod dpal che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
420b1(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa yi no// zhes bya ba ni// ming 'di dbang bskur ba'o// dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje dang / dpe med pa'i rdo rje dang / bde ba'i rdo rje dang / mnyam pa'i rdo rje dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dang / bde ba
420b2(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'i rdo rje dang // rdo rje me dang / rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje'i zhal zhes bya ba la logs pa'o// mi bskyod pa'i ming ni/
420b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / rnam par skrag pa'i rdo rje dang / gnyis med rdo rje dang / 'dzum pa'i rdo rje dang / gzhi med pa'i rdo rje dang / mi phyod pa'i rdo rje dang / dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / bsgying ba'i rdo rje dang / rang 'byung rdo rje
420b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhe sdang rdo rje dang / dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang / rtse ba'i rdo rje dang / thugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba sogs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad kyi ming ni rnam snang rdo rje dang / gti mug rdo rje dang / oM ka ra badz+ra dang // rtag pa'i rdo rje dang /
420b5(rgyud 'grel): de btsun gshegs pa'i rdo rje dang / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rdo rje dang / sangs rgyas rdo rje dang / sku'i rdo rje la sogs pa'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi ming ni/ chags pa'i rdo rje dang / rnam par gzigs pa'i rdo rje dang /
420b6(rgyud 'grel): chos rdo rje dang / shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / bde ba rdo rje'i myu gu dang / brtse ba'i myu gu rdo rje dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ming ni/ rin chen
421a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu'i rdo rje dang / na mkha'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje yid ces bya ba la sogs pa'o// dron yod grub pa'i ming nI/ don
421a2(rgyud 'grel): yod rdo rje dang / dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje dang / dam tshig rdo rje dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje las dang / rdo rje srung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnamaso// rdo rje sems ma'i bud med kyi ming ni/ rdo rje chags
421a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ma dang / rdo rje glu ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje shugs can ma dang / rdo rje yum dang / rdo rje kong ka na dang / rdo rje bsgyings ma'o// mi bskyod pa'i ming ni/ rdo bdag sde ma dang / rdo bzhed pa ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje myu gu
421a4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang / rdo rje mA mA kI zhes bya ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad kyi btsun mo'i ming naM/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje gau ri maM dung / rdo rje bzhad pa mo dang / rdo rje sprin ma dang / rdo rje spyan mA lu sogs pa'o// rin chen
421a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan g+h+r-i ming nau// rin chen 'byung ma dang / rdo rje dra ba me dang / rdo rje dbugs 'byung ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba mA zhes b+hA ba'o// snang ba mtha' yas kyi maung ni/ rdo rje chags pa mu dud+ya/ rdo rje
421a6(rgyud 'grel): glu ma dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje blo ldan ma dang / rdo rje bzhad pa mo dang / rdo rje gos dkar mo zhes bya'o// don yod grub pa'i ming ni/ rdo rje snying po ma dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje 'ching ba mo// rdo rje sgrol
421b1(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag dngos// dbang ldan thob pa'i rgyu las nI/ mA rig pa ni rnam spangs te// ye shes lnga ni rim gyis yin// blo ldan ston brjod rim pa las// de DAs sngags kyis dbang
421b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhing // 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de// he ru ka'i lag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu chongs// he ru ka yi brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha oM Sha staM dA ra ya mi/
421b3(rgyud 'grel): oM ha hA hu ha hoH/ zhes bya ba nI na rdo rje'i brtul zhug sbyin pa'o// dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag rgya ni// phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas// thod pa kha T+wAM cang ti'u// dpa' bo chen po sprir gyis gzung // spyod pa'i brtul
421b4(rgyud 'grel): zhugs sbyin pa'o// rdo rje can gyi phyag g.yon gyis// chos gos go sar nas bzung nas// g.yas pas mi 'jigs sbyin byas te// slob ma lA ni dbugs dbyung sbyin// sangs rgyas kun khyod 'dir shog cig/ khyod
421b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dpa' bo kun rang bzhin// dpral ldan khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to// dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i ming gis de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ phyag rgya'i
421b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya ni rnam lnga dang // rtag tu rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bzung // thod pa kha nAM cang ti'u// zung zhig zung zhig dpal chen po// rdo rje rdo rje kho T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni 'khrol ba dang // tshangs srud rang bzhin rnal 'byor dang
422a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje kha T+wAM rnal 'byor dang // dpal ldan khrag 'thung phyag rgya nI// phyi rol nang du yang dag gnas// khams gsum gyi ni rgyal chen po// gtso bo dpal ldan yon tan gtso// thams cad bdud
422a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas rgyal nas// khyod ni mchog gi grong du gshegs// shesau bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang chen po// dpa' bo chen pos bdag la bdag la stsol// 'gro ba mtshan ma med
422a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyir// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bdag nyid ye shes semasau dpa' yi// snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis// bskul ba'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// rnams kyis mchod bskur rgya chen po/ thogs
422a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rnams ni spyan drangs te// ye shes bdud rtsi chus gang ba'i// lag na bum thogs bde gshegs kyis// rdo rje 'dzin dbang gis bkrus par// dpa' bos rnam par bsam par bya// dbang bskur rdo rje chen
422a5(rgyud 'grel): po ni// 'jig rten kun gyis phyag byas la// gsang ba gsum gnas 'byung ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya// dpa' bo kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o// de nas mi bskyod cod par gyur// oM su pre tISh+Tha
422a6(rgyud 'grel): badz+re swA hA// zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod par bya'o// rnal 'byor mas ni ci 'dod par// kun nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// de nas me tog mchod sogs kyis// dpa' bo de ni mchod par bya// de nas gnod sbyin
422b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje rgyan// slob mas phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas gzugasu dmigs byas te// rtag pa'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// sems can kun la phan don du// kun nas sems can thams cad la// dzA ltar
422b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba// ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskur// de ltar chos kyi gnasu ni// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las rnams zhugs par bya ba ni// tsi rig par ni shes par bya// tshigs bcad rim pa
422b3(rgyud 'grel): lce yis ni// khyab bdag gis nI gnang bu sbyin// rnal 'byor de nyid rig pa la// bya ba ma yin cung zad med// dba' bo de nyid shes de nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod// bdag nyid sangs rgyas kun bdag
422b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// rang nyid lha mo kun rang bzhin// ci rigs par ni shes par bya// de phyir dngos po kun gyis ni// bdag nyid dpal ldan khrag 'thung mchog rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos// sems can don ni
422b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan te// de ltar 'jig rten gsum shes nas// sems can don ni mnyam myed kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas zad
422b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi dag dang / de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings na/ snying la khrag chen 'thung ba yin// sems can khams ni ma lus pa
423a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi 'grog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spong ba// dka' thub kyis ni mi btu ste// ci bde bas ni bde bzung
423a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ 'di las ma 'ongs sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad lo// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' bu'o//
423a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod// lhan cig spyod dang rjes la spyod// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu rten// slob ma'i bya ba byas de nas// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // dngos
423a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun gyis phyag kyang 'tshal// mdza' bo kun kyang bsdu bar bya// zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'dog pa'i dbang // skyabs meng rnams kyi skyabs dang mgon// khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// thugs rje
423a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po rgyu myed ba// mgon med mgon med bka' drin mdzod// gang zhig bdag tshon khyod kyis ni// bdag la phan po bden mdzod cig/ 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshog su ni// bying ba bdag la 'dir skyabs mdzad // de
423a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'dir ni rim pa yin// slob dpon dpal ldan stobs chen la// mtshan chen dben pa'i gan su ni// chung ma sring mo bu mo rnams// mkhas pa yis ni dbul bA bya// phyag rgya dam tshig bsrung 'gyur ba//
423b1(rgyud 'grel): gang dang gang du rnyed 'gyur bas// snyoms par zhugs te gang skyes pa// ma skyes pa yi rang bzhin te// lha mo thams cad 'dus pa ni// dpa' bo thams cad gshegs pa ste// gang zhig kun nas byang chub
423b2(rgyud 'grel): sems// gsang ba nges ni dbang bskur bya// 'di ni dpa' bo rna lnga 'byor pa'i// dam tshig rmad byung chen po ste// khams lnga zhu ba'i rtsi sman pa'i// bde ba chen po yang dag nos// ji ltar sangs rgyas sras po

423b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir ston pas gtad par bya// lha mo phyag rgya chen po 'di// bde ba dpag med ster ba mo// rnam pa kun tu bus+t+ra gzung ste// bla na med pa'i mchod ba gyis// lha mo des ni gnang byin ste// dpa' bo bla na med

424a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang dam tshig gang dang gang // ji ltar 'dod pa bus smros shig/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam tshig la// lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro// rtag tu bud med cis mi gus// pad+mo las ni cis ma
424a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod// de nas lha mo de mA nyes te// skra bshig cer bur bya ba drang // pad+ma gsal bar byas nas ni// b+ha gA mok+Sha hoH/ zhes brjod/ bkas gsang pad+ma'i dbus pa'o// rtsa ni bde bababs pa mo// byams pas sar
424a3(rgyud 'grel): mos bskul bya ste// lce yis de nas dga' gnas bya// lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa mo// dam pa'i lha mo des gzung ste// mchog tu dga' bas myos byas nas// lhun cig skyes dga' dor mi bya// sbrang
424a4(rgyud 'grel): bar ma byas dor 'gyur na// ltar yang phyir ni spyad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma des// dga' mgu yid ni dgyes 'gyur te// spyi bor yan lag bzhag nas ni// rje su gnang ba sbyin par bya// dong nas
424a5(rgyud 'grel): gzung ste bu khyod kyis// ji srid byang chub ma thob par// sems can kun la rmi lam ltar// kun gyi dngos po'i don gyis shig/ shes rab ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba'o// / slob dpon la so/
424a6(rgyud 'grel): bye brag gis// dbang gi rnam pa bzhir brjod pa// chu la sogs pa'i bye brag gis// bzhi po de dag bcu bzhi yin// 'thad pa de dag yongs bca' bas// rim pa 'di bzhin dam pa rnams// rigs
424b1(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di ni dor gyur na// thams cad dag gis sangs mi rgya// brtul zhugs gong nA gong gyur pa// bu yi rigs pa'i brtul zhugs spyod// ceswA byA ba nI rig pa'i brtul zhugaso// chu nas phyi rA mi ldog pa'i mthar//
424b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis ni dbang du brjod// lhag ma ji lta de ltar te// phyi dang nang du ying dag gnas// 'pho ba'i rim pa'i bye brag ni// dpa' bo'i bdag nyid las shes bya// dbang ni rnam pa bzhir brjod pa// ji ltar
424b3(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs can gus pas// bsam gyis mi khyab chos thob s+t+wa~M// de ni skal pa can du 'gyur// phyi drang nang du legs rdzogs pa// phyi dang nang ni rang bzhin to// rang bzhin chos ni thams cad la// bsam
424b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa zhes brjod// snang ba med cing mi gsal ba// skye ba med cing gnas med pa// lnga yi de nyid rdzogs pa ste// rim gyis lhan skyes bzang ngan med// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' med pa// 'gro
424b5(rgyud 'grel): ba brtan dong g.yo bdag nyid// bdag med pa ru bdag med gnas// dpa' bo chen po shes rab kyis// slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs nas ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol mthon byas te// cho ga sbyin sreg gis rdzogs bya//
424b6(rgyud 'grel): slar zhugs rgyal ba la bzod gsol// g.yon pa yis ni dril dkrol te// mchod pa nang ni bstod par bya// g.yas pa yis ni rdo rje gsor// tshigs bcad kyis ni gshegasu gsol// khyod kyis sems
425a1(rgyud 'grel): can don kun mdzod// rjesu mthun pa'i dngos grub gsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol// lha yi 'khor lo gshegs nas kyang // sngags
425a2(rgyud 'grel): pas rdul tshon bsdu bya ste// gtsang ma'i snod du bzhag nas ni// chu bo'i rgyun la dor bar bya// oM pi l-i ki li hUM dzaHswA hA// rdul tshon dor ba'i sngagaso// dkyil 'khor rnam par bri ba yis// de nas dris ni nyi
425a3(rgyud 'grel): byugs te// 'byung po yi ni tshogs btsas+dza la// dngos grub phyir ni gtor mA sbyin// oM an+da/ dz+nyA ma/ dza lA/ dza khyA b+hU te/ ba tsI/ ba tsu/ raSh+pa/ tsan+da/ pU tsaM ma hA/ pa b+ha/ ta pa ta pa yi/ Ad+haHsa pa s+ya swA hA/ i daM ba laM
425a4(rgyud 'grel): b+h+r-i na dza/ dzaMd+YA/ prI l+ya/ du pa/ ma ma pyA sa pid+tha/ am+nA g+h+rA dza sa bi hA/ khan+thi khru nI/ pad d+ha g+ha d+hA/ oM a kA ro myA kr-i sarba d+har+m+mi NAM/ Ut+ma nut+pan+na tAMta/ au AHhUM phaT s+thAh+ma/ g+had+hor ma sbyin nas slar yang ni/ gasru
425a5(rgyud 'grel): sdigs 'di ni b+hidz+rod par bya// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma~M yaM/ ma nu pA la ya/ d+hi D+ho me b+ha ba/ su pau Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha banI shwe tau maM b+haM baM/ a nu rAk+to mo b+haM ba/ saMrbaM sid+d+hiM me pra yauts+tsha/ sarba kArma su tsa me tsit+taM/
425a6(rgyud 'grel): gr-i ya gr-i mr-i hU~M/ 96\u0f7f/ dz+dza ga wam sarba ta thA ga te hr-i da ya sa hU~M ny+tsA ma~M me swats+tsha/ badz+ra d+hU ba/ ma~MhA sa ma ya satwa a suH/ rab gnas ring ni sbyir sreg dang // nges par dkyil 'kho ba yin las s+ho/
425b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de ma thag pa ni// sbyin sreg rab gnas brjod par bya// de nyid bcu shes slob dpon gyis// rab tu gnas par byar 'os te// gza' dang skar ma bzang sogs la// mdzes pa yis ni shes
425b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// mgul brgyan dpung rgyan rkang gdub dang // rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub sde/ gser ni mAn cha las byas pa'i// sor gdub tsam ni bcing bar bya// thog mar re zhig slob dpon gyi// dril bu lag
425b3(rgyud 'grel): pupar daug+hol bya zhing // g+hayas pas rdo rje gsor byas te// cho ga de bzhin gtor ma bzhin// ba yi rnam lnga sh-ing shun lnga// khyad par du ni dri lnga yis// lus can rnams ni bkru bya ste// mchod pa la soT
425b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon bzhin do bul// dgongs kar yul nges shes pa ste// lhag par gnas par bya bA yin// dung chos chu yis gsang gtor gyis// gzugs brnyan la sogs bkru byas te// shin tu 'jam pa'i gos
425b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// lus rnams phyi bar bya ba yin// ji lta'i lha rnams dmigs nas ni// lha'i gzugs rnams na mkha' ste// 'od zer gtso bos rnams spros nas// de yang lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis// de bzhin ga
425b6(rgyud 'grel): kun spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan la sogs thugs ka ru// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dga' ldan la ni rab gnas dang // lha mo rgyu 'phrul lhums
426a1(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin// ji ltar gzugaswa brnyan 'dir bzhugs shig/ gru bzhi pa la khri bzhi pa'o// de nas lhag gnas khang pa dang // ring ba nyid du mi bya sde// dpangs su khru bo mtho ba ni// brdan par
426a2(rgyud 'grel): ldegs rkos skal lhun gyis// mkhas pa yi ni stegs bsdu bya// shar phyogs mngon phyogs 'dug byas te// lha 'di la ni mngon phyogs bya// rdo rje dril bu lag thogs te// de ma bag tu gtor ma sbyin/
426a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'od zer sbyor ba yis// de nas lha mo mchod spros te// stegs bu'i gdan la gnas pa yis// lha rnams bkru bar bya ba yin// brisau sku glegs bam la sogs pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs
426a4(rgyud 'grel): lta bar// me long gzugs brnyan bkru bye ste// de las gzhan la dngosu yis// sngags pa rnams kyis mnyam gzhag swa// mdun nas lha rnams bkru bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya b+hi sho d+ha ne sA hA/
426a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams lha yi bdag nyid kyi// slar yang dris byugs bkru bya ste// bkra shis klu dang rol mo dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gar mdzes pa'o// yo byad rnams kyi nus pa ni// bsogs te rgyal po'i dbang bskur ro//
426a6(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar bsdam pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol te// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis bkru bar bya// oM sarba ta tha ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM// mkhas pa
426b1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi thur ma ni// man chu tsam gyi tshad byas la// oM ni mig la bsgom par bya// 'di yis spyan ni dbye bar bya// oM tsak+Shu tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu sho d+ha ni swA hA/ mchong yon me tog sogs mchod nas// gsang
426b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di ni brjod par bya// oM su pra tis+tha tau badz+ri swA hA// 'di ni stong du bzlas byas te// rab tu gnas pa'i rim pa'o// gA sang sngags ma bzlas mi 'grub cing // sbyin sreg ma byas 'bras mI
426b3(rgyud 'grel): gter// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// sbyin sreg las rnams brtsam par bya// sbyin sreg med par gyur pas ni// dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// de phyir brtson pa chen po yis//
426b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas sbyin sreg las rnams bya// chu skyes rnams po'i thab khung du// las rnams thams cad shis pa ste// khru grang tsam gyi kham por te// sngags pas kun tu mnyam par bya// 'og tu
426b5(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bya ba'i tshang // khru phyed kyis ni tshwa yin te// skos pa'i dbusu pad+ma ni// mdab ma brgyad legs mdzes pa yi// de dag sngags pas thabs khung steng // sor bzhi dor bar byas nas ni//
426b6(rgyud 'grel): zheng dang dbang du de bzhin te// sor bzhi yi ni ched du bya// thab khung sa byung rgyas pa yi// 'dab ma'i rnam pa kha phyir te// kha khyer gyi ni phyi rol dang // pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor bar bya// sngags
427a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yi sa la ni// kha dog dri dang ro rnams kyis// gral te dngos grub 'dod gyur na// sngags pa yis ni bsku bar bya// thab khung dbus kyi pad+ma ma// mtshan ma dgu ni bri bya ste/
427a2(rgyud 'grel): de dbus rdo rje bri bya zhing // 'dab brgyad du ni bum pa bzhin// kun nas gru bzhi mnyam par ni// shes rab can+da gyis tshon thig grang ba// sgo bzhi la sogs dang ldan zhing // phyogs rnamasu ni mtshan mi bri//

427a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du ri mag dang ni// lho phyogs snam bu dag la b+hi// 'khor lo dung da// tun shing dang // ral gri phug dang lnga pa ste// chu yi phyogs kyi snam bu la// sdigs pa yis ni mtshan ma bri// mda' dang dril bu ba

427a6(rgyud 'grel): gser dang za'os rnams dang // lcags laso rim bzhin dgangs gzer te// med na mchod yon shing bu la// mkhas pa yis ni dbang gzar bya// mtsho skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa la// yu ba sor ni nyi shu bzhi//

428a1(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma can shing 'dab bcas te// mnyam par mthong rtse'i tshad tsam la// rtse mo sbrang dang 'o ma dang // mar gyis spangs pa nyid dang ni// dkar po'i dri yis legs byugs pa'o//

429b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na dbyug tho dang lcags kyu 'dzin la// g.yon zhags pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ dmar po gros dang rgyan 'chang zhing phreng ba dang dris nye bar byugs// mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba/

431b5(rgyud 'grel): slob ma las kyi rdo rje 'dod// de ltar rnal 'byor pa kun gyis// spyong lam la ni mnyam gzhag ste// sgom par gyur kyang rgya lam yang // snod ni skam par mi bya'o// 'thab pa dang ni sdod pa dang
431b6(rgyud 'grel): gu co'i sgra ni 'jigs pa dang // shin tu nga rgyal dang ldan pa// tshogs kyi dbus si bya'o// slob dpon gyi ni dka' min par// glu dang gar ni mi bya zhing // tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bo yis//
432a1(rgyud 'grel): gang la bka' snang byin gyur nA// de yis myur du dgongs pa ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' sbyin bya// brda dang brda'i tha snyad ni// sgrub pa po ye shes bya sa/
432a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par spyod bsdus las// 'phags pa lha yis bris pa yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan rin chen rdo rje dang // blo bzangs ma yis bka' yis rjes bzung bas// rnam pa sna
432a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pa yi babs ni bstan pa yin// srid pa shin tu 'jigs las sems can sgrol bar shog// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba/
432a4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog sems can thams cad thams cad kyi bde ba skye ma zhes bya ba// kha che'i mkhas pa chen po shes bya mtha' dag la
432a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pa dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad po rdzogs s+ho// / dpal ldan oD+yan du sbyangs pa/ mkhas pa ye shes rdo rje
432a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // skad sbyar gnyen pan bsod de yis// bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab// dpal ldan mnyam sbyor rgyud chen gyi// dge ba shel sgong ltar thob pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa gnas thob shog
433a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bzhug so//
433b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satwa no pi ka/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig phan bzang skyob pa'i mgon// thams
433b2(rgyud 'grel): cad don kun ston mdzad cing // yang dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i mchog/ rigs bdag sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i cho ga dag/ rab tu sbyangs pas grol gyur cig/ de
433b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas ye shes bzang po nyid// don mchog gsang ba bshad par bya// dam tshig 'khor lo rdzogs byas te// phyag rgya'i yan lag rnam sbyangs pas// dngos grub kun gyi cha shas dge/ nye bar sbyor
433b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i yul tu 'gyur// sa phyogs mngon par dga' ba ru// bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug sde// 'gro rnams kun grol bsam pa yis// khrus rnams cho ga bzhin du sbyar// dus gsuM phyogs cha'i phyi
433b5(rgyud 'grel): brag gis// drug gi chos rnams rang bzhin med// der snang rtog pa'i cha bral zhing // 'byung tshogs khams rnams mA skyes pa'o// 'gro ba'i rigs rnams tha dad kyang // mtshan nyid rton cing 'brel
433b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyun// bya dang byed tshogs yul can nyid// kun rtags ye shes chen pos non// thugs rje snang ba 'od ldan pa'i// kun 'byung rin chen phung po'i tshogs// rab tu sbyar bas khyab mdzad cing //
434a1(rgyud 'grel): nye bar ston pa'i bdag nyid do// thugs kyi sngags kyis gsal byas te// kun nas sro zhing bsdus pa'i mthus// rdo rje sa gzhi la brten pa'i// rU ba gur sogs mtshon char bcas/
434a2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba las// thabs kyi phyag rgya rdzogs pa nyid// gnyen po'i ye shes stobs dang ldan// 'gro gnas nyon mongs rnam par dag/ rigs mchog 'khor lo bzang po'i tshogs// kun
434a3(rgyud 'grel): nas bsdus pas brtan pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid sku// 'od 'bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhini// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgeg dang bcas// rin chen rgyan sogs kun gyis spras// g.yas
434a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje rtsi lnga 'dzin// g.yon pa kha T+wAM dril bu 'khrol// dbu rgyan rtsi phran lnga yis brgyan// byang chub sems kyi cha lugs kyis// 'od 'bar kha dog sna lnga'i mdangs// stod smad nA bzas rnam par grub//
434a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// nyi zla gasngal ba'i gdan dang bcas// mtshan dang dpo byed phun sum tshogs// rigs kyi sprul bas kun don mdzad// gnas gsum yi ge'i mtshan ma las/
434a6(rgyud 'grel): spro bsdus rigs kyi sems dpa' dang // rang gi cha lugs phreng sngags bcas// thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' nyid// ting 'dzin 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i gnas// yang dag bskul ba'i byin brlabs
434b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // rigs lnga'i brjod pan rnam par mdzes// dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs pa las// ye shes byin brlabs brtan par gzhug/ lha mo mchod pas
434b2(rgyud 'grel): mAmanyes byas te// shin tu gar bcas rol mo'i glus// rigs kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs dag/ yang dag stos cing gnas kun brgyan// thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba las// sna lnga'i phyeng bA spro/
434b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing bsngo// oM badz+ra sAtwa hUM swA hA/ ji srid brtan pa ra ma gyur paR+Sha// 'od 'bar 'phreng ba kun tu rgyas// stong pa ma yin mi stong min// dbu mar yang ni dmigasu med/ shes rab pha rol phyin
434b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas// thabs kyi snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams// de bas de nyid snying rje thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// kun tu 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // nyal dang la sogs thams cad du// lho yi
434b5(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin brtan byas te// thams cad sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs// bza' btung thams cad bdud rtsi'i tshogs// yul kun lha mA'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed la phyag rgya'i 'khor lo yis// bya
434b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phrin las sna tshogs kun// 'gro gnas 'jug pa'i don bzhin spyad// dkyil 'khor mnyes pas mchod bya ste// dga' ba'i sbyin sreg tshim pa'i mchog/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo rtul zhugs bzang //
435a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge phyag rgyu mtshan ma'i sku// rnam gsum mdzad pa sgra gsung thugs// rtag tu gsang sngags sgra ldan pas// phyag rgya'i gnas kun mnyam sbyor zhing // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med

436b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad drA/ dz+nyA ka b+hUM hU~M ma hA su kha thedz+nyA satwA sA d+hA no/ bong sbrang rngu/ maHma ldan 'das ratha la badze wa rje na tha lnga k+Sha sems rbaT+Takrar+dz+dza \u0f7fswa rbas/ dzaHrbardzaH sems dpa' ya phyag 'tshal/

436b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ba// bde chen bde skyed rdo rje sems dpa' mgron po la// 'gro ba gsum gyis gnyen gyur phyogs pas phyag byas te// sems can dus ngan rnyog pas nyen cing dge ster ba// yul la chags

436b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kun sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid de// de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bde bas bdag nyid bsgrub

437b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bzhag nus rgyal ba kun// nye bar na mkha' thams cad la// rdo rje sa grol bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtogs pas bsdu bar bya// dzaHhUM baM ho sangs rgyas kun// rab tu sbyor bas yang dag brjod// thal mo
437b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// zhi ba'i thal mos mnyes par bya// cho ga bzhin du phyag byas te// ci rigs mchod pa rnams byas lA// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams// dbang po kun nas spro bar bya// dngos
437b3(rgyud 'grel): grub thams cad sgrub byed pa// zhi ba'i thal mo sbyor ba yis// shardza gan dar tshul gyisu// rdo rje dbyangs kyis stod par bya// mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid
437b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri ming mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la 'ang tshad med//
437b5(rgyud 'grel): dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i
437b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don bsgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med
438a1(rgyud 'grel): tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa ma

438b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon du byas nas pad+ma'i lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi mthil la ma Ta yi ge gnyis las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha thams cad kyis rnam par mdzes pa'i mngon du brtags te/ de'i steng du 'dis rdo rje dang

438b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// oM badz+ra any+dza li oM/ rdo rje khu tshur bsnams pa'i snying po ni/ oM badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ de yang snying po 'di lan gnyis samA gsum du brjod de dbab poR+ShI byin gyis brlab bo// oM badz+ra pad+ma saM yo ga a bi
438b5(rgyud 'grel): sha moM hA su kha/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM a/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ hrIHhUM bAM hoH/ bcings pa de 'bab par gyur gyi bar du brjod nAs de nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha ma hA kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gA tA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta
438b6(rgyud 'grel): pra duSh+TaM// mai ma na sidz+dza/ dz+nyA ne mai hA ta mon+ta ka ra pi ti tsi gau ra bi ka ra hI/ trat+ta tra de ta tat+ta/ de nas rang gi lus mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral nas zlo ba lta bur yongasu dag par bsgoms te/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+hi
439a1(rgyud 'grel): d+har+m+ma ta sa ma ya hUM zhes yid la brjod do// de nas bcings pa de slar gnyisu bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba las lcags kyu ltar gcus te/ de bzhin du rang gi snying gar sngags 'dis grol
439a2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha a gu sha ma hA kro ta dzaHhUM baM hoHhUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag par bsam ste/ ye shes yong su dag pa tsam la dmigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dag

440b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma rdo rje thal mo 'od// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur brgya// rang byung ba yis dbang bskur pas// rgyal srid mchog dngos grub kun// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// spyi bo dang ni dpral
440b2(rgyud 'grel): ba gnyis// blo dang de bzhin rgyab nyid du// byas nas dar dpyangs tshul du byaM// oM bud+d+ha a b+hi She kai ru ru s+phu rA dzI lA tiSh+Ta bud+d+ha lo tsa na sar+b+bA ar+tha sA d+hA na a bi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA// sangasu rgyaso kun+da gyi dbang
440b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'o// rdo rje rAb tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin dbang bskur ba'o// oM badz+ra rit+na a b+hi She kA hi ri mau ti shrI ya a b+hi Shany+tsa maM swA hA// rdo rje rin+da chen dbang bskur ba'o// oM pad+ma A b+hi She ka ta re
440b4(rgyud 'grel): tu ri tut+tA re a b+hi Shany+tsi mi swA hA// de'i phyag rgya ni sangs rgyasna rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas dbu ma'i rtse mo phab pa nr-i pad+ma rin chen gyi phyag rgya ste// 'dis snga ma bzhin du dbang bsku ro// rdo rje thul mo rab
440b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor te/ 2/ gnyis kyis rin chen 'dzin pa ltar// ji ltar rigs pas mnyam par bya// mthe bo rtse mo gdong bzhi yis// phyag rgya de nas rA ba~M bsgyur te// g.yas pa nyid du bzhag par bya// blo dang ldan
440b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags 'di yis// sngags rigs de bzhin dbang bskur bya// oM rat+na rat+na oM b+hi She k+She traM traM/ b+ha b+ha ta ta tra tra tra tra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma~M swA hA// rin che na rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje thal mo gdab pa ste/
441a1(rgyud 'grel): madz+dza mA mo'i rtse mo yud tsam dgug/ mthe bo dpa' ba'i skyil krung du// lhag ma rnams ni 'od bzhin btang // sngon bzhin yang ni sbyang bar bya// las kyi rin chen dbang bsgyur ba'o// oM
441a2(rgyud 'grel): kar+m+ma rat+na a b+hi She ke hi hi hi h+ni/ shrI pad+ma ba du mu Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM swA hA// rIgr-i sngags sbyin bdag la dbang bskur bar bstan te rang gi rigs kyi na thig ma nyid du dbang bskur ba'o// de lngar bdag nyid dbyung
441a3(rgyud 'grel): bskur byir byas nas// go bgo bar bya ste// rdo rje khu tshur brkyang ba las mgrin par gzhig ste/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsi yA maM haM paM yaM// zhes bya ba'i snying po brjod nas bcings pa dI was mdzub mo brkyang ste// so sor
441a4(rgyud 'grel): nas gdong spyod pa mdud pa'i tshul gyis snying ga nas brtsams te/ spyi bo'i gtsug bar du sngags 'dis oM Tu ka pa tsa yaM yaM hUM/ ldan gsum du byas na lus la cis kyang mi phyed par 'gyu ro// de nas a las
441a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje shin+da tu dga' ba ma 'am rdo rje sems mi bskyed do/ bcom ldan 'das kres cha lugs dang kha dog dbyibs ldan pa g.yus g.yon gyi pad+mo'i dbyibs can du shes rab kyi pha rol
441a6(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa la snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bya ste/ gnyis su med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis brtsam par bya na ni lung ngo // dzaHhUM baM ho// zhes brjod cing bcing ba ni nang gi dbu ma'i lcags kyu
441b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying gar lcags kyus drang bar bya// de nyid gdong reg pa ni zhags pa'o// de nyid lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni bcing ba'o// de nyid rtse mo bsdams pa ni dgyes pa'o// 'di ni gas nga ba'i phyag rgya ste// phyi yi
441b2(rgyud 'grel): phyaphyug rgya rnams kyis kyang snang bar bya'o// dwe la de rnams kyi phyag rgya nI 'di ste// rdo rje bcing ba gnyis su bya ste// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas// mthe'u chung bsnol ba la g.yon gyi mdzub mo
441b3(rgyud 'grel): babobasgreng ba'i tshogs nas g.yos kyi mdzub mo dgug pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste/ oM badz+ra kA ma aM ku sho ka twe hUM dzaMHzhes pa'i snying po dang bcas pas drang bur bya'o// de nyid las phan tshun du mdzub mo gnyis
441b4(rgyud 'grel): zhags pa ltar bcings te/ oM badz+ra pra be sha ya swA hA// zhes bya ba'i snying po drung bcas pe s+ya gzhug go/ de nyid las phan tshu nu shin tu bskums te/ oM badz+ra kA ma ban+d+ha ban+d+ha baM/ zhes pas bcing bar bya'o// /
441b5(rgyud 'grel): de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bzung ste/ rgyab sbyor ba 'di ni rdo rje dgyes pa'o// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti ka ma su ko sho ta ya ho/ zhes brjod nas phyag rgya des dgyes par byA ste/ bde ba'i thal myo 'am/ zhi
441b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thal mo gsum gyis dgyes pa bskyed nas mdun du rdo rje shin tu dga' ba la sogs pa mngon du blta bar bya ba'i phyir dbyangs bskul bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen bskal bzang khyod bdag
442a1(rgyud 'grel): lags so// bsgrub la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshog 'dul mchog
442a2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dza hUM baM ho/ kye ma bde mchog bde bas gzung ba rnam par
442a3(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sna tshogs sgyu ma mkha' 'gro slob mas gzung du gsol// de nas 'dug pa de langs te/ ma dang Ta las gyur pa'i mig
442a4(rgyud 'grel): gis na mkha'i ngos la bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis til 'bru bzhin brtags te rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing rang gi lha la mchod pa'i phyir/ de rnams kyi snying gur
442a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o// yang na rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya stsal te/ cho ga ji lta bu byin gyis brlabs la/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas/ mchod pa brtsam par bya'o// mdun du zla ba'i kha dog can
442a6(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum dang bcas// phyag rgya mda' stong 'dren par 'dzin// sangs rgyas rin chen rnams kyis brgyan// rgyab tu lha mo chu srin gyi// pad+ma dmar po 'od dang ldan// dpal byed dran pa sna
442b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi// sangs rgyas dbu brgyan mchog 'chog 'dzin ma// sngo mthing mchog gi phyag gnyis kyis// phyag rgya rang gis 'khyud pa yi// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan phreng ba la// sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par
442b2(rgyud 'grel): klubs// 'dud bcas g.yon nas sngo bsangs te// sangs rgyas gtsug gis rnam par spras// rnal 'byor 'byor ldan bsam bya ba// rang gi snying po rdzogs par bya// bzhi po de rnams ni phyag rgya phyi mo'i
442b3(rgyud 'grel): tshigasu bstan te/ gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro'i lha mo rnams phyogs bzhir rang gi stan la pad+mo'i lo ma lo gnas par bsam mo// pad+mo'i phyi mtshams su sgrog mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / dbyings
442b4(rgyud 'grel): can me dang / gar+ra ma la sogs pa grwa bzhir bzhag/ de bzhin du me tog ma dang / bdug pa ma dang / mar ma mu dang / sna tshogs kyi dri la sogs pa yang phyogs mtsham su bzhag/ gling bu dang / pi
442b5(rgyud 'grel): wang dang // cang ta'u dang // rdza rnga dang // cha lang dang / dar dir dang // pa Ta ha gdungs pa la sogs pa yang phyogs phyog su bzhag/ shar gyi sgo ru bsam paM ni// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa mchog/ g.yon
442b6(rgyud 'grel): du rdo rje zhags pa ste// nub du rdo rje lcags kyu rgyud// byang du dril bu bshad pa ste// de rnams rang gi laso la brtson// kun kyang gzugs kyi mchog ldan pa// rang gi lha la rjes mthun pa'i//
443a1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin ldan par// sngags shes pas na dgos par bya// rang gi lha'i sbyor ldan pas// ci rigs mnyam par bzhag bya ste// mnyam par bzhag pa'i ting 'dzin nyid// rdo rje
443a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin du nye bar 'gyur// de nas ji ltar sbyor ba yis// sbyor dgyes pa yi rol byas te// sbyor ba bzhi'i tshul gyis su// mnyam par bzhag nas rab tu bya// mchod pa thams cad ma 'byor na// phyag rgya bcing
443a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing mchod bya ba// rang nyid lha yi ngo bo la// de dag gos mchod dmigs par bya// brdung dang gar du bcas pa yis// stegs bcas dga' bas bde ba yis// glu la sogs pa'i ro ldan pas// hUM a//
443a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po bskal bzang khyod// thams cad 'dod pa bzhin du 'dod chags paso// bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhes shig/ mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga la sogs pa sbyor ba dang ldan pas dbul bar
443a5(rgyud 'grel): byAbya'o// dzaHhUM br-i hoH/ ru Ta mo Ta sma ra ra te/ hu lu hu lu/ pra siM ta/ ta ki hA/ tU ta ki ni hUM dza dzi/ hu lu hu lu/ a la la ho/ shud+d+ha/ sid+d+ha ya/ dA ri sha ya/ sarba kra te tA g+ho tA g+he ta b+he/ ta ta g+he ta g+he/ g+he g+he ta/
443a6(rgyud 'grel): g+he te g+he ta/ g+he na to/ ta ki hAM dza dziHhu lu hu lu hu lu/ a la la la la ho/ ru Te ma Ta/ thal mo myur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po laM 'dis/ mchod pa thams
443b1(rgyud 'grel): cad dbul bar bya'o// b+he tad+he/ tak+She k+She/ ta g+he g+he/ g+he g+he ta/ rgyun gyis brdung ba'o// AM aM aM/ haM hAM haM/ baM baM baM/ daM daM draM/ dam tshig gsum gyis brdungs pa s+yA/ 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs
443b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'i dam tshig gsum gyi gsang ba'i sbyor ba ste/ de rnams kyi brdung ba dbyingasu blangs shing shardza dang dwe ba ti dbyangs 'dis kyang sbyor ba'i bdag nyid kyis hUM la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bskul
443b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// rjesu chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'i// mchod pa gsal bas rjesu mchod byas pa// mchog rtag po'i rnal 'byor bde bas byede ba grub par mdzod// kye mchog
443b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i dam mchog rang gi ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor shin tu bskul bzang mchog brnyed pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag lo rol cig rol cig ho// kye mchog tu gsang ba'i
443b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnamaso// 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yog
443b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba sgyu ma mkha' 'gro ho// kye rim pa brtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu bsgrubs pa ston// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kye ma ho bde mchog bar
444a1(rgyud 'grel): bas drongs// rnam par sprul pa snang bar mdzad// a la la la la to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyi// slob ma dag ni gzung du gsol/
444a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs bde bas bskul ba'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag pa yis// bgyings pa'i tshul gyi gar byas te// g.yon gyi mthe bo srin lag sbyar// g.yas
444a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi ba dan gsum pa yis// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dang yang dag 'grogs// thams cad mchog gi dngos grub che// dbang phyug chen po rab tu 'grub// de nyid dor ba'i tshul gyi
444a4(rgyud 'grel): slad du sdud pa cher byas te// bsgyur nas g.yas kyi 'gram pa dang // spyi gtsug mtsham su bzhag pa las// slad du gar gyi dbab tshul gyis// cha lugs kun gyis rab bsgyur cing // bskal bzang hUM gri
444a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs ldan pas// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// la lar zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor stong pas mdzes pa'i gzugasu snang bar snang // la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba khrag dgu'i 'odi zer
444a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog pas 'jigs// la lar mdangs bzang gzi brjid zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugasu snang // la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston// rdo rje
444b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' grub phyir 'dul mkhas ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las// a ral thams cad mnyam sbyor grub par mdzod// ru Ta ma ta ma te a lA la la ho// rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i
444b2(rgyud 'grel): tshul la khar mkhyen mchog gri gar mdzad pa// dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mkhan gor mdzad a la la ho// rnam mang bde mchog rab tu gar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba
444b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra thob par mdzod// 'di yis pa dan gsum dang ldan purar+ya gar du bya'o// rab tu dga' dang rje su chags par dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra bas rgyas btab pas// rab tu dga' bar sbyor
444b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod// rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang // rab tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug mchog
444b5(rgyud 'grel): tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs// hi rta mchog ho// kye ma he rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs rol cig ho// de bas slong rnam par rol// hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la la ho// de bzhin ga
444b6(rgyud 'grel): pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma rnam pa tshogs kyi slob ma gzung du gsol// kye bde ba'i mchog grub par mdzod// kye ma ho bde bas bde ba bde ba stsolo// dam pa rab tu zhugs par mdzod// bdag
445a1(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu bde bar gyur// a la lA la ho// kye ma ho shi shi bzhugs shig mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ yongasu skor/ kun tu zhugs/ de nas gar drang ldan pa yis// dbyangs 'di
445a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis glur blangs shing // dpal ldan g.yon du 'dud pa yis// g.yas kyi ba dran gsum du bya// de ltar g.yas dang g.yon tshul gyis// sems dpa'i skyil krung bsnyems byos te/
445a3(rgyud 'grel): steng du dor dang 'og tu dor// skor dang de bzhin byug byas te// me tog bdug pa mar mchog/ dri yis mchod pa bskor ba yis// lhag ma gar gyi tshul gyi su// gling bu pi waMrdza rnga mchog/ de bzhi ca
445a4(rgyud 'grel): te'u rnam dag kyang // g.yon gyi khu tshur rab bsdams te// lag pa g.yas pas brdung bya ste// rang gi ming gis bskul bcas pas// sngags pas mchod pa dbul bar bya// zhi ba'i thal mo bde
445a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis// thal mo'i sbyor bas dgyes pa bskyed// g.yon du 'dod pas phyag bya zhing // 'dzum dang bcas pas blta ba'i mig/ smin ma mig dang mchu gdon pa// kha dang lus kyis gdon pa
445a6(rgyud 'grel): yis// cha lugs ji bzhin gar bya ste// phyag rgya thams cad dbul bar bya// no me s+t+rI sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaHzhes pas phyag rgya rab gnas te// mchod pa mchog ni dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med
445b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis btabA na// bdag nyid dang ni yang na gzhan// sgrub po ni myur 'grub ste// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog 'dra 'gyur// langs pa'i tshe yang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba dang //
445b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba lA sogs pa byas te// bde ba'i thal mos dgyes pa bskyed nas ci dgo' gnas par bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang // rdo rje rin chen bla na med pa// rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang /
445b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// a ho su kha zhes pa'i ming // rdo rje sems gang gang klog pa// sdig pa kun las 'gro 'gyur zhing // bsod nams rnams ni byin brlabs 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
445b4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogas+ho// #// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra satwA nu smi ti nA mo bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjesu
445b5(rgyud 'grel): dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// rang gnas yul tshogs nyams dga' brar// kun rdzob 'phrul po'i dkyil 'khor la// rnam dag gnyis med yul kun sbyor// byang
445b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems byung rgyal ba'i mchog/ de la de snang rol mo'i chos// srid mtha' mi dmigs dus gsum 'gog/ rnam bcas bya ba'i rgyud ldan zhing // rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstod pa'i gnas//
446a1(rgyud 'grel): nges pa'i gsang mchog rtsa ba'i rgyud// de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs chen po// gnyis dang gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ rje su dran pa skyed byed pa'i// cho ga bzang po rmad du byung // gsung don
446a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud pa rdo rje'i tshig/ dus gsum rgyun gyi mtshan ldan bcing // rigs bdag dkyil 'khor bstod pa'i gnas// 'khor ba'i bya ba kun gnas 'jug/ dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang //
446a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sgrub yan lag dang bcas bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i yul// bya ba'i yan lhag kun rdzogs shing // nges pa'i gsang ba ston mdzad pa'i// 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor bla na med//
446a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dus zhes bya ba yi// lta bA la sogs 'byung ba'i chos// nyon mongs gnas kun rnam dag cing // rang bzhin mnyam pas spros dang bral// yang dgra sangs rgyas bde bya che// kun tu goms pas
446a5(rgyud 'grel): sal byed pa'o// yan lag lan gnyis rdzogs pa phrogs// rab sbyangs pas ni 'jug 'gyur zhing // rig 'dzin gnas kun 'grong byed cing // rgyu rkyen cha shas kun rdzobra shing // thun mong bye phrag rkyen gyi stobs// snga ma
446a6(rgyud 'grel): sa byung phyi ma'i rgyun// 'bras bu tshogs pa'i bdag nyid do// sa dang sar gnas rig 'dzin kun// rang rig sbyor ba'i tshul gyis ni// gseng gsang phyag rgya'i gnas kun dang // mi mthun gnyen po bye brag
446b1(rgyud 'grel): mthus// dngos grub mtha' yas rtags ldan zhing // ting 'dzin chos kun rdzogs pa'i mthar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas mthong zhing // nges pa'i sa mchog rdzogs par 'gyur// rigs kyi 'khor lo kun bskor zhing // rigs
446b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi gnas rnams dam dag pas// rigs mchog yon tan bzang po'i tshogs// rigs kun rgyal bas mnyam sbyor ba'o// yang dang nges pa'i thig le'i mchog/ dam pa las byung dam pa'i yul// de gnas tshul gyi phreng
446b3(rgyud 'grel): bapa nyid// yang dag bsdebs pas brgyan du byas// dkyil 'khoru chen po dga' 'tshal dag/ chos kyi rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rim 'jug pas// chos kyi 'bras bu bzang po nyid// shin tu sbyor bas
446b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag skyes// me tig tshal las kha dogau dri// 'dod pa'i tshogs rnams tshim gyur ltar// rang gnas byang chub yon lag phreng // bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa dang // sgrub dang sgrub pa chen po yi// yan lag cho shus
446b5(rgyud 'grel): kunan+da rdzogs pas// zhi sogs bye brag rnam par bkod// sangs rgyas theg pa'i yan lag gis// nye bar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor 'grub// sa mtshams mkhas pa'i spyod yul nyid// rkyen bcas stobs kyis rab tu rdzogs//
446b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor yan lag stobs ldan pa'i// bla ma lhag gnas brtul zhugs can// yon tan rin chen 'bras bu'i bdag/ byang chub mchog sems rnam dag pa// yang dag mos pas bstod byas te// sgo gsum dang bas
447a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab// gdams pa'i yan lag kun 'dzin cing // nye bar 'khor ba'i dga' ston mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen por dgyes byas pas// rab tu rdzogs par 'khor lo dbang // de nyid yan lag dam
447a2(rgyud 'grel): tshig bcas// nges par 'jug pas bstan byas pa'o// gsang ba'i rgyud don sna tshogs dag/ 'dren pa'i yan lag bla na med// nges par bstan pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag rdzogs pas theg pa'i mchog/ dben pa yi ni gnas
447a3(rgyud 'grel): dradrug gam// rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par// kun tu sna tshogs skyil bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams// ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// gnas kyi nye 'khor phyag dar dang //
447a4(rgyud 'grel): zhim chus bcas dag byas te// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi bzang po'i mchog/ bkra shis dag byed rdzas kyi byug/ phyogs bcur bla re rgyal mtshan dang // phan gdugs lhubs lhub rnga yab dang // rin chen me tog phreng ba'i tshogs//
447a5(rgyud 'grel): bza' btung 'dod yon rnam 'phrul ba'i// phyag rgya gos drar rgyan bcas pas// ma lus kun tu nye bar mdzes// thabs dang shes rab brtul zhugs mchog/ bde ba'i ye shes rol mo'i dbyings// rnam par 'phrul pas bsam
447a6(rgyud 'grel): byas pas// bya ba'i 'khor lo brtan par bya// ji snyed mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dang // gtor mas gnas kun nyer brgyan dag/ gsal sbyangs bkra shis byin gyis brlab// rim bzhin sngags dang phyag rgyas gnas// 'gro
447b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro gnas kun gyi nyon mongs tshogs// mi dge stobs sogs sdig pa'i mthus// gnas kun nyam thag gzir bas 'joms// bdag gzhan kun rgyud rlag par byed// de dag thugs rje chen po'i rlos// ma lus
447b2(rgyud 'grel): yul bcas sgrol ba'i phyir// dran pa gcig pa'i ye shes sku// ting 'dzin dag pas rnam par grol// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyis// rang bzhin gnyis med byang chub sems// der snang yul las langs pa
447b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ lhun gyis grub pa'i chos nyid // tshul 'di rnam par spangs pa yis// de nas de las de bzhin rgyud// kye ma thugs rje chen po'i yul// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa nyid// rnam gsum lha yi ting 'dzin//
447b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rnam gsum sngags dang phyag rgyar sbyor// byin brlabs nus mthu rdzogs byas nas// bdag gzhan sbyang zhing gsal byas te// rigs mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas
447b5(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid// tshul gsum phyag rgya'i tshe lugs kyis// shin tu bkod pa legs 'byung ba'i// tshad med bzhi yi gnas rdzogs 'gyuraro// kun nas spyan drangs brtan byas pa// nye bar sbyor ba'i phyag rgya nyid// oM yang dag
447b6(rgyud 'grel): brtan pas stobs rdzogs pa'i// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshogs// thugs rjes bdag nyid rnam grol ba// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i las lo dgyes// mi shes yul rnams bcom mdzad cing //
448a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa'i gnas chen snyoms 'jug par// phyag rgya bde ba'i tshul sbyor bas// grong khyer brtan par mdzad du gsol// oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ dz+nyA na sa ma yas+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHpra be sha ya phaT/ badz+ra A pe
448a2(rgyud 'grel): ya a A// ji srid brtan pa'i gnas bzhugs shing // byang chub sems mchog spel ba'i phyir// bkra shis lhag nas brgyad pa yis// zhing khams pho brang dag par brjod// oM badz+re tsakra maN+Dal pa na sa pa ri hUM/ rab tu
448a3(rgyud 'grel): gus pa'i tshul gyis ni// mngon par dmigs byas dog pa'i mchog/ thabs dang shes rab rdzogs byed pa'i// yul kun rang bzhin rnam pur dag/ gang 'dir yon tan sngags pa'i gnas// rgyal ba bde gshegs 'dren
448a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gtso// rigs mchog rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// ngo mtshar yul kun rnam par dag/ oM na mo stau sti ban+d+ha naM gA ro ya mi// mye na rA ga ho// kun 'byung yon tan rdzogs pa yi// me tog 'bras bu bzang ldan zhing //
448a5(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i rgyan rnams dang // 'dod pa'i lha mo rgyan ldan cing // yul kun chags par rnam grol ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bla med pa// lha dang lha mo bsam yas pus// phyogs bcu kun+da nas rnam par 'khrig
448a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i yul kun ma lus dag/ yang dag bsngo ba bla na med// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dngos// gnyisu med pa'i rol ba dag/ mnyam nyid rol mo'i dkyil 'khor nyid// oM sarbo bu dza me g+ha pra tits+tsha ho// thog med yul/
448b1(rgyud 'grel): rings 'khar ba'i gnas// ma lus nye bar bsags pa'i tshogs// kun spyod gnas gsum las skyes la// thaMd yul la nye bar gshegs// rab rtogs nye bar bsags pa'i chos// tshul khrims brtul zhugs sdom
448b2(rgyud 'grel): pA dag/ nyer mdzes brgyan pa'i yan lag rnams// rab sngags bstod pas yi rang mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi lam ston cing // don bzhin bstan pas 'dul mdzad// sbyor ba'i stobs bcad shes rab tshogs// thabs
448b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi theg chen bshad du gsol// phyogs bcu'i mgron gnas ji snyed mtha'// mya ngan kun sgrol mgon po rnams// sku gsum bstan pa'i tshul gyis ni// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa'i dbyibs// ma lus srid dngos 'gro bI
448b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs 'don cing // yang dag gnyis med bstan par byed pa'i yid// byang chub sems mchog bla na med pa'i don// yang dag brtan gnas kun tu rgyas par bya// smin cing grol bar byed pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// khyad par ldum
448b5(rgyud 'grel): kun yang dag rdzogs par 'gyur// bsnyen sgrub phyag rgya'i yan lag sna tshogs pas// bdag gzhan gzung zhing yan lag rdzogs par spyad// thugs rje rnam dag dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i tshogs// rag tu grol bas gnyis
448b6(rgyud 'grel): med mnyam ldan pas// thad mthun pa'i tshul rnams mdzad bcad pas// bdag gis cha shes rab tu dmigs pas dbul// thams cad mi gnyis ye shes chen po bdag/ bya byed rdog pa'i tshogs rnams rnam dag cingag
449a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu mA rnam drag bya rtsal bde ba'i mchog/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i don rdzogs mnyam pa nyid// mgon po dus gsum sgrib bral sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub phyin las yul rnams nye bar ston// rat+na gAn+d+ha
449a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' mnyam nyid mchog gI bdag/ rnam dag bya ba'i tshul gyi yul las 'das// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pA tISh+Tha/ dwi D+ho ma b+ha ga su toSh+yo me b+ha gsu ba Sh+yo ma b+ha ga/ a nu ts+tsha me b+ha ga.aHsid+d+hi ma~M/
449a3(rgyud 'grel): pra yats+tsha/ sarba kArma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ ha hau ha ha ho/ badz+ra mA me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba/ ma hA sa maM ya satwa AHbadz+ra gats+tsha muHrtse gcig dran pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma lus yul bcas rnam par grol// phyag rgya gsang
449a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags sbyor ba'i mthus// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs nyid// 'gro gnas sdug bsngal las grol zhing // badre ba'i mchog kun mthar phyin te// thar pa mya ngan las 'das par// btang snyoms kun tu mi dmigs
449a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ d+hAg po'i tshogs bcas mA lus kun+d+ha/ rab tu zhen rtog stobs kyis 'jug/ de dgra thugs rje chen po yis// 'dul byed stobs chen+ma he ru ka/ phyag rgyu dbyings dang mnyam par sbyor// rnam par 'phrul pa'i
449a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs bcu'i bgegs tshogs 'dul bar mdzad// yang dag dkyil 'khor brtan byas te// mtshon cha me 'od 'bar ba yi// dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan pa la// bgogs kyi rgyal po kun bsdus
449b1(rgyud 'grel): te// phyag rgya bzhi yis dbang byas nas// myos shing gzir gnon rnam par dgod// thugs kyi ye shes rab 'bar ba// ye shes phyag rgya'i gnas kyis 'jug/ kun nas 'phro zhing bsdu ba'i mthus// khro bo'i dkyil 'gro
449b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan 'gyur ba'o// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs par byed// rgyan chas mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams dang // chu lugs rngam pa'i cha byad ldan// rigs kyi sprul pa'i bsnam yas pa'o// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi
449b3(rgyud 'grel): ston cing // ngaswa par brjod pa'i sngags rnams kyis// kun nas brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// yang dag sbyor bcas rdzogs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra k+to d+ha mr-i sa la ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+d+ra hUM/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
449b4(rgyud 'grel): ha na ha na// shrI he ru kro d+h+waM shwa ri hUM phaT// thams cad kun+da nas rdzogs pa'i chos// rnam gsum yul kun rnam dag pa'i// byang chub sems nyid rang byung ba// thad rdzogs pa'i gan+d+hes nyid// oM ma hA shun+ya tA dz+nyA ni ba
449b5(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ thugaste rje chen po'i rgyun gyis ni/ thams cad khyab mdzad rin chen tshogs// don kun snang ba'i gnas rdzogs te// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnam par dag/ oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&d+ha/
449b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ 'og min gnas mchog nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i cha lugs kyis// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// thugs rje chags pa'i ting 'dzin dang // gsang
450a1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi byin brlabs kyis// pho brang rnam par dag pa'i tshogs// rnam par 'phrul pas bskyed pa'i tshul// thugs kyi gsang sngags kun 'gyur gnas// rim bzhin sbyor ba'i byin brlabs kyi//
450a2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon gsang sngags spro bya ste// rten gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mdzad// e las na mkhar dkyil 'khor nyid// chos 'byung gru gsum gyin bsgreng dkar// yaM las rlung dkyil gzhu'i dbyibs// dud kha sra
450a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khregs rgyal mtshan can// baM las chu dkyil sna tshogs 'byung // kar zlum kun 'byung bum pas mtshan// laM las dbang chen sa gzhi dbye bas// gru gzhi gser mdog rdo rjes rgyan// khaM las rim bzhin brtsegs pi
450a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ kha dog dbyibs brgyan kun rtsol// saM las r-i'i rgyal po ste// rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa'o// de las me'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ dmar ser gru gsum ra yis mtshan// de dbus bruM las gzhan yas khang
450a5(rgyud 'grel): gru gzhi sgo khang sgo khyud bcas// rA ba rim pa gsum dur khrod dang // kun 'byung rin chen phreng bas mdzes// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mtshan pa'i// rgyal tshogs rnam par sbas pa la// 'od gasngal thu
450a6(rgyud 'grel): rje byang chub sems// rnam dag dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i mchog/ pho brang 'khor lo'i lte dbu su// ri che'i phreng ba rdo rjes mdzes// bdag gi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod pa'i// ma 'dres par ni dag pa'i don//
450b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// rab tu 'od 'bar phyag rgya'i tshogs// rigs dang rigs bcas mnyam par sbyor// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// glu dbyangs
450b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od bcas bskul par mdzad// thams cad rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// de gnas mtha' rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// phyag rgyu'i rol pas mnyes 'gyur zhing // rtogs mod byang chub sems kyi sku// shos ra
450b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od gsal bcu drug phreng // 'od zer 'phro dang 'du ba'i mthus// 'gro rnams bde gshegs yul sbyor te// rang gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan// thabs mchog thugs rje gsal byed phreng // sbyor ba rnam gnyis mdzad
450b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas rdzogs// sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang po nyid// g.yas g.yon phreng ba 'khor lo'i tshul// thams cad gcig tu sbyar ba'i mthus// rin chen kha dog sna lnga po// hUM madz+re ba~M rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdzogs// dkar
450b5(rgyud 'grel): gsal 'od mdang lnga yis brgyan// rab tu sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i nga rgyal nyid// 'od zer rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs// drug bcas bcu drug gnas rnams dog/ ma 'dres theg pa bas
450b6(rgyud 'grel): yas kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdus// rab 'bar gsal bas brjid pa'i sku// gsang sngags yi ge'i phreng bas mdzes// oM ma hA su kA badz+ra satwa aHdzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra tas+t+waM// phyag rgya chen po rdzoDa/
451a1(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// rdo rje sems gtso 'dre ba'i mchog/ zhal bzhi phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis mdzes// dbus dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// g.yas sngo g.yon dmar rgyab ser po// rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes
451a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chags pa'i don mdangs ldan// phrin las rnam bzhi cha lugs bcas// gAya sa na rdo rje rtsa lnga 'bar// g.yon pa kha T+wAM dril bu 'khor// 'og gnyis zhi gnas lhag mthong rgya// 'od mdangs lnga yi phreng bas
451a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' dang // phyag rgya rnal lnga mtshan dpe rdzogs// 'od kyi rig ma dang sbyor cing // bde ba'i rol pas kun spyod mdzad// mkha' dbyings dbang phyug phyag rgya yis// gnas kun gyis brlab
451a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lhar nI bdag nyid bya// thugs gsal nyi ma la gnas pa'i// ye shes sems dpa'
451a5(rgyud 'grel): hUM dadaM bcas// 'od zer 'phro 'du sbyor ba yis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dgug byas te// gnyis med sbyor ba'i byang chub sems// bdud rtsi'i bum bac+doMs lha mo'i tshogs// gun+da dz+nyA kun tu khrus byas pas// rigs kyi bdag
451a6(rgyud 'grel): pos nye bar mdzes// mthe bong sems dpa'i skyal mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug/ gung mo gnyis ni mnyam por sbyor// lhag ma rdo rje thal mo nyid// spyi bo deng ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang
451b1(rgyud 'grel): ltag pa'o// oM a b+hI Shiny+tsa laM// thod skam phyag rgyas brtan byas pas// rim bzhin gnas kun brgyan par bya// hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ rin chen myu gu'i phyag rgya yis// rgyan rnams nye bar bdags byas+yA te// rin chen phreng
451b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dar dpyangs bcing // rdo rje rgya gram khro ber bcas// ska nun rgyan thag bgos pa dang // mnyes pa'i thal mos brtan par bya// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM pa ta laM a b+hiShany+tsa hUM// oM badz+ra tu sh+ya ho// rjesu
451b3(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+ma rnams// dag pa'i mchod pas gsal bar rje su mchod byas pa// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor pas bde ba grub par mdzod// e mA ho mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo
451b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid// mchog tu badre ba'i rnal 'byor bskal bzang mchog/ rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig ho// mkha' gdang dbyangs dang ye shis rgya// sa bon rdo rje pad+mar bcas// ling ga 'greng bar rang 'byung ba// brla'i
451b5(rgyud 'grel): dbusu gzhug bya ste// lding ga rdo rjer byin brlabs pas// rdo rje sems sogs skur bskye do// 'od 'phro kun tu khyab po yis// sangs rgyas tha~Md mnyes mdzad cing // dgro ba'i gnas chen rnam dgu par// mkha'
451b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// hUM las bskyed pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni// gsang gnas dbus kyi gdan la gzhug/ oM las gling bu traM pi waM/ baM las rnga chen dza rdza dza// a las me tog A spos me//
452a1(rgyud 'grel): las myar me dri chub// phyogs dang mtshamasu rim pa bzhin// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnamaso// dzaHhUM baM hoHsgo bzhi ru// rta mgrin 'phang mtho la sogasu bskyed// b+ha grar ling gA bcug
452a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ der ni mtshan mya bsgom par+ya bya// rdo rje sems dbu'i phyag rgya che// sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o// kun tu don mdzad 'dus pa dang // thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par sbyor// gling bu sngon mo rdo rje
452a3(rgyud 'grel): momatshan// rdo rje lcags sgrog shar gyi phyogaswA// byi waM ser mo rdo rjes mtshan// pog thogs bden bral mtshom su gnas// mA R+Sha me dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan// glu dbyangs drug ldan lho yis phyogs//
452a4(rgyud 'grel): chen dmar mo rdo rje'i rnga// brdung mdzad nub kyi phyogs na gnas// rdza rnga ljang gu rdza rnga la// rdo rjes mtshan brdung byang gi phyogs// me tog dmar ser rdo rjes mtshan// gzhong thogs ma yi mtsham su gnas// smos
452a5(rgyud 'grel): me dkar sngon rdo rjes mtshan// pog thogs bdon bral mtshamasu gnas// dmar me dmar mo rdo rje mtshan// gsol 'dzin rlung gi phyogasu gnas// dri chub ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan// dag 'byor dbang ldan mtsha
452a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas// rta mgrin 'phang mtho dkar mdangs can// lcags kyu rta mgrin ljang gu shar// phag gdong nag mo zhags pa g.yon// g.yas pa mche ba lho yi sker// nyi zla lcag sgrog nub kyi phyogs// thal byed
452b1(rgyud 'grel): ku g.yas dril bu// glu yon pa ban+d+ha sku btsas+ya pa// oM he ra ti badz+ra pA pi lA/ si na tA tha/ he rA ti g+hi te te taM/ he ra twa~M badz+ra he se h+ya ta gi he ra ti badz+ra nri tre pe ba le ba dzaM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra A lo
452b2(rgyud 'grel): kaM/ \u0f7foM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra a ku shaM dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra shri khe le bau/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De ho// 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs rnams kyis// rnam mdzes phreng ba'i rgyan thags shing // glu dbyangs rol mo'i
452b3(rgyud 'grel): gar du bcas// lha mo bcu gnyis rang snang rdzogs// dbang po drug la sangs rgyas kyis// gsang sngags phyag rgya sbyor ba'i mthus// rigs kyi bdag po yum dang bcas// rnam dag mngon shos ye shes rdzogs//

452b6(rgyud 'grel): e a ra li b+ha ga ban// mau hA ka ru NaM ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya staM/ dza hUMHbaM hoHtiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// sgyu 'phrul dga' ba'i rdo rje rol pa'i tshogs// gzhan la snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par mdzes/
453a1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams zil gyis gnon mdzad pa'i// rtog pa du ma'i sgro 'dogs gcod par mdzad// gnyis med ye shes gnyis can rnam mtha' yas// snang stong bde chen mnyam
453a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid dbyings la rol// kun 'byung yon tan stsol med lhun grub snang // rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bkod rang las byung // mdzad pa rgya chen 'gog med lhan grub pas// tshogs bcas rol pus bya ba kun
453a3(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzogs gnas// sku gsung thugs mchog yon tani phrin las rgyun// dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'i lha la phyag 'tsho lo// oM AHhUM a ti/ bu ho/ sarba ta thA ga ta bAn+d+ha nAM ka rlo mi/ a la la ho// dpal ldan
453a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// sri zhu byas shing btegs pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos
453a5(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag 'tshalo// oM bde bar gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod sprin mchog tu rol// oM nA maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yo/
453a6(rgyud 'grel): bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ung+ga te s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga ni khaM swA hA/ tshad med bzhi yi phyag rgya yis// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dag/ dam tshig dkyil 'khor la gzhug cing // mnyes nas dgas
453b1(rgyud 'grel): brtan par mdzod// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs ldan// khams gsum kun tu rgyab btab cing // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gasdang ba'i bdag/ oM badz+ra sAtwa hUM/ ma hA mu dra ste/
453b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' sgrol bzang dpal khyod bdag/ bdag cag sbubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol// rigs mchog sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi// byin+da rlabs bsgyur chu 'phrul bla na med// oM l+ya
453b3(rgyud 'grel): le la ho/ lcags kyi pad+mo mtshan bcas dkyil// 'od zer sbyor ba'i sngags dang bcas// oM na maHsar+b+ba sad+ya/ sta da sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+hU hU~M phaT// dpal grub sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid// dam tshig gan suM bzhag par bya//
