453b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+rI pa na pe n+yA su ra tr-i ti pu ba ra mu sa ma yo ga si ta A hUM/ oM AHhUM/ rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dam pa grub por mdzod// dam tshig dam pa grub par
453b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol tu gsol// gyen du 'thor dang thur du 'bebs// mar me 'debs sogs so so'i rgya// gling bu dang
454a1(rgyud 'grel): nI prI ljang dang // rgyud mngasna rgyud drug sil snyan dag/ dngos 'byor sprul pa gung yang rlung // rjem bzhi sngags dang sbyar te dbul// oM 'byung blta las thams cad byung // rangadwa las ma byung
454a2(rgyud 'grel): gang lnga med// gtsang sme'i dri rtog kun brel ba'i// bdud rtsi byung chub sems chen pos// bidrag sogs gnyisu med pa'i phyir// mnyam po chen po'i gnas la rol// a na madz+nyA sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta Ats+tsha
454a3(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ oM shin tu brgyan po'i rigs dang mtshan ldan mchog/ bkra shis glu dbyangs gar gyi bskyod byos pa'o// lha mo rdulo snyeng phyogs bcur spro byas nas// byang sems bde ba'i mchog pas rnam par rol/
454a4(rgyud 'grel): i maN+Da su kha b+ho d+hi tsid+d+ha a lA lA ho// oM mnyam nyid mi g.yo mnyam nyid mchog gi cho sa nyid cano// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i stag bsnol sel por mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub
454a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyor mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med med pa'i chos mchog can// oM yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chu la'ang tshad med// dpe ni na mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha'
454a6(rgyud 'grel): yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par gsol// oM rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs la byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med
454b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don mtha' yas lhur mdzad pa// thugs rje bdag nyid rnam par gnas// oM tshad med tshad dang bral bshin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa rnyed gyur/
454b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur// oM shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi
454b3(rgyud 'grel): nang na go 'phang mchog mnyes pa// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen cing // dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub bdag la stsol// dAm tshigs la grenas brtul zhugs mchog/
454b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags theg pa'i spyod pa nyid// rlung rdzogs byang chub kun don bzhin// 'khor lo bla med rdzogs gyur cig/ thugs rje che mnga' thabs ldan pas// rigs kyi dngos grub brten par mdzod//
454b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i ye shes mtha' yas mchog/ phrin las gnas chen rdzogs gyur cig/ rigs kyi sems dpa' gsum ldan pa// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma yi ger bcas// 'od 'phro gsal ba rnam gnyis kyis/
454b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis rgyun// rin chen thig le rnam gnyis 'od// rigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs byed pa'o// oM ma hA su khaM badz+ra satwa AHdzaHhUM baM ho/ su ra ta s+t+waM// ye shes dkyil 'khor
455a1(rgyud 'grel): brtan byed pa'o// yan lag cho ga kun bsdus te// rin chen 'bar ba'i gong bu la// mtshan ma rnam pa rim bzhin rdzogs// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor spro bsdu kun// mtshan ma lnga'i mthar
455a2(rgyud 'grel): ji srid yul kun brtan gnas pa// de gnas dmigs pa med pa'i chos// phyag rgya'i gsang gnas dkyil 'khor du// yi ge mtshan mo phra mo sku// rim bzhin rdzogs pas lus mdzad cing // phyag rgya bstan
455a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin// khams gsum yul bcas rnam dag pa'i// byang chub sems mchog bde ba'i rgyun// 'khor lo bzhi gzha gnas rim pa bzhin// dga' bzhis bskyod pa'i zla ba'i rgyu// gong gi phyag
455a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya'i tshogs dang bcas// rab tu chags pas rnam grol sems// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum bde ba me mar bzhin// rnam par spro zhing bsdu bya ste// 'dod pa'i yan lag rdzogs
455a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// thig le mnyam dang mnyam sbyor bas// dga' bcas byang chub sems bzhi bdag/ 'byor tshogs yang dag sbyor ba'i mthus// skye 'gags chos kun rnam par spangs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
455a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa// ji lta'i gzugs dbyingasu ldan// bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag lo bzhun par bya// chags pa med cing ma tshogs med// dbu mar yang ni dmigasu med// bud med kun gyi
455b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyu sbyor zhing // gnyisu med pa'i theg pa mchog/ thun mtshams sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yis// rigs kyi dam tshig sngags gsal zhing // bzlas brjod la sogs grangs kyis 'jug/ ye shes rdzogs pa'i
455b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo zhing // dam tshig yul kun mnyam sbyor zhing // rim dang TIg car yan lag gis// mtshan bcus mtshan ma med gnas dag/ rab tu brtan pas gnyis med rdzogs// mang du gsang
455b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdzas rnams kun// dag pa'i snod rnams bkang byas te// nye bar sbyar ba'i byin brlabs kyis// gnyis myed bdud rtsi chen po bsgrub// bsnyen pa rab gsal rdzogs pa las// nye bar gnas pa'i byin brlab
455b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas// sgrub pa bdag gzhan 'bras bu nyid// yang dag brtan 'gyur dga' chen po// 'jig rten mgron tshogs ma lus pa// rang gri sngags dang phyag rgyas dgug/ gtor mA'i rdzas rnams bsags pa dang /
455b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gcig thugs kyi sems bsreg shing // gsung gi gdung rtsi dag par mdzad// sku yi byin brlabs ye shes lnga// nye bar bkod pa'i sprin rnams kyis// thams cad dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i tshogs//
455b6(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing // shes rab yum bcas rol pa nyid// de dag sngags dang phyag rgya yis// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs par mchod// spyod lam kun tu ma nyams blos// phyag rgya'i
456a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor brtan byas te// thabs dang shes rab gar sogs kyis// rol pa'i 'phro 'du rgyun bzhin gnas// nges pa'i gsang mchog phyag rgya'i tshogs// nyer gsal bshad pa'i tshul
456a2(rgyud 'grel): drug gis// dron kun sku gsung thugs kyi tshul// rab sbyangs brtan par rdzogs pa nyid// mi shes dri ma kun sol cing // yang dag ye shes gnas gsal byed// rigs mchog 'khor lo rdzogs pa
456a3(rgyud 'grel): yid/ sgrub pa'i zlabs 'dis rgyas par shog// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rjesu dran pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba// slob dpon chen po thu bo rA dza ha ti sa
456a4(rgyud 'grel): ga / b+h+ya b+hU rna hU~M ASh+man+na d+hA kA r+b+hu dAd+yA/ rkyen nas nas / nas sa kyis ma sa
456a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba yis// tshe rabs dum+bAr b+hasags pa'i sdig sgri ma lus kun// dge 'dis dug lnga'i mi lce chu yis btsal ba bzhi ni// r-i bi mi ni byang chub snying po'i go 'phang myur blo rba shog/ ces mi dbang
456a6(rgyud 'grel): po lha bas sgo gsum tshig dril gyi smon lam btab pa'o// sarba mang+ga la
